directions: ['Cook over medium heat the sugar, milk and salt to soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Stir in peanut butter, butter, vanilla, coconut and chopped nuts.', 'Wait 5 minutes.', 'Beat with spoon until spreading consistency.', 'Spread over 9 x 13-inch pan.']

title: Banana Egg Nog
ingredients: ['1 mashed banana', '1 egg', '1 c. milk']
directions: ['Add banana and egg to milk.', 'Mix thoroughly.', 'Chill and pour in container.', 'Shake before using.']

title: Baked Canadian Bacon
ingredients: ['2 lbs Canadian bacon', '1/2 cup pineapple juice']
directions: ['Place bacon, fat side up in an open roasting pan; add juice.', 'Bake at 300F for 2 1/2 hours.', 'Very pretty garnished with pineapple rings or drained, canned peaches.']

title: Peanut Butter And Jelly French Toast
ingredients: ['1 peanut butter and jelly sandwich', '1 egg', '2 Tbsp. milk']
directions: ['Make peanut butter and jelly sandwich.', 'Dip both sides in egg/milk mixture.', 'Cook on buttered griddle until brown on one side, then turn over and brown other side.', 'Eat with a knife and fork.']

title: Easy Grilled Chicken Livers
ingredients: ['1 lb chicken liver', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Spray grill with non-stick cooking spray; heat grill to medium high heat.', 'Place livers on hot grill, being careful not to let any slide through.', 'Cook 3-4 minutes on each side.', 'Remove from grill, sprinkle with sea salt and freshly ground black pepper.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Microwave Chicken
ingredients: ['1 to 2 lb. whole chicken', 'Mrs. Dash seasoning salt']
directions: ['Wash chicken.', 'Take off excess fat.', 'Sprinkle with Mrs.', 'Dash salt inside and outside.', 'Place in large microwave dish with lid; breast side down.', 'Microwave on high 15 minutes.', 'Turn chicken. Microwave 20 more minutes.', 'Chicken will be nice and brown.']

title: Banana Soup
ingredients: ['1 banana', 'milk', 'sugar']
directions: ['Chop up a banana and put it in a bowl.', 'Pour milk over the banana.', 'Put some sugar on it.', 'You can eat it for breakfast or for a snack.', 'Some kids put corn flakes in it.']

title: Avocado Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 avocado', '1 banana', '3 cups milk', '3 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['put avocado, banana, milk, sugar,put in to a blender.', 'mix the ingredients with blender and ENJOY :).']

title: Egg With A Hat
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 egg']
directions: ['With a 2 1/2-inch round cutter, cut out a circle on the slice of bread.', 'Melt butter in a heavy frying pan.', 'Put in both pieces of bread.', 'Cook over moderate heat until they begin to brown. Break an egg into the hole and sprinkle it with salt and pepper. Continue cooking until the bread is brown.', 'Turn and brown the other side.', 'Add butter as needed to keep the bread from sticking. Serve with the cut-out piece on top.']

title: French Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/3 c. milk', '1 tsp. butter', '4 slices bread']
directions: ['Beat egg until frothy.', 'Add milk; beat well.', 'Melt butter in skillet on low heat.', 'Dip bread slices, one at a time, into egg mixture.', 'Lift them into skillet with pancake turner.', 'Brown on each side.', 'Serve with confectioners sugar, maple syrup or cinnamon and sugar, if desired.']

title: Grandpa Witzel'S Potato Pancakes
ingredients: ['1 medium potato', '1 egg', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['Peel and grate potato, then stir in egg and salt.', 'Fry in a large skillet as one large pancake in a small amount of oil over medium heat, turning once.', 'The pancake should be rather dark or it won't be cooked through.']

title: Shrimp Wrapped In Bacon
ingredients: ['8 large shrimp, shelled and deveined', '8 slices bacon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Wrap shrimp with bacon; fasten with toothpicks.', 'Place in baking pan.', 'Bake for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from oven; drain and serve.']

title: Watermelon Dash
ingredients: ['12 watermelon, cubed', '1 teaspoon black pepper', 'salt']
directions: ['Blend the chilled watermelon cubes.', 'Pour in a tall glass.', 'Sprinkle black pepper and salt.', 'Serve chilled.']

title: Hopple Popple
ingredients: ['1 medium potato', '1/4 chopped onion', '1/2 slice dried rye bread', '1 egg, beaten']
directions: ['Peel and dice potato; mix with onion and fry in bacon drippings.', 'Add salt and pepper and cubed bread until grease is absorbed.', 'Beat egg and pour slowly into skillet until cooked. Serve vegetables and salad or as a breakfast with toast or biscuits.', 'Can add ham or bacon chunks.']

title: Pistachio Pie(Serves 12)
ingredients: ['30 Ritz crackers', '1 stick melted margarine']
directions: ['Crush crackers; combine with melted margarine.', 'Press into 8 x 11-inch pan.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes and cool.']

title: Ketchup and Mayonnaise Broccoli for Bento
ingredients: ['3 bunches Broccoli', '2 tsp Mayonnaise', '1/2 tsp Ketchup']
directions: ['Boil the broccoli.', 'Mix the condiments together, spread on the broccoli, then bake in a toaster oven until browned.']

title: Unbelieveable Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chunk-style peanut butter']
directions: ['Beat the egg slightly in a bowl.', 'Add the sugar, peanut butter and vanilla and beat together until smooth. Drop by teaspoon on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a slow oven at 325° for 20 minutes or until nicely brown.', 'Makes about 40 cookies.']

title: Mom'S Baked Rice
ingredients: ['1/3 c. rice', '1/3 c. sugar', '1 qt. milk', 'pinch of salt']
directions: ['Stir all together in greased casserole.', 'Bake at 300° for 3 hours.', 'Stir every 15 minutes for first hour.', 'May add raisins and nuts.']

title: California-Style Blue Cheese Dressing
ingredients: ['1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. Blue cheese, crumbled', '1/4 c. dry white wine', '1 Tbsp. onion, grated', '5 drops hot pepper sauce']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients.', 'Cover; chill at least 2 hours. Makes 1 2/3 cups.']

title: Microwaved Scrambled Eggs with Tomato
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '5 pieces Chopped tomatoes', '1 Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Put the chopped tomatoes in a heatproof container.', 'Add 1 egg and lightly season with salt and pepper.', 'Mix together.', 'Wrap the mixture from Step 2 with plastic wrap and heat it in the microwave at 600 W for 50 seconds.', 'Remove it from the microwave and mix.', 'Wrap again and heat for another 30 seconds at 600 W.', 'Stir the mixture once more.', 'Transfer the eggs to a plate and enjoy.']

title: Tomato Butter Jelly Recipe
ingredients: ['7 pound ripe plum tomatoes', '7 c. sugar', '1 lemon, cut up and seeds removed']
directions: ['Put tomatoes in warm water and peel them first.', 'Put all ingredients in pot and cook down till thickened, about 2 hrs.', 'Keep on low fire, stir once in awhile.', 'No water.', 'Wash jars and lids in boiling water.', 'Use pint jars.']

title: Chunky Guacamole
ingredients: ['1 whole Avocado', '1 whole Lime', '2 cloves Garlic', '1 teaspoon Salt', '1 whole Plum Tomato']
directions: ['Cut the avocado in half to pit it.', 'Using a knife, cross-hatch the avocado fruit (cutting just until you hit the skin) and turn the avocado half inside out over a bowl.', 'The pieces should fall out.', '(If the avocado is less than willing to give up its inside, drag a spoon along the cross-hatched inside, along the area where the fruit meets the skin.)', 'Zest a little bit of the lime over the avocado pieces and then roll lime on a hard surface to release the inner juices.', 'Cut lime in half and squeeze the juice over the avocado pieces right away before the flesh turns brown.', 'Set aside.', 'Place the garlic on a cutting board and cut into smaller pieces.', 'Pile salt on top.', 'Mash together with a knife or a fork until it forms a paste.', 'Set aside.', 'Slice the tomato into small pieces and add it into the avocado.', 'Mash together until guacamole is to desired consistency.', 'Add garlic and salt and mix together.', 'Serve with tortilla chips.']

title: Toad In Hole
ingredients: ['3 Tbsp. butter', '1 slice bread', '1 small egg']
directions: ['Melt butter in a small frying pan.', 'Using a biscuit cutter, cut a circle from center of bread slice.', 'Fry bread until brown and crisp on one side, then turn over and break egg into circle.', 'Fry over low heat until done.', 'Use fried bread round to dip into egg when served.']

title: Bacon Fried Apples
ingredients: ['1 whole Gala Apple', '4 strips Bacon']
directions: ['Slice the apple, leaving on the skin.', 'Cut the bacon in half so you have 8 pieces that are shorter and more manageable.', 'In a skillet or on a griddle, cook the bacon till almost done. Add the apple slices directly and cook for one minute on each side.', 'Move to a paper towel and pat off grease. Serve warm.']

title: Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Bring the sugar and the milk to a boil until it makes a ball. Add the rest of the ingredients and pour on a plate and let it sit.'],['sugar'

title: Homemade Bread Crumbs
ingredients: ['2 loaves firm-textured white bread', '1 cup butter', 'salt & freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Use a food processor or blender to crumb the bread evenly.', 'Crumbs should not be like sand.', 'Leave some texture-don't overprocess.', 'Melt butter in a large pan and add crumbs and salt and pepper.', 'Stir until evenly coated.', 'Continue stirring over medium heat until the crumbs sound like sand when they hit the bottom of the pan.', 'Cool thoroughly.', 'Then store in heavy duty plastic bags with zipper seals.', 'Don't put them in the refrigerator-they won't keep.', 'Store them in a cabinet for up to six months.']

title: English Toffee
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 lb. butter']
directions: ['Put sugar and butter in a heavy pan and cook, stirring until it turns the color of brown paper bag.', 'Pour on buttered surface and melt chocolate bars on top.', 'Sprinkle on chopped nuts.']

title: Christmas Punch
ingredients: ['1 can pineapple juice', '2 cans frozen orange juice, will make 2 qt', '2 pkg strawberry kool aid, will make 4 qt']
directions: ['Mix ingredients. Add 2 qt chilled ginger ale before serving. Top with pineapple sherbet.'],['strawberry'

title: Peanut Butter Playdough
ingredients: ['2 cups Creamy Peanut Butter', '2 cups Powdered Milk', '3 Tablespoons Honey']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a bowl. If dough is too sticky, add more powdered milk, one tablespoon at a time. Wash your hands, and play with the dough on a clean surface!']

title: Crisp Bacon Potatoes
ingredients: ['6 potato', '14 lb bacon']
directions: ['Peel the potatoes; dice into large pieces.', 'Grease a large baking pan with sides.', 'Place potatoes in a single layer in the pan.', 'Lay strips of bacon across the potatoes.', 'Bake 400 degrees for about 40 minutes.', '**This recipe is great because you can use one or more potatoes.', 'Usually 1 pound of bacon will work with a large number of potatoes.']

title: Pommes de Terre pour le Petit Dejeuner
ingredients: ['potato, raw', 'bacon grease']
directions: ['Peel and prepare the spuds however you like for the final product, ie diced, sliced as thin as potato chips, or grated.', 'Next, for the real old-fashioned diner-type spud, parboil them THE NIGHT BEFORE!', 'They should be dropped into rapidly boiling water, and then returned to a boil- by the time the water has returned to a'rolling' boil, they should be done.', 'Stir them a couple times and taste-test one or two- the'crunch' of fresh spuds should be all gone, but they can\'t be mushy- then, drain them completely and run COLD water over them until they are no longer warm (If you fail to do this, the internal heat of the spuds will continue to cook them).', 'NOTE: If using grated or very thinly sliced potatoes, drain and rinse them before the water returns to a full boil, because they will cook very quickly.', 'Store the drained, parboiled spuds in a sealed container in the fridge and refrigerate overnight.', 'Next morning, pull out the amount of spuds you'll need- about 1 medium potato or 1 large handful per person.', 'Then, pre-heat a skillet or griddle until a drop of water'dances'.', 'Add your bacon grease- the amount is up to you and the quantity you're cooking- you will need enough to lightly coat all the spuds.', 'Keep the cooking heat around a medium temperature- grills in diners are kept at a constant temperature all day long, and you need even heat for best results.', 'Use a heavy cast-iron or aluminum pan or griddle- you are going to be dropping cold spuds into hot grease and thin pans will cool off rapidly, requiring extra cooking time to re-heat the pan.', 'Drop the spuds into the grease and flip them constantly until they are all coated with grease.', 'Press down to ensure even heating and place a flat pot lid over the potatoes until they are ready to turn the first time.', 'Brown them to your desired preference.', 'Turn them once and, when they are browned on the other side, use your spatula to break them loose from the pan and slide onto a serving plate.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Curd And Onion Chutney
ingredients: ['1 big onion, sliced finely', '1 tomato', '1 c. yogurt', 'salt']
directions: ['Slice onion and tomato.', 'Add yogurt and enough salt; mix well. Serve with the Biryani.', 'One small finely chopped chili may be added to this and mixed well.']

title: Quick And Easy
ingredients: ['saltine crackers', 'thin sliced bacon, each piece cut in half']
directions: ['Wrap each cracker with 1/2 slice of bacon.', 'Bake at 250° for 50 minutes.', 'Store in airtight tin.']

title: Wilma'S Cracker Snacks(Microwave)
ingredients: ['2 doz. saltine crackers', '12 strips bacon']
directions: ['Wrap 1/2 slice of bacon around each cracker.', 'Place on paper towels and microwave until bacon is crisp.', 'Cool and serve.']

title: Extremely Easy Peanut Butter Cookie Recipe
ingredients: ['1 cup Peanut Butter', '1/2 cups Granulated Sugar', '1 whole Egg', '1 teaspoon Vanilla']
directions: ['Simply whisk all ingredients together until thoroughly combined. Chill for 30 minutes. Roll into 18 balls. With a fork, create a crisscross pattern. Bake at 325 degrees F for 18-20 minutes. Cool and serve with milk.']

title: Diced Carrots And Bacon
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. diced, boiled carrots', '1/4 lb. bacon', '1 onion, chopped']
directions: ['Chop bacon and saute until almost crisp.', 'Drain off part of the fat.', 'Add carrots and onion to the bacon and saute until brown.']

title: Avocado Toast
ingredients: ['1 ripe avocado', '2 slices bread', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Toast bread.', 'Spread avocado generously on toast.', 'Sprinkle black pepper on top.']

title: Joyce'S Baked Beans
ingredients: ['1 large can Showboat pork and beans', '1 c. chopped onion', '1 c. sugar', 'sliced bacon']
directions: ['Put pork and beans in pan.', 'Put in sugar and onions; stir well.', 'Then put sliced bacon on top of the beans and bake in a preheated oven at 350° or 400° for 30 minutes to 1 hour.']

title: Pumpkin Cheese Pie
ingredients: ['24 graham crackers, crushed', '1/2 c. margarine', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix and press into a 9-inch pie plate.'],['crackers'

title: Mango Avocado Lime Spread
ingredients: ['1 whole Mango, Cubed', '1 whole Avocado, Peeled, Pitted, Smashed', '1 whole Lime, Zest And Juice', '1/2 teaspoons Salt', '1 Tablespoon Pure Honey']
directions: ['In a food processor add all ingredietns and puree.', 'Transfer to a serving bowl.', 'If not using right away, cover and refrigerate.', 'Serve on toast, pita wedges, or crackers.']

title: MadCity Dale's Luv Seasoning #2
ingredients: ['1 13 cups salt', '1 13 cups black pepper', '13 garlic powder']
directions: ['Mix all together and package in Mason jar.', 'Store in refrigerator or freezer for long term storage.', 'Use filled shaker for daily use.']

title: Graham Pralines
ingredients: ['40 graham crackers', '2 sticks margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Combine sugar and margarine.', 'Boil for 2 minutes.', 'Add vanilla and nuts.', 'Spread over graham crackers.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.', 'Let cool and break apart.']

title: Honey Roasted Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['2 cups Honey Roasted Peanuts', '1/2 teaspoons Fine Sea Salt', '1 Tablespoon Peanut Oil, Optional']
directions: ['Transfer the peanuts to a heavy-duty food processor and process the nuts on high for about 5 minutes, stopping to scrape down the sides of the bowl every minute or so, and checking to see that the nuts havent stuck under your food processor blade.', 'Once the peanut butter looks smooth, add the salt and then process for another minute or so to make sure the butter looks glossy and smooth.', 'If you dont have a heavy-duty food processor, add the peanut oil to help the butter along (see notes).', 'Transfer the peanut butter to a small mason jar or airtight storage container.', 'Peanut butter can be used immediately and will keep for several weeks in the fridge.', 'Note: You shouldnt need to add any oil to this recipe unless you do not have a heavy-duty food processor.', 'What makes this peanut butter nice and smooth is time.', 'Keep processing, scrape down the bowl, and process again.', 'It will come together in under 10 minutes, I promise!']

title: Peach Smoothie
ingredients: ['12 cup milk', '1 banana', '1 peach', '1 teaspoon sugar']
directions: ['Blend milk,peach,banana,and sugar.', 'mix well and drink.']

title: Hot Turkey Salad
ingredients: ['2 c. turkey, cubed', '2 c. celery, cut fine', '2 Tbsp. onion, cut fine', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix well.', 'Put in casserole and cover with 1/2 cup buttered bread crumbs.', 'Bake 30 minutes at 350°.']

title: Jeffrey'S Favorite Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', 'dash of salt', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Cook the first 3 ingredients until mixture forms a soft ball in cold water.', 'Add the peanut butter, vanilla and butter; beat until hard.', 'Put on serving dish.', 'Refrigerate.']

title: Baked Tofu Pita With Cucumber-Radish Salad And Fruit
ingredients: ['1/2 Tomato', '1/2 tablespoon Low-fat, egg-free mayonnaise', '2 ounce whole-Wheat pita bread']
directions: ['Cut tofu into one-inch cubes. Rinse and chop tomato; mix with tofu cubes. Toast pita and cut in half. Spread each half of pita with mayonnaise and stuff with half tofu and tomato mixture. Serve.'],['tomato'

title: Peanut And Bacon Sandwich
ingredients: ['3/4 c. Peanut Butter', '1/4 c. Crisp Bacon', '8 slices of bread']
directions: ['Mix peanut butter and bacon well.', 'Spread on sandwich bread.']

title: Tuna and kale pasta bake
ingredients: ['1 can tuna', 'dash salt']
directions: ['Boil the pasta!', 'I tend to use 3 or 4 portions worth so as to fill the oven dish which lasts me about 4 servings, but depends on your portion size!', 'Boil as much or as little as needed, adjust quantity to requirements :)', 'Add in the peas so the peas and pasta are done at the same time.', 'I usually add them about 3-5mins before the pasta is cooked.', 'Drain the peas pasta!', 'Add in the tuna, mayo, pesto, kale and plenty of cheese.', 'I usually use 1 can of tuna, a large handful, or a couple, of kale (I have small hands and kale shrinks when cooked), plenty of pepper and herbs, a dash of salt and lots of cheese :) I have the queezy mayo bottles and add plenty - hold down for about 5 seconds.', 'You can use all f these ingredients to taste.', 'You can also add some chili flakes or olives too!', '!', 'Mix all together', 'Put into oven about 180C for approximately 15mins or until cheese melted/browning on top', 'Sprinkle more cheese (I chose a mix or grated mozzarella and cheddar for mine) on the top.', 'I also sprinkle more pepper and herbs on top too', 'Eat!']

title: Peanut Butter Honey Balls
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. honey', '1 c. dry milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', 'nuts', 'coconut']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and shape into small balls.', 'Roll in coconut or nuts.']

title: Best Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1/2 t. salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350F.', '', 'Place all ingredients in large mixing bowl and cream ingredients together until light in color, about 2 minutes with a mixer on medium speed.', '', 'By spoonful, roll dough into small balls and place on greased cookie sheet. Place about 2 inches apart.', '', 'Bake for 10 minutes at 350F. Let cool. Enjoy!', '', 'Optional: press one large chocolate chip or chocolate chunk into the center of each ball before baking.']

title: Whole Wheat Strawberry Pizza
ingredients: ['1/2 yeast', '2 tablespoons yogurt', '1/2 cup strawberry']
directions: ['Combine dry ingredients together', 'Now make a hole, and start adding wet ingredient slowly.', 'Knead at least 15 minutes, and set the dough aside for couple of hours in a warm setting', 'Preheat the oven at 400 f. Use a non stick baking sheets, or use an oil spray, or just grease the sheet with vegetable oil lightly', 'Roll your pizza before putting it on the baking pan.', 'Now add the sauce', 'Add the suggested toppings, or you can add or omit what you want.', 'Put it in the oven for 35 minutes, or less depending on your oven.', 'Serve it immediately.']

title: Egg Custard
ingredients: ['2 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 egg', '2/3 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Boil milk, sugar and butter together for 2 minutes.', 'Beat egg and add to mixture.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Bake in an unbaked pie shell at 375°.']

title: Peanut Butter and Cucumber Roll-Ups
ingredients: ['1 slice flat bread, whole wheat is better', '2 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 cucumber', '1 dash salt']
directions: ['Spread peanut butter on the flat bread.', 'Stay to the right side of the bread and spread the peanut butter so it comes to three of the four sides.', 'Cut a 4' long piece of the cucumber.', 'Seed and slice the cucumber into 1/4' x 4' sticks.', 'Place cucumber sticks lengthwise from the left side of the flat bread so they will roll up.', 'Sprinkle a little salt on the cucumbers.', 'Begin rolling from the left side by folding the bread over a couple of cucumber sticks, roll the sandwich tightly to the end and press to seal.', 'Turn the sealed side down and let rest for a minute.', 'Either cut in half on the diagonal or slice into pin-wheels and enjoy!']

title: Creamy Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['3 cups cooked rice', '3 cups milk', '1/2 cup sugar', '3 Tbsp. margarine', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine rice, milk, sugar and margarine.', 'Cook over medium heat until thickened (about 30 minutes).', 'Stir often.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Pour into serving dish.', 'Serve hot or cold.']

title: Easy Fried Rice
ingredients: ['2 cups rice', '1 whole egg', '1 whole onion']
directions: ['chop one onion so that it is very small.', 'saute the onion on medium heat for a few minutes.', 'beat egg and put in pan', 'put two cups of rice in the pan and mix it', 'mix with ketchup if you want.']

title: Tomato Cucumber Salad
ingredients: ['2 medium tomatoes, peeled and diced', '1 medium cucumber, peeled and diced', '1 small onion, diced', '3 Tbsp. mayonnaise', 'dash of salt and pepper']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a bowl.', 'Let stand in refrigerator 1 hour before serving.']

title: A Really Delicious Recipe
ingredients: ['1 large onion', 'salt', 'pepper', 'slice of margarine']
directions: ['Take the onion, preferably a Vidalia.', 'Peel the onion and quarter 3/4 of the way down the onion.', 'Cut a cup shaped depression in the top of the onion.', 'Place a piece of margarine on top of onion and salt and pepper.', 'Place in microwave for 5 to 8 minutes. Cover with waxed paper.', 'This is a great tasty treat.']

title: Pork rillette
ingredients: ['2 cups cooked pork', '1/2 cup mayonnaise', '1 dash salt & pepper']
directions: ['Chopped the pork fine.', 'In a bowl, mix the pork chopped, mayonnaise, salt & pepper.', 'Enjoy on the bread you like .']

title: Finnish Carrot Casserole
ingredients: ['1 bunch carrots', '2/3 c. rice', '1 egg', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Cook and mash carrots; cook rice until soft and mix with carrots.', 'Mix egg with milk and add to carrot mixture.', 'Season with salt.', 'Pour into greased casserole.', 'Dot with butter and bake in a 350° preheated oven for about 1 hour or until brown.']

title: Egg Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 c. milk', '4 slices bread']
directions: ['Beat the egg thoroughly and add the salt and milk.', 'Have the bread cut in thin slices.', 'Dip them in the milk, allowing each to absorb some.', 'Brown in a buttered frying pan or on a griddle. Butter and serve hot with sugar and cinnamon or syrup.']

title: Fake Whip Cream Frosting
ingredients: ['3/4 cup confectioners' sugar', '1 egg white', '1 cup grated apple', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a large bowl, combine confectioners' sugar, egg white, grated apple and vanilla. Beat on high speed of an electric mixer until desired consistency is achieved.']

title: Easy Hershey Fudge

directions: ['Cook the first 3 ingredients until boiling; boil for 5 minutes.', 'Remove from heat; let cool for 10 seconds.', 'Add the chocolate bars.', 'Stir until mixed.', 'Pour into a 10 x 13-inch greased glass container.']

title: Milk Chocolate Fondue
ingredients: ['2/3 cup Double cream', '12 ounces Good quality milk chocolate']
directions: ['In 2-quart heavy saucepan, heat half-and-half and chocolate over low heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and mixture is smooth; remove from heat. Stir in liqueur. Pour into fondue pot or chafing dish.']

title: Appetizer Bacon Snack
ingredients: ['Club crackers', 'bacon']
directions: ['Mash out slice of bacon and cut in 3 slices.', 'Wrap each tightly around a cracker, tucking ends underneath.', 'Bake 1 hour at 250°.', 'Makes a bow shaped snack.']

title: Breakfast Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 banana', '4 ounces crushed pineapple', '13 cup mango, pieces', '1 peach, peeled and diced', '1 cup skim milk']
directions: ['Mix all together in a blender until smooth.'],['peach'

title: Sweet And Sour Punch
ingredients: ['2 pkg. cherry Kool-Aid', '2 pkg. strawberry Kool-Aid', '2 pkg. orange Kool-Aid', '1 large can orange juice', '6 c. sugar', 'juice of 1 lemon', '1 large can pineapple']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients for concentrate. Make punch 1 part concentrate to 3 parts water.'],['sugar'

title: Honey-Marinated Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 as many as you have Freshly-picked cherry tomatoes', '1 Honey']
directions: ['Remove the stems of the tomatoes and stick in 2 toothpicks into each tomato.', 'Put the tomatoes and toothpicks in a pot of boiling water and blanch them for 30 seconds.', 'Drain and cool the tomatoes in cold water.', 'Peel each cherry tomato and place them in a plastic container.', 'Drain any water in the plastic container and pour enough honey on top of the tomatoes to cover each tomato.', 'The amount of honey doesn't have to be precise.', 'Store them in the refrigerator and leave for at least 1/2-1 day before serving.', 'Enjoy as a dessert.', 'If you end up making too much, divide each serving into plastic bags, and freeze them.', 'These honey marinated cherry tomatoes are also delicious frozen.', 'Their texture will become similar to sherbet.', 'They are also delicious served with unsweetened yogurt.']

title: Banana Peanut Butter Pudding
ingredients: ['1 medium banana', '2tbs. milk', '2-2 1/2tbs. peanut butter']
directions: ['1.slice banana into small pieces and place in a cereal bowl', '2.add in peanut butter', '3. add in milk', '4. mix with spoon or mixer until consistency of pudding']

title: Salmon And Cucumber

directions: ['Remove the skin and bones from the salmon; mix together with mayonnaise to taste.', 'Slice the cucumber into 3/4-inch slices and with a sharp paring knife make a shallow indentation in each slice.', 'Top each slice with salmon.']

title: Baked Cauliflower

directions: ['Cook cauliflower until tender.', 'Place in 8-inch glass dish. Cover with slices of yellow American cheese.', 'Crumble on Ritz crackers.', 'Drizzle melted margarine over crackers.', 'Bake uncovered 30 minutes at 350°.']

title: Air Fryer Bacon Wrapped Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 lb asparagus', '8 slices bacon']
directions: ['Heat air fryer to 350-degrees F.', 'Collect asparagus into 8 bundles of 2 or 3 pieces. Wrap each bundle in a slice of bacon and transfer to a plate; repeat with remaining bacon.', 'Working in batches, place the bundles in the air fryer basket and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until bacon is crisp.', 'Serves: 4 ; Calories: 69; Total Fat: 3 grams; Saturated Fat: 1 gram; Total Carbohydrate: 4 grams; Sugars: 2 grams; Protein: 6 grams; Sodium: 149 milligrams; Cholesterol: 10 milligrams; Fiber: 2 grams.']

title: Chemical Free Easy Mix to Lighten Up Dark Skin
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon milk', '1 teaspoon honey']
directions: ['To lighten dark skin, apply a mix of milk and honey and massage it into the skin.', 'Leave it on for an hour.', 'Rinse it.', 'Gradually you will notice your skin colour lighten up!']

title: Milk Honey Moisture Mask
ingredients: ['1 12 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon milk']
directions: ['Mix milk and honey together.', 'Smooth over the face.', 'Leave it on for 10 minutes.', 'Rinse with warm water.']

title: Creamy Avocado Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups milk', '1 avocado, cut into chunks', '1/2 cup yogurt', '1 banana, halved']
directions: ['Combine milk, avocado, yogurt, and banana in a blender; blend until smooth. Divide between 2 glasses.']

title: 3 Ingredient Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 Cup Peanut Butter, plain', '1 Cup Granulated Sugar', '1 Large Egg']
directions: ['Blend the 3 ingredients well and is best to add the egg last before blending.', '', 'Using a teaspoon, drop dough onto an ungreased cookie sheet leaving about 2 inches between them. Dip a table fork into some granulated sugar and make a cross-hatched design on the top of the dough while flattening slightly.', '', 'Bake in a preheated oven at 350 degrees']

title: 1-1-1 Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 Cup Peanut Butter', '1 Cup Sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Blend all three ingredients until throughly mixed. Place by spoonful on a cookie sheet with parchment paper 2-inches apart. Cook for 10-12 minutes and allow to cool before eating.'],['egg'

title: Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', '1 c sugar', '1 c creamy peanut butter']
directions: ['In a large bowl, mix all ingredients. Roll level tbsp into balls. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten with a fork. bake at 350° for 10-12 min. makes about 2 dozen.']

title: Coffee (Or Any Flavor) Granita
ingredients: ['5 cups strong brewed coffee', '1 1/4 cups sugar']
directions: ['Brew your coffee however you like. Remove the brewed coffee to a saucepan and add the sugar, then cook over low heat until the sugar dissolves.', 'Pour the coffee-sugar mixture into a 8' square Pyrex baking dish (or whatever shallow baking dish you have). Place in the freezer.', 'After 40-60 minutes, remove the dish from the freezer and see if any ice crystals have formed around the edges of the dish. If they have, use a fork to gently scrape the icy bits from the edges into the center of the dish, which will still be somewhere on the spectrum from liquid to slushy. Return the dish to the freezer.', 'Check on the granita every hour for a few hours, repeating the gentle scraping of the ice into the center. After a few hours (depending on how much you're making and how cold your freezer is) you should have a beautiful pile of icy shards.', 'You can serve the granita immediately, plain or topped with whipped cream. Or you can leave it in the freezer until you need it, using a fork to scrape it up when you're ready to serve.']

title: Pumpkin Souffle Crunch
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. mashed pumpkin', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/4 c. milk', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 1/2 Tbsp. margarine', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine pumpkin and sugar, mixing thoroughly. Add milk, egg and melted margarine. Stir; add remaining ingredients and pour into a greased casserole dish. Cover with Crunch Topping (see following recipe) and bake at 350° for 35 minutes.']

title: Peanut Butter Bread Fingers
ingredients: ['1/2 c. peanut butter', '1 c. milk', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '12 slices of bread']
directions: ['Cream together peanut butter and milk; add salt and pepper, then add slightly beaten egg.', 'Remove crusts from bread slices and cut into narrow strips.', 'Dip in the mixture and saute in butter.']

title: Pineapple Boat
ingredients: ['1 large pineapple', '1 banana, sliced', '1/4 c. mayonnaise', '1 1/4 c. cooked chicken', '1/4 c. diced celery', '1/2 c. coconut']
directions: ['Cut pineapple lengthwise.', 'Scoop out pineapple.', 'Mix pineapple pieces with all of the remaining ingredients.', 'When ready to serve, return ingredients to pineapple halves.']

title: Best Peanut Butter Kisses Cookie Recipe
ingredients: ['1 can Eagle Brand sweetened cond. lowfat milk', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Blend together.', 'Blend with the peanut butter mix, form into 1-inch balls and roll in white sugar.', 'Bake at 325 degrees for 8 to 10 min, add in candy kiss immediately (press into cookie) out of oven and place to cold.', 'Cookies won't appear to be done, check the bottom of the cookie if it is slightly brown it is done, allow cookie to set overnight with the kiss on top and they will be wonderful each additional day you can keep them!']

title: Grilled Hawaiian Salmon
ingredients: ['1 whole medium butterflied salmon', '3 large tomatoes, sliced', '1 cup mayonnaise', '1 large lemon, sliced thinly']
directions: ['Place cleaned salmon on a large piece of heavy foil, open and flat with skin side down.', 'Spread mayonnaise on one side of fish, and layer sliced tomatoes on top.', 'Put salmon back together as a whole fish, and layer lemon slices over salmon.', 'Wrap with foil and grill for 30 minutes (or until fish flakes easily): you can also do this with salmon steaks.']

title: Quick Potato Soup
ingredients: ['4 strips bacon, cut fine', '1/2 c. celery, cut fine', '2 c. raw potato, cut fine', '1/2 c. carrots, cut fine', '1 small onion, cut fine']
directions: ['Add 1 quart water to ingredients; cook until tender.', 'Mash well.', 'Add milk, salt, pepper and butter to taste.', 'Simmer.']

title: Almond Bread, Avocado And Poached Egg
ingredients: ['1 slice Julian's Paleo Almond Bread', '1 whole Egg', '1 Avocado']
directions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 400°F or use a toaster for the almond bread.', '2. If using the oven, bake the almond bread for 30 minutes.', '3. Poach or soft boil an egg.', '4. Remove the almond bread from the oven and mash the avocado on top.', '5. Gently place the egg over the avocado', 'Enjoy!', 'Optional: add a sprinkle of lime juice to the avocado to make it a little zesty!']

title: Custard
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 c. milk', 'dash of salt', '1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Beat egg until fluffy.', 'Add remaining ingredients.', 'Bake at 350° until light brown.', 'Don't overbake.']

title: Pineapple Bacon Wraps
ingredients: ['8 slices bacon', '1 can pineapple chunks, drained']
directions: ['You will need toothpicks.'],['bacon'

title: Smoked Pineapple Rumaki
ingredients: ['1 slice bacon', '1 pineapple chunk']
directions: ['Take the pineapple chunks, wrap them in bacon, hold them together with toothpicks, and you're done with preparation.', 'In and offset firebox smoker, they'll be done in around 2 hours at 250 degrees F. If you're doing them on a charcoal grill, they need to be watched and turned so nothing burns.', 'A year or so ago I served these to a bunch of folks at a large gathering. I had underestimated the number of folks who would show up for supper. Even so, I figured one or two per person would be enough. I was wrong. They were all devoured, leaving none for Linda and I! And, I got requests to do it again next time.', 'Fine results for such a simple thing.']

title: Pineapple And Bacon
ingredients: ['24 pineapple chunks', '8 slices bacon']
directions: ['Fry bacon until clear and still soft. Do not cook completely or it won't roll when cool.', 'Depending on the length of bacon slices, cut crosswise into 2 or 3 pieces.', 'Wrap bacon around pineapple, securing with a toothpick.', 'Place in a shallow baking pan.', 'Bake in 350°F (180°C) oven for about 15 minutes or until bacon is cooked.', 'May also be broiled.', 'Variation: Use dates instead of pineapple.']

title: Pasta Salad
ingredients: ['1 cucumber, seeded and chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '1/2 medium onion, chopped', 'pasta']
directions: ['Cover the cucumber, tomato and onion with Kraft Italian dressing (no fat) overnight.']

title: Vanilla Sugar
ingredients: ['2 cups granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract']
directions: ['Blend the sugar and the vanilla extract in a bowl, then spread it on a tray lined with wax paper or plastic wrap and let it dry for 5 hours.', 'Press out any lumps or sift through a strainer.', 'Store it in an air tight plastic container.']

title: White Bread
ingredients: ['2 1/4 c. lukewarm milk', '3 Tbsp. sugar', '1 Tbsp. salt', '2 pkg. yeast, dissolved']
directions: ['Dissolve 2 packages yeast in 1 cup warm liquid; stir until well mixed.', 'Add 2 tablespoons soft shortening and 7 to 7 1/ 2 cups Gold Medal flour, adding flour in 2 additions, using the amount necessary to make easy to handle.', 'Knead dough and let rise until double in bulk.', 'Knead and let rise again.', 'Work into loaves and let rise again.', 'Bake in 425° oven until golden brown, about 30 minutes.']

title: Homemade Condensed Milk 2 [Fresh Milk]
ingredients: ['6 cups milk, whole, skim, nofat', '2 1/4 cups sugar']
directions: ['In heavy saucepan pour milk and bring to a boil.', 'Reduce to a simmer.', 'Cook to reduce to about 2/3 in volume, stirring occasionally.']

title: Homemade Condensed Milk 1 [fresh Milk]
ingredients: ['6 cups milk, whole, skim, nofat', '5 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['In heavy saucepan pour milk and bring to a boil.', 'Reduce to a simmer and cook for about 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Stir in sugar and continue simmering 10 to 15 minutes, or until milk has reduced to 3 cups.', 'Strain.', 'Milk can be refrigerated for up to one week.']

title: Crispy Garlic Chips
ingredients: ['4 garlic cloves, as large as possible, peeled', '1 cup olive oil']
directions: ['Using a small slicer or a mandoline, slice the garlic very thin.', 'Heat the olive oil in a 10-inch cast-iron skillet over medium-high heat until very hot. Line a plate with two paper towels. To test the temperature of the oil, add a slice of garlic. If it sizzles, add the rest of the garlic and cook until just crisp and light golden brown, a matter of seconds. Use a flat slotted skimmer to keep the slices from sticking together as they cook, and transfer them to the paper towels to drain the moment they turn color. (The oil can be strained and used for another batch or reserved for another use.)']

title: Ear Drops
ingredients: ['3 ounces olive oil', '3 4 garlic cloves']
directions: ['Crush or mince garlic.', 'Put it in a clean glass jar with lid.(Baby food jars are great)', 'Leave it sitting on the counter and gently shake it every time you pass by for 4 or 5 hours.', 'Strain off the oil and either discard the garlic solids or save them to use in a recipe.', 'Put the oil in a dropper bottle.(Preferably glass).', 'For use when having ear pain or sore throat: Put two or three drops of oil in each ear, twice a day, once in the morning and again at night.', 'Place a cotton ball in the ear for a few minutes to absorb any excess oil.', 'Keep oil in the refrigerator and warm gently rolling the bottle between your hands before using.', 'NOTES:', 'It gets slightly solidified in the refrigerator. More is NOT better.', 'Ears need to be able to 'breathe'/get oxygen.', 'You should make fresh ear drops every two or three days. I keep mine three days -- I\'ve never had a problem with 'spoilage'.', 'You can make less if you will only be using it for one person.']

title: '"Garlic And Olive Oil Paste'"
ingredients: ['4 5 garlic heads', '1 quart olive oil, use the good stuff']
directions: ['Add 4-5 heads of garlic (separate the cloves and peel them) see note above.', 'Add garlic to olive oil.', 'Let the garlic marinate for one week in glass container in refrigerator.', 'Using food processor, make garlic and olive oil to a paste.', 'Store the mixture in a jar or bottle in the refrigerator.']

title: Dark Turkey Stock
ingredients: ['Bones, leftover meat and carcass from a 15-pound turkey', '2 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks', '1 large onion, peeled and quartered', '1 stalk celery, roughly chopped']
directions: ['Heat oven to 450 degrees.', 'Place bones, meat and chopped or broken-up carcass in a large roasting pan, and place in the oven.', 'Roast, stirring occasionally, for about 1 hour, or until nicely browned.', 'Don't worry if the meat sticks to the bottom of the pan.', 'Add chopped vegetables, and roast for about 30 minutes more, stirring once or twice.', 'Remove roasting pan to stove top, and place it over one or two burners, whichever is more convenient.', 'Turn heat to high, and barely cover the bones with water, about 8 to 10 cups (it's fine if some of the bones poke up out of the water).', 'When water boils, turn heat down so that the liquid simmers.', 'Cook, stirring occasionally and scraping bottom of pan to loosen any bits of meat, for about 30 minutes.', 'Cool, then strain.', 'Refrigerate, and skim off excess fat.', 'Then, store for up to 3 days in the refrigerator (longer if you bring the stock to a boil every second day), or up to several months in the freezer.']

title: Homemade Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons peanut oil', '2 pounds honey roasted peanuts']
directions: ['Pour the peanut oil into the bowl of a food processor. Turn the processor on. As the blade is spinning, gradually add the peanuts. Process until smooth, scraping down the sides of the bowl as needed, about 2 minutes. Store refrigerated in an airtight container.']

title: Asparagus And Ham Recipe
ingredients: ['1 bn asparagus', '12 slc good ham extra virgin olive oil']
directions: ['Trim the bottoms off the asparagus stalks and cook the stalks in boiling water for 4-5 min, till tender.', 'Drain and run under cool water.', 'Lay a couple of stalks of cooked asparagus onto a slice of ham and roll it up.', '(repeat with remaining asparagus and ham)', 'Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil and serve.']

title: Simple Homemade Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1/2 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '3 drops vanilla']
directions: ['Place above ingredients in quart size freezer bag.', 'Place ice in 4 tablespoons of table salt in gallon size freezer bag.', 'Place smaller bag inside larger bag and shake for 5 minutes.']

title: Banana Sangria Recipe
ingredients: ['2 ounce Banana Schnapps', '1/2 x Wine', '1/4 x orange juice', '1/4 x pineapple juice']
directions: ['Ice // rocks'],['wine'

title: Porra Antequera
ingredients: ['1 kg stale bread', '1 1/2 kg ripe tomatoes', '4 cloves garlic', '1/4 cup olive oil', 'salt']
directions: ['Cut the bread into very small pieces.', 'Peel the tomatoes by putting tomatoes in boiling water for five minutes then removing and plunging into cold water.', 'Put sliced garlic and the rest of ingredients in a bowl, mash together until it holds together, adding the olive oil gradually.', 'Refrigerate until well chilled.', 'Serve as tapas with chopped hard-boiled eggs or green peppers if you like.']

title: Mexican Rice
ingredients: ['4-6 tomatoes', '2-3 cloves garlic', '1 onion', '1 1/2 c rice']
directions: ['Blend in food processor or blender tomatoes,garlic & onion.', 'Saute rice with a little oil in frying pan. When toasted add tom mixture, turn down to simmer for 2 min or so.']

title: Rice Pudding(Top Of Stove)
ingredients: ['3 c. cooked rice', '3 c. milk', '1/2 c. sugar', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine rice, milk, sugar and butter.', 'Cook over medium heat until thickened, about 30 minutes.', 'Stir often.', 'Add vanilla. Serve hot or cold.']

title: Chicken-Eggplant Casserole
ingredients: ['1 eggplant', '1 Tbsp. onion', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 c. boned chicken', '3 tomatoes', '1 tsp. salt', 'Ritz crackers']
directions: ['Cut eggplant from shell.', 'Cook onion in butter.', 'Add to chicken, eggplant and tomatoes.', 'Cook 15 minutes over surface burner; then add egg and salt.', 'Fill shell with mixture (or put in dish).', 'Cover with buttered cracker crumbs.', 'Bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes.']

title: Brownies
ingredients: ['nuts', 'sugar']
directions: ['You make up at home and for Thanksgiving dinner.', 'Get a brown potato that is white inside.', 'Carve it out and throw away the peelings.', 'Smash it good and put some milk in it.', '(I think that's how you make it.)']

title: Easy Avocado Shake
ingredients: ['1/2 Hass avocado', '2 oz coconut milk', '4 oz whole milk', '2 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients into a blender.', 'Add 1 cup of ice and blend.', 'Pour into a fountain glass and garnish with toasted coconut shavings.']

title: Cafe Au Lait Granita
ingredients: ['3 cups hot strong brewed coffee', '3 cups 1% low-fat milk', '1/2 cup sugar']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a pitcher; stir until sugar dissolves. Pour into ice cube trays; freeze 4 hours or until firm.', 'Let stand at room temperature 10 minutes. Place the frozen cubes in a food processor; process until smooth. Spoon into chilled dishes; serve immediately.']

title: Glenda'S Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '3/4 cup sugar', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl.', 'Shape dough into 1' balls.', 'Place 2' apart on an ungreased baking sheet, and flatten in a criss-cross pattern with a fork.', 'Bake 8-10 minutes at 350°.']

title: Chocolate-Peanut Butter Shake
ingredients: ['1 pint low-fat sugar-free chocolate ice cream', '1/2 cup skim milk', '1/4 cup creamy peanut butter', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in blender. Cover and blend until smooth.', 'Pour into 2 small glasses.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Yo-Naise (Light Mayonnaise)
ingredients: ['14 cup nonfat plain yogurt', '14 cup mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix together ingredients and use in your favorite recipes.'],['yogurt'

title: Baked Salmon Fillets
ingredients: ['4 salmon fillets', '1 cup olive oil', '1 teaspoon sea salt, and freshly ground pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 and Line a pan with non stick foil.', 'Spread olive oil across foil where each fillet will go.', 'Place fillets evenly across foil-thicker ones on the outside.', 'Cover in olive oil.', 'Sprinkle sea salt and freshly ground pepper on top of each fillet.', 'Bake at 450 for 12-15 minutes until cooked through and easily flakes with a fork.']

title: Cherry Tomato Hors D'Oeuvres
ingredients: ['12 cherry tomatoes', '1/2 cup celery', '1/2 cup onion', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 cup cooked chicken']
directions: ['Slice your cherry tomatoes in half. Scoop out the interior with a melon ball scoop, and place your tomatoes on a serving dish.', 'Make sure your celery and onions are finely chopped. Using a fork and a folding motion, mix them in a bowl with your mayonnaise.', 'Add 1 cup finely chopped cooked chicken (you can also substitute tuna or ham) to the bowl with your celery and onions. Mix with fork continuing your folding motion until you achieve the desired consistency.', 'If you are not adding meat, substitute an additional 3/4 cup each of finely chopped celery and onions.', 'Add more Mayo if you like, but be careful. Too much will make your filling soggy.', 'Using your melon ball scoop, fill each tomato with a scoop of your filling. When all are done, sprinkle with dried parsley flakes, cover, and place in your refrigerator to chill. Serve about 1 hour after making.', 'This recipe makes 24 Hors D'oeuvres. You can increase ingredients proportionately if you want to make more.']

title: Goat Cheese Salmon

directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a large baking dish.', 'Arrange the salmon fillets in the baking dish. Make small incisions in each fillet, and stuff with equal amounts of the herbed goat cheese. Spread equal amounts prepared Dijon mustard mayonnaise blend over each fillet. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Bake salmon 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until easily flaked with a fork.']

title: Ms Mogie Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '1 cup peanut butter crunchy', '1 large egg', '1 tsp vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients. Drop by spoon onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 F for 12 minutes.'],['egg'

title: All Shook Up Vanilla Ice Cream Recipe

directions: ['In a pint-size bag, mix lowfat milk, sugar and vanilla.', 'Then seal.', 'Fill gallon-size bag half full of ice and salt.', 'Put sealed small bag in with the ice.', 'Seal large bag.', 'Shake the bag about 5 min till it becomes ice cream.', 'Wipe the small bag off.', 'Open and dig in!']

title: Quick and Easy! Garlic Shoots and Bacon Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['8 Garlic shoots', '2 slice Bacon']
directions: ['Chop the garlic shoots into 3 cm length.', 'Cut the bacon into 1 cm strips.', 'Put the bacon in a pan, and stir-fry over low heat.', 'When it becomes brown and fat renders, add the garlic shoots.', 'Stir-fry until the bacon becomes crispy, then it's done.']

title: Christmas Porridge(Risengrynsgrot)

title: Easy Rice Pudding

title: Grilled Carrots

directions: ['Prepare hot grill. Rub carrots with oil and place on oiled grill 4-6 inches from coals.', 'Grill, turning occasionally, until outside is browned and inside is tender, about 20 minutes.']

title: Tuna Marinade

directions: ['Mix juice of 1 whole lemon; Soy Sauce until enough in juice, 1 tablespoon powdered Ginger, 1/2 tablespoon powdered Garlic, 1/2 teaspoon Ancho Chili Powder, Crushed red pepper dash or two. Mix together above ingredients and marinate for minimum of 1 hour, turn every 15 minutes. Before searing sprinkle with Black Sesame Seeds on all sides. Get Skillet super hot add olive oil sear on all sides about a minute or two.', 'That is it']

title: Banana Sandwiches

title: Coffee With Coconut Milk

Let simmer 15 to 20 minutes or until the mixture is creamy.', 'Strain the mixture; set aside.', 'Grill the coconut (that was strained) in a preheated oven of 350 F until lightly gril. Set aside.', 'Distribute the coconut milk and coffee in 4 mugs equally.', 'Put sugar if you want and gasnish with grilled coconut.']

title: Puerto Rican Garlic Marinade

directions: ['In a blender or food processor, combine olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper. Process for 3 to 5 minutes.']

title: 30 Minute Baked Potato
ingredients: ['1 potato, well scrubbed', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Stab the potato with a fork several times and wrap in a paper towel. Place in a microwave on high for 8 minutes, turning half way through. (Add 2 minutes for each additional potato.).', 'Remove from microwave and brush with olive oil. Then place in a pre-heated 200 C (Gas Mark 6) oven for 15 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and slice with a cross. Add butter or other toppings as desired.']

title: Fancy Baked Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 potato', '1 teaspoon olive oil']
directions: ['Wash Potatoes, Dry off, Place 2 wooden spoons on each side of the potato. With a sharp knife slice potato down to the spoon 1/4' slices down the whole length of the potato. slightly fan out. Drizzle with olive oil and fav spices.', 'Bake one hour at 350']

title: Spicy Italian Lasagna
ingredients: ['onion 1 sm., chopped', '3 cloves garlic minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Saute above ingredients in a large pot.', 'Add to above ingredients until browned. Add the following to above ingredients: 8 oz. can tomato sauce 6 oz. can tomato paste 2 c. shredded fresh spinach, chop and shred with knife 1 1/2 tsp. oregano 1/2 to 1 tsp. red pepper flakes (optional) 1/4 c. dry red wine (Burgundy) 2 tbsp. red wine vinegar', 'Fold in all ingredients. Boil 10-12 lasagna noodles, following cooking directions. Drain and rinse.', 'Mix together in separate bowl: 15 oz. ricotta cheese 1 egg, slightly beaten', 'Layer in a large casserole oblong dish the following ingredients, starting with meat and sauce on bottom: noodles, cheese mixture, meat, sauce, seasonings, salt, pepper, and Parmesan cheese. Bake at 375 degrees for 40 minutes (bubbling). Cool 10 minutes, serve with garlic bread. Serves 8-10.']

title: Hot Peanut Butter Sauce
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. cream', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/4 stick butter']
directions: ['Put cream, peanut butter and sugar on medium heat and boil 1 minute.', 'Remove from heat and add vanilla and butter.', 'This is especially good by itself or to use over cake or ice cream.']

title: Strawberry Pineapple Punch

directions: ['Mix Kool-Aid and sugar in a gallon container and add pineapple juice and water to fill the container.'],['strawberry'

title: Garlic Cheese Spread

directions: ['Beat all ingredients in blender until light and fluffy. Spread on split French loaves.', 'Broil until spread is bubbly and brown.']

title: Roasted Carrots In Olive Oil

directions: ['Peel carrots, and chop into 2' lengths, then cut these in half.', 'Fill a shallow casserole dish with carrots, and pour olive oil over them - enough to cover the carrots.', 'Cover with tin foil and roast on bottom shelf for the last 45 minutes (or an hour, no more) of whatever's being cooked on the middle shelf.']

directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degree F. Spread vegetable sticks in single layer on nonstick baking sheet.', 'Sprinkle vegetables with olive oil.', 'Toss until well coated.', 'Bake, tossing vegetables frequently, 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until crisp and golden']

title: Apple Carrot Milk
ingredients: ['apple 1 Granny Smith apple', 'carrots cups 1/2 cup of shredded carrots', 'milk/almond milk cups 1 cup', 'honey tablespoons 1']
directions: ['Chop the apple and shred the carrots, or buy the shredded carrots', 'Mix the prepared apple and carrots in a blender', 'Add milk and blend them. If like sweet flavor, add honey. I did not add honey, I like the original taste!\r\nFinally, enjoy the shake!']

title: Microwave Broccoli
ingredients: ['1 cup broccoli, fresh', '1/2 cup butter', 'garlic powder', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Heat butter in pan.', 'Add garlic powder, salt and pepper, to taste.', 'Toss broccoli in a butter garlic sauce.', 'Put into a plastic sandwich bag.', 'Microwave for 90 seconds.']

title: Better-for-You Peanut Butter Cookies

directions: ['Heat oven to 325 degrees F.', 'Mix ingredients until blended.', 'Roll into 24 (1-inch) balls.', 'Place, 2 inches apart, on baking sheets.', 'Flatten each, in criss-cross pattern, with tines of fork.', 'Bake 15 min.', '(Do not overbake.)', 'Cool on baking sheets 5 min.', 'Remove to wire racks; cool completely.']

title: Simple Creme Anglaise
ingredients: ['1/3 cup sugar', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '3/4 cup 2% low-fat milk']
directions: ['In a bowl, whisk together sugar, egg and vanilla.', 'In a small saucepan, heat the milk over medium heat until it is steaming. Gradually add a bit to the egg mixture, stir to combine, then add to the saucepan. (By adding a bit to the egg mixture first, it will help prevent getting scrambled eggs).', 'Stir over low heat, stirrig constantly, for 5 - 8 minutes or until slightly thickened. Do not boil.', 'Pour the sauce into a bowl. Place a piece of plastic wrap on the surface of the sauce. Chill.']

title: Israeli Style Tuna
ingredients: ['6 ounces tuna in olive oil', '1/2 lemon, juice of']

title: Simple Carrot Salad

title: Rice - Quick And Easy
ingredients: ['8 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 chopped onion', '2 c. hot chicken stock', '1 c. rice']
directions: ['Melt in a saucepan 2 tablespoons butter.', 'Add and stir until golden brown the 1/2 chopped onion.', 'Add and shake until the grains are coated.', 'Add hot chicken stock.', 'Cover the pot and simmer the rice or bake it in a 375° oven until the liquid is absorbed.', 'Add 2 tablespoons melted butter.', 'Toss the rice with a fork to distribute it.']

title: Homemade Buttery Croutons
ingredients: ['1 loaf French Bread', '1 cup Salted Butter', '4 cloves Garlic, Minced', '1 dash Sea Salt']
directions: ['Allow loaf of French bread to sit out uncovered overnight. Using a bread knife, cut loaf of French bread into about 1/2 to 3/4 inch squares. Spread squares over a half sheet pan (preferably one with edges).', 'Melt butter completely over low heat. At the end, add minced garlic if using fresh. Stir together. (Fresh garlic can be replaced with 3 tablespoons garlic powder of desired.)', 'How the buttery goodness kisses the bread cubes is up to you. I like quickly dipping a spoonful of squares into the butter with a slotted spoon, then placing them back onto the tray. Some prefer to drizzle. Some may prefer to mix them all together in a large bowl. Whatever your method, make sure the bread cubes are well-covered with butter mixture.', 'Place all butter-coated bread cubes upon the tray again. Spread them out well. Dust a dash of sea salt over the croutons.', 'Bake for about 15-20 minutes until croutons are golden brown as pictured. You may like to toss them a bit mid way through the baking cycle.', 'Other things you can add to the butter mixture include Beau Monde spice (celery flavor), onion powder, Italian seasoning, red pepper flakes, etc.']

title: Graham Treats
ingredients: ['12 graham crackers', '1 c. chopped nuts', '2 sticks margarine', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Place graham crackers on foil lined cookie sheet. Sprinkle nuts on top of crackers.', 'Combine margarine and sugar and bring to a boil.', 'Pour over nuts.', 'Bake 15 minutes in a 325° oven.', 'Break apart and serve.']

title: Milk Chocolate Ice Milk
ingredients: ['1 lb milk chocolate', '3 cups milk']
directions: ['Break up the chocolate and transfer to the top of a large double boiler. Add 1/2 cup milk. Stir over hot water over moderate heat, until chocolate is melted and smooth.', 'Gradually add remaining milk and whisk until smooth.', 'Cook, uncovered, over moderate heat, stirring and scraping frequently, for about 30 minutes. Remove from top of double boiler and stir occasionally until cool.', 'Refrigerate overnight.', 'Before freezing in ice cream maker, stir again to make sure ingredients are mixed. Transfer to ice cream maker and freeze according to manufacturer's directions.']

title: Roasted Garlic Mayonnaise
ingredients: ['1 garlic clove', '1/2 cup mayonnaise', 'olive oil, salt and pepper']
directions: ['Slice the head off the the top of a garlic clove, about a half inch from the top.', 'Drizzle olive oil and, salt and pepper over the top.', 'Wrap loosely in foil like a pouch so it has room to steam/roast, 400F for 45 minutes.', 'Wrap the bottom in the leftover foil and squeeze out the roasted garlic, be careful as it is extremely hot. By the time you mash it up, it will lose a lot of it's heat.', 'Squash, smash and mince the garlic up with a knife, I make it a paste, lightly salt the garlic and whisk with 1/2 cup of your favorite mayo. Done.', '*Will last for 2-3 weeks refrigerated, mine always runs out in about a week ;-).']

title: Green Pasta With Bacon Sauce
ingredients: ['1 lb. spinach pasta', '2 cloves garlic', '1/2 lb. bacon', 'salt and pepper', '1 can crushed tomatoes']
directions: ['Fry bacon. Cut in pieces and add the garlic (if the juice of the bacon is too much, pour out). Add the crushed tomatoes and simmer. Add salt and pepper. Boil pasta; mix with sauce. Add grated Parmesan cheese.']

title: Choconana Worm
ingredients: ['1/4 cup Dark chocolate', '5 tbsp milk', '1 Firm Banana', '4 tbsp Peanut butter']
directions: ['Sliced banana into 1-inch thick slices', 'Spread peanut butter evenly between slices', 'Mix chocolate chips and milk together and microwave safe dish', 'Melt on medium heat in microwave, stirring every ten seconds.', 'Spread chocolate on one side of banana', 'Freeze in freezer for 10 minutes', 'Enjoy']

title: Pasta With Pesto
ingredients: ['pesto', 'Pasta']
directions: ['Add pesto to hot pasta'],['pesto'

title: 3-Step Peanut Butter Squares
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 cup Kraft Smooth Peanut Butter', '1/2 cup sugar', '2 oz. Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate, chopped']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325F.', 'Mix egg, peanut butter and sugar until well blended.', 'Spread into 8-inch square baking pan; sprinkle with chocolate.', 'Bake 20 min.', 'Cool completely before cutting into squares to serve.']

title: California Avocado Toast with Fried Egg
ingredients: ['1 slice True GoodnessTM by MeijerTM Organic Multigrain Bread, toasted', '1/2 ripe avocado, mashed', '1 True GoodnessTM by MeijerTM Organic Cage Free Egg with Omega-3', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Spread mashed avocado on toast.', 'Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray and fry one egg.', 'Place cooked egg onto avocado toast, sprinkle with salt and pepper.']

title: Outback Croutons
ingredients: ['1 loaf bread', '1 lb butter', '1/4 cup minced garlic']
directions: ['Take any amount of bread. Get an electric bread knife and then you can cut three rows one way four rows another. Let sit in open air overnight--the more stale they get the better to cook.', 'Take a cookie sheet and evenly spread over so that none overlap.', 'Heat oven to 250°. Place in oven for 30-45 minutes. They should have a yellow tint all the way through. Some will burn on edges. Shake cookie sheet to check evenness.', 'Take 1 lb of butter and melt to mayo consistency--no more, no less--this is very important! Add to 1/2 cup of house seasoning.', 'House seasoning from Outback is mostly paprika, dash of salt, some onion powder and garlic powder and a little bit of cayenne pepper.', 'Then mince 1/4 cup garlic. The easy way is to buy cloves that are skinned and use a cheese shredder blade so that its flaky.', 'Mix together in melted butter.', 'Let crouton bread get room temperature and mix butter and toasted bread gently and evenly coat. Then stick it back in the oven at 275°F Cook for about 10 to 15 minutes or until most butter is cooked. It will always look like it is wet until it cools down for 20 minutes. Shake cookie sheet to see that it evenly coats.']

title: Birds Nest(Easy)
ingredients: ['1 thick slice bread', '1 Tbsp. margarine', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cut a hole in the middle of the piece of bread, large enough to contain the egg yolk.', 'Melt margarine in skillet and brown bread on one side.', 'Flip and carefully crack egg, dropping it into the hole so as not to break the yolk.', 'Cover skillet and simmer slowly until egg firms.']

title: Egg In Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 Tbsp. margarine', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['This is from my grandmother\'s book, 'Domestic Cookery,' printed in 1951.']

title: Labneh
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons salt', '6 cups yogurt']
directions: ['In a large bowl stir the salt into the yogurt. Place the yogurt in the', 'center of a piece of doubled cheese cloth or piece of soft cotton.', '', 'Pull corners up and tie tightly.', '', 'Suspend from a stationary object over a bowl (to catch liquid).', '', 'Let this hang overnight or about 12 hours. When well drained it will be', 'the consistency of cottage cheese.', '', 'Remove from the cloth. Store covered in the refrigerator until needed.']

title: Broccoli Florentine
ingredients: ['1 lb. broccoli', '2 garlic cloves, sliced thin', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '2 Tbsp. olive oil', '1/4 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Remove and discard outer leaves and cut off tough ends of stalks from broccoli.', 'Split lengthwise heavy stalks over 1/2 inch thick.', 'Boil 2 inches of water in saucepan and add broccoli.', 'Cover pan, allowing water to form steam.', 'Cook 10 to 20 minutes or until broccoli is tender.', 'Do not overcook.']

title: Tuna Tasties
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/2 c. tuna', '1/2 slice bread per child', '4 Tbsp. peas', '1/4 c. cheese']
directions: ['Break the bread into very small pieces.', 'Mix the bread with tuna, egg and peas.', 'Spray the muffin tin with Pam and press the tuna mixture into muffin tin.', 'Grate cheese to sprinkle over each muffin.', 'Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.']

title: Breakfast Toads
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper', '1 tsp. butter']
directions: ['Melt butter in pan; add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Using small glass, cut a hole in slice of bread in center; put in pan.', 'Crack egg into center of hole.', 'Fry until bread is toasted on bottom and flip to fry other side.']

title: Bird'S Nest
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', '1 tsp. butter', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Melt butter in a frying pan. Press out a small circle in middle of bread using a small glass. Place bread in frying pan and crack egg into the middle of the circle. Cook', 'until bread is toasted and flip over. Cook egg until desired taste. Place on a plate and sprinkle with salt and pepper.']

title: Sun-Dried Tomatoes In The Oven! Sun-Dried Tomatoes
ingredients: ['9 plum tomatoes', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Cut tomatoes in half.', 'Place on foil lined baking tray.', 'Bake at 200 degrees for 8-10 hours.', 'Store in mason jar with olive oil.']

title: Pineapple Orange Mousse
ingredients: ['3/4 cup orange juice', '3/4 cup pineapple juice', '13 cup sugar', '2-4 grains salt', '2 cups evaporated milk', '1 cup pineapple, canned, crushed']
directions: ['Combine fruit juices, pineapple, sugar, and salt.', 'Pour into mold.', 'Pack in ice and salt.', 'Partially freeze.', 'Repack.', 'Carefully fold in stiffly whipped evaporated milk.', 'Let stand 4 hours.']

title: Simple Cauliflower Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', 'salt', '2 tablespoons peanut oil', '2 teaspoons minced garlic']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to boil.', 'Cut off and discard cauliflower leaves and cut out the core; cut the cauliflower into florets.', 'Add 1 tablespoon of salt to boiling water; bring back to a boil and add the cauliflower; stir gently as water comes back to a boil, boil for about 1 minute, or till cauliflower is tender but still firm; drain and set aside.', 'heat a large wok over high heat; add the oil and swirl to coat; add the garlic and stir-fry until it starts to turn golden, 15-20 seconds; add the cauliflower and stir-fry for 30 seconds to 1 minute; press it against the side of the wok to sear it but don't mash it.', 'Add 1/2 teaspoon of salt, stir-fry briefly and serve.']

title: Effortless Clarified Butter (Aka Ghee) In The Oven
ingredients: ['1 lb butter', '1 dash salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 300°F.', 'The oven needs to be on low heat.', 'Cut the butter into large chunks and put it into an oven proof dish.', 'Something like a souffle dish will work, but just make sure that the bottom of the pan isn't too wide, or the butter will cook too quickly and you won't have time to get that nice roasted flavor.', 'Put the butter into the oven for one hour.', 'At that time, the impurities will have separated from the butter, but it probably won't have darkened in color to show that it has that roasted flavor.', 'Keep checking the butter every 10 minutes until it darkens several shades.', 'Remove the butter from the oven and let it cool for about 10 minutes, and then spoon off the impurities on the top of the butter.', 'Pour the butter through a fine metal mesh strainer.', 'Store the clarified butter, covered, in a cool dry place.']

title: Honey-Orange Ice
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups fresh orange juice', '1 cup honey', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine all the ingredients in a bowl.', 'Pour into a 9-by-13-inch nonreactive baking dish and freeze until firm, at least 8 hours or overnight.', 'Just before serving, scrape the ice into fine crystals using 1 or 2 forks.', 'Transfer to tall glasses and serve.']

title: Sauteed Cherry Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['6 garlic cloves, peeled and sliced', '1 medium onion, cut into 8 pieces', '1/4 cup olive oil', '3 pints cherry tomatoes, rinsed', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Puree the garlic in a food processor fitted with the chopping blade.', 'Add onion and pulse 3-4 times, until finely chopped.', 'Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat until hot.', 'Reduce heat to medium and add the onion and garlic.', 'Cook, stirring occasionally, until they are softened, about 5 minute.', 'Meanwhile, place 1 pint of the cherry tomatoes in the food processor bowl and pulse 3-4 times, until coarsely chopped.', 'Transfer to a bowl and repeat with the remaining 2 pints of tomatoes.', 'Add the chopped tomatoes to the onion and simmer, stirring frequently, until they form a sauce, about 15-20 minute.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste and serve with your favorite pasta or gnocchi.']

title: Banana Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1 piece bread', '12 cup milk', '1 banana', '1 teaspoon sugar']
directions: ['chop bread and banana into cubes.', 'pour in milk and sugar.', 'wait for stand for 5 minutes.', 'put in oven.']

title: Pina Colada Yogurt
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons crushed pineapple', '14 teaspoon coconut extract', '12 cup plain yogurt']
directions: ['Combine and enjoy!'],['yogurt'

title: Ritz Pie
ingredients: ['20 Ritz crackers, crushed', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. nuts']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together.', 'In another bowl, beat whites of 3 eggs adding 1/2 cup sugar.', 'Add to first mixture, mixing well together.', 'Press out in greased 8-inch Pyrex pie dish, pulling up on side of dish.', 'Bake 30 minutes at 325°.', 'Whip 1 pint of cream. Place on top of pie after it is cold.', 'Grate bittersweet chocolate over top.', 'Sweeten cream with 4x sugar to taste.']

title: Toad In A Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut 2-inch hole in center of bread.', 'Melt butter in skillet. Fry bread in skillet until golden brown.', 'Turn bread over and break egg into center hole.', 'Reduce heat and cook to desired doneness.', 'Salt and pepper.', 'May flip bread over if desired.']

title: Sandwich
ingredients: ['Turkey', 'Bread']
directions: ['Combine Turkey & bread'],['bread'

title: Avocado Toast With Lemon
ingredients: ['1 avocado, quartered', '4 slices bread, toasted medium well', '1 lemon, quartered', 'salt, to taste', 'pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Mash the avocado and spread it evenly on the toast pieces.', 'Squirt the lemon juice over the avocado. (Optional: Peel and place the lemon in pieces on top, after the squeeze. I started this when I was a kid and still love it this way. Very lemony!).', 'Salt and pepper. Eat immediately before it gets soggy. This dish is best prepared by the person eating it so they are available to eat it right away!']

title: Bacon Wands(Microwave)
ingredients: ['12 very thin bread sticks', '12 slices bacon']
directions: ['Wrap each bread stick with a bacon slice in a spiral.', 'Place 6 at a time on paper towel lined plate.', 'Cover with paper towel. Microwave 6 minutes on High or until bacon is crisp, turning once.']

title: Gypsy Bacon
ingredients: ['1 cured slab bacon, rind attached', '1 slice bread, to serve']
directions: ['Score the bacon in 1 inch square sections down to the rind.', 'Skewer it on a long fork or stick and hold it over the fire until the bacon starts to cook and sizzle and the rind shrinks and curls up the bacon sections.', 'Serve with bread.', 'Optional:sprinkle paprika and serve with sliced raw onions.']

title: Egg In The Nest
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 large egg', '2 slices bacon']
directions: ['Fry the bacon in your skillet.', 'Meanwhile cut or tear out a circle', '(I use a biscuit cutter) in the center of the bread. When the bacon is.', 'done remove it from the pan and place the bread in the pan.', 'Crack the egg into the hole you created in the bread. Place the cut out portion in the pan to toast.', 'Fry egg to your liking, turn over the cut out portion to brown the other side.', 'The egg and bread can either be turned for a few seconds or left as sunny side up.', 'Serve with the bacon.', 'For some reason kids love this simple breakfast -- might be the name.']

title: Fruit Shake
ingredients: ['1/4 c. milk', '1/4 c. orange juice', '1/2 banana', '1 tsp. honey', 'dash of vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a blender for 30 seconds.'],['vanilla'

title: Fruit Shakes
ingredients: ['1/4 c. milk', '1/4 c. orange juice', '1/2 banana', '1 tsp. honey', 'dash of vanilla']
directions: ['Mix 1/4 cup each of milk and orange juice with 1/2 banana, honey and a dash of vanilla in blender.']

title: Easy 'Oven' Sun Dried Heirloom Tomatoes
ingredients: ['20 ripe heirloom tomatoes', '1/4 cup olive oil', '10 teaspoons sugar', '5 teaspoons pepper', '5 teaspoons sea salt']
directions: ['Remove the hard stem from each tomato, and cut each tomato crosswise. Upside down give each tomato a squeeze to remove seeds, using your finger to scoop out any lingering seeds.', 'Place each tomato face up on a cookie sheet lined with parchment paper.', 'Put 1/2 tsp of sugar in each tomato.', 'season each tomato with salt and pepper.', 'Drizzle all the tomatoes with olive oil.', 'Bake in a 180 degree oven for 6 hours on the middle shelf.', 'Pack in olive oil when cold, and freeze or refrigerate.']

title: Stuffed Shells With Prosciutto And Spinach
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon pepper', '3 cups milk', 'tomato']
directions:
['Cook your shells in a large pot of boiling water for about 8 minutes. Drain and run under cold water until they are cool. Set aside. 

In a large bowl mix all the ingredients for the filling together. Put the bowl in the refrigerator until the sauce is done. 

In a large heavy bottom sauce pan, melt the butter and then stir in the flour with a whisk. When it comes together in a clump, add the milk. Whisk over medium high heat until it begins to bubble around the sides of the pan and starts to thicken. Lower the heat and add the Parmigiano-Reggiano, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Whisk well then turn the heat off.', 'Butter the bottom of a large casserole pan then ladle enough sauce in to cover the bottom. 

Take your cheese mixture out of the refrigerator and begin filling your shells. I don't like to over stuff them. I like to be able to close the shell up at the top. Place them in the casserole dish in rows. Pour the remaining sauce over the shells. Top with the Parmigiano-Reggiano, then the tomatoes and then the grated mozzarella. 

Cover with tin foil and cook 40 minutes. Remove the tin foil and cook for another 10 minutes.', 'I usually make lasagna but when you don't have the time to layer it all together, stuffed shells are a great idea. Most of the time I use spaghetti sauce on my stuffed macaroni but today I decided to try it with a cheesy bechamel. It came out delicious and I decided I am going to make it this year for Christmas too! I think you will enjoy it also.']

title: Cooked Salmon
ingredients: ['Salmon', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 tsp black pepper']
directions: ['Rinse salmon. In a glass casserole dish put salmon, 1/4 cup tap water, lemon, and pepper. Put lid on dish and put in oven at 350 degrees F for 35 min.']

title: Bacon-Tomato Dip
ingredients: ['1 lb. bacon, cut and fried, drain', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 tomato, diced']
directions: ['Mix together.', 'Serve cold with rye crackers.']

title: Crock-Pot Turkey(Easy!)
ingredients: ['1 frozen turkey breast, thawed', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Put seasoned turkey breast in crock-pot.', 'Do not add water. Cook on low all night or all day.', 'Delicious! (Makes great turkey salad.)']

title: Aunt Jeanie'S Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['2 cups sugar', '1/2 cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3/4 cup peanut butter']
directions: ['Add the milk and sugar to a pot and boil for 2 1/2 minutes.', 'Stir in the vanilla and peanut butter until it starts to thicken.', 'pour fudge on to a buttered dinner plate and shape.', 'Cut when cool.']

title: Mamaw'S Bird Nest
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'margarine']
directions: ['Spread margarine thinly on both sides of bread.', 'Make hole in middle of bread big enough to put egg in.', 'Place in your skillet over medium heat.', 'Break egg in hole.', 'When egg is halfway cooked, flip and cook other side.']

title: One-Eyed Monster
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', 'margarine', '1 egg']
directions: ['Spread margarine on both sides of bread.', 'Cut a hole in the center with a biscuit cutter.', 'Brown one side of bread in pan over medium heat.', 'Turn add 1 egg into the hole and cook for 3 minutes. Cover and cook 3 more minutes.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Bacon Crackers
ingredients: ['saltine crackers', 'bacon']
directions: ['Wrap cracker in 1/2 slice bacon.', 'Bake at 375° until brown. Delicious.']

title: Classic MINUTE RICE Pudding
ingredients: ['1-3/4 cups milk', '1/2 cup Minute Rice Brand Rice, uncooked', '2 Tbsp. each sugar and raisins', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1 egg', '1/4 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine milk, rice, sugar, raisins and salt in medium saucepan.', 'Bring to a boil, stirring constantly.', 'Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer, uncovered, 6 min., stirring occasionally.', 'Beat egg and vanilla with wire whisk until well blended.', 'Add a small amount of the hot milk mixture; mix well.', 'Return to saucepan; cook and stir on low heat 1 min.', '(Do not boil.)', 'Remove from heat.', 'Let stand 30 min.', 'Serve warm.', 'Store any remaining pudding in refrigerator.']

title: Peanut Bacon Wraps
ingredients: ['8 crackers', 'peanut butter', '8 bacon strips']
directions: ['Spread cracker on both sides with peanut butter.', 'Wrap a strip of bacon around each cracker.', 'Micro-cook on paper towel in roasting pan 4 minutes on High or until bacon is crisp.']

title: Homemade Tropical Pops
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups pineapple chunks', '1 banana', '1 1/2 cups coconut milk', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.', 'Pour into popsicle molds and freeze until firm.', 'Unmold and enjoy.']

title: Baked Pineapple
ingredients: ['1 stick margarine', '1 large can pineapple', '1/2 c. sugar', '8 slices bread, cubed', '1 egg, beaten']
directions: ['Grease baking dish.', 'Brown bread in margarine.', 'Add other ingredients.', 'Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes.']

title: Sunshine Shake
ingredients: ['2 cups orange juice', '1 banana, cut into chunks', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon honey']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in blender and blend until smooth.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Spanish Rice
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. cooked rice', '1 qt. tomatoes', '1/2 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces', '1/2 c. sugar', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients and cover top with bacon.', 'Bake in slow oven two hours.']

title: Roasted Garlic Oil
ingredients: ['2 lbs garlic cloves, peeled', '1 quart olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 250°F.', 'Place garlic in a deep casserole dish and cover with oil. Add extra if needed to cover all the garlic. don't use as much as called for if it won't all fit in your dish. This is not an exact recipe here. The main thing is that all the garlic is covered with oil.', 'Cook in the oven until the garlic is soft and squishy.', 'Remove from oven and let it cool a bit.', 'Remove garlic from the oil and set aside.
