Let the garlic cool completely in the fridge before you cover it.', 'Pour oil through a coffee filter and into a shallow pan and let it cool in the fridge before you bottle it.', 'Keep refrigerated and use the oil soon.', 'The garlic can be frozen if you want to hold on to it for awhile, but it will break down when it's thawed. I like to puree it into a smooth past and use it that way.', 'BE ADVISED! SOME LOCAL HEATH DEPARTMENTS CLAIM THAT THERE IS A RISK WHEN MAKING HOMEMADE FLAVORED OILS.', 'To help avoid any risk of illness I suggest that you treat this entire procedure like you are doing home canning. SANITIZE EVERYTHING THAT WILL COME IN CONTACT WITH FOOD!', 'I can't stress this enough. Botulism is nothing to mess around with. I have never had a problem with my flavored oils. Always smell them before you use them. If there is any doubt about the quality, TOSS IT! You can't be too careful.', 'Be careful and enjoy.']

title: pineapple coconut milk popsicles
ingredients: ['1 can pineapple chunks', '1 can coconut milk', '1 tsp vanilla extract']
directions: ['blend all ingredients including the juice from the pineapple can', 'pour into popsicle molds.', 'freeze.', 'enjoy your trip to sin.']

title: One Vanilla Milkshake
ingredients: ['1/2 c. frozen low-fat yogurt', '1 c. skim milk', 'vanilla extract to taste']
directions: ['Whirl all ingredients together in blender.'],['yogurt'

title: Ziplock Vanilla Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1/2 cup milk', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Add ingredients to pint size ziplock bag and zip shut.', 'Place bag into 2 large ziplock bags.', 'Add ice to fill bag 1/2 full.', 'Add 6 T salt.', 'Zip bag shut and shake, turn, toss and mix in the bag.', 'In about 5 to 10 minutes, you will have yummy ice cream.', 'Do not double this recipe.', 'The two bags are needed because the one containing salt and ice tends to spring leaks when shaking it up.']

title: Cherry Tomatoes and Bacon Grill
ingredients: ['4 Cherry tomatoes', '2 pieces Half-strip of bacon', '1 dash Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Remove the blossom ends (the stems) from the cherry tomatoes, cut the bacon horizontally, wrap around the tomatoes and secure with a cocktail stick.', 'Place on baking paper or foil, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and grill for 5 minutes in the toaster oven.']

title: French Toast Pockets
ingredients: ['8 thick slices of bread - 8 oz softened cr cheese - 6 tbl sugar', 'divided - 2 tsp vanilla - 8 tbl chopped pecans - 7 lg eggs - 1 cup milk - 1 cup crushed corn flakes - 1/2 tsp nutmeg -']
directions: ['combine cr cheese, vanilla, pecans & 2 tbl sugar - set SIDE - blend eggs, milk, nutmeg & 4 tbl sugar - set aside - cut through top & along one side of ea bread slice - spread a rounded tbl of cr cheese filling inside ea pocket - dip bread pockets into egg/milk mix - press into cornflakes - coat both sides - cook until golden on ea side -serve warm - (bread may be stuffed, wrapped & frozen)']

title: Laban (Yogurt)
ingredients: ['1 qt. milk', '1 small container plain yogurt']
directions: ['Rinse kettle out with cold water.', '(This will make it easier to clean later.)', 'Pour in the milk, bring to a boil until bubbles form on top.', 'Watch so milk doesn't scorch.', 'Let milk sit until it is cold.', 'At night time, put back on stove and let the milk get barely lukewarm.', 'Take container of yogurt; mix it with some of the milk, then mix well with rest.', 'Put a lid on the kettle, cover with a warm blanket, and set it in the oven.', 'In the morning, put the kettle in refrigerator with a clean cloth on top of the Laban. This will absorb the whey.', 'Wring out and put back until it is the consistency you want it.', 'Put in containers in refrigerator. Makes 4 cups.']

title: Tuna Salad
ingredients: ['1 can tuna, drained', '1 c. chopped celery', '1 c. grated carrot', '1/4 c. chopped onion', '3/4 to 1 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Toss ingredients together and just prior to serving add 1 can shoestring potatoes.'],['tuna'

title: Corn Bread
ingredients: ['1 pan corn bread', 'bacon', 'onion', '2 cans tomatoes']
directions: ['Make pan of corn bread; let cool.', 'Fry bacon and onion and drain.', 'In a big bowl break up corn bread; add bacon and onion. Add tomatoes and mix well.', 'Put into baking dish.', 'Bake about 20 to 25 minutes in oven on about 350°.']

title: Peanut-Coconut Dreams
ingredients: ['1 cup dry milk', '12 cup peanut butter', '14 cup honey', '2 tablespoons shredded coconut']
directions: ['Mix together dry milk, peanut butter and honey.', 'Roll mixture into 1-inch balls.', 'Put coconut in dish and roll peanut balls in mixture so that all sides are covered.', 'Refrigerate.']

title: Bread Custard Pudding
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. crumbled bread', '1 Tbsp. butter', '2/3 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg', '3 c. scalded milk']
directions: ['Combine the crumbs and milk; bring to boiling point.', 'Add the butter and stir into the egg and sugar, beaten until light in the baking dish.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Place baking dish in a pan of hot water and bake at 350° until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 45 minutes (raisins can be added 1 cup).']

title: Ash-Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['Whole heads of garlic', 'Olive oil']
directions: ['Cut tops off heads of garlic and set heads on a doubled piece of heavy-duty foil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and drizzle with olive oil. Wrap and set on hot ash of a dying wood fire. Let roast for about 1 hour, rotating occasionally. When cool, squeeze roasted garlic cloves from skins. The garlic keeps 1 week in the fridge and up to 2 months in the freezer, wrapped airtight.', 'Note: Nutritional analysis is per garlic head.', 'The DIY Firepit', ''You can do anything on this. It\'s a little like camping in the middle of your day,' says Napa Valley chef Michael Chiarello. All you need is bricks arranged to fit under your cooking grate and some sand.', 'Build the pit: Spread a double layer of heavy-duty foil on the ground ('not grass,' warns Chiarello, since it may scorch). Make it big enough to extend a foot beyond your cooking grate in all directions. Build a brick rectangle 3 layers high, leaving a couple of bricks out of the top layer on opposite sides, to encourage airflow. (For a standard 21-in. round Weber grate, the rectangle should be 2 bricks by 3 bricks.) Fill with about an inch of sand.', 'Light the fire: Put several balled-up sheets of newspaper in the center and position kindling into a tipi around it; lean larger kindling and then 5 to 6 small logs (preferably oak). Light the fire. 'The tipi lets every bit of flame go up past 3 or 4 logs,' says Chiarello, so the fire starts fast. Once the logs have caught, add several larger logs to the perimeter. Let them burn down to ashy chunks with low flames (1 1/2 to 2 hours). Because there\'s less smoke and char than cooking over a flaming fire, Chiarello says, 'it makes your food taste much cleaner, gives nuanced flavor, and is better for wine.'', 'Start cooking: Keep another log burning at the back of the pit. When it's ashy chunks, rake it into the main fire to maintain heat.']

title: Storing Garlic In Oil
ingredients: ['3 -5 heads garlic', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Separate heads into individual cloves of garlic.', 'Peel the garlic cloves.', 'Cloves may be left whole, chopped or minced, whatever your preference may be.', 'Place garlic cloves in a small jar with a tight fitting lid.', 'Add oil to completely cover the garlic, place cover on jar and close tightly.', 'Store in refrigerator for up to 3 months.', 'Replenish oil as needed to keep garlic covered.']

title: Salad Dressing
ingredients: ['6 cloves garlic, crushed with enough salt to make a paste', 'equal parts olive oil and lemon juice']
directions: ['Cut all vegetables into this mixture and let marinate for about an hour. Add lettuce last just before tossing in all the other vegetables.'],['garlic'

title: Roasted Garlic Puree
ingredients: ['10 garlic cloves, unpeeled', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['preheat oven to 375*F.', 'wrap garlic cloves in aluminum foil package and cook for 1 hour in oven.', 'remove cloves from foil and peel.', 'puree garlic in food processor, add olive oil and blend until incorporated.', 'store garlic puree in glass jar with tight-fitting lid.', 'refrigerate.', 'use in preparation of sauces or with meats.']

title: Crock Pot Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['6 heads garlic', '2 teaspoons olive oil']
directions: ['Place the 6 heads of garlic on one layer of aluminum foil.', 'Drizzle with olive oil.', 'Fold foil loosely around garlic.', 'Place in crock pot and cook on low for 8 hours.', 'Squeeze garlic out of skins and add whatever floats your boat.']

title: Homemade Garlic Oil
ingredients: ['1 head garlic, peeled', '1/2 cup olive oil']
directions: ['Place garlic and olive oil in small pot on the stove and bring to a simmer.', 'Reduce heat to low and allow oil to cook until garlic begins to turn golden brown, about 10-20 minutes.', 'Watch carefully to make sure it doesn't burn.', 'Serve both oil and cloves over your favorite foods.']

title: Oven Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['1 bulb Garlic', '1 Tablespoon Olive Oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400°F.', 'Remove all but one layer of the loose papery skin from the outside of the garlic bulb, leaving the bulb intact. Cut off the top of the bulb, which will leave the top portions of the cloves exposed.', 'Place the garlic bulb, cut side up, on a doubled square of foil. Drizzle the olive oil over top of the bulb, then rub to coat the entire bulb with the oil.', 'Pull up the sides of the foil to form a loose package around the garlic and crimp the edges to seal. Place the foil package in a small baking dish or on a baking sheet.', 'Roast the garlic for 40 to 45 minutes. To test, carefully unwrap the foil and insert a small, sharp knife into one of the cloves. If the garlic clove is soft and tender, it's ready. If not, close the foil and roast for an additional 5 to 10 minutes.']

title: Caramelized Garlic And Garlic Oil
ingredients: ['10 heads garlic, cloves separated and peeled', '1 1/2 cups olive oil']
directions: ['Arrange the garlic cloves in a frying pan large enough to accomodate them in a single layer.', 'Pour in the olive oil to cover the cloves, about 1 inch of oil.', 'Place over medium heat and cook for 10 to 15 minute Stir from time to time.', 'Garlic is done when it turns a beautiful golden brown.', 'Remove the pan from the heat.', 'Using a slotted spoon, place the cloves in a bowl to cool. Return any oil that collects at the bottom to the frying pan.', 'Once the garlic and oil have cooled, package the cloves in snack size freezer bags of 20 to 25 cloves.', 'Freeze any bags that won't be used in 3 days.', 'Transfer the garlic oil to a plastic container, cover and refrigerate. It will keep for several months.', 'Makes 150 cloves and 1 cup oil.', 'NOTE: You can make a smaller batch by simply adding the desired garlic to a frying pan and covering it with 1 inch oil.']

title: How to Roast Garlic to Perfection and Ways to Use it
ingredients: ['1 head Garlic', '1 teaspoon Olive Oil']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 180 degrees C (350 degrees F).', 'Peel most of the outer garlic head wrappers and trim 1/4 inch off the top of the garlic head.', 'Place the garlic head (or heads, if making multiple batches) on a piece of aluminium foil big, enough to wrap it around the heads.', 'Drizzle extra virgin olive oil over the exposed tops of the cloves and allow the olive oil to run down to the inner parts of the garlic head.', 'Wrap the garlic head in the aluminium foil and place it on the baking tray, in the oven (trimmed top up).', 'Bake for 40 minutes.', '(For deeper color and flavor, extend the roasting time to 5060 minutes.)']

title: Perfect Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['6 heads garlic', '12 tsp. olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Remove the outer layer of skin from 1 to 6 heads of garlic.', 'Cut 1/2 inch off from each head straight across top and arrange in a shallow baking pan.', 'Drizzle 2 teaspoons olive oil over each head, letting it run between the cloves.', 'Cover with foil and bake 30 minutes.', 'Remove foil and bake 30 to 45 minutes, until garlic is tender when pierced with a toothpick.', 'Cool slightly.']

title: No Waste Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['2 heads fresh garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 375.', 'Don't peel the garlic and leave the head intact.', 'Cut about 1/4 inch off the top of each bulb.', 'Put the garlic bulbs on a sheet of aluminum foil and drizzle with the olive oil.', 'Wrap the foil around the garlic and seal to make a package.', 'Shake the package to distrubute the oil.', 'Place the foil package, seam side up in a baking dish.', 'Bake until the garlic cloves are soft, about 30 minutes.', 'The clove should easily be pierced by a knife.', 'To use: squeeze garlic from the skins.', 'Store cloves in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 10 days.']

title: Bavarian Apple Torte
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter', '1/3 cup sugar', '1/4 tsp vanilla']
directions: ['1st Stage', 'Cream: 1/2 cup butter', '1/3 cup sugar', '1/4 tsp vanilla', 'Blend in 1 cup flour. Spread bottom and sides of 10' spring-form pan for crust.', '2nd Stage', 'Cream: 1-250gpkg cream cheese', '1/4 cup sugar', 'Add: 1 egg', '1/4 tsp vanilla', 'This should be creamy. Pour into pan over crust.', 'Last Stage', 'Combine: 1/3 cup sugar', '1/2 tsp cinnamon (or more)', 'Toss with: 4 cups peeled sliced apples (3 large)', 'Spread over cream cheese layer (No juice)', 'Sprinkle with 1/4 cup slivered almonds', '', 'Bake 450 for 10 minutes', '400 for 25 more minutes', '**Remember to reduce temperature 25 degrees for glass plate)', 'Loosen torte, Cool and remove rim.']

title: Perfect Yogurt(Makes 2 Quarts)
ingredients: ['2 qt. milk', '2 Tbsp. yogurt']
directions: ['Heat the milk to 176°.', 'Cover; turn off heat.', 'Wait 10 minutes.', 'Turn heat on for 45 seconds.', 'Turn heat off; wait 10 minutes.', 'Turn into a heavy casserole dish, a crock-pot or Dutch oven.', 'Cool milk to between 105° and 115°.', 'Stir in the yogurt from the store.', 'It must be the kind with live cultures.', 'Cover the pot; wrap in 2 bath towels.', 'Keep at 90° for 3 to 6 hours. Remove towels.', 'Put yogurt in fridge overnight to set.']

title: Haystacks
ingredients: ['12 oz. milk chocolate', '12 oz. coconut']
directions: ['Melt chocolate in double boiler.', 'Add coconut, stirring until coconut is completely covered.', 'Spoon onto wax paper or greased cookie sheet.', 'Cool completely.']

title: Slow Cooker Yogurt
ingredients: ['8 cups Homogenized Milk', '1/2 cups Pain 6% Yogurt']
directions: ['Pour milk into your crockpot and turn it on low.', 'Put the lid on and cook it on low for 2 hours and 45 minutes.', 'A timer may come in handy as a reminder to turn it off.', 'After 2 hours and 45 minutes, turn off the crockpot and let the milk sit in the crockpot for 3 more hours.', 'Spoon a small amount of the milk into a small bowl and add the half cup of yogurt to it.', 'Mix together thoroughly.', 'Dump this mixture back into the milk in the crockpot and mix it around well.', 'Put the lid back on your crockpot and wrap the crockpot with a large beach towel or blanket (make sure the crockpot is unplugged and turned off!', ').', 'Let the beach-towel-wrapped crockpot sit for 8-12 hours (or overnight).', 'After 8-12 hours, it should be thickened.']

title: Vegetable Ribbons
ingredients: ['1 zucchini', '1 carrot', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['wash the vegetables.', 'peel the skin off of the vegetables & keep peeling them down to the core with a vegetable peeler while putting the peelings into a medium bowl.', 'add oil & mix well.', 'serve in small bowls.']

title: Soothes Coughs, Colds,& Indigestion
ingredients: ['8 ounces pineapple juice', '2 teaspoons honey', '14 teaspoon grated fresh ginger']
directions: ['Combine 8 ounces of pineapple juice, 2 teaspoons of honey and ginger heat over low flame till warm.', 'Sit back under a blanket and sip for soothing relief.']

title: Piping Hot! Honey and Ginger Milk
ingredients: ['200 ml Milk', '1 tsp - 1 tablespoon Grated ginger', '1 tsp - 1 tablespoon Honey']
directions: ['Pour milk into a large mug.', 'I'm lazy, so I just place the grater over the mug and grate the ginger directly into it.', 'Microwave it on the milk setting and it's done.', 'If I reduce the ginger to one teaspoon, my 2 1/2 year old daughter can drink it.', 'I like to add a heaped tablespoon of it as it soothes my throat.', 'Add as much or as little as you like.', 'Instead of honey, you can use sugar, liquid sugar or maple syrup.', 'Try out lots of different things,', 'It saves time if you grate the ginger in advance, pickle it in the same amount of honey and keep a stock of it.', 'If you add a black tea bag before microwaving, it'll become like chai.']

title: Broccoli And Cauliflower Baked Crisp
ingredients: ['Broccoli', 'Cauliflower', 'Olive Oil']
directions: ['Cut head, flowerette off broccoli and cauliflower. Place a single layer in a pan sprayed with olive oil. Drizzle olive oil and spray heavily with olive oil. Bake at 350° until veggies are tender and crisp.']

title: Homemade Stewed Tomatoes
ingredients: ['10 ripe tomatoes', '2 teaspoons salt']
directions: ['To peel the tomatoes, place them in boiling water for 1 minute and then immediately transfer to cold water. Peel and quarter tomatoes, and place in a large saucepan with the salt. Slowly simmer over low heat for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent burning.']

title: Hawaiian Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['2 c. cooked chicken, cut into small pieces', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1/2 c. coarsely chopped Macadamia nuts', '1 c. cubed pineapple', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Serve cold.', 'Makes 4 to 6 servings.']

title: Easy Keto Bacon-Garlic Asparagus
ingredients: ['3 strips bacon', '2 cloves garlic', '1 1/4 pounds asparagus']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400°F.', 'Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Slice the bacon into 1/4 inch wide strips.', 'Crush and finely mince the garlic.', 'Trim the rough ends from the asparagus and arrange the spears on the baking sheet.', 'Sprinkle the bacon and minced garlic over the asparagus.', 'Roast the asparagus for 10-15 minutes on the middle rack of oven.', 'Remove the asparagus from the oven when the asparagus is tender and the bacon is crisp.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Peaches & Cream Mask for a Healthy Complexion
ingredients: ['1 large peach', '2 -3 tablespoons cream']
directions: ['Peel and pit the peach.', 'Mash peach.', 'Add cream until smooth.', 'Run a nice warm bath!', 'Apply to face and lie back in your bath for 10 minutes or so!', 'This mixture is a bit runny, so you may want to lie back and just relax in your bath!', 'Pamper yourself!', 'You deserve it!', 'Rinse with warm water after 10 minutes.']

title: No Bake Cheesecake
ingredients: ['24 graham crackers, crushed', '1/4 c. sugar', '1/2 c. margarine, melted']
directions: ['Butter a 9 X 13 pan.', 'Mix cracker crumbs, sugar and margarine. Spread and press into pan.', 'Refrigerate (or bake at 375° for 8 minutes and cool).']

title: Fresh Fruit Torte
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter 1 stick softened', '1 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Beat with mixer until creamy. Add 2 large eggs, one at a time and beat well.', 'Add: 1 tsp. baking powder Pinch of salt', 'Mix together and add to above. Spread in a 9 inch springform pan you have greased and floured.', 'Slice about 1 pound or more fresh peaches, nectarines or apricots (or whatever you like, or mix all three). Toss sliced fruit with 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice.', 'Spread over top of torte. Crush 1/2 cup amaretti cookies and sprinkle over top. (Buy Musso's Italian almond cookies at Long's for this.) Bake about 60 minutes at 350 degrees (until center seems done).']

title: Bagged Turkey
ingredients: ['1 thawed turkey', '1 large onion', '2 to 4 ribs celery', 'seasoned salt']
directions: ['You will also need 1 Reynolds turkey bag.'],['celery'

title: Dutch Carrots
ingredients: ['3 slices bacon, chopped', '1 onion, sliced', '4 c. cooked, diced carrots', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Fry bacon in skillet until crisp; remove bacon.', 'Cook onion in bacon drippings until transparent.', 'Add carrots; season with salt and pepper.', 'Turn carrots into hot vegetable dish.', 'Garnish with bacon; serve immediately.']

title: Baked Rice
ingredients: ['1 cup rice', '1 1/2 cups sugar', '1 cup cream', '2/3 cup milk', '1 egg', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Cook rice until tender in salt water.', 'Mix the rest of the ingredients add rice.', 'Pour into baking dish.', 'Dot top with butter. Sprinkle with cinnamon.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.']

title: Homemade Clay Pot Curd
ingredients: ['4 cups, 3 tablespoons, 1-7/8 teaspoons, 1/4 pinches Milk \tFresh', '2 Tablespoons Yogurt']
directions: ['Heat milk in saucepan over low heat until it begins to boil, temperature should be 110C. Use a thermometer to test the temperature.', 'Remove from heat and allow to cool. Temperature should cool to between 25 and 30C. If necessary use a thermometer.', 'Add 2 tablespoons yogurt, stir well.', 'Transfer the yogurt mixture to a new, clean clay pot and cover the pot with plastic wrap and a thick blanket. (If weather is too cool).', 'Place outside overnight or for 10- 12 hours. (At this point, the curd will be done).', 'The temperature in Sri Lanka every day is between 28C and 32C. If your temperature is a lot hotter or colder than this, you can also prepare this dish in the oven.', 'For oven prep, preheat the oven to 110-115 F and then turn it off but turn on oven light. Place curd mixture in oven on upper rack. Close the door and leave it there. Curd will be done in 4-6 hours.', 'When it is done refrigerate it for 1-2 hours for best results.', 'Serve and enjoy.']

title: Curd Cheese
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons yogurt', '2 quarts milk']
directions: ['You will need a saucepan, a bowl, and a sieve.', 'If using yogurt, bring the milk to a boil and then leave it to cool to finger temperature (100 F).', 'Mix with milk with the yogurt in a basin.', 'Put in a warm place for 4 to 5 hours to set as solid as yogurt.', 'Pour the mixture into a sieve lined with a scalded clean cloth.', 'After an hour put a plate on top to weight and encourage the whey to drip through.', 'The curds in the cloth are the cheese.', 'Cover and store in a cool pantry, and it will keep for about a week.', 'Drink the whey, flavored with fruit juice, for your health - or use to to make scones.', 'Keep in refrigerator and eat within 2 days.']

title: Home Made Yogurt
ingredients: ['1 quart Whole Milk', '2 tablespoons Yogurt']
directions: ['Heat milk in enameled cast iron pot. Skim occasionally to remove protein coagulating at surface. When it reaches 190 degrees, pour milk into plastic container.', 'Continue to skim protein as milk cools. At 110 degrees, pour a cup into a mixing bowl. Add yogurt, whisk. Pour back into container.', 'Store covered in a warm place in kitchen (where cats cannot discover it) for 6-12 hours. The longer it sets, the thicker and tangier it becomes.', 'Refrigerate.\r\nIf you prefer a thicker yogurt, place a folded paper towel on top of yogurt to wick out moisture. Repeat to desired thickness.']

title: Whey & Yogurt - Liquid Whey
ingredients: ['1 quart whole milk, raw', '4 ounces yogurt, voskos unflavored']
directions: ['Bring the 4 ozs of yogurt to room temperature in a large glass bowl on the counter.', 'In a sauce pot on a moderately hot stove heat the Raw milk to 100 - 102 degrees stirring constantly and do not go over 104 degrees or you will kill the live enzymes in the raw milk.', 'immediately cool to about 90 degrees by placing the sauce pot on the ice cubes in the pie pan while continuing to stir.', 'thoroughly stir/whisk the warm milk into the yogurt and cover with the cheese cloth.', 'place in 100 degree oven overnight ( 8 hours) but watch that your oven doesn't cycle and spike too high - killing the enzymes and culture.', 'remove from oven.', 'use a knife and slash cut several cris-X-crosses through the yogurt to start the separating process.', 'chill in refrigerator several hours - you should start to see weeping liquid that is the color of lemonade but viscous like chicken broth.', 'line the strainer with the cheese cloth over a bowl and let most of the liquid whey drain from the yogurt', 'pick up the corners of the cheese cloth and squeeze a bit to help the whey drain out.', 'tie the cheese cloth corners together and suspend in a tall glass pitcher or the mason jar using the wooden spoon as a support.', 'leave to drain for several hours.', 'harvest your 1 1/4 cups of yogurt out of the cheese cloth and refrigerate - eat as store bought by adding fresh berries.', 'pour all of the whey into a clean glass jar and refrigerate', 'skim off undesirable left over solids or strain again through the cheese cloth', 'yield 2 1/2 cups whey', 'keeps fresh 6 months if refrigerated properly.']

title: Terri'S Fruit Drink
ingredients: ['5 c. apple juice', '3 c. unsweetened pineapple juice', '1 1/2 c. orange juice']
directions: ['Mix well and chill.', 'Better than Kool-Aid.']

title: Easy Banana Drink
ingredients: ['1 cup milk', '12 teaspoon vanilla', '1 banana, frozen']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in blender and blend until all the banana lumps are gone.', 'Enjoy while it's still cold.', 'This can be made without freezing the bananas.', 'I prefer the cold, thicker drink that freezing the fruit brings.']

title: Mackerel Patties
ingredients: ['1 pound can of mackerel', '1/4 box of saltine crackers, crumbled', '1 egg']
directions: ['Drain juice from mackerel into a bowl.', 'Debone mackerel under slow running water and drain. Break up mackerel into bowl of juice, add the egg and crackers, mix well. Shape into eight patties. Cook in a well buttered skillet and top with a pat of butter on uncooked side. Brown on both sides.']

title: Simple Dandy Candy
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup dry milk', '3/4 cup honey', '1 dash vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in bowl. Roll into small balls.', 'Can roll in wheat germ, coconut, flax seed.', 'Can add in chocolate chips.']

title: Puff cheese madness
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 tbsp milk']
directions: ['Defrost the puff pastry in the microwave if it is frozen.', 'Chip all kinds of cheese together', 'Put a small portion of mixed cheese in the middle of pastry and shape it as you want', 'In a small bowel mix the egg and the milk', 'Brush with the previous mix', 'Preheat the oven 200 C and put it for 15 min.']

title: Garlic and Fennel Infused Oil
ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic, peeled and smashed', '1 bulb fennel, tops and bruised outer leaves removed, cored and chopped', '1 cup olive oil']
directions: ['Combine garlic, fennel and oil in a heavy saucepan.', 'Bring mixture to a boil and then reduce to a simmer.', 'Simmer until fennel and garlic are very tender, 45 minutes to an hour.', 'Remove from heat and allow the mixture to come to room temperature.', 'Strain oil, pressing on solids, into a clean bottle and refrigerate.', 'Remove tender garlic and fennel from strainer.', 'Mash mixture and season with salt and pepper.', 'Use as spread for crostini or crackers']

title: Salmon Loaf
ingredients: ['1 can salmon', '1 egg', '1/4 c. milk', 'crackers']
directions: ['Beat egg; add milk, salmon and crackers until you can make a loaf.', 'Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.']

title: Honey Butter Shanachie
ingredients: ['1 lb butter, unsalted', '14 lb honey']
directions: ['Warm the butter -- don't need to melt it.', 'Add the honey to the butter.', 'Form into a block and chill to reform the shape.', 'Alternately, you can form a log, chill into molds, cut pats, etc.']

title: Yogurt Dessert Sauce
ingredients: ['2 cups plain low-fat yogurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1/4 cup sugar']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients, stirring well.', 'Cover and chill in refrigerator for at least an hour or until ready to serve.', 'This sauce will keep several days in the refrigerator.']

title: Diet Peanut Butter Balls Recipe
ingredients: ['2 c. peanut butter', '1 c. dry lowfat milk', '1/4 c. honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Roll into balls.', 'Then roll in wheat germ.']

title: Lebanese Laban (Yogurt)
ingredients: ['8 cups milk', '1/2 cup yogurt']
directions: ['Place a couple of tablespoons of the milk in a small container and stir in the yogurt to make it more liquid.', 'Bring milk to a boil. Place aside until lukewarm.', 'Stir in yogurt (don't stir too much). Cover pot with lid. Wrap pot with a wool cover. Place in a warm place for 6 hours. Be careful not to move the pot during this time.', 'Cool in refrigerator for at least 3 hours.']

title: Toasted Baguette Slices
ingredients: ['French bread', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees.', 'Slice bread into 1/4 inch thick slices.', 'Place bread slices on baking stone or pan.', 'Brush tops lightly with olive oil-if you do not have a pastry brush, you can pour some olive oil into a bowl and simply dip the slices in it.', 'Bake 10-12 minutes or until slices are lightly browned.']

title: Coconut Rice
ingredients: ['1 cup Jasmine Rice', '3 cups Milk', '1/3 cups Flaked Coconut', '2 Tablespoons Granulated Sugar']
directions: ['Place the rice and milk in a rice cooker and once it gets hot and starts to boil, add the coconut and sugar. Serve warm.', 'If you don't have a rice cooker, in a medium pot, bring rice and milk to a boil. Once it boils, stir in the coconut and sugar and turn heat to low. Cover and simmer until the liquid has been absorbed, about 15-20 minutes.']

title: Onion, Tuna & Spinach Sandwiches
ingredients: ['1 can Canned tuna', '50 grams Boiled spinach', '3 tbsp Marinated onion', '3 tbsp Mayonnaise']
directions: ['This recipe uses the marinated onion from this recipe 'Easy Marinated Onions with Sushi Vinegar'.', 'Boil the spinach and squeeze out the moisture.', 'Cut into 2 cm long pieces.', 'Drain the oil from the tuna.', 'Combine all of the ingredients and it's done.', ''Extremely Easy Italian Bread'.', 'You will be shocked at how easy you can make delicious bread.', 'Here are the amount of ingredients I used when I made it: Instead of 250 g of regular flour, I used 150 g of strong flour + 100 g of cake flour.', 'Instead of regular sugar, I used brown sugar.', 'Instead of regular salt, I used Krazy Salt.', 'Top bread: plain; bottom bread: cheese.', 'I divided the risen bread dough into two portions and added 2 slices (30 g) of processed cheese in one of them.']

title: Honey Play Dough
ingredients: ['1 part honey', '1 part peanut butter', 'dry milk']
directions: ['Mix honey and peanut butter together.', 'Add enough dry milk to make it less sticky.']

title: Rice Pudding For Babies
ingredients: ['1 cup cooked rice', '1 cup milk', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon granulated sugar']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in pan.', 'Cook very gently for 10 minutes until the rice is heated through.', 'Check the temperature before serving.']

title: Easy Pea Salad
ingredients: ['1 small onion, diced', '1 can peas', '1 tomato, diced', 'mayonnaise', 'pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix ingredients with mayonnaise.', 'Add pepper to taste. Chill.', 'Best served cold.', 'Serves 4.']

title: Cheesy  Grapes In Nuts
ingredients: ['30 ml olive oil', '250 g mild goat cheese', 'some white seedless grape, about 40 grapes are enough', '100 g chopped roasted pistachio nuts']
directions: ['Wash grape well and let it dry. Smash the cheese. If not mild, grate it. Adding some olive oil, mix it with the cheese until it turns to smooth hard cream. With the help of 2 spoons roll each grape in this cream and then roll the blobs in a bowl with the chopped pistachios. Cool taste better. Bon appetit!']

title: Oven-Dried Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 pound firm-ripe Roma tomatoes', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['Rinse and dry about 1 pound firm-ripe Roma tomatoes. Slice crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick rounds and pat dry with towels. Coat a 10- by 15-inch baking pan with about 1 tablespoon olive oil. Arrange tomato slices in a single layer in pan. Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper. Bake in a 200° regular or convection oven until tomatoes are dry but still pliable, 2 1/4 to 2 3/4 hours. While still warm, with a wide spatula, loosen slices from pan. Cool completely and store airtight in refrigerator.', 'Nutritional analysis per 1/4 cup.']

title: Red Peppers Grilled
ingredients: ['olive oil rosemary branch', 'seasoned salt']
directions: ['pore some olive oil inside of pepper, sprinkle season salt inside and stuff rosemary inside the pepper. place on grill and turn until outside is black. place in bowl and cover with wrap for 5 minutes until skin slides off.']

title: baked French fries
ingredients: ['1 large potato', '1 1/2 tbsp olive oil', '1 salt']
directions: ['wash and peel the potato, then cut it into thin wedges', 'Soak the potato wedges in cold water for 30 minutes, that will release the starch and help it become crunchy', 'after 30 minutes drain and dry the potatoes, then add the oil and make sure they are evenly coated', 'heat the oven to 350F', 'Get a baking sheet and leave it in the heated oven so that it gets nice and hot', 'When the baking sheet is hot take it out and then distribute the wedges with about 2 cm between each, make sure they are spaced or they will steam and won't become crunchy', 'Let it bake for 20 minutes (or more depends on your oven) and flip them on the other side half way through', 'After it becomes nice golden brown take it out and season with salt to taste', 'Put some ketchup or mayo on the side and enjoy!']

title: Grilled Sweet Potato Rounds
ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato, uniform in shape', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Place a steamer tray in a saucepan, add water, cover, and bring to a boil.', 'Once water is boiling, peel sweet potato and slice crosswise into 1 1/2 inch rounds. Add potatos to pan and steam 11 minutes.', 'After potatos are cool enough to handle, coat them with olive oil, salt, and pepper.', 'Grill over medium heat until nicely browned, turning once.', '****Don't peel the potatos until they're ready to go in the boiling water or they will turn brown on you.*******.']

title: Guilt Free Sweet Potato Chips
ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato, thinly sliced', 'olive oil flavored cooking spray', 'salt']
directions: ['Slice the sweet potato as thin as possible (I use a mandolin). Place as many slices as will fit in a single layer on a microwave safe plate. Mist the slices with water.', 'Cook for 5 minutes on high or until all the slices have shriveled to about half their original size.', 'Lightly spray with olive oil and salt as desired. Cook on high for 1-2 minutes longer or until they start to brown. Watch them closely! Once they start to brown, they burn quickly. If you don't let them start to brown, the resulting chip with be chewy rather than crisp. Repeat with remaining slices.', 'Let cool for about 5 minutes. They will crisp as they cool. Serve immediately.']

title: Roasted Garlic Scapes
ingredients: ['1 bunch garlic scapes, sliced into 1' pieces', '2 teaspoons olive oil', 'Salt & pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425°F. In a ziplock bag toss scape slices, olive oil, salt and pepper. Spread onto a rimmed backing sheet and roast for 25 minutes, tossing occasionally, until browned and crisp. Enjoy with most anything that needs some garlic favor or a bit of texture.']

title: Confit Tomato
ingredients: ['1 large tomato, peeled, cored, and quartered', 'Olive oil', 'Salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Place tomato fillets on sheet pan and sprinkle liberally with olive oil.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Place in 250 degree oven for 1 and 1/2 hours.', 'Garnish with confit tomato and young celery leaves']

title: Saute Spinach
ingredients: ['50 ml olive oil', '2 garlic cloves', '500 g spinach', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Saute spinach in olive oil and garlic for one minute or until wilted.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Baked Planked Carp
ingredients: ['1 large carp, cleaned', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 f .', 'Rub olive oil over one side of plank.', 'Salt and pepper the plank.', 'Rub olive oil on both sides of fish.', 'Salt and pepper both sides of fish.', 'Place fish on seasoned plank.', 'Place in oven and baked for 30 minutes.', 'Remove from oven.', 'Throw carp in trash and eat the plank.']

title: Pizza Sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, thinly sliced', 'salt and pepper', '28 ounces crushed tomatoes, in sauce']
directions: ['Warm the oil in a wide skillet with the garlic and a little black pepper.', 'Add the tomatoes and a pinch of salt and raise the heat.', 'Cook, stirring frequently until the juices are evaporated and the sauce that remains is thick enough to mound on a spoon with no surrounding watery liquid.', 'Taste and correct the seasonings.']

title: Grilled Garlic Scapes
ingredients: ['8 garlic scapes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Combine garlic scapes, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl and turn to coat evenly. Marinate for 20 minutes.', 'Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.', 'Place garlic scapes on the grill and grill until well charred and tender at the thickest part, 1 to 2 minutes per side.']

title: Crock Pot Rotisserie Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole roasting chicken', 'olive oil flavored cooking spray', 'seasoning salt, to taste']
directions: ['Make 4 or 5 loose balls of aluminum foil and place in bottom of crock pot.', 'Clean chicken inside and out. Spray with olive oil spray.', 'Sprinkle generously inside and out with seasoned salt.', 'Put chicken back-side down in crock pot (on top of foil balls).', 'Cook on high 4-6 hours.']

title: Microwave Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole roasting chicken', 'salt and black pepper', '30 ml olive oil']
directions: ['Take whole chicken and make diagonal slits in breast and thighs.', 'Rub chicken with olive oil followed by salt and pepper ensuring slits are also prepared with spice.', 'Place in a glass casserole dish suitable for microwave.', 'I use a 900 Watt combination microwave oven, program grill and microwave for 30 - 40 minutes depending on size of chicken on full power.', 'Turn chicken every 10 minutes to ensure even grilling.']

title: Cracker Salad
ingredients: ['1 medium onion', '1 tomato', 'crackers', 'mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Chop onion and tomato.', 'Mix together.', 'Add mayonnaise until it is mixed and juicy.', 'Salt and pepper to your taste.', 'Can be refrigerated until ready to serve.']

title: Bryte Havrekaka (Oatmeal Cookies)
ingredients: ['3 cups oatmeal', '1 cup butter', '1 cup sugar', '1 egg']
directions: ['Melt butter in a saucepan and fry the oatmeal lightly. Stir egg and sugar together. When the oatmeal is cooled, mix it all together. Drop from teaspoon onto well-greased cookie sheet. Bake in a slow oven, 300 - 325 degree oven and check on them at 12 minutes.']

title: Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['1/3 cup butter', '4 1/2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar', '1/4 cup milk', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a bowl beat butter or margarine until fluffy. Gradually add 2 cups of the confectioners' sugar, beating well.', 'Slowly beat in the milk and vanilla. Slowly beat in remaining sugar. Beat in additional milk, if needed, to make of spreading consistency. Tint with food color, if desired.']

title: Peanut Butter Energy Balls
ingredients: ['2 cups peanut butter', '3/4 cup honey', '2 1/4 cups oatmeal', '2 teaspoons vanilla']
directions: ['Process oatmeal in blender or food processor.', 'Mix everything together in a Bosch or other heavy duty mixer.', 'Form into 30 balls (~33 grams each).', 'Extras may be left at room temperature, or in fridge, or in freezer -- experiment and see what you like best!']

title: Gluten Free Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup Creamy Peanut Butter', '1 cup Granulated Sugar', '1 Egg', '1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract', 'Coarse Sea Salt']
directions: ['1. Preheat oven to 350°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.', '2. Beat peanut butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla until fully incorporated. Spoon 1 tablespoon of mixture 1 inch apart on the baking sheet. Flatten with fork, making a crosshatch pattern on the cookies. Sprinkle coarse salt over the top of the cookies', '3. Bake for 10 minutes; they should still be soft to the touch when removed from oven. Let cool.']

title: Moist Roast Turkey
ingredients: ['1 turkey', '1 lb bacon']
directions: ['Clean and season the turkey with your favorite seasonings inside and out.', 'Place turkey breast side down in the roasting pan.', 'Stuff turkey with your favorite stuffing.', 'Completely cover the turkey with bacon overlaping the edges so that as it cooks and shrinks it will still cover the turkey.', 'Cook the turkey following the temp and time guides on your turkey packaging.', 'I baste occasionally, not for the turkey so much as the stuffing.', 'Tent the turkey with foil at the end of the cooking time if it should start to burn.']

title: Family Favorite Vanilla Popsicles
ingredients: ['1 1/3 cups milk', '3 tablespoons sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla']
directions: ['Pour milk in a large bowl.', 'Add sugar and vanilla.', 'Mix until the sugar dissolves.', 'Put the mixture in popsicle molds. (or cups)', 'And put in freezer for 4 1/2 hours.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Simple Roasted Carrots
ingredients: ['1 lb pre-cut baby carrots', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Heat oven to 475 degrees.', 'In shallow baking dish, toss carrots with oil and salt.', 'Roast 12 minutes, then shake pan to toss.', 'Roast another 8 minutes, shaking pan once or twice, until brown and tender.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Zucchini Fry
ingredients: ['zucchini', 'olive oil', 'chopped onion', '3 plum tomatoes', 'spinach']
directions: ['Cut up zucchini, put olive oil and chopped onion in skillet, saute.', 'Add zucchini and stir.', 'Add plum tomatoes, cut up.', 'Cover for 10 minutes.', 'Add spinach, stir and saute 5 to 10 minutes.']

title: Fruit Of The Palm Tree
ingredients: ['3 c. milk', '3 c. Neapolitan ice cream']
directions: ['Put the ice cream and milk in the blender. Push each button for 10 seconds. Pour out and there's a good milk shake ready to drink.']

title: My Favorite Snack:  Peanut Butter Coffee
ingredients: ['peanut butter', 'bread', 'coffee']
directions: ['You toast the bread.', 'Then you put peanut butter on the bread. Then make the coffee. Then, dip the peanut butter bread in the coffee and taste.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Pooh's Honey Sauce 1
ingredients: ['1 cup honey', '12 cup cream']
directions: ['Heat honey gently (do not boil) in a double boiler or heavy saucepan.', 'Remove from the heat and slowly stir in the cream.', 'Blend thoroughly.', 'Use on cereals, pancakes, waffles, French toast, ice cream, apple pie, or other desserts.', 'Store in a tightly-closed jar in the fridge, if there is any left over.', 'Winnie-the-Pooh woke up suddenly in the middle of the night and listened.', 'Then he got out of bed, and lit his candle, and stumped across the room to see if anybody was trying to get into his honey-cupboard, and they weren't, so he stumped back again, blew out his candle, and got into bed -- The House at Pooh Corner.']

title: Seasoned Grilled Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 lb asparagus', '1 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon Lawry's Seasoned Salt']
directions: ['Remove woody ends from asparagus and discard.', 'Place asparagus in large ziploc bag. Pour in oil and sprinkle seasoning.', 'Close bag forcing out air. Rub asparagus through bag to evenly distribute seasonings.', 'Grill to your taste. We use a pan for the grill that has holes in it. Often serve with grilled shrimp since it can all be placed in the same pan. Delicious.']

title: Chicken Stew
ingredients: ['1 large chicken', '1 qt. tomatoes', 'crackers', '1 large onion', '1 lb. Hoop cheese']
directions: ['Boil chicken, debone and reserve broth.', 'Boil broth, tomatoes and onion until onions are tender.', 'Add meat back to mixture.', 'Add shredded cheese and crackers until desired consistency.']

title: Salad Crispies
ingredients: ['tomato flavored soft tortilla roll', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Heat a teaspoon or so of olive oil in a medium sized skillet.', 'Cut the tortilla into 1/2 inch squares.', 'Fry quickly in hot oil until just crisp.', 'Drain.', 'Use on salads to add crunch.']

title: Oven Fried Bacon - No Mess, No Cleanup!
ingredients: ['8 slices bacon', '1/2 tablespoon pepper']
directions: ['Use a 4 sided pan like a jelly roll pan.', 'Line pan with tinfoil.', 'Fold parchment paper to fit over tinfoil in pan. Must use parchment paper & line the pan for easy cleanup, important step!', 'Set oven to 400*.', 'After lining pan lay strips of bacon on parchment paper.', 'Put in preheated 400* for 15 minutes, I turn bacon over after 10 minutes.', 'Take out when crispy & lay on paper towels.', 'When pan cools roll up tinfoil & parchment paper & throw away, no pan to wash!']

title: Strawberry Sauce
ingredients: ['1 pint strawberry, hulled', '13 cup granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a medium sized bowl, cut into chunks about 1/3 of the berries, reserve these for later.', 'Leave the other 2/3's whole or cut up, whichever you prefer.', 'Place them in a sauce pan over medium heat.', 'Add the sugar and simmer until thick, about 10 minutes.', 'Remove the sauce from heat and set on counter to cool about 5 minutes, stir in the vanilla.', 'Place the cooked berry sauce in the blender and puree.', 'Combine the berry puree with the reserved, uncooked berries.', 'Store in covered container in the refrigerator.']

title: Spinach With Garlic And Lemon
ingredients: ['2 tbsp olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 lbs spinach, well washed, trimmed', '1/2 None lemon, juiced']
directions: ['Heat oil and garlic in a large skillet on medium heat. Add spinach and cook 5 mins, until it wilts.', 'Remove from heat. Drizzle with lemon juice and season to taste. Toss well before serving.']

title: Ritz Cookies
ingredients: ['Ritz crackers', 'peanut butter', 'vanilla candy coating']
directions: ['Put peanut butter on 1 Ritz and add another Ritz to top.', 'Use about 2 or 3 packs; this will use all the vanilla coating.', 'Melt the vanilla in microwave using directions on back.', 'Coat each cookie and put on cookie sheet or wax paper.']

title: Better Than Mounds
ingredients: ['2 c. nuts', '1 c. Eagle Brand milk', '1 1/2 to 3 c. coconut, shredded', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in bowl.', 'Refrigerate overnight.', 'Roll in balls.', 'Taking a few out at a time, keeping rest cold, dip in melted chocolate.', 'Put on waxed paper.']

title: Bacon Fried Zucchini
ingredients: ['2 zucchini; 1/3' half moons', '8 slice bacon', '1 tbsp onion powder', '2 tsp garlic powder', '1 salt and pepper']
directions: ['Roast bacon on a sheet tray at 400 for approximately 15 minutes or until bacon is crispy.', 'Alternatively, dice bacon and render fat in a large saute pan, and remove crisped bacon.', 'Heat the rendered bacon fat in a large saute pan.', 'Add zucchini and dried spices.', 'Saute on medium heat for approximately 5-10 minutes or until zucchini is caramelized and tender.', 'Toss with bacon.', 'Variations; applewood seasoning, citrus, mustard, horseradish, potato, celery root']

title: Mango Kheer
ingredients: ['1 kg ripe mango', '200 g sugar', '1 liter milk', '2 tablespoons chopped nuts']
directions: ['Peel and extract mango pulp from the ripe mangoes and sieve it.', 'In a deep pan, cook mango pulp with equal quantity of water.', 'Prepare sugar syrup (boil sugar with little water and boil until it is slightly thickened) and mix it with mango mixture while continuously stirring.', 'Add milk to it. Mix well and keep it boiling until the mixture thickens. Decorate it with nuts and serve.']

title: Easy Baked Fries
ingredients: ['1 Large Potato', 'Olive Oil', 'Salt And Freshly Ground Black Pepper']
directions: ['Peel the potato. Slice into 1cm strips and place the strips in a pot. Fill with hot water and boil for 5 minutes. The strips will still be hard.', 'Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 220 degrees Celsius (425 F). Line a baking tray with aluminum paper and drizzle with olive oil. Place in the oven.', 'Drain the potatoes and return the potato strips back into the pot and stir constantly over low heat until the excess water has evaporated. This is very important to prevent the oil from splattering later on and injuring yourself. Place a lid on the pot and shake the pot - as vigorously as you want - to roughen the sides of the potato strips. Tumble the potatoes into the hot oil and stir to coat the potato in the oil.', 'Bake for 30 minutes to 45 minutes, turning the fries once during the course of baking. Drain on a kitchen paper and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Serve immediately.']

title: Broccoli with Toasted Garlic
ingredients: ['1 pound broccoli, washed and cut into florets', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Put broccoli, with water still clinging to it from being washed, into a large microwave safe bowl or dish with a lid.', 'Cover the bowl with the lid and microwave for 5 minutes.', 'In the meantime, heat the oil in a large skillet over a medium heat and add the garlic.', 'Cook the garlic in the oil, stirring frequently, until it is golden brown, about 3 minutes.', 'Transfer the toasted garlic to a small dish.', 'Remove the bowl of broccoli from microwave and carefully uncover it, drain it and pat it dry.', 'Put the broccoli into the skillet with the olive oil and saute over a medium heat for 3 minutes.', 'Sprinkle with toasted garlic, and season with salt and pepper.']

title: Blueberry Sherbert Recipe
ingredients: ['2 ounce Blueberry Schnapps fill orange juice', '1 ounce cream']
directions: ['Ice // rocks or possibly blended // frzn'],['cream'

title: Bubble Gum Sherbert Recipe
ingredients: ['2 ounce Bubble Gum Schnapps fill orange juice', '1 ounce cream']
directions: ['Ice // rocks or possibly blended // frzn'],['cream'

title: Roasted Carrot Fries
ingredients: ['1 pound fresh carrots, cut into 1/2-inch sticks', '2 teaspoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Place carrots in a greased 15x10x1-in. baking pan. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with salt; toss to coat. Bake, uncovered, at 450° for 10-12 minutes or until crisp-tender.']

title: Baked Haddock
ingredients: ['1 piece haddock', '2 Tbsp. butter', 'salt and pepper', '1 1/2 c. milk', 'sliced onion']
directions: ['Place fish in', 'the', 'middle', 'of large baking dish.', 'Pour milk over fish.\tPut', 'butter', 'on', 'top', 'of', 'fish.', 'Add salt and pepper. Slice an onion and place over fish.', 'Let fish bake at 300° to 350° heat for 20 to 25 minutes.']

title: Steamed Zucchini
ingredients: ['4 zucchini', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Trim ends from zucchini. Cut each one in half, then cut each half lengthwise into quarters.', 'Place zucchini and garlic into a steamer basket, then place the steamer basket into the pot. Steam for 10 to 15 minutes, or until the zucchini are tender.', 'Transfer zucchini to a large bowl. Mash the garlic and put it in the bowl with the zucchini. Drizzle the olive oil into the bowl and toss until the vegetables are coated with oil and garlic.']

title: Sweet Milk And Sugar Icing (Frosting)
ingredients: ['2 cups sugar', '1/2 cup milk', '1/2 cup butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix sugar, milk, and butter in a large saucepan.', 'Bring to a full rolling boil. Boil for 90 seconds.', 'Remove from heat and add vanilla.', 'Place in a pan of cold water and using an electric mixer, beat until a thick spreading consistency.']

title: Banana Ice Cream-- Not Mine Just Checking Nutrition Info
ingredients: ['1 banana', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 teaspoons orange juice', '12 teaspoon sugar']
directions: ['banana froze and chopped', 'puree it in food processor add the juice.', 'serve.']

title: Baked Fennel and Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 kg fennel, thinly sliced', '4 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced into slivers', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 kg potato, thinly sliced']
directions: ['Pre-heat the oven to 180C.', 'Saute the fennel and garlic in the olive oil until mostly soft, about 10-12 minutes.', 'Add the potatoes, stir well and fry for a few minutes.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Lay the vegetables in a greased baking dish, one or two layers deep.', 'I like to season the veggies in between the layers with lots of pepper.', 'If you want to be really decadent you could add a bit more olive oil or butter as well.', 'Bake until soft, about 30 minutes.', 'You may want to take the veggies out once or twice just to keep the top from burning too much.']

title: Chicken Briyani
ingredients: ['5 3/8 cups rice', '2/3 cup tomato and onion', 'pepper Chilly and']
directions: ['First cut the vegetables', 'Then add the ingredients with boiled water.']

title: Zucchini Linguine
ingredients: ['2 8 inch long zucchini, ends trimmed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '12 lemon, juice of', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Julienne just the outsides of each zucchini lengthwise using a mandoline or by hand.', 'Discard seed core.', 'Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.', 'Add zucchini and saute 3 minutes, or until soft.', 'Season with lemon juice, salt and pepper.']

title: Sauteed Cauliflower
ingredients: ['1 cauliflower', 'olive oil, as needed', 'salt, as needed']
directions: ['Remove the base of the stem of the cauliflower with a sharp knife.', 'From the top down, cut the cauliflower into 1/4 inches slices. (Some of the slices will crumble, but those still taste good, they just don't look as pretty.).', 'Heat 2 Table olive oil over medium-high heat in a large nonstick frying pan.', 'Add one batch of the cauliflower (in a single layer) and cook until brown on the first side. Use a spachula to flip over the cauliflower.', 'Fry the cauliflower until brown on the second side, adding more olive oil if needed.', 'At this time, I usually add 2-3 Table. water, turn over the cauliflower again, cover and cook for several more minutes.', 'Repeat on the second side if the cauliflower is not quite tender. The cauliflower tastes best if it has gotten very brown.', 'Sprinkle with salt.', 'Remove the first batch, keeping warm, and doing a second and third batch (if you still have cauliflower to cook) until all of the cauliflower has been sauteed.']

title: Caramelized Cauliflower
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', 'olive oil', 'fine sea salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.', 'Place the head of cauliflower on a cutting board, and slice it top-down into 1/4-inch slices, some of which will crumble.', 'Toss cauliflower in a large bowl with plenty of olive oil and a bit of salt, spread it in a single layer on a heavy sheet pan (or two, if one looks crowded), and roast until golden brown and caramelized, turning bits and slices once or twice, about 25 minutes. Devour.']

title: Roasted Pumpkin Croutons Recipe
ingredients: ['Fresh cubed pumpkin', 'Olive Oil', 'Salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.', 'Toss pumpkin in salt and olive oil.', 'Line baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Spread cubes of pumpkin on baking sheet and bake until pumpkin is soft and slightly charred at corners.']

title: Quick Roasted Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients: ['1 medium pumpkin whole, sugar pumpkins are the best for seeds', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat your oven to 400F (200C).', 'Carve your pumpkin as normal for Halloween and set the pulp and seeds aside.', 'Separate the seeds from the pulpy stringy leftovers.', 'Rinse the seeds well to remove the pulp.', 'For each cup of seeds add 2 cups of water and place them in a saucepan.', 'Add 1/2 tablespoon of salt for every 2 cups of water.', 'Bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for about 10 minutes.', 'Drain well.', 'Add the seeds to a bowl, toss the seeds with the olive oil.', 'Feel free to add other seasonings as desired, eg.', 'salt, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper, cajun spice mix, etc.', 'Line a baking pan with aluminum foil.', 'Lay the seeds on the sheet and spread all in one layer.', 'Bake on the top rack of your oven until the seeds have roasted and begin to brown, about 10 to 20 minutes.', 'Stir and roast until you are happy with the golden brown color.', 'Let the seeds cool completely before eating.', 'Crack the seeds open and eat or just eat the seed and shell whole.']

title: Purple Cow
ingredients: ['ice cream', 'grape carbonated drink']
directions: ['With a big spoon, get ice cream out of box and put in blender. Pour grape drink over the ice cream, push one of the buttons until the ice cream and grape drink are mixed real good.', 'Pour into a tall glass and drink up!']

title: Tropical Smoothie (No Added Sugar)
ingredients: ['1/2 cup banana, mashed and frozen', '1/2 cup pineapple chunk, frozen', '2 ounces coconut milk', '2 ounces evaporated milk', '4 ounces yogurt']
directions: ['Throw everything in the blender. 1 -- 37 -- 82 -- HIKE!', 'Blend for about 2 minutes or until creamy and well mixed.', 'Pour into two lovely cups and enjoy.:).', 'NOTES: These are even better chilled in the fridge. TIme to make does not including chilling or freezing fruit.']

title: Roasted carrots
ingredients: ['9 carrots', '1/4 cup honey', '3 tbsp olive oil', '5 garlic cloves', '1 salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['preheat oven to 350F', 'peel carrots and cut carrots in 1/3rds.', 'you can peel and put carrots in baking dish whole if you like.', 'add honey then olive oil.', 'mix with hands, super sticky, but mix well.', 'take off shell of garlic, add to the mix.', 'sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.', 'this is a basic roasting recipe - add different herbs before or after carrots are cooked.', 'Bake carrots for 60 minutes.', 'Don't rush a good thing.', 'Maybe consider covering with foil.']

title: Sauteed Zucchini
ingredients: ['3 strips bacon', '3 small zucchini', '1/2 c. diced onion', '1 clove minced garlic', '2 diced tomatoes']
directions: ['Cook bacon over medium heat until crispy; drain on paper towels.', 'Pour off all but 1 tablespoon fat.', 'Slice zucchini; add to hot fat.', 'Add onion and garlic.', 'Cook, stirring often, until soft, but not mushy.', 'Add tomatoes.', 'Cook for 2 minutes.', 'Serve with bacon crumbled over top.', 'Serves 4.']

title: peanut butter cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup sugar', '1 egg', '1 tbsp butter']
directions: ['preheat to 325', 'cream egg and sugar, add peanut butterand butter.', 'bake 8-10 mins.', 'and enjoy.']

title: Crispy bacon and avocado sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 ripe avocado', '1 lime', '3 very thin rashers bacon']
directions: ['Put the bacon rashers under the grill.', 'Peel and cut the avocado', 'Squees the lime over a seive and add to the bowl', 'Add salt and pepper and mash', 'Spread on one slice of bread', 'Add the crispy bacon rashers', 'Cover with the other slice and cut into two.', 'Serve with a tomato.']

title: Tomato Sandwich
ingredients: ['fresh tomatoes', 'salt', 'pepper', 'mayonnaise', 'bread']
directions: ['Peel tomatoes and slice in small pieces.', 'Add salt, pepper and mayonnaise to taste.', 'Toast bread and add the tomato spread.']

title: Banana Avocado Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 frozen banana', '1 avocado', '1/2 cup milk', '1/2 yogurt', '1 tablespoon honey optional']
directions: ['put your frozen banana into the blender them empty your avocado too', 'then blend', 'the last step and it is optional \n-wet your glass \n-then put it in sugar', 'AND VOUALA']

title: Black Kiss
ingredients: ['Dough: 12 eggs,2cups of flour,12 tablespoons of sugar,walnuts,poppy-seeds,almonds,raisins.', 'Cream: 8 OZ of butter,4 tablespoons of sugar,2 eggs,4 tablespoons of milk,jelly,fruit,cocoa powder.']
directions: ['1.Separate the egg whites from yolks.Stir yolks with 9 teaspoons of sugar until sugar is completely dissolved.Whip the mixture until the mixture increases in volume 2-3 times.', '2. In another bowl whip whe whites until foamy and when the whites are whipped little by little add 3 tablespoons of sugar at the same time continuing to whip the mixture.', '3. Whipped yolks should be mixed with 1/3 of whites,then add flour and mix everything slightly.Add the rest of whippped whites and mix evrything carefully.', '4.The dough should be divided into 3 parts.Into one part you add walnuts ,into the second one- poppy-seeds,into the third- raisins ( the amount of these ingredients depends on your taste).', '5. Preheat oven to 350 F/.Spray cake molds with nonstick cooking spray.Bake the cake 20-30 minutes until ready.The baked dough should be left aside for 3-4 hours.', '6. Put the cream between the layers of the cake.Decorate the top with the fruit jelly.', 'Cream: Pour milk into the bowl,add sugar andkeep on the fire until starts to boil.Eggs should be whipped a little bit and added into the milk and sugar mixture.', 'Butter should be whipped to get a fluffy mixture.Not stopping the whipping add the milk syrop and add 1-2 tablespoon of cocoa powder.', 'Jelly: You should make an orange or lemon jelly ( any variety sold at the supermarket) and pour the warm mixture onto the cake which is put into the deep dish.Decorate the cake with any fruit you like( cherry,raspberries,strawberry).As the jelly is yellow,choose red fruits for decorating to make it look bright and beautiful.', 'Levae the cake in the fridge for some hours.', 'Enjoy it!']

title: Easy Frozen Yogurt For Dogs
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon honey', '3 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 ripe banana', '16 ounces plain yogurt']
directions: ['Mix the peanut butter, honey, and fruit together until well blended-mash with a fork or use the blender.', 'Add the fruit mixture to the yogurt and mix well. Freeze in ice cube trays.', 'Crack trays and release treats as needed!']

title: Homemade Frosty Paws Treats for Dogs
ingredients: ['32 ounces, weight Plain Yogurt', '1 whole Ripe Banana', '1 Tablespoon Honey', '1 Tablespoon Peanut Butter']
directions: ['Lightly spray 2 cupcake tins with vegetable spray.', 'Put all ingredients (break banana in pieces) into the food processor.', 'Whiz it around until smooth.', 'Divide evenly between 24 cupcake molds.', 'Freeze until solid.', 'Pop out of cupcake tins, put into plastic freezer bags and keep frozen.', 'Your dog(s) will thank you!']

title: Cauliflower 'cous cous'
ingredients: ['1 each Salt and pepper to taste', '1 tbsp Olive oil', '2 clove to 3 garlic cloves', '1 each onion', '1 head cauliflower']
directions: ['Break down cauliflower and remove large stems from florets.', 'Place florets in food processor and process in quick bursts until cauliflower resembles small bits of gravel or beads.', 'There may be some pieces that don't process down small enough; these pieces should be removed.', 'Dice onion and mince garlic.', 'Saute in olive oil - add onions to pan first, cook until softened, add garlic and saute a minute more.', 'Remove from heat and transfer to small bowl, reserving oil in pan.', 'Add cauliflower to oil in pan (additional oil may be needed) and cook until slightly browned - appx.', '15 mins', 'Add onions and garlic back in pan and quickly toss with cauliflour, add salt and pepper to taste and transfer to serving bowl.', 'This is just the basic recipe - use your imagination and add whatever you like to switch it up!', 'I like to finish it with a splash of apple cider vinegar and a squeeze of lemon.', 'Toasted nuts like sunflower seeds or pine nuts are also good, as is just a simple sprinkling of fresh chopped Italian parsley or basil.', 'The sky's the limit :)']

title: Ezekiel Bread Breakfast 1
ingredients: ['egg', 'mushroom', 'ezekial bread', 'spinach']
directions: ['Egg Sunny Side Up, Spinach, And Mushrooms This egg and veggie combo gives your body everything it needs in the mornings. The bread will keep you full until lunch and the protein from the egg will give you energy. Plus, nutrient-rich spinach is one of the best leafy greens to start off your day.']

title: Heaven and Hell
ingredients: ['2 pounds milk chocolate', '2 cups cream']
directions: ['In a saucepan over medium heat, bring the cream to a boil and stir in the chocolate.', 'Removed from heat, cover pan and let the chocolate melt.', 'Whisk to combine thoroughly, then let cook to room temperature.', 'Optional garnish:', 'Raspberry sauce; Puree frozen raspberries, strain through a sieve.', 'Sweeten to taste with sugar.', 'Drizzled raspberry sauce, propped up with chunks of swirled chocolate.', 'Chocolate pieces.', 'Melt milk chocolate and white chocolate.', 'Spread milk chocolate in cookie sheet lined with wax paper.', 'Scatter spoonfuls of white chocolate around the dark, then create swirls with a toothpick.', 'Allow to cool, then break into pieces.']

title: Fennel Salad
ingredients: ['2 bulbs fennel, chopped', '4 ounces olive oil', 'Salt and black pepper']
directions: ['In a mixing bowl, combine chopped fennel and olive oil.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste and mix thoroughly.']

title: Vanilla Ice Cream With No Cream
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '2 tbsp Sugar', '1 Milk']
directions: ['Separate the egg white and yolk.', 'Whisk the egg white until stiff peaks form.', 'Next, mix in the egg yolk and sugar, and put it in the freezer.', 'Leave it for an hour, and then stir in the milk.', 'Put it back in the freezer.', 'It should harden within around 3 hours.', 'It's done!']

title: Smoked salmon wrap
ingredients: ['3 slice Smoked salmon', '3 slice Bread', '1 Avocado', '1 Carrot', '3 slice Honey ham']
directions: ['Shred carrot', 'Cut avocado in slices.', 'Flatten bread with rolling pin.', 'Put bread on plastic wrap.', 'Place ham and smoked salmonon bread.', 'Place avocado and carrot shreds on one side.', 'Roll the bread like a sushi.', 'Start rolling on the side with avocado and carrot shreds with plastic wrap.', 'Cut the roll into two pieces.']

title: Flavoured Salt For Fish
ingredients: ['6 salt measures of, cup of tea', '1 package seasoning mixture for fish']
directions: ['In a bowl, mix the ingredients well and store in a sealed jar.', 'Use it to flavor your grilled or baked fish. You can make a sauce by mixing a spoon of this mixture and 2 tablespoons of olive oil to brush over the fish.']

title: Baked Stuffed Fish(Any Type Fish May Be Used)
ingredients: ['fish', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper.', 'If whole fish, rub cavity with lemon juice.']

title: Sushi
ingredients: ['1 ounce raw fresh tuna', '1 ounce cooked sushi rice']
directions: ['Put the fish on top of the rice.'],['rice'

title: Eggs in a Nest of Spinach with Mayonnaise
ingredients: ['1/2 bunch Spinach', '1 Egg', '2 tbsp Mayonnaise', '1 dash Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Chop the spinach lengthwise into thirds.', 'Heat vegetable oil (not listed in ingredients) in a frying pan and add the spinach to the pan.', 'Once the spinach becomes tender, mix in the salt, pepper, and mayonnaise, then arrange the spinach in a circle, with an indentation in the center.', 'Break the egg into the indentation, cover with a lid, and steam on medium heat.', 'Once the egg white turns cloudy, remove from the heat and slide the entire nest off of the frying pan onto a serving dish.']

title: Roasted Veggies
ingredients: ['2 medium heads cauliflower, broken into florets', '6 medium carrots', '1/4 cup olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['Cut cauliflowerets and carrots into 1/4-in. slices. Place in a single layer in two ungreased 15x10x1-in. baking pans. Drizzle with oil; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 15-20 minutes or until tender, stirring once.']

title: Doodle-Bug Eggs
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'margarine', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['When Jim's son, Jeremy, was 3 or 4 years old, he watched while his daddy cooked doodle-bug eggs for him.', 'Jim put some margarine in a frying pan and while it was melting, he took a slice of bread and folded it in half.', 'He took a bite from the middle, making a hole in the center of the slice, entertaining Jeremy in doing this.', 'He put the slice in the frying pan, broke an egg in the hole and cooked for a minute or so each side.', 'Jeremy was delighted with his doodle-bug egg.']

title: Sweet & Spicy Baked Chicken Wings (Momofuku Bar Inspired)
ingredients: ['2 pounds chicken wings', '2 1/2 tablespoons ginger finely chopped']
directions: ['Cook them to crisp perfection as in my recipe for skinny baked chicken wings.'],['chicken'

title: Roge Can Ice Cream
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 c. cream', '1/3 c. sugar', 'vanilla to taste']
directions: ['Mix together all ingredients.', 'Pour into a 1 pound coffee can with snap lid.', 'Put 1 pound can into 2 pound can.', 'Add ice and salt.', 'Snap lid onto 2 pound can.', 'Roll can for 10 minutes and serve with favorite topping or just plain.']

title: Zora'S Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. black pepper']
directions: ['Put chicken in large pot and cover with water.', 'Cook until tender.', 'Take chicken off bones.']

title: Lemon Olive Oil Ice Cream
ingredients: ['2 cups whole milk', '1 cup sugar', '1 lemon, juice and zest of', '1/2 cup olive oil']
directions: ['heat milk to poiling point and stir in sugar until dissolved. Chill mixture in refrigerator for 1-2 hours.', 'Place mixture in blender. Add lemon zest and juice. Mix well.', 'Add olive oil in batches until incorporated. Chill in refrigerator 1-2 hours.', 'Freeze mixture in shallow pan. Still several times and refreeze.']

title: Easy Roasted Broccoli
ingredients: ['14 ounces broccoli', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Cut broccoli florets from the stalk.', 'Peel the stalk and slice into 1/4-inch slices.', 'Mix florets and stem pieces with olive oil in a bowl and transfer to a baking sheet; season with salt and pepper.', 'Roast in the preheated oven until broccoli is tender and lightly browned, about 18 minutes.']

title: 5 Minute Roasted Broccoli
ingredients: ['2 heads Broccoli', '1 Tablespoon Olive Oil', 'Salt And Pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 F.', 'Chop the broccoli into bite-sized florets. Toss the broccoli into a pan. I use a loaf pan. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add in the olive oil and mix to distribute the oil and seasoning.', 'Bake in the oven at 350 F for about 5-7 minutes. Stir it halfway through to ensure even cooking.']

title: Savory Chicken Roll-Ups
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. boned chicken', '1 piece of celery', '1 small onion', '1 small carrot']
directions: ['Cook chicken in boiling water until done; I add celery, onion and carrot for seasoning.', 'Debone chicken and cut into small pieces or grind in food processor until coarse.', 'Let broth stand until congealed in refrigerator.', 'Scoop off fat.']

title: Tuna Roll-Ups
ingredients: ['1 loaf frozen bread dough', '2 cans tuna, drained', '3 Tbsp. minced onion', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'dash of pepper', 'minced celery']
directions: ['Roll bread dough out on floured board.', 'Brush with melted butter.', 'Combine remaining ingredients.', 'Spread evenly over dough. Roll up like jelly roll and cut into 8 slices.', 'Put slices, cut side up, on greased cookie sheet.', 'Let rise for several hours. Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes, until bread is golden brown.']

title: Garlic Croutons
ingredients: ['Whole wheat bread slices', 'Garlic, crushed', 'Olive oil']
directions: ['Rub bread slices with garlic and olive oil.'],['bread'

title: Bruschetta
ingredients: ['6 slices rustic, country-style bread, cut 1/2 to 3/4-inch thick and halved', '2 cloves garlic, lightly crushed', '1/4 cup olive oil', 'Salt']
directions: ['Grill or broil the bread on each side by setting the slices 4 to 6 inches from the heat source.', 'Rub each slice with a crushed garlic clove, letting the garlic release its pungence and fragrant juices into the bread.', 'Drizzle with the olive oil and sprinkle with the salt.', 'Serve warm if you wish.']

title: Grilled Zucchini
ingredients: ['4 6 zucchini', '3 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Wash the and remove the ends. Leave skin on and slice lengthwise.', 'Put olive oil in a bowl and add salt and pepper.', 'Dip zucchini slices into oil mix then grill until crisp tender, about 5-10 minutes turning half way through.']

title: French Fried Zucchini
ingredients: ['6 zucchini, young firm ones are best', 'salt, to taste', 'olive oil, for frying']
directions: ['Preheat oil to 350F.', 'Slice the zucchini very thinly lengthwise.', 'Saute in oil until golden brown; drain on absorbent paper and sprinkle with salt.']

title: Honey Shake
ingredients: ['1/2 cup skim milk', '3 ounces diabetic sugar-free vanilla ice cream', '1/2 teaspoon honey', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a blender.', 'Blend on medium speed for 2 minutes .', 'Pour into glass and enjoy.']

title: Honey Deep Hair Conditioner
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon honey', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['Mix honey with Olive Oil. Heat in microwave oven to melt and apply to hair then cover head with a very warm towel for half an hour while taking a warm soothing bath then shampoo off.'],['honey'

title: Mom'S Winter Special
ingredients: ['4 c. cooked rice', 'sugar to taste', 'milk to cover']
directions: ['For many years a man watched his wife take a locked box down from the cupboard.', 'She would unlock the box, take a pinch, sprinkle it over whatever she was cooking, relock the box and return it to its place.', 'One day, while his wife was away, his curiosity got the best of him.', 'He went to the cupboard, took the box down and opened it.', 'To his surprise it was empty.', 'He turned it over and on the bottom was written the word 'love'.', 'Don\'t keep your 'love' locked up in a cupboard.', 'Keep it within easy reach and use generously.', 'So into everything you cook, put a pinch of 'love'.']

title: Fish Baked In Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['2 lb. fish', 'juice of 1 lemon', '1/2 c. olive oil', '5 tomatoes, cut up', '1/2 c. white wine']
directions: ['Put lemon juice on both sides of fish.', 'Put in baking pan. Heat in skillet; add tomatoes, wine, garlic and sugar.', 'Simmer 15 minutes.', 'Add salt and pepper.', 'Put parsley, bread crumbs and sauce on fish.', 'End up with bread crumbs and parsley.', 'Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.', 'Baste a couple of times.']

title: Peanut Butter Coffee
ingredients: ['6 cups brewed coffee', '1 tablespoon peanut butter']
directions: ['Put the peanut butter and a cup or two of the coffee in a blender.', 'Whomp until it's well-blended, then stir back into the rest of the coffee.']

title: Coconut Cream Pie Creamer
ingredients: ['1 cup Whole Milk, Almond Milk Or Coconut Milk', '1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream', '1/2 cups Sucanat/ Raw Cane Sugar, 1/4 Cup Pure Maple Syrup Or 1/2 Teaspoon Stevia', '2 teaspoons Coconut Extract', '1/2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract']
directions: ['Whisk together milk, cream and sweetener in a medium saucepan over medium heat.', 'When mixture begins to steam up from the pan, remove from heat and stir in coconut and vanilla extract.', 'Pour into a glass bottle and store in the refrigerator.', 'Use according to your own taste in coffee, hot cocoa, ice cream, oatmeal, French toast, etc.']

title: Bacon In The Oven
ingredients: ['bacon', '1 pinch black pepper']
directions: ['First all you need to do is take the bacon and lay it down on any of the following, cookie sheet, parchment paper (not wax paper as the wax can melt and/or the paper can catch fire), or aluminum foil. We do this for an easy clean up but if you want just lay down on your baking pan. Then sprinkle the bacon with black pepper.', 'Next turn on your oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit.', 'Put your bacon in and wait about 15 min to check on it then as soon as the bacon is crispy brown or golden brown take it out and you're done!']

title: Panettone Eggnog Ice Cream Cake
ingredients: ['2 pounds Panettone Bread', '4 cups Light Eggnog Ice Cream, Softened']
directions: ['Cut the top off of the panettone bread, about 2 inches from the top. Do not discard the top.', 'Hollow out the inside of the panettone, about an inch from the bottom and the sides. (Save the scooped out bread for another use like bread pudding or toasted croutons.)', 'Scoop ice cream into the hollowed out part of the panettone, patting the ice cream down until the bread is filled to the top. Replace bread top.', 'Wrap it in plastic wrap and store in freezer for 2 hours or until ready to serve. (Let sit at room temperture for 10 minutes before slicing.)']

title: BunnyLovingCook's Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 cup of frozen banana']
directions: ['Blend until creamy.'],['banana'

title: Garlic Chicken
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. chicken', '40 cloves garlic']
directions: ['Put the chicken (whole or in pieces) into a roaster.', 'Cover it with the unpeeled garlic cloves.', 'Roast at 350° for 1 to 1 1/4 hours.', 'When chicken is done, you can make a white sauce and squeeze the garlic cloves into it for a gravy or just squeeze the cloves onto a piece of bread and eat with the chicken.']

title: Skinny Vanilla Latte – Real Food Style
ingredients: ['1 cup Strong Brewed Coffee', '1 cup Whole Milk', '2 Tablespoons Honey', '1/2 teaspoons Good Quality Pure Vanilla Extract']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in a small saucepan. Warm on the stove at Medium heat until desired temperature. Transfer to a blender and blend until foamy or if you have an emersion blender you can use that.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Schmaltz (Rendered Chicken Fat) Recipe
ingredients: ['3/4 pound chicken fat and skin, finely chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped']
directions: ['In a medium saucepan, combine chicken fat and skin with just enough water to barely cover. Bring to a simmer over high heat, then lower heat to medium-low and continue to simmer, stirring frequently, until fat has mostly rendered, water has cooked off, and chicken skin and fat pieces are small, browned, and starting to crisp, about 50 minutes. Add onion and cook, stirring frequently until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.', 'Strain rendered chicken fat (schmaltz) through fine mesh strainer and use as directed. Reserve crisped chicken skin, fat, and onion (called', 'in Yiddish), if desired (they can be eaten as a snack with salt, or stirred into chopped liver).']

title: Chicken Noodle Soupgroves, Texas
ingredients: ['1 can Chicken Noodle soup', 'crackers']
directions: ['Get soup out of cabinet and open with can opener.'],['crackers'

title: Banana Mango Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 cup frozen peeled and diced mango', '1 large ripe banana, sliced', '1/2 cup skim milk', '1 teaspoon honey', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Using a blender, blend mango, banana, milk, honey and vanilla extract on high speed until slushy and well combined.']

title: Garlic Puree
