ingredients: ['2 dozen heads of garlic', 'Salt', '2 to 3 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Separate the heads into cloves, leave the cloves in their papery husks, and simmer in a pan of water seasoned with 1 teaspoon salt for 30 to 40 minutes, or until very, very soft.', 'Drain, then put through a food mill to extract the soft pulp from the skins.', 'Season the puree with a touch of salt and mix in the oil.', 'Put in a jar and refrigerate until needed.', 'It will last several weeks, or longer if you cover the top with a thin film of olive oil.']

title: Roasted Garlic Paste
ingredients: ['whole garlic cloves', '1/2 c olive oil', 'salt & fresh pepper']
directions: ['peel outside layer of garlic,cut off the top 1/3 of head, saute cut side up in onven proof pa for about 10 minutes, transfer to pre heated 350* oven and roast for 15 minutes. let cool and pop cloves from skin, puree in blender until smooth']

title: Roasted Garlic On The Grill
ingredients: ['1 head garlic', '1 teaspoon olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut the top off a head of garlic.', 'Drizzle olive oil on top.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Wrap in foil to cover.', 'Toss on grill over high heat.', 'Grill until soft.']

title: Caramelized Roasted Garlic And Storage Methods
ingredients: ['1 Garlic Bulb', 'Olive Oil', 'Salt and Pepper']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350° F.', 'Peel as much of the papery skin off the garlic without loosening the garlic cloves from the base of the bulb.', 'Cut off as little of the top of garlic that you can while exposing the tops of all the cloves.', 'Get a piece of aluminum foil out that is large enough to cover the whole piece of garlic and set the bulb in center.', 'Drizzle the garlic top in olive oil until it is completely covered and seeping down the inside. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Wrap the garlic up tight but do not rip the foil while doing so or else the oil will seep out while cooking.', 'Place in oven on a baking sheet or baking stone and let roast until it is golden and has slight caramelization around it, about an hour depending on the size of the garlic bulb .', 'Let cool and then slip the cloves out by squeezing the ends.', 'Use immediately, store in olive oil in fridge for no more than four days, or freeze and use as needed.']

title: Gift Of The Gods
ingredients: ['3 cloves garlic, crushed', 'olive oil and water', 'little salt']
directions: ['Mix', 'well.', 'Use a sprig of parsley or celery to garnish roast or sausage.']

title: Salad Croutons
ingredients: ['1 loaf of kings Hawaiian bread', 'garlic powder, to taste', 'Lawry's Seasoned Salt, to taste', 'olive oil flavored cooking spray']
directions: ['Pre heat oven to 350.', 'Cube bread into bite sized pieces.', 'Place into a 9x13 cake pan.', 'Spritz with oil.', 'Sprinkle garlic powder and Lawry's over the croutons and toss well.', 'Place into oven and bake for 10 minutes. Remove from oven, toss, spritz again and sprinkle with more garlic powder and salt if desired.', 'Return to oven. Bake for another 10 minutes or until croutons are 'dried' and browned. Remove from oven and allow to cool.', 'Store in an air tight container or large Zip style bag.']

title: Grilled Eggplant (Aubergine) & Garlic Spread
ingredients: ['1 large eggplant', '5 -6 garlic cloves, cut into slivers', 'olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['With sharp paring knife, cut slits into eggplant.', 'Insert garlic slivers into each slit, using as few or many as you like.', 'Rub olive oil all over eggplant.', 'Put on hot grill, turning to cook evenly.', 'Eventually, the eggplant will sort of 'deflate'.', 'Remove from grill; set aside to cool a bit.', 'When cool enough to handle, cut a long slit in eggplant, open it up, and scrape out eggplant/garlic 'innards'.', 'Place in bowl, salt & pepper to taste.', 'Drizzle with a little olive oil.', 'Serve with pita chips or crackers.', 'Or use as a vegetable side dish.']

title: Low-Fat Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '2 Tbsp. honey', '3 Tbsp. apple juice']
directions: ['Mix honey and apple juice and pour over chicken.', 'Bake at 350° until done, approximately 1 hour.']

title: Honey-Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['4 to 6 chicken parts', '1/2 c. orange juice', '1/3 c. honey']
directions: ['Baste chicken with orange juice and honey.', 'Bake in oven at 350° for about an hour.', 'Baste 2 to 3 times during the hour. The chicken has a glazed look when done.']

title: Bacon Warm Ups!
ingredients: ['One Box of Town House Crackers', 'One Pound of Hickory Smoked Bacon']
directions: ['Cut each bacon strip into thirds.', 'Wrap each cracker with one third of a strip of bacon.', 'Grill in perforated pan or BBQ wok on high heat using the indirect BBQ cooking method.', 'Turn once during cooking to crisp bacon on both sides.', 'Serve on a platter and watch these quickly disappear!']

title: Rabbit
ingredients: ['1 rabbit', '1 c. onion', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Boil rabbit until tender in water with salt and onion.', 'Put in baking container and bake until brown.', 'Sprinkle with pepper.']

title: Easy Baked Turkey
ingredients: ['10 to 13 lb. turkey', 'margarine', 'salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 500°.', 'Season turkey with margarine and salt. Place in a roasting pan with a good fitting lid.', 'Add 8 cups of hot water.', 'Place turkey in oven, making sure lid is on good.', 'After oven has again reached 500°, bake for 1 hour.', 'Turn oven off and do not open oven door until the next morning.', '(I usually start mine at 8 p.m. and open oven door next morning at 6 a.m.)', 'This is very easy and the meat is very tender and moist.']

title: Toffee Chocolate Spoons
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '4 oz milk chocolate, melted', 'None None Hot milk, to serve']
directions: ['Line 2 baking pans with parchment paper. Combine sugar and 1/2 cup water in small saucepan. Stir on medium heat, without boiling, until sugar has dissolved. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low; simmer, uncovered, without stirring, until toffee is golden brown. Remove from heat; let stand for 2 mins.', 'Spoon toffee onto prepared pans in 10 spoon shapes, about 5 inches long. Let stand at room temperature until set.', 'Dip toffee spoons into chocolate; return to pans. Let stand at room temperature until set.', 'Use spoons to stir mugs of hot milk to make hot chocolate.']

title: Broccoli With Lemon And Garlic
ingredients: ['1 head broccoli divided into florets', '1 lemon', '1 clove garlic minced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper']
directions: ['Steam the broccoli until tender, approximately 6 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water. Place on paper towels to drive. Place into a serving dish.', 'Whisk together the lemon juice and rind, garlic, and olive oil. Add salt and pepper and pour over the broccoli. Refrigerate for at least 20 minutes before serving.']

title: Roast Beetroot Soup
ingredients: ['Beetroot', 'onion', 'chicken stock']
directions: ['Roast 4 beetroot in foil, 180c 1 hr. Peel, chop. Sweat 1chopped onion in butter. Add beet, 1ltr chicken stock, S&P. Simmer 30mins. Blitz.']

title: Carne Asada Marinade
ingredients: ['3/4 cup orange juice 1/2 cup lemon juice 1/3 cup lime juice 4 cloves garlic', 'minced 1/2 tequila 1 teaspoon finely chopped canned chipotle pepper 1 tablespoon chili powder 1 tablespoon ground cumin 1 tablespoon paprika 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1 tablespoon black pepper 1 bunch fresh cilantro', 'chopped 1/2 cup olive oil 3 pounds flank steak']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and marinate for several hours'],['olive oil'

title: Lemon Lime Gelato
ingredients: ['1/2 whole Lemon', '1/2 whole Lime', '1-1/2 cup Heavy Whipping Cream', '1/2 cups Milk', '1 cup Sugar']
directions: ['Juice the lemon and lime halves (you should get about 1/4 Cup total juice). Then zest them as well.', 'Pour cream, milk, sugar, juice, and zests into an 8x8 inch pan. Mix it gently until sugar is well incorporated. Cover dish and freeze for 8 hours.', 'If you want your ice cream sooner, put it in a larger pan so it's thinner and freezes more quickly.']

title: Monterey Jack Crispy Wafers
ingredients: ['1 lb monterey jack cheese', 'garlic powder']
directions: ['Cut cheese into l/4 inch slices.', 'Space cheese 3 inches apart on a non-stick cookie sheet.', 'Sprinkle with garlic powder, to taste.', 'Bake 5-10 minutes at 400 degrees F depending on your oven (Watch these closely; Do not overbake).', 'Remove immediately and let cool.', 'Store in an airtight container.']

title: Grilled Lemon Garlic Zucchini
ingredients: ['1 lemon, juice of', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large zucchini, cut into 1/2 inch round', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Mix first three ingredients together in shallow bowl and let them sit for around 15 minutes.', 'Making sure the grill is nice and hot, dip the zucchini slices into the marinade and place them directly on the grill. Use tongs for the best results.', 'Remember to flip them once you feel that one side is nicely browned.', 'Cook until desired amount of tenderness is reached, or until both sides have grill marks and can be stabbed easily with a fork.', 'Note: If using a smaller zucchini cut into a shape that works for your grill, you wouldn't want the slices to fall between the bars. I usually end up using ridiculously large zucchinis (diameter around 3 inches or larger).']

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: ['3 c. cooked rice', '5 slices bacon', '2 carrots, grated', '1/4 c. onion, chopped', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['While rice is cooking, fry the bacon and remove from skillet. Saute the grated carrots and chopped onion.', 'Crumble the bacon. Add bacon and sauteed vegetables to cooked rice.', 'Mix ingredients together and salt to taste.']

title: Fried Zucchini
ingredients: ['2 to 3 slices bacon', '1/3 to 1/4 c. margarine', '1 small onion, diced', '2 to 3 sliced zucchini', '1 to 2 tomatoes, cut in chunks', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Fry bacon that has been cut in small pieces.', 'Drain off grease.', 'Add margarine and melt.', 'Add onion and stir-fry until onion is half done.', 'Add zucchini and tomatoes.', 'Add salt and pepper and stir-fry rapidly, about 5 minutes.', 'Cook until done, but not mushy.']

title: An Italian Snack (Chocolate)
ingredients: ['4 slices really good bread, sliced thick', '1 12 ounces dark chocolate']
directions: ['Preheat a toaster oven or a regular oven to 450F.', 'Arrange half of the chocolate on one slice of the bread, and place another slice of bread on top.', 'Repeat for the second sandwich.', 'Place the sandwiches on a cookie sheet and let them toast in the oven for about 5 minutes on each side.', 'Remove them from the oven, slice in half, and let them cool for a couple of minutes (otherwise youll scorch your tongue) before eating them.']

title: Honey Roasted Carrots
ingredients: ['8 carrots, peeled', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1/4 cup honey', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Place the whole carrots into a baking dish, and drizzle with olive oil. Mix until the carrots are completely covered with olive oil. Pour on the honey, then season to taste with salt and pepper; mix until evenly coated.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until just tender, or cooked to your desired degree of doneness, 40 minutes to 1 hour.']

title: Crock-Pot Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '3 carrots', '1 onion']
directions: ['Place peeled, cut up carrots and onions in bottom of crock-pot.', 'Place chicken on top.', 'Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Turn on low, let cook all day.', 'Wonderful.']

title: Smoked Garlic Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['free-range chicken', '1 garlic bulb Smoked']
directions: ['Cut the smoked garlic bulb in half and place both halves inside the cavity of the chicken before placing in the oven. Add whatever other ingredients you would when roasting a chicken normally and you're set!']

title: Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1 stalk celery, cut in chunks']
directions: ['Select a plump chicken.', 'Dress.', 'Cut in pieces.', 'Place in saucepan.', 'Cover with boiling water.', 'Add celery, salt and pepper. Cover.', 'Simmer slowly until chicken is tender.', 'Prepare dumpling dough.']

title: Roasted Carrots
ingredients: ['3 Medium Carrots', '2 tablespoons Olive Oil', '2 tablespoons Garlic', 'Crushed Sea Salt to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.', 'On parchment paper lined baking sheets place carrots, drizzle olive oil, garlic and sea salt over carrots. Mix together with hands.', 'Roast carrots for 30 minutes.']

title: Steward Rabbit
ingredients: ['1 rabbit', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 small onion']
directions: ['Clean rabbit and boil rabbit in water with salt, pepper and onion until meat comes off bone.']

title: Vanilla-Almond Glaze For Doughnuts
ingredients: ['1/4 cup whole milk', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups confectioners' sugar']
directions: ['Combine milk and vanilla in a medium saucepan and heat over low heat until warm.', 'Sift confectioners' sugar into milk mixture.', 'Whisk slowly, until well combined.', 'Remove the glaze from the heat and set over a bowl of warm water.', 'Dip doughnuts into the glaze, 1 at a time, and set on a draining rack placed in a half sheet pan for 5 minutes before serving.']

title: Potato Soup
ingredients: ['1 c. celery, cubed', '1 medium potato, cubed', '1/4 c. carrot, cubed', '12 oz. milk', 'salt', 'pepper', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Cover celery with water.', 'Boil 12 minutes, add potato and carrot and boil 15 more minutes.', 'Add milk and butter, salt and pepper to taste.', 'Serve with crackers.', 'Do not drain water, vitamins and minerals are in the water.', 'A favorite during the Great Depression 1929-36.', 'I make it often.']

title: Best Rub For Grilled Steak
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons coffee', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons pepper']
directions: ['Grind the coffee really fine if you have a grinder.', 'Mix ingredients together and rub generously on the steaks.', 'Grill the steaks the way you like them.', 'This mix makes enough for about four Rib-Eyes.']

title: Carolyn's Chicken a la Crock Pot
ingredients: ['1 each chicken', '1 each lemon', '1/4 cup honey', '1/2 cup orange juice']
directions: ['Rinse chicken inside and out well.', 'Roll the lemon on a flat top to soften, and pierce well with a 2 tined fork.', 'Place the lemon in the cavity of the chicken and place the chicken in the crockpot.', 'Mix the honey and the orange juice together and pour over the chicken.', 'Cook on low until done.', 'When you take the chicken out of the pot, remove the lemon very carefully, it will be hot, and squeeze the juice over the chicken.']

title: Delicious Broiled Trout
ingredients: ['1 trout', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Cover the broiler pan with aluminum foil.', 'Remove the head of the fish.', 'Cut down the backbone to open the fish.', 'Wash and dry the opened trout thoroughly.', 'Turn the oven to broil and place the trout, skin side down, on the broiler pan.', 'Season with salt and pepper and broil 5 minutes, 3 inches from the heat.', 'Baste with melted butter seasoned with salt and pepper.', 'Broil 10 minutes longer or until trout is dry and flaky.', 'Serve with tartar sauce or horseradish mixture and ketchup.']

title: Simply Perfect Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['1 4-5 pound organic roaster chicken', '1 head of garlic', '1 lemon', 'olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425 degrees convection.', 'Rinse out your bird, removing any parts from the cavity. Pat as dry as possible.', 'Cut your lemon into quarters, and your head of garlic in half, exposing the cloves (hamburger style). Stuff the lemon and garlic pieces into the cavity. I do not truss the bird.', 'Place the bird breast side down into a roasting pan or gratin dish. It is important to choose a pan that is not much larger than the bird. The key to this recipe is for the juices to pool up around the white meat allowing it to braise.', 'Drizzle the chicken with a bit of oilve oil and rub it generously with salt and fresh ground pepper to your liking.', 'Place the chicken in the oven. The chicken will roast for an hour and a half, basting occasionally.The skin should be dark golden and crispy. If you are multiplying this recipe, add approximately 10 minutes of cook time for each additional bird.', 'Let the chicken rest about 10 minutes before carving. The white meat will come away from its skin--ladle it immediately with pan juices so it stays tender and moist.', 'Serve the carved bird with the pan drippings.']

title: Milky Tea
ingredients: ['1 cup milk', '2 tablespoons honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a ceramic or glass mug, combine the milk, honey and vanilla. Microwave on HIGH for about 1 1/2 minutes. Stir.']

title: Mango Tango Smoothies
ingredients: ['1 cup chopped peeled mango', '1 medium ripe banana, frozen, peeled and sliced', '1 cup fat-free milk', '1/2 cup reduced-fat plain yogurt', '1/2 cup unsweetened pineapple juice']
directions: ['In a blender, combine all ingredients; cover and process until smooth. Pour into chilled glasses; serve immediately.']

title: The Elvis Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon creamy peanut butter', '1 slice crusty white bread', '1/2 medium banana, sliced', '1 bacon strip, cooked and crumbled']
directions: ['Spread peanut butter over bread. Top with banana and bacon.'],['bread'

title: Crunchy Baked Broccoli
ingredients: ['2 cups chopped broccoli', '2 -3 minced garlic cloves', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Put ingredients in ziploc bag and shake. Spreak out evenly on non stick baking sheet. Bake 30 minutes at 375 degrees.'],['garlic'

title: Chicken And Peas
ingredients: ['chicken', 'peas']
directions: ['Take a cold chicken, open it up.', 'Put peas in, put it in the oven.', 'Cook at 90° for 10 minutes.', 'Chicken is done when buzzer goes 'eeehhhtt!'']

title: Herb And Garlic Bacon Wrapped Shrimp'
ingredients: ['1 lb large shrimp', '1/2 lb bacon, thin slice', '270 g Philadelphia Savory Garlic Cooking Creme']
directions: ['Peel and devein shrimp. In the back cut the shrimp a little deeper to make room for the cooking cream.', 'Fill the groove in the back with the cooking cream.', 'Wrap the shrimp with half a slice of bacon and secure it with a tooth pick. If your using smaller shrimp partially cook the bacon before wrapping the shrimp.', 'Cook on the grill a short time on low heat untill the shrimp are done. This should only take about 5 minutes on each side depending on your grill.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Scrambled Bacon
ingredients: ['bacon', '1 egg']
directions: ['Have mommy or daddy cook bacon and scramble eggs.', 'Then mix together and enjoy.']

title: Egg With Canadian Bacon
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1/2 ounce Canadian bacon']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400.', 'In a muffin pan place a piece of candian bacon. Crack egg and pour into the canidian bacon. Bake until done.']

title: Eggs Nestled In Bacon
ingredients: ['1 strip Bacon', '1 whole Egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Lightly spray your muffin pan with cooking spray. Cut your slice of bacon in half. Take the first half and lay the bacon across the middle. Take the second half and wrap it around the inside of the muffin tin. Cook for 6 minutes, until slightly crispy.', 'Crack your egg into the center of your bacon. If the bacon has slid, just gently tap it back into place. Cook your egg for about 12 minutes, with the egg yolk just past runny. Gently use the edge of a knife and go around the edge of the muffin pan. The egg and bacon will neatly pop out. Season your egg as you normally would and enjoy!']

title: Broccoli Salad
ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli', '1 onion', '4 slices bacon', 'Hellman's mayonnaise']
directions: ['Break broccoli into tiny flowerets, peel stems and dice. Slice 1 onion very thin. Dice up 4 pieces of bacon and fry, drain well.', 'Use enough mayonnaise to moisten mixture.', 'Salt lightly if desired.']

title: Apple-Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['1 cup minced cooked chicken', '1 Granny Smith apple, minced', '1/4 cup minced celery', '1 tablespoon minced onion', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon pepper', '1/3 cup mayonnaise']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a bowl; chill until ready to serve.'],['apple'

title: Unjury Chocolate Peanut Butter Balls
ingredients: ['3/4 cup reduced fat jif peanut butter', '3 scoops chocolate unjury protein powder']
directions: ['Add peanut butter to a mixing bowl.', 'Add protein powder, 1 scoop at a time, stirring well after each scoop until dough is formed.', 'Roll dough into balls.', 'Freeze overnight.', 'Optional Additions: Dried fruit (raisins, cranberries, or cherries), spices (cinnamon or nutmeg), oatmeal, chopped nuts (pecans, walnuts, almonds).']

title: Reheating Pasta
ingredients: ['8 ounces dry pasta', '3 tablespoons olive oil']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until still slightly less than al dente; drain. Rinse with cold water. Toss with olive oil. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use. To reheat, bring a large pot of water to a boil, add pasta and cook until hot, 1 to 2 minutes.']

title: Tita'S Cucumbers With Olive Oil
ingredients: ['1 cucumber', 'olive oil', 'salt']
directions: ['Peel and slice cucumber into 1/4-inch slices/rounds. (Tita used to cut the seeded centers out of the cucumber slices for me. This is not necessary, but I think it's better. You can also buy a seedless cucumber.).', 'Arrange cucumber slices on a large plate.', 'Lightly pour or sprinkle olive oil over rounds.', 'Sprinkle with salt.']

title: Chicken In A Bag
ingredients: ['whole chicken', '1 orange', '1 lemon']
directions: ['Wash and pat dry whole chicken.', 'Season to desired taste. Stuff with 1 orange and 1 lemon.', 'Put in paper bag.', '(Bag should have no lettering.)', 'Cook for 1 hour at 450°.', 'Reduce to 350° for 1 hour.', 'Do not open oven.']

title: Toad-In-The-Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '2 tsp. butter', '1 egg', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat skillet.', 'Butter 1 slice of favorite bread on both sides. Use the rim of a small juice glass to cut a hole in the middle of bread.', 'Put bread and 'hole' in the skillet.', 'Break 1 egg and put it in the hole.', 'Add salt and pepper.', 'Turn bread when egg turns white, turn 'hole' too.', 'Serve with 'hole' as lid to cover 'toad.' Serve with orange or grape juice . Yields 1 serving.']

title: Oven Baked Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['2 lbs of chicken wings', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['1) section chicken wings', '2) set oven for convection broil (425F)', '3) place chicken wings in oven safe platter', '4) sprinkle salt and pepper over wings', '5) place chicken on top rack for 12 minutes', '6) take chicken out and flip each section', '7) sprinkle salt and pepper over wings', '8) place chicken on top rack for 11 minutes', '9) remove chicken and serve']

title: Chicken Under A No. 10 Can
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. whole chicken', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['You will also need heavy-duty foil, a No. 10 can and a skewer.']

title: Tuna-On-Bun
ingredients: ['1 can tuna', '1 onion, chopped', '1/2 c. cheese', '1/4 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Put on bun and place in toaster oven until heated through and cheese melts.']

title: Poor Man'S Dinner
ingredients: ['1 lb. cheese', '1 loaf bread']
directions: ['Place cheese between slices of bread and add mayonnaise.'],['bread'

title: Ice Cream Topping
ingredients: ['1 large can Sego milk', '2 c. sugar', '2 sq. chocolate']
directions: ['Combine ingredients and bring to a boil over medium heat. Cook 5 minutes, stirring vigorously.', 'Remove from heat and add 1 teaspoon vanilla.', 'Beat with rotary beater for 1 minute.', 'Store in refrigerator.']

title: Barbecued Beef 'N Pork
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. each: pork and beef roasts', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Place both roasts in roaster; cook in a 325° oven for 3 to 4 hours, or until meat falls apart.', 'Make gravy out of drippings. Add your favorite barbecue sauce.', 'Add the beef and pork to it. Serve on buns.']

title: Duck Ala Orange
ingredients: ['1 duck', '3 c. orange juice', 'cooked rice']
directions: ['Wash duck.', 'Poke holes in skin all over duck.', 'Bake in oven without lid at 450° for 25 minutes.', 'Drain off fat.', 'Add 3 cups orange juice.', 'Cover with lid.', 'Put back in oven at 350° for 2 1/4 hours.', 'Pour the juice from the duck over a bed of cooked rice.']

title: Healthy Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['2/3 cup oatmeal', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons peanut butter', '1/4 cup sugar', '1 splash milk']
directions: ['Gather ingredients.', 'Preheat oven to 325 degrees.', 'Combine the peanut butter and sugar. Mix.', 'Combine with the eggs until well blended.', 'Add oatmeal. Mix well.', 'Add a splash of milk.', 'Spoon into small cookies on a cookies sheet lined with paper.', 'Bake in the oven for 15-25 minutes or until the outside is slightly brown.', 'Let cool and Enjoy!']

title: Dave'S Good Ole' Egg Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 egg', '2 pieces bread', 'Kraft real mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Spray #5 skillet with Pam on medium heat.', 'Crack egg on edge of pan and slowly drop egg into pan.', 'Bust yolk with edge of spatula, be sure not to scramble the egg.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'When egg has firmed up, flip once.', 'When egg is done, put egg on a napkin to soak up any oil.', 'Spread mayonnaise on the 2 pieces of bread.', 'Put egg between the bread and enjoy.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Grandma'S Cauliflower
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '2 3 slices bacon', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise']
directions: ['Cut up cauliflower and cook until it is tender but still has a bite. Then drain very well and set aside.', 'Fry bacon until crisp but not burnt, crumble and put into heated pan.', 'Add sugar and mayonnaise and stir until the mixture turns smooth and nearly translucent.', 'Add cauliflower to pan and gently mix until cauliflower is coated in mixture.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Pork & Rice Skillet Dinner Recipe
ingredients: ['2 pork steaks', '3/4 c. diced onion', '3/4 c. rice', '1 lg. can tomatoes']
directions: ['In 10-12 inch skillet, brown pork steaks in small amount of oil.', 'Set aside.', 'Brown rice and onion.', 'Add in tomatoes.', 'Chop into small pcs if necessary.', 'Bring to boil.', 'Add in pork steaks.', 'Cover, reduce heat, simmer for 1 hour.']

title: Pasta And Peas
ingredients: ['1 box ditali pasta', '1 bag peas', '1 onion', 'olive oil to cover bottom of pot']
directions: ['Chop onion.', 'Put olive oil in pot just to cover the bottom. Heat the oil, then put in onion and saute until golden brown.', 'Put in peas and cook until soft, ten to twenty minutes.', 'Then put a pot of water up for pasta and cook to desired time.', 'After pasta is ready; drain it, then take the peas and pour it onto the pasta and serve.']

title: Vanilla Frosting
ingredients: ['12 cups confectioners' sugar', '3/4 cup butter, softened', '3/4 cup whole milk', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine sugar, butter, milk and vanilla. Beat on medium speed until smooth and fluffy. Spread over cake or cupcakes. Store in refrigerator.']

title: Mama'S Caramel Icing
ingredients: ['2 1/2 c. sugar', '8 Tbsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 egg, well beaten', '3/4 c. milk']
directions: ['Cook 1/2 cup sugar in black skillet until melted and golden. Mix egg, butter and remainder of sugar with milk in a heavy boiler and cook over medium heat until butter melts.', 'Add caramelized sugar.', 'Cook until soft ball can be formed in cold water.', 'I use a candy thermometer and cook it to 232°.', 'Add vanilla; beat.']

title: Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['1 large can evaporated milk', '2 c. sugar', '3 sq. chocolate', '1 Tbsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Bring milk, sugar and chocolate squares to full boil over medium heat.', 'Boil 5 minutes, stirring hard.', 'Remove from heat. Add vanilla and beat well 1 minute.']

title: Haystack Bunches
