directions: ['Melt chocolate as directed on package.', 'Add to cereal; toss to evenly coat.', 'Use tablespoon to drop cereal mixture into eight mounds on waxed paper-covered plate.', 'Refrigerate 10 min.', 'or until set.', 'Store in tightly covered container at room temperature.']

title: Vanilla Ice
ingredients: ['4 cups 2% reduced-fat milk', '1/2 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a bowl, stirring with a whisk until sugar dissolves. Pour into an 8-inch square glass or ceramic baking dish. Cover and freeze until partially frozen (about 1 hour). Scrape with a fork, crushing any lumps. Freeze, scraping with a fork every hour, 2 hours or until completely frozen.']

title: Charleston Tomato Pilau
ingredients: ['2 slices bacon, chopped', '1 lg. onion, finely chopped', '4 cups canned tomatoes', '1/4 tsp. sugar', '1-1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. black pepper', '2-1/2 cup raw rice']
directions: ['Cook bacon in frying pan until brown; add diced onion, cover pan and saute lightly.', 'Add tomatoes, sugar, salt and pepper.', 'Cook over low heat for 1/2 hour, stirring frequently.', 'Add rice and cook 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Transfer mixture to rice steamer; cook 45 minutes.', 'Ten minutes before serving, stir with fork.', 'Uncover steamer to dry rice.']

title: Peanut Butter Balls(Candy)
ingredients: ['1 1/2 Tbsp. butter', '3/4 c. xxx sugar', '1/2 c. peanut butter', 'melted chocolate']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together.', 'Roll into small balls.', 'Dip into melted milk chocolate.', 'Set until firm.']

title: Steamed Broccoli With Garlic
ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper']
directions: ['Using a paring knife, cut off and discard tough bottoms of broccoli stalks.', 'Cut broccoli into florets.', 'Place broccoli in a steamer for 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Do not overcook.', 'Heat oil in a skillet, add garlic, broccoli and salt and pepper to taste.', 'Saute briefly, being careful not to burn garlic.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Broccoli
ingredients: ['Broccoli', 'Garlic', 'Olive Oil', 'Salt & Pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375°', 'Chop a head of broccoli (do not rinse!)', 'Mince 2-3 cloves of garlic', 'Put broccoli, garlic, 2 tbsp. olive oil, and a few shakes of salt and pepper in a ziploc bag.', 'Shake it up (my daughter loves to do this part)', 'Spread out on baking sheet, place on top rack, and bake for about 30 minutes.']

title: Charleston Shrimp Pilau
ingredients: ['1 c. diced bacon', '2 1/2 c. cooked tomato', '1 lb. shrimp, cooked', '2 Tbsp. chopped onion', '1 c. raw rice']
directions: ['Fry bacon crisp; cook onion in bacon fat and add tomatoes and rice.', 'Mix well.', 'Cover; heat to boiling, then simmer 20 minutes, stirring.', 'Cook 15 to 20 minutes for rice to get fluffy; add shrimp and bacon and put in dish.', 'Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.']

title: Salted-In-The-Shell Shrimp
ingredients: ['1 lb. large shrimp in the shell', '1 Tbsp. olive oil', '1/4 tsp. pepper', 'coarse salt', '4 Tbsp. butter', '1 lemon']
directions: ['Heat the oven to 350°.', 'Toss the shrimp with the oil and sprinkle with the pepper.', 'Spread 1/4-inch of salt in a large baking dish.', 'Put the shrimp on the salt and turn them once or twice so that they are lightly coated.', 'Bake the shrimp until they are cooked through, about 15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, melt the butter. Squeeze 1 tablespoon juice from the lemon and stir into butter as dipping sauce.', 'Makes 4 servings.']

title: Vanilla fudge
ingredients: ['100 grams unsalted butter', '300 ml Milk', '350 grams Castor sugar', '1 tsp vanilla extract']
directions: ['Line 18cm baking tray or grease with oil.', 'Melt butter, sugar and milk in saucepan ( stirring all the time ) and bring to boil once melted ( keep stirring )', 'Continue to stir until it turns light brown, after 10-15 min or just when it starts to brown ( reaches softball stage ) then set aside to cool for 5 min', 'When cooled, stir in vanilla extract until lovely golden brown', 'Pour into baking tray then cool at room temperature ( dont put into fridge ) .', 'Cut into squares when set.']

title: Turkey Ole
ingredients: ['leftover turkey', 'Minute rice, flavored with medium-hot picante to taste']
directions: ['Arrange sliced turkey over flavored rice.', 'Add turkey gravy, if desired.', 'Garnish with ripe olives.']

title: Tomato Gravy And Rice
ingredients: ['28 ounces diced tomatoes', '8 10 slices bacon, cooked and drained', 'rice, cooked']
directions: ['In cast iron skillet, cook 8-10 slices of bacon until cripsy.', 'Drain bacon and pour off all but 4-5 tablespoons of bacon drippings.', 'Crumble bacon and set aside.', 'In the same skillet with bacon drippings, add diced tomatoes.', 'Then add crumbled bacon pieces.', 'Stir all together and add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Simmer for 15 minutes and then pour over cooked rice.']

title: Easy Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream', '4 Tablespoons Sugar', '2-1/2 teaspoons Vanilla']
directions: ['1. Pour all ingredients in a bowl.', '2. Blend using a stand or electric mixer until peaks form.', '3. Use as a garnish for your favorite foods!']

title: Homemade Hand-Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream', '3 Tablespoons Sugar', '1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract']
directions: ['Pour the heavy whipping cream, sugar, and vanilla extract into a large bowl, and whisk using a large balloon whisk. Whisk for approximately 3-5 minutes, until the cream reaches the soft peak stage. First you will notice the cream form large bubbles on top, then the bubbles will disappear and the cream will start to form ridges. You can test for soft peaks by lifting the whisk straight out of the bowl, inverting it, and seeing that a peak falls ever so slightly to the side. Enjoy!', 'Whipped cream can be stored in the refrigerator for a couple hours.']

title: Chocolate Banana Pops
ingredients: ['4 banana, halved', '3 1/2 ounces dark chocolate']
directions: ['Stick bananas with a lollipop stick; place on a baking sheet and place in the freezer for 1 hour.', 'Place chocolate in top of a double boiler over simmering water. Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes.', 'Coat frozen bananas with melted chocolate.']

title: Oven-Dried Tomatoes and Olive Salad
ingredients: ['3 to 5 lb. Roma tomatoes', 'Olive oil for drizzling']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 275F.', 'Remove stems and slice tomatoes in half lengthwise.', 'Gently squeeze out seeds with fingers.', 'Place cut side up on baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil and season to taste.', 'Bake for 3 to 4 hours, or until slightly shriveled and softened.', 'Remove from oven, place in large jar, cover with olive oil, seal jar and refrigerate for up to 3 weeks time.']

title: Nora Ephron'S Bacon Hash
ingredients: ['bacon, 2 strips', '1 medium potato, cooked', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Cut bacon into small pieces, then cook over low flame in skillet.', 'Meanwhile, dice up the cooked potato and, after some fat is rendered from the bacon, add to the skillet. Cook until the potatos are crusty brown. season with salt and pepper.', 'Eat with an egg, if you like.']

title: Mother Ripp'S Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['1/2 c. margarine', '2 1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '3 sq. chocolate', '1 large can evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt margarine in top of double boiler.', 'Drop in chocolate and melt.', 'Gradually add sugar, 4 tablespoons at a time.', 'Add salt. Gradually add milk.', 'The water in the double boiler must be kept boiling.', 'Lastly, add vanilla.', 'Cook until desired thickness, about 1 hour.', 'Stir often.', 'Store in refrigerator.', 'Can be reheated.']

title: Substitute Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['1 quart skim milk', '1/2 cup confectioners' sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place milk in freezer for 1 hour. Remove and pour into a tall cylindrical container. Using an immersion blender, start at the bottom and slowly draw the blender up at a tilt. Gradually add confectioners' sugar while continuing to move blender up and down to build volume. When milk begins to form soft peaks, mix in vanilla extract. Serve immediately.']

title: Fluffy French Toast Made With Frozen Bread
ingredients: ['1 slice Frozen bread', '1 Egg', '200 ml Milk', '1 Sugar']
directions: ['Mix together the egg, milk, and sugar in a deep bowl or tupperware container.', 'If you mix up the egg whites to break them up thoroughly, and it'll turn out better.', 'Cut the frozen bread into 4 pieces.', 'Use a skewer to poke holes into it.', 'It's hard for the egg mixture to get absorbed near the crusts, so be sure to poke holes there!', 'Soak the bread in the egg mixture.', 'After about two minutes, flip the bread over.', 'The bread is soft, so if you're worried about breaking it, use a spatula to flip.', 'Once both sides have completely soaked, fry it up and enjoy!', 'This is a version made without cutting up the bread.', 'It might look a bit unappealing with all those holes, but you won't be able to tell at all after it's been fried!', 'If it's too soft, it can break, but you can use a spatula to safely flip it over.', 'You can make more french toast with the remaining egg mixture if you like, but I like to pour it over the bread to fill in the holes!', '!']

title: Snowballs
ingredients: ['ice cream', 'coconut']
directions: ['Shape ice cream balls.', 'Roll in flaked coconut.', 'Freeze until very firm.', 'Remove from freezer one at a time and decorate with icings and gels to resemble Christmas tree ornaments or decorate with flowers. Use simple designs and work quickly.', 'Return each snowball to freezer when finished.']

title: Tuna Fish And Spicy Pickled Vegetable Pate
ingredients: ['6 ounces of drained canned tuna', '2 tablespoons Kraft mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons of drained hot pickled vegetables']
directions: ['Blend tuna, mayo and veggies in a food processor until smooth.', 'Serve with crackers or a baguette as an appetizer with a whole piece of one of the veggies on top or on a slice of whole grain bread for an open face sandwich.', 'Enjoy!']

title: New Orleans Orange Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. ketchup', '1 c. frozen concentrated orange juice']
directions: ['Cut up chicken as desired.', 'Combine mayonnaise, ketchup and orange juice.', 'Pour over chicken in a shallow baking dish.', 'Bake at 350° for 1 hour (uncovered).', 'Extra sauce may be used over rice.']

title: Ceviche Salad
ingredients: ['1 cup cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined', '1 cucumber, peeled and diced', '1 tomatoes, diced', '12 avocado, diced', '14 cup prepared mango salsa', '12 lime, juice of, a', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Combine ingredients, tossing lightly.', 'Chill.', 'Serve with tortilla chips.']

title: Quick Vanilla Glaze
ingredients: ['1 cup confectioners' sugar', '2 tablespoons milk', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a small bowl, combine the sugar, milk and vanilla. Stir until smooth. Let stand for 5 minutes to thicken if desired. Spoon over bread.']

title: 1-2-3 Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['1 large can evaporated milk', '2 C. sugar', '3 squares sweet chocolate', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in a saucepan on low heat, stirring constantly with a wire whist.', 'Bring to a boil and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add vanilla and beat until smooth. Great for ice cream!']

title: Sugar Glaze
ingredients: ['1 1/4 cups sugar', '3 tablespoons milk', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine sugar with milk and vanilla.', 'Pour over pound cake with fruit (Raspberries and blueberries great for the 4th of July).']

title: Instant Pot Yogurt
ingredients: ['7 cups milk', '1 tablespoon yogurt']
directions: ['Pour in all the milk.', 'Place lid on Instant Pot and close the Pressure Valve.', 'Push the Yogurt button and then the Adjust button, until it says 'boil.'.', 'When Beep is heard, open lid and remove cooking pot. Allow it to cool to 100 - 115 degrees, stirring occasionally.', 'When temperature is reached, remove a cup of the milk and add yogurt to the cup and whisk in well. Add that cup back into the cooking pot and whisk in thoroughly.', 'Place cooking pot into the Instant Pot and replace lid.', 'Press the Yogurt button and the display screen will say 8:00 (hit again or Adjust, if necessary). Adjust time to 6 hours.', 'When the beep is heard, remove the cooking pot and strain the yogurt. Place in the fridge to chill.']

title: Simple Stir-Fried Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 lb asparagus', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'garlic powder', 'salt']
directions: ['Clean asparagus and snap off tough ends, leave whole.', 'Heat skillet and olive oil (use skillet with lid).', 'Add asparagus and cook on medium-low heat (so that asparagus doesn't burn) Turning asparagus occasionally.', 'Add garlic and salt to taste, Cook asparagus to tender crisp.', 'serve.']

title: Michigan Baked Brook Trout
ingredients: ['trout', '2 c. milk', '1/4 tsp. salt', 'dash of pepper', '1 c. cornflakes']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 500°.', 'Combine milk, salt and pepper.', 'Wash and dry fish; cut into serving pieces.', 'Dip in milk mixture and coat with crushed corn flakes.', 'Arrange in single layer in a lightly oiled shallow baking pan.', 'Bake 10 minutes without turning or basting.']

title: Vanilla Drizzle
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '5 to 5-1/2 teaspoons milk']
directions: ['In a small bowl, combine the sugar, vanilla and enough milk to achieve desired consistency. Stir until smooth. Drizzle over bread.']

title: Gold Sauce
ingredients: ['1 Tbsp. butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. milk', '1 egg', 'vanilla']
directions: ['Cream butter and sugar over low heat.', 'Add milk and cook very carefully for short time.', 'Remove from heat and add mixture slowly to 1 beaten egg.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Excellent on a piece of leftover cake.']

title: Family Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['2 qt. milk', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. rice', 'pinch of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in baking dish; stir lightly.', 'Bake in 325° oven for 1 hour or until rice is tender, stirring twice.']

title: Chocolate Frosting
ingredients: ['2 sq. chocolate', '3/4 c. sugar', '1/8 lb. butter', '1/4 c. milk']
directions: ['Melt ingredients all together in a pan.', 'Bring to a boil and let boil for 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Place pan into a large bowl of ice cold water.', 'Ice cubes may be needed to keep water good and cold. Beat until thick enough to spread.', 'Do not use flavorings.', 'This will cover a large tube cake.', 'Double ingredients and cook 1 minute longer for larger cake.']

title: Lemon Chicken
ingredients: ['2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1 lemon']
directions: ['Put chicken in a shallow pan.', 'Sprinkle salt and pepper on top.', 'Inset lemon in cavity.', 'Bake, breast up, at 350° for 1 hour, breast down at 350° for 1/2 hour and breast up at 400° for 1/2 hour.']

title: Creamy Pineapple And Banana Smoothie
ingredients: ['1 cup frozen pineapple chunks, thawed', '1 cup milk', '1/2 banana', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine pineapple chunks, milk, banana, honey, and vanilla extract in a blender; blend until smooth.']

title: '" Zucchini Mix' in Tomato Sauce"
ingredients: ['3 lbs ripe tomatoes, chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '14 cup minced onion', '1 cup chopped celery', '5 -6 cups diced zucchini', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 12 teaspoons salt']
directions: ['Chop or partially puree tomatoes to your liking.', 'Heat oil in large pan.', 'Add onion and celery, saute for about 10 minutes or until onion and celery are soft.', 'Add zucchini and cook until soft.', 'Add tomatoes, sugar and salt.', 'Bring to boil, and turn down to a simmer.', 'Simmer for 30 minutes.', 'Cool and pack into freezer containers.', 'Freeze up to 3 months.']

title: Grilled Portobello
ingredients: ['3 Portobellos Mushroom tops with stems removed', '1 tablespoons olive oil', '1 cloves garlic']
directions: ['Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Mix remaining 5 tablespoons oil and remaining garlic in small bowl. Brush garlic oil evenly over both sides of mushrooms. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill mushrooms until tender, turning occasionally, about 10 minutes. Place mushrooms, gill side up, on platter.']

title: Roast Chicken Breast
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast with bone and skin, at room temp', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['place breasts on a wire rack in a pan so air circulates around evenly. Salt both sides, bake at 375 for 30-35' until internal temp is 164-degrees, let sit 10' under foil, then can remove skin and bone if want to.']

title: Juicy Grilled Chicken Breasts
ingredients: ['4 bone-in and skin-on chicken breast halves', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Rinse and thoroughly dry the chicken breasts. Sprinkle all over with salt, putting some under the skin. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours and up to overnight. Let chicken come to room temperature 30 minutes before grilling.', 'Prepare a charcoal or gas grill for indirect heat: If using a gas grill, turn all burners to high and close the lid. When the temperature inside the grill reaches 400°, lift lid and turn off one of the burners. The area over the turned-off burner is the indirect heat area. If using a charcoal grill, light 50 to 60 briquettes and let burn until covered with ash, about 20 to 30 minutes. Mound them to one side. The area over the section cleared of coals is the indirect heat area.', 'Brush the grill with vegetable oil. Place chicken skin side down on indirect-heat area; close lid on gas grill. Cook 15 minutes. Turn chicken over, close lid on gas grill, and cook another 10 minutes. Move chicken over direct heat and cook, turning once, until skin is well browned and crisp, 3 to 5 minutes. Watch carefully; dripping fat or any added oils or butters catch fire easily (a small spray bottle filled with water is handy for taming flames).', 'Test one piece for doneness by cutting into the center. It should be slightly pink (it will finish cooking while it rests). If very pink, move all chicken back to indirect heat, cover grill, and cook for another 5 minutes. Let rest at least 10 minutes before serving.', 'Once you've got the basic method down, try adding different flavors to your grilled chicken:', 'Spice-rubbed. In step 1, sprinkle your favorite spice rub all over the chicken while you're letting it come to room temperature. We like the Indian flavors of 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 teaspoon ground coriander, 1/2 teaspoon turmeric, 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, and 1/2 teaspoon cayenne.', 'Marinated. In step 1, coat chicken in a zesty marinade while you're letting it come to room temperature. Most vinaigrettes make great marinades for chicken. We like to mix 3 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1 teaspoon minced fresh rosemary or thyme, 1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.', 'Buttered. In step 1, while chicken is coming to room temperature, rub softened butter onto and under skin. We like to use a compound butter (softened butter mixed with seasonings, herbs, or spices). For one with a bit of kick, we blend 1/4 cup butter with 1/2 minced chipotle chile (either canned, or dried and soaked in hot water until soft), 1 teaspoon fresh lime juice, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.', 'Herbed. In step 1, while chicken is coming to room temperature, rub herb paste onto and under skin. Pesto (homemade or store-bought) is a good choice.', 'Note: Nutritional analysis is per serving.']

title: Chicken-Skin Croutons
ingredients: ['Chicken skin reserved from backbone, legs and thighs of a 3-to-4-pound chicken', 'Salt']
directions: ['Heat the oven to 400 degrees.', 'Lay the skin flat on a baking sheet, making sure not to let the pieces overlap; sprinkle with salt.', 'Roast for 15 to 20 minutes or until the skin releases easily from the pan.', 'Flip the pieces and continue to cook for another 10 to 15 minutes or until its very crisp.', 'Remove the pan from the oven; put the skin on paper towels and reserve the fat.', 'Crumble into a salad or serve as a premeal snack, with more salt if necessary.']

title: Chicken Stuff
ingredients: ['Chicken', 'Salt']
directions: ['Put it on the BBQ'],['chicken'

title: Oven Baked Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds chicken wings', 'sea salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425F', 'Wash wings in cold water and pat dry', 'Season wings on both sides with all spices', 'Place wings on baking sheet covered in parchment paper in single layer', 'Bake in oven for 40 minutes or until chicken is baked through', 'Create a dipping sauce that you enjoy or just eat as baked', 'Enjoy !!!']

title: Easiest Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['2 -3 lbs chicken', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 degrees.', 'Dry the chicken thoroughly, then salt and pepper all over.', 'Bake for 50-60 minutes; remove and let stand 15 minutes before carving.']

title: Todd House Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken, cut up', 'Sauer's seasoned salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Place as many pieces of chicken as will fit into a baking dish.', 'Generously sprinkle chicken with seasoned salt.', 'Add a little water in bottom of dish; cover tightly with foil.', 'Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, or until tender.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: How To Spatchcock A Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Place chicken on a flat surface breast side down, legs facing away from you.', 'With kitchen shears or a very sharp knife, cut out the neck bone all the way to the butt by cutting down one side of the neck bone and then repeat on the other side.', 'Turn chicken over and press flat, season and grill or bake as desired.']

title: Prep-Work for Making Cheap Chicken Delicious
ingredients: ['1 Chicken breast', '1 tbsp Salt']
directions: ['Sprinkle the chicken all over evenly with 1 tablespoon salt, and knead well.', 'Place into a sieve or onto a net, and let sit for 10 minutes to get rid of any excess water or foul odors.', 'Cheap chicken may have a bit of feathers and hide remaining, so make sure to remove it all.', 'Rinse off the salt in water once 10 minutes have passed.', 'Immediately wipe with a paper towel.', 'The osmotic pressure of the salt will pull out the water, so just doing this will make the color of the meat much darker, and the meat will tighten up!', 'If you sever the thick tendons, then you won't have to worry about them, and the meat wont shrink when cooked.', 'I don't like the tendons either, and it is easy to remove them here.', 'Use a knife to strip them off if they are a little difficult to remove.', 'I don't like the fat that is under the skin, so I always get rid of it if there is any.', 'You will be able to take off quite a bit of fat from under the skin.', 'You are now done with the preparations!', 'Feel free to use it in various recipes!']

title: Actifried Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['1 kg chicken wings', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Put the chicken wings in the ActiFry. Close the lid.', 'Leave to cook for 12 minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'If you wish to add a sauce (barbecue) or spices (paprika, Cajun, etc), add 1 or 2 ActiFry spoons 5 minutes before the end of cooking time.']

title: Classic Blasted Chicken
ingredients: ['3 1/2 pound chicken, rinsed and patted dry', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 450 degrees.', 'Season the chicken all over with salt and pepper and place in a roasting pan.', 'Roast for 45 minutes, or until the juices run clear when the thigh is pricked with a skewer.', 'Transfer the chicken to a cutting board and let stand for 15 minutes.']

title: Roasted Garlic Mayo
ingredients: ['1 head garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt & pepper', '2 cups mayonnaise']
directions: ['Cut top off 1/4 portion of garlic head.', 'Place garlic head on 6in x 6in square of foil.', 'Drizzle olive oil over and add S & P.', 'Crimp together sides of foil.', 'Make sure all edges are sealed.', 'Bake in 350 degree oven for 25-30 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and let cool.', 'Squeeze cloves of garlic into a seperate bowl and slightly mash to break down cloves.', 'Add mayo and mix.', 'Place in fridge for 30 minutes to set prior to serving.']

title: Chicken Volcano
ingredients: ['small roasting chicken', '1 Tbsp. margarine', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Rub', 'a small roasting chicken with a generous amount of margarine.\tSeason\tit', 'liberally with salt and pepper.', 'Place the chicken', 'in', 'a', 'pouch', 'made', 'from\tseveral thicknesses of heavy-duty\taluminum', 'foil.', 'Insert', 'a clean hot volcanic rock into the', 'cavity of the bird.', 'Make sure the rock is as hot as it can', 'be.', 'Crimp the edges of the foil shut.', 'Wrap the pouch in', '20 thicknesses of newspaper for insulation.', 'Put the whole package in a heavy paper bag.\tLeave for 3 hours and serve.']

title: Roasted Salmon
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 1/2 lbs salmon fillets, with skin cut in 4 pieces', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 425. Season each piece of fish with a pinch of salt and black pepper.', 'Heat the oil in an ovenproof medium skillet. When a drop of water dances on the surface of the pan, add the pieces of fish skin side up.', 'Cook until they are seared and have a golden crust, 3 minutes.', 'Turn the fish over skin side down.', 'Slip the skillet into the oven and roast until the fish is pearlescent in the center, 8 minutes for a 1' thick filet.', 'Serve with Fresh Garden Salsa.']

title: Coffee Milkshake
ingredients: ['1 cup double strength brewed coffee, cooled', '1 pint softened ice cream', '2 tablespoons peanut butter']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.', 'You could vary the ice cream using chocolate, vanilla, coffee, butter pecan or whatever your favorite is.', 'You could also vary the add-in, instead of peanut butter use the same amount of chocolate syrup, caramel ice cream topping or even a couple of Oreo cookies (broken in half first-so they break up easier).']

title: 48 Little Miracles
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine peanut butter and sugar; mix well.', 'Stir in egg and vanilla.', 'Roll into 48 balls.', 'Place on ungreased pan.', 'Flatten with floured fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.', 'Allow to cool before removing from cookie sheet.', 'That's all there is to it. Enjoy.']

title: Scrumptious Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix ingredients, starting with creaming sugar and peanut butter, then mix rest in.', 'Shape into 1 inch balls on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Press with fork to flatten slightly.', 'Bake in 350 degree oven for 12 to 15 min.', 'Makes 3 dozen.', 'These are nice and chewy.']

title: Soft Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '1 cup creamy peanut butter', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients; mix well. Roll dough into one-inch balls and place on an ungreased baking sheet. Use a fork to press a crisscross pattern into the top of each cookie. Bake at 325 degrees for 10 minutes or until golden. Let cool before removing from sheet.'],['egg'

title: Peanut Butter Balls Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients and stir till well blended.', 'Form into 1 inch balls.', 'Bake on ungreased cookie sheets in a preheated oven at 300 degrees for 15 to 20 min or possibly till lightly browned.', 'Makes 2 1/2 dozen.']

title: Eeeeeasy Peasy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup sugar', '1 egg', '1 cup peanut butter', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['preheat oven to 350.', 'cream egg, sugar, vanilla.', 'mix in peanut butter.', 'bake for 8-10 minutes.']

title: Homemade Peanut Butter Cookies!
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Mix all ingredients in a mixing bowl by hand.', 'Drop dough by the spoonful on a greased cookie sheet.', 'Make a criss-cross pattern on the top of the dough with a fork.', 'Bake for 7-9 minutes.', 'Let cool on a wire rack or plate.']

title: Soft Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. granulated sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients thoroughly.', 'Place by teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet in 350 degree oven for 10 min.', 'Yields: 2 dozen.']

title: Unbelievable Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. creamy peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients well.', 'Form 1 inch balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Stamp with cookie stamp or possibly bottom of decorative glass.', 'Bake at 325 degrees 10 to 12 min.', '(Yes, there really isn't any flour in this recipe.)']

title: Good And Easy Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1 c. peanut butter', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together.', 'Form into balls.', 'Put onto ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Press down.', 'Bake at 350 degrees (don't over cook); watch because they burn easily.']

title: Skippy Quick Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. Skippy peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325°.', 'In medium bowl, combine ingredients; stir making a dough.', 'Shape dough into 1-inch balls.', 'Put on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Place 2-inches apart and with a fork, gently flatten each cookie making crisscross pattern on each cookie.', 'Bake 8 minutes or until lightly brown and slightly puffed.', 'May be topped immediately with sprinkles, chocolate chips or Hershey Kisses if desired.', 'Cool on rack completely.']

title: Miracle (Peanut Butter) Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine peanut butter and sugar; mix well.', 'Stir in egg and vanilla.', 'Roll dough into 3/4-inch balls.', 'Place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Flatten with a floured fork.', 'Bake cookies at 350° for approximately 10 minutes.', 'Allow to cool slightly before removing from pan.', 'Yields about 4 dozen.']

title: Unbelieveable Peanut Butter Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Mix thoroughly.', 'Shape into round balls.', 'Press flat with fork.', 'Bake on ungreased cookie sheet for 12 to 15 min in 300 to 325 degree oven.']

title: Miracle Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c. peanut butter', '1 c. sugar', '1 egg, well beaten', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Form into balls and press down with fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Broccoli Piemontese
ingredients: ['2 to 3 pounds broccoli', '2 finely chopped cloves garlic', 'Olive oil', 'Salt, freshly ground black pepper', 'White wine']
directions: ['Cook broccoli in boiling, salted water until barely tender.', 'Drain.', 'Saute garlic in enough oil to cover the bottom of a large skillet.', 'When lightly browned, add broccoli and spoon hot oil and garlic over it.', 'Season to taste.', 'Add wine and cook down quickly.', 'Serve the broccoli with pan juices poured over it.']

title: Simple Pasta With Garlic And Oil
ingredients: ['4 ounces Pasta', '2 tablespoons Olive oil', '1 Clove garlic']
directions: ['Bring salted pasta water to boil', 'Add your pasta to the water and cook for 2 minutes less than the package designates', 'While the pasta is cooking, add your olive oil to a large frying pan over medium heat', 'Finely chop your garlic (and shallot if you are using it)', 'Add your garlic and other optional ingredients (shallot, red pepper) to the oil and cook until the garlic turns light brown (a few minutes)', 'Remove your oil and ingredients from the heat until the pasta is done cooking', 'Add your cooked pasta to the frying pan with 1 tbsp of pasta water', 'Mix together for a couple minutes. Add your parmesan cheese and other pasta add-ins at this time if you wish.', 'Plate and enjoy!']

title: Peanut Butter Kiss Cookies
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup sugar', '1 large egg, room temperature', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '30 milk chocolate kisses']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°. Cream peanut butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg and vanilla.', 'Roll into 1-1/4-in. balls. Place 2 in. apart on ungreased', '. Bake until tops are slightly cracked, 10-12 minutes. Immediately press 1 chocolate kiss into center of each cookie. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks.']

title: Perfect fried egg
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 onion', '1 olive oil, extra virgin']
directions: ['Put olive oil into skillet', 'Cut onion into rings.', 'When oil is .', 'Hot place one ring into skillet', 'Crack egg into center of onion ring.', 'Bust yoke if desired.', 'When almost done cooking carefully flip over and cook a few seconds longer serve.']

title: Caramel Cream Frosting
ingredients: ['1 cup Plus 2 Tablespoons White Granulated Sugar, Divided', '1/2 cups Butter', '1/2 cups Heavy Whipping Cream']
directions: ['Place 2 tablespoons of sugar in a saucepan. Cook over medium heat until sugar is dissolved and becomes golden brown in color and set aside.', 'Combine remaining 1 cup sugar, butter, and cream in a medium saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture comes to a boil. Stir in caramelized sugar, and return to a boil. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat. Beat until frosting has a good spreading consistency.', 'Tips:', 'I typically make 2 batches for 2 nine-inch layers. Since the caramel hardens quickly, I torte the layers and then frost with the first batch. Then, I make the second batch and finish frosting the cake.']

title: Roasted Tomatoes
ingredients: ['8 ripe plum tomatoes', 'Olive oil', 'Salt and pepper', '2 tablespoons sugar']
directions: ['Cut the tomatoes in half lengthwise.', 'Brush an oven dish or baking sheet (or a piece of foil) with olive oil and place the tomatoes on it, cut side up.', 'Sprinkle each with salt, pepper, and sugar (sprinkle the sugar with your fingers) and cook in a 275F oven for 3 1/24 hours, until shriveled and shrunken.', 'Serve them hot or cold, cut side up, on a flat platter.']

title: Tomatoes In Mayonnaise
ingredients: ['4 cups diced tomatoes', '4 tablespoons mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Divide tomatoes into individual serving bowls.', 'Immediately before serving top each bowl with a dollop of mayo. Do not try to do this ahead -- the tomato juice will melt the mayo into an unappealing mush.', 'Pass the salt shaker and pepper grinder at the table.']

title: Lithuanian Pressed Chicken
ingredients: ['chicken', 'salt and pepper', '1 onion']
directions: ['Place chicken in soup pot seasoned with salt, pepper and onion.', 'Cover with water and cook over medium heat until chicken is tender.', 'Remove chicken from liquid.', 'Remove skin and bones. Cut meat into small cubes.', 'Put meat back into liquid and cook for 1/2 hour more.', 'Remove chicken from pot.', 'Press chicken into a Pyrex dish.', 'Pour liquid just to cover chicken.', 'Refrigerate overnight.', 'Serve chilled, sliced thin; garnish with parsley.']

title: Homemade Butter
ingredients: ['1.5 cups Heavy Whipping Cream', '1/8 teaspoon Salt']
directions: ['In a large bowl, whisk cream on high speed. Cream will become whipped cream, continue to whisk until butter is separated from buttermilk.', 'Using a mesh strainer, strain buttermilk into a storage container and refrigerate for another use. Rise butter under cold water. In a small bowl, stir in the salt. Store butter in desired container in the refrigerator.']

title: Chocolate Buttercream Frosting
ingredients: ['1/2 cup salted butter, cut into 1 tablespoon pieces', '6 ounces 77% dark chocolate, chopped']
directions: ['In a small pan over very low heat, melt chocolate and butter, stirring constantly', 'Place mixture in refrigerator for 20-30 minutes to chill', 'Remove from refrigerator and whip with a hand blender until thick and fluffy', 'Frost over Elana's Pantry's Paleo Birthday Cake']

title: Salmon Patties
ingredients: ['1 can pink salmon and its juice', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. black pepper', '16 saltine crackers, crumbled']
directions: ['Remove all skin and big bones from salmon.', 'Flake salmon and mix with other ingredients until crackers are moist.', '(If you have time, refrigerate 30 minutes.)', 'Dip by rounded tablespoon and form into 10 patties.', 'Fry over medium heat until brown and crisp. Serve hot.']

title: Spaghetti Squash Sauté
ingredients: ['1/2 cup chopped onion', '2 teaspoons olive oil, divided', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['Rake stringy pulp from Roasted Winter Squash, using the tines of a fork, and place in a bowl. Set aside.', 'Saute onion in 1 teaspoon hot oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat 5 minutes or until tender. Add garlic; saute 1 minute.', 'Add squash, salt, pepper, and remaining 1 teaspoon oil to onion mixture in skillet, and cook, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes. Serve immediately.']

title: Chocolate Candy
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2 sq. chocolate', '1 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Cook very slowly without stirring until it forms a ball when dropped in cold water.', 'Remove from fire; add butter and cool before beating.']

title: Old Fashioned Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '2 squares chocolate', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix in saucepan the sugar, milk, baking chocolate and salt. Stir until mixture begins to boil.', 'Boil slowly to soft ball stage (236°).', 'Set pan in cold water and leave until cold.', 'Add butter and vanilla.', 'Beat mixture until it becomes thick and creamy. Pour into buttered tin and, when set, cut in squares.', 'This recipe is 50 years old.']

title: Pumpkin Soup
ingredients: ['2 c. cooked pumpkin, drained', '2 qt. milk', '6 tsp. sugar', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '1/4 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Saute', 'pumpkin and sugar in butter over medium heat for 15 minutes.', 'Add', 'milk,', 'salt\tand', 'pepper.', 'Bring to a boil. Serve with toast on crackers.', 'Yields 6 servings.']

title: Chicken Soup
ingredients: ['1 small chicken', '1 small onion and onion tops', '1 tomato', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Put chicken in a good size pot.', 'Add enough water to cover. Simmer slowly over a small fire to draw out as much of the juices as possible.', 'Add onion, salt and tomato, then cook again until these are tender.', 'When ready the flesh will fall of the bones. Serve hot.']

title: Vanilla Latte
ingredients: ['2 cups freshly brewed MAXWELL HOUSE Coffee, any flavor Walgreens $6.99 thru 02/06', '3 cups milk', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Pour coffee into 6 large cups or mugs.', 'Heat milk in small saucepan on low heat until warm, stirring briskly and constantly with wire whisk to create foam.', 'Remove from heat; stir in vanilla.', 'Stir milk mixture into coffee.', 'Serve immediately with NILLA Wafers.']

title: Brook Trout In Bacon
ingredients: ['8 small trout', '8 strips bacon']
directions: ['Clean and wash trout.', 'Pat dry and rub inside with salt.', 'Wrap in bacon and fasten with wooden picks.', 'Place in hand broiler and cook over hot coals, turning several times, until bacon is crisp and fish is done.']

title: Yummy Zucchini
ingredients: ['2 medium zucchini, sliced thinly', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 stick margarine', '6 slices bread, broken up', 'milk', 'salt and pepper', 'dash of sugar']
directions: ['Put sliced zucchini and onion in large skillet with melted margarine.', 'Saute until zucchini is transparent.', 'While it is cooking, break bread in bowl and cover with milk.', 'Add bread to zucchini and season.', 'Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes, until blended. Serve as side dish with any meat entree.']

title: Blender Eggnog
ingredients: ['1 c. milk', '1 egg', '2 Tbsp. sugar', 'a little vanilla']
directions: ['Stir or beat in blender all of the ingredients.', 'May add nutmeg, if desired.']

title: Eggnog
ingredients: ['1 egg, well beaten', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 c. chilled milk', '1/4 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Beat egg and sugar.', 'Then beat in milk and flavoring of your choice.', 'Serve cold, sprinkled lightly with cinnamon and nutmeg.']

title: Robert'S Delicious Chocolate Candy
ingredients: ['chocolate', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['You mix it up in a bowl; pour it in a pan.', 'Then you have to set the timer.', 'You put it in the freezer for 10 minutes for the timer.', 'In the morning, it has to be mixed up.', 'You know it's ready when the dark is over, and the next morning, then you get all the ingredients to make it.', 'No fingers in the chocolate and not in the peanut butter.', 'The next morning, the chocolate and the peanut butter go in the freezer for 10 minutes.', 'Take it out of the freezer.', 'You have to set the timer before it rings. You got to knock on the chocolate to see if it's hard or not that hard. If it's supposed to be 5 minutes, 5 minutes is the low one to make it not that hard.']

title: Orange Julius
ingredients: ['1 6-oz can frozen orange juice concentrate', '1/2 c milk', '1 t vanilla extract', '1/4 c sugar']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in blender with 1/2 cup water and enough ice cubes to fill container.', 'Process until liquified.']

title: Fried Potato Slices Prepared In The Microwave
ingredients: ['1 potato', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Peel and cut the potato into thin slices.', 'Season the potato slices with olive oil, salt, and pepper.', 'Place the potato slices on a glass plate and place it in the microwave for 3 minutes.', 'Flip the slices over and cook for another 3 minutes.', 'If the potatoes do not have a light golden color on both sides, continue cooking them for another 3 minutes.', 'Let the potatoes cool for 10 minutes and serve.']

title: Blasted Chicken By Chef Melinda Lee
ingredients: ['3 1/2 Lb. Chicken', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Onion', 'Lemon']
directions: ['Wash, and pat very dry with paper towels, a whole chicken - about 3 1/2 pounds. Salt and pepper chicken, adding other seasonings, if desired. Stuff with a quartered lemon and onion.', '', 'Place chicken (untrussed, not covered, in a roasting pan) in a thoroughly pre-heated 450-degree oven. Roast for 45 minutes. Thermometer, inserted in thickest part of thigh meat - not touching bone - should read 160 degrees or slightly higher.', '', '*Add about 10 minutes per 1 lb. of chicken', '', 'Remove from oven and allow to stand 15 minutes before serving.']

title: Pineapple Filling
ingredients: ['1 large can pineapple, drained', '1 small can evaporated milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 stick butter', '3 c. sugar']
directions: ['Boil 5 minutes.', 'Make 2 cake layers and split to make four layers.', 'Put filling between and on top of layers.', 'Soaks in good.']

title: Sauteed Squash With Tomatoes & Onions
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '4 medium zucchini, chopped', '2 large tomatoes, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add onion; cook and stir until tender, 2-4 minutes. Add zucchini; cook and stir 3 minutes.', 'Stir in tomatoes, salt and pepper; cook and stir until squash is tender, 4-6 minutes longer. Serve with a slotted spoon.']

title: Crusty Oven Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['2 to 2 1/2 lb. chicken, cut up', '1/2 c. margarine, melted', '2 c. crushed Ritz round crackers', '2 Tbsp. sesame seed', '1 tsp. salt', 'dash of pepper']
directions: ['Dip chicken pieces in margarine, then in mixture of cracker crumbs, sesame seed, salt and pepper.', 'Place on foil lined shallow pan.', 'Bake in 375° oven for 1 hour.', 'Makes 6 servings.']

title: Honey Coffee Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '1 Margarine', '1 Honey', '1 Instant coffee']
directions: ['Make some slits on the surface of the bread.', 'This time, I did it horizontally.', 'Spread margarine over the surface, then honey.', 'Toast in a toaster oven.', 'Sprinkle instant coffee on top.']

title: Cauliflower Poppers (Low Carb)
ingredients: ['2 heads cauliflower', '14 cup olive oil', '1 12 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees.', 'Wash and clean the cauliflower.', 'Cut off and discard the stem.', 'Cut the cauliflower up into small pieces.', 'In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, salt and pepper.', 'Add the cauliflower pieces and thoroughly coat each piece.', 'Place cauliflower pieces onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.', 'Bake for one hour and turn 3 times during cooking until each piece has a nice brown coloring.', 'The browner they are the better!']

title: Sherry- Blue Cheese Chicken With Fried Baby Eggplant
ingredients: ['Chicken', 'Eggplant']
directions: ['Heat olive oil in a large non-stick saute pan over medium-high heat. Coat the pan with the oil. Lay the chicken on the pan and brown on each side, about 3 minutes per side. Add the sherry and bring to boil. Reduce the heat to medium-high and whisk in the blue cheese. Cover and cook for 6 more minutes, turning once. Place two pieces of pancetta on each piece of chicken. Cover and remove from the heat.', 'While the chicken is cooking, heat the oil for the eggplant in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Test the temperature of the oil by carefully dripping water into the oil. If it spits, it is ready for cooking. In a shallow dish whisk together the eggs and pour the breadcrumbs into another shallow dish. Coat the eggplant pieces with the egg followed by the bread crumbs. Use your fingers to gently push down on the breadcrumbs so they stay put will cooking. Carefully place the eggplant in the oil with a slotted spoon. Cook for 1-2 minutes per side. Remove with the slotted spoon and drain on a paper towels.', 'Next, carefully lower the basil into the oil with the slotted spoon. Cook for 30 seconds, remove and drain on a paper towel. Be certain to blot off excess oil from both the eggplant and the basil.', 'To arrange, plate one piece of eggplant. Place the chicken on top (pancetta side facing up), then another piece of eggplant and then a few fried basil leaves. Top with a spoonful of the sherry-blue cheese sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken', '2 carrots', '2-3 sticks of celery', '1 medium onion', '1 lemon', '1 head of garlic']
directions: ['Salt and pepper the bird.', 'Add mirepoix to the roasting dish', 'Sit bird atop mirepoix', 'add a little olive oil', 'squeeze half a lemon over the bird', 'Place the other lemon half inside the cavity with half a head of garlic', 'Place the other half head of garlic in the roasting pan.', '', 'Roast for 20 min/500g +30 min', 'Rest for 15 minutes']

title: Grilled Mackerel with Fennel
ingredients: ['1 Mackerel', '1 bunch Fennel leaves', '1/2 Lemon', '2 tbsp Olive oil', '1 tsp Salt']
directions: ['Pack the fennel leaves into a baking tray, and add some olive oil.', 'Slice the mackerel in half, rub the salt into the flesh and place on top of the fennel.', 'Add more olive oil.', 'Bake in the oven at 200C for 15 minutes.', 'Turn the fillets over halfway through.', 'When done, discard the fennel you cooked with the fish.', 'Cut new fennel into bite-sized pieces and serve it with the fish and lemon.']

title: Broccoli With Lemon
ingredients: ['1 lb broccoli', 'salt', '1 large lemon, juice and zest of, grated', 'pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
directions: ['Cut florets from broccoli.', 'Trim and peel steams, then cut crosswise into 1/4 inch slices.', 'Heat 1 inch water in pan large enough to hold steaming rack or basket to boiling.', 'Place broccoli steaming rack and scatter florets over top.', 'Salt boiling water, place rack in pan, and steam covered until tender.', 'Place broccoli in serving bowl.', 'Add 2 tablespoons lemon juice, half of zest and oil.', 'Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Toss quickly to combine and serve hot.']

title: Buttercream
ingredients: ['1 cup butter, very soft', '8 cups confectioners' sugar', '1/2 cup whole milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place butter in a large mixing bowl - whip for 3-5 minutes until very fluffy.', 'Add 4 cups of powdered sugar and combine well.', 'Add milk & vanilla and continue to combine.', 'Add powdered sugar, 1 cup at a time until frosting is thick and spreadable **you may not use all 8 cups**.']

title: Chocolate Macaroons
ingredients: ['1 can Eagle Brand milk', '2 sq. chocolate', '3 c. coconut', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt milk and chocolate; add coconut and vanilla.', 'Drop by spoonful on greased cookie sheet.', 'Bake for 12 minutes at 350°.']

title: The Realtor'S Baked Sweet Potato Chips
ingredients: ['1 sweet potato', 'olive oil, spray', 'sea salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350.', 'Peel the sweet potato and slice it with a vegetable peeler into thin strips.', 'Lay them out on a parchment lined tray. Keep them seperate and not touching in a single layer.', 'Spray them lightly with olive oil.', 'Sprinkle with sea salt and pepper.', 'Bake them about 20 minutes or until browned and crispy. Turn the tray about halfway through.', 'Keep your eye on them and adjust the cooking time to acheive the desired crispy texture.', 'Cool slightly and enjoy!']

title: Pineapple Popsicles
ingredients: ['1 quart milk', '20 ounces crushed pineapple, drained', '1 1/2 cups sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Blend in blender until smooth.', 'Pour into molds and freeze.']

title: Wedding Soup
ingredients: ['1 chicken', 'salt and pepper', '1 onion, chopped', '1 c. celery, chopped']
directions: ['Boil chicken for 2 to 3 hours.', 'Add onion and celery last hour.', 'Shred with fork.']

title: Tuna Cakes
ingredients: ['6 1/2 oz. can tuna, drained', '1 egg, beaten', '12 saltine crackers', '1/4 c. milk', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Shape into 6 patties.', 'Fry in 10-inch skillet over medium heat in 1 teaspoon margarine until browned. (Can substitute canned salmon for tuna.)']

title: Bacon And Eggs(Microwave)
ingredients: ['2 slices bacon', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut bacon in half and place in 1-quart dish or micro pan. Cover with paper towel.', 'Cook in microwave oven, covered, on Full power for 1 minute.', 'Arrange bacon at edge of dish.', 'Break egg into center of dish.', 'Pierce yolk with knife or fork.', 'Cook in microwave, covered, on Full power for 20 to 45 seconds, or until egg is cooked as desired.', 'Season with salt and pepper as desired.']

title: Peanut Butter Granola
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons margarine', '1/3 cup peanut butter', '1/3 cup honey', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 cups oatmeal']
directions: ['Melt together margarine, peanut butter and honey.', 'Add vanilla and salt.', 'Add oatmeal and toss to coat completely.', 'Spread on baking sheet.', 'Bake at 375 about 10 minutes. Stir after 5 minutes.', 'Store at room temperature in sealed container.', 'Note.watch it closely while it bakes -- it burns easily, especially around the edges where it's spread thinner on the pan.', 'Also note -- I omit the salt without noticing any change in flavour.']

title: Salmon Croquettes
ingredients: ['1 can salmon', '1 grated potato', '1 egg', 'crushed crackers']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients and form into patties.', 'Fry in oil until golden brown.']

title: Grandma'S Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['1/3 cup creamy peanut butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 cups sugar', '2/3 cup milk', '2 tablespoons butter', '1/8 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Butter a 9-inch pieplate. Set aside.', 'Place peanut butter and vanilla in a medium bowl.', 'Combine sugar and next 3 ingredients in a 2-quart heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring until butter melts. Using a pastry brush dipped in hot water, brush down any sugar crystals on sides of pan. Cook, without stirring, until a candy thermometer registers 235° (soft ball stage). Remove from heat, and let stand 5 minutes. Pour hot syrup over peanut butter mixture in bowl. (Do not scrape sides of pan.) Beat with a wooden spoon until smooth. Quickly pour into prepared pieplate. Cool completely. Cut candy into pieces.', 'Tips: Grandma probably used the stage method to determine her candy's readiness, but a thermometer will give you more consistent results. Be sure to check that your thermometer works accurately and adjust accordingly if it doesn't. For example: if water boils at 212° on your thermometer, your thermometer works accurately. If it boils at 210°, cook this recipe to 233°; if the boiling point on your thermometer is 214°, cook this recipe to 237°. Be sure that the bulb of the candy thermometer is fully submerged in syrup but does not touch bottom of saucepan. Don't beat candy too long; it hardens quickly as it cools. Beating candy in a separate bowl helps prevent the grainy texture that results from accidentally scraping any crystals off sides of pan.']

title: Ziti With Fresh Broccoli Sauce
ingredients: ['4 garlic cloves, peeled and halved', '1/2 cup olive oil', '1 bunch broccoli, trimmed and ends of stalks removed', 'salt and pepper', '1 lb ziti pasta, cooked and drained']
directions: ['Place garlic in heavy skillet; pour in enough oil to cover garlic.', 'Cook over med heat until garlic begins to brown.', 'Cook broccoli in small amount of boiling water until tender, drain; cool slightly. Puree broccoli in blender.', 'Add garlic and olive oil; whirl until garlic is pureed. With motor running, slowly pour in remaining oil and mix until mixture reaches mayonnaise-like consistency.', 'Stir in salt and pepper to taste. Pour over hot, freshly cook ziti in warmed serving bowl. Toss gently to mix well.']

title: Comfort Eggs
ingredients: ['1 egg', '8 soda crackers', '1 teaspoon margarine', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['In small saucepan, cover egg with water.', 'Bring to boil, then continue boiling 3-5 minutes.', 'In bowl, crush soda crackers.', 'Add margarine and soft-cooked egg.', 'Mix well.', 'Season to taste and enjoy.']

title: No Bake Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. butter', '1/2 c. milk', '3 c. quick oatmeal', '1 c. coconut', '1/2 c. nuts', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Combine and boil sugar, butter and milk 1 minute.', 'Stir in oatmeal, coconut, nuts and vanilla.', 'Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper.']

title: Eating Well'S Fresh Tomato Puree
ingredients: ['5 lbs plum tomatoes', '12 garlic cloves, peeled and smashed', '1/2 cup olive oil', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Core tomatoes and chop into 1 into pieces.', 'Combine tomatoes, garlic and oil into a 5 quart non-aluminum saucepot. Simmer, uncovered, over low heat for about an hour, or until tomatoes and garlic and soft. Stir occasionally to prevent sticking.', 'Pass the mixture through a food mill or sieve. Discard the pulp and return the puree to the saucepan.', 'Simmer, uncovered, for 1 - 1 1/2 hours, stirring often, until the mixture is thick. Time depends on moisture content of tomatoes.', 'Season to taste with salt and pepper.', 'Keeps in the refrigerator for up to a week, freezes for up to 2 months.']

title: Bacon wrapped asparagus(real quick)
ingredients: ['1 bacon', '1 asparagus']
directions: ['preheat oven to 375', 'trim asparagus spears and place on baking/cookie sheet in groups of 3', 'wrap each group with a slice of bacon secure with toothpick all the way thru bake until Bacon is crisp turn occasionally.', 'serve immediately & enjoy']

title: Burst Tomatoes And Bacon
ingredients: ['4 slices bacon', '2 pints heirloom cherry tomatoes']
directions: ['In a cast-iron pan over medium heat, add the bacon and cook until crisp, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate.', 'Remove all but 1 tablespoon of the bacon fat from the pan.', 'Add the tomatoes and swirl them around the pan so they are fully coated in the bacon fat and glossy; add more bacon fat if needed.', 'Cook the tomatoes until they are plump and about to burst, about 5 minutes. Remove to a serving dish and crumble the bacon on top. Serve immediately.']

title: Bacon Wrapped Crackers
ingredients: ['sliced bacon', 'Club crackers']
directions: ['Heat oven to 400°.', 'Wrap raw bacon slices around Club crackers.', 'Bake in broiler pan for 10 to 15 minutes.']

title: Mudd Fish
ingredients: ['1 mud fish', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['on a cypress board lay fish, sprinkle with salt and pepper,take and lay in sun make sure it is a bright sunnie day and hot.', 'let lay in the sun for about 8 hours.', 'take and remove fish from cypress board.', 'then you eat the cypress board.']

title: Reese'S Cookies
ingredients: ['1 pkg. Ritz crackers', '1 jar peanut butter', '4 to 6 cubes almond bark chocolate']
directions: ['Make a peanut butter sandwich by spreading peanut butter between crackers.', 'After making up 20 to 24 cookies, melt chocolate.', 'Dip cookies into chocolate and place on waxed paper to cool.']

title: It's Easy! Very Delicious Chicken Ham
ingredients: ['1 Chicken breast', '2/3 to 1 tablespoon Sugar', '2/3 to 1 tablespoon Salt']
directions: ['Pat dry the chicken breast and sprinkle sugar and salt (in this order).', 'If you salt first, the meat will be tough.', 'Put in a plastic bag and squeeze out as much as air possible.', 'Tie the bag and leave to rest in the fridge for 24 hours.', 'You will find the liquid from the chicken in the bag.', 'Rinse the chicken quickly to remove the liquid and seasonings.', 'You don't have to de-salt for a long time at all.', 'Bring water in a pan to the boil and put the chicken.', 'Cook the chicken for 5 minutes without boiling.', 'Skim off any scum.', 'Turn off the heat and leave to stand for 8 hours.', 'Cover with a lid to protect the contents.', 'In this photo the soup has cooled down completely and the fat has risen to the surface.', 'Slice and serve.', 'Serve as it is or use as a sandwich filling or salad topping.', 'Use for your ramen soup noodles instead of char siu.', 'Cold Ramen.', 'The cooking liquid can also be enjoyed as delicious soup.', 'Just sprinkle black pepper and eat as it is or use itfor making risotto.', 'If the chicken is too dry, drizzle a little olive oil.', 'In summer, the soup goes bad quickly.', 'Store in the fridge for the 8 hour resting period.', 'If you keep it longer, divide into small portions and freeze.']

title: Mike'S Super Easy Fudge
ingredients: ['1 cup peanut butter', '1 cup butter', '16 ounces confectioners' sugar', '1 tablespoon vanilla']
directions: ['Put the peanut butter and butter in a microwave-safe bowl and heat for two minutes.', 'Stir peanut butter and butter, then heat for two minutes more.', 'Stir in the vanilla and confectioner sugar.', 'Pour into a pan.', 'Refrigerate until set.', 'You can customize this recipe by adding nuts/chocolate chips/anything you want to the mix after microwaving it.']

title: Donna'S Hawaiian Bread
ingredients: ['1 loaf of Hawaiian bread', '1/2 c. finely chopped onion', '2 c. of Hellmann's Mayonnaise', '2 c. of grated sharp cheese']
directions: ['Core out the center of the loaf leaving a thick shell (1-1 1/2 inch).', 'Mix remaining ingredients and pour into loaf.', 'Wrap complete loaf with foil and bake for 1 hour at 325.', 'Serve remaining bread on the side in bite size pieces for dipping.', 'Also tear the shell for dipping.']

title: Simple Tomato And Cucumber Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 sliced cucumber', '1 sliced tomatoes', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '4 slices bread', '1 dash salt', '1 dash pepper']
directions: ['Toast bread (if desired).', 'Put mayo on slices of bread.', 'Layer with Cucumber slices.', 'Sprinkle Salt and Pepper, if desired.', 'Layer with tomato slices.', 'Put on the top piece of bread, and cut.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Chocolate-Coconut Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '2 sq. chocolate', '1 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. coconut']
directions: ['Cook sugar, chocolate, milk and butter slowly until it forms a soft ball.', 'Cool.', 'Add vanilla and coconut.', 'Beat until stiff. Pour into buttered pan and cut in squares.']

title: Simple Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: ['1 bag cauliflower florets 1 lb.', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400°F.', 'Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Make sure the cauliflower florets are roughly 1 inch wide, and arrange them on the baking sheet.', 'Drizzle the cauliflower with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and black pepper.', 'Use a rubber spatula to toss the cauliflower until it is evenly coated in the oil.', 'Roast for 22-25 minutes on the middle rack of oven, stirring halfway through the cooking time, until the cauliflower is crisp-tender and slightly charred.', 'Check to see that cauliflower is done. Remove from oven or add time as needed.', 'Serve immediately.']

title: Tuna Fish
ingredients: ['bread', 'tuna fish', 'mayonnaise']
directions: ['Take a piece of bread.', 'Take the tuna fish.', 'Mix it with mayonnaise.', 'Then spread the tuna with mayonnaise on the piece of bread.', 'Then take another piece of bread and put it on top of the bread and tuna fish and mayonnaise.', 'Then eat.']

title: Grilled Garlic Whistles (Garlic Scapes)
ingredients: ['1 lb garlic, whistles', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 lemon, juice of']
directions: ['Rinse garlic whistles in water and then soak in a mixture of the olive oil, salt, pepper and lemon juice for about 30 minutes.', 'Did not test --->>>Cook on an outdoor grill (medium heat) for about 3 to 5 minutes.', 'Alternate method for stove top preparation which I tested: use a grill pan and cook the same way as Step #2.']

title: Honey Fudge
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '3/4 c. milk', '1/4 c. cream', '1 sq. chocolate', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 c. nuts', '1/4 c. honey']
directions: ['Boil sugar, milk, cream and chocolate for 5 minutes.', 'Add honey and cook until it forms a soft ball in cold water; 236°.', 'Remove from heat and allow to cool to 120°.', 'Beat until it loses its shiny look.', 'Pour into 8 x 8-inch pan.', 'Cut in 1 inch squares.', 'Store in refrigerator.']

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Crackers
ingredients: ['Ritz crackers', 'peanut butter', 'chocolate']
directions: ['Put peanut butter between 2 crackers.', 'Melt chocolate; dip crackers one at a time in chocolate.', 'Place on rack to harden. After hardened, place in airtight container.']

title: Tuna Fish Patties
ingredients: ['1 can tuna', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 to 8 crushed saltine crackers']
directions: ['Crush saltine crackers.', 'Add to mixture.', 'After completely mixed, make round balls.', 'Flatten out.', 'Coat with cornmeal.', 'Put enough grease to cover bottom of skillet.', 'Put patties in.', 'When grease is hot, brown.', 'Turn over.', 'Brown both sides.', 'Drain on paper towel.', 'Makes about 8 patties.']

title: Grilled Zucchini
ingredients: ['4 zucchini', 'olive oil', 'Seasoning Salt', 'Pepper']
directions: ['Wash zucchini, cut off ends, and slice lengthwise, entire length of zucchini. Lightly coat open part of zucchini in olive oil. Sprinkle on seasoning salt (I like Johnny's) and pepper. Place on grill for 12 minutes']

title: Zucchini Noodles Low-Carb
ingredients: ['4 -5 zucchini', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 dash salt', '1 dash pepper']
directions: ['Get out your best vegetable peeler (it must be SHARP).', ''Peel' strips off the zucchini, going around the length of the veggie in an equal manner so that you make strips of equal length and thickness - you\'ll get the hang of it after one zucchini so have an extra available for practice.', 'After you have peeled a bowl full of strips, add olive oil and salt and pepper to taste. Don\'t add too much olive oil. Let the bowl sit out for 1 hour to 'temper' the noodles, tossing once or twice (I like to toss with my hands, the zucchini strips feel silky and wonderful!)', 'Place in fridge after one hour until ready to use (will keep for one day).', 'I serve this with meatballs and sauce, plain, or with grated cheese. Some people actually boil these noodles briefly (blanche) but I prefer them raw.']

title: Mayonnaise Salmon
ingredients: ['salmon', 'enough mayonnaise to cover the top of the salmon', 'pepper', 'garlic salt', 'season salt']
directions: ['Spread mayonnaise all over the salmon, then cover with the spices; put on greased foil lined grill at medium-low heat and cook for 30 minutes or until done. Remove from grill; place on serving tray, then enjoy!']

title: Amaretto Hawaiian Sherbert Recipe
ingredients: ['2 ounce Amaretto fill pineapple juice', '1 ounce cream']
directions: ['Ice // rocks or possibly blended // frzn'],['pineapple juice'

title: For Two Pain Perdu
ingredients: ['1 egg', '3/4 Tbsp. sugar', '1/4 c. milk', 'few drops vanilla', '4 slices bread', '1/8 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Beat egg.', 'Add salt, sugar, milk and vanilla.', 'Pour into shallow dish and dip bread into mixture letting the bread absorb as much egg mixture as possible.', 'Arrange slices in greased pan and place in hot oven (400°) until dry and brown.', 'Serve with butter and honey.']

title: Broiled Salmon Steaks
ingredients: ['Four 6-ounce salmon steaks', '2 tablespoons olive oil, turning to coat', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Heat broiler. Place four 6-ounce salmon steaks on a broilerproof baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil, turning to coat; season with salt and pepper. Broil until cooked through but still slightly translucent in the center, 5-7 minutes.', 'Serve with Roasted Poblano and Caper Salsa.']

title: Copper River Salmon
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '48-ounce Copper River salmon fillets', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 275.', 'Heat olive oil in a nonstick saute pan.', 'Add fillets, skin side down.', 'When skin blisters, about 1 minute, place pan in oven and roast for 8 to 12 minutes to medium-rare.', 'Remove pan from oven and heat over high flame until skin crisps, about 2 minutes.', 'Season.', 'Serve skin side up.']

title: Chicken With Orange Juice
ingredients: ['1 fryer chicken', '1 cup orange juice', 'seasoned salt', 'garlic salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven at 350 degrees.', 'Sprinkle chicken with seasoned salt and garlic salt.', 'Bake in casserole dish for 30 minutes.', 'Pour orange juice over chicken and continue to bake until chicken is done.', 'Serves 4.']

title: Fluffy 4 Ingredient Peanut Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['1 pound Powdered Sugar', '1 cup Heavy Whipping Cream', '1 cup Natural Peanut Butter', '1 teaspoon Vanilla']
directions: ['Add all ingredients into the bowl of your stand mixer. Using the whisk attachment, beat on low for 30 seconds and then on medium for 2 minutes or until fluffy and smooth.', 'Find whatever you can to frost with this frosting! It will be a hit. At least that has been my experience. This frosting also stores in your refrigerator for a week or so. If refrigerated, leave it out on the counter for 20 minutes to soften before using.', 'This recipe will generously frost about 24 cupcakes or one large layer cake.']

title: Chicken A La Orange
ingredients: ['2 1/2 to 3 lb. frying chicken, cut into 8 pieces', '1/4 c. butter', '1/4 c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. orange juice', '1 orange']
directions: ['Heat oven to 375°.', 'In skillet, combine butter, sugar and orange juice.', 'Cook over high heat, stirring occasionally until thickened (12 to 17 minutes).', 'Arrange chicken in 13 x 9-inch pan. Bake for 50 to 60 minutes, until tender, brushing with sauce every 15 minutes.', 'Cut orange colored peel from orange.', 'Cut half of the peel into narrow strips and add to remaining sauce.', 'Slice orange into 1/4-inch slices.', 'Dip slices in sauce and arrange on serving platter with chicken.', 'Serve with additional warm sauce. Makes 4 to 6 servings.']

title: Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['1 qt. cooked, diced carrots', '3 Tbsp. butter', '1/4 c. honey']
directions: ['Cook the carrots.', 'Add butter and honey.', 'Cook until glazed.']

title: Salmon Pie

directions: ['Mix all ingredients and let set for a few minutes.', 'Pour into a greased 9-inch pie plate.', 'Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.']

title: Hawaiian Coffee
ingredients: ['12 cup milk', '12 cup sweetened flaked coconut', '12 cup coffee']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350F.', 'Place milk and coconut in a small sauce pan and heat over low heat for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Strain the milk into a coffee cup.', 'Place the strained coconut on a baking sheet and bake for roughly 8 minutes or until the coconut is a light brown.', 'Add coffee to the coconut milk and top with the toasted coconut.']

title: Grilled Elephant Garlic
ingredients: ['1 elephant garlic clove', 'olive oil', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper', '1 pinch sugar']
directions: ['Slice peeled elephant garlic into 1/4 inch sliced.rub with oil and sprinkle with salt, pepper and sugar.', 'Place on a preheated grill for about 3 minutes each side.', 'Remove and cover with foil to continue cooking and keep warm.', 'Place on fresh crisp bread, garnish any grilled meat or veggies.', 'Or if you want eat it straight up!']

title: Easy Peanut Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar', '1 cup peanut butter', '6 tablespoons butter, melted', '1/4 cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine confectioners' sugar, peanut butter, melted butter, milk, and vanilla extract in a large bowl. Mix with a wooden spoon until well-combined and smooth, 2 to 3 minutes.']

title: Kyra'S Mild Or Hot Chicken
ingredients: ['12 pieces chicken parts', 'seasoning salt', 'granulated onion', 'granulated garlic']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Set the 12 pieces of chicken on a greased pan.', 'Shake on the seasoning salt, granulated onion and granulated garlic.', 'The more you add, the spicier it tastes.', 'Put it in the oven and bake for one hour or until slightly browned and it doesn't bleed.', 'Turn off the oven and let cool 5 to 10 minutes. Then serve and enjoy.']

title: P Nut Butter Chocolate Ritz Cracker Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['48 Ritz crackers', 'Peanut butter, sufficient to make sandwiches out of 24 sets of Ritz crackers', 'Melting chocolate for candy making']
directions: ['Make two cracker sandwiches filled with peanut butter (24).', 'Heat candy making chocolate in double boiler.', 'Put crackers in chocolate and coat them with chocolate.', 'Put on waxed paper and let cold.', 'These taste just like the Girl Scout P-Nut Butter cookies.']

title: Easy Roasted Garlic
ingredients: ['1 head garlic', 'salt', 'pepper', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Peel garlic cloves.', 'Place in sliver foil.', 'Salt and Pepper the cloves.', 'Pour a little olive oil over the cloves.', 'Seal the foil and bake @ 4OO for 25 minutes.']

title: Mackerel
ingredients: ['1 can mackerel', '8 saltine crackers, crushed', '1 egg', '1/4 c. milk']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a bowl.', 'Make out into patties and fry in hot oil until brown.']

title: Ritzy Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1 box Ritz crackers', '1 stick margarine', 'chicken']
directions: ['Crush Ritz crackers until very fine.', 'Melt butter and dip chicken in it.', 'Then roll chicken in crackers.', 'Bake on cookie sheet, uncovered, for 1 1/2 hours at 300°.']

title: Easy Ice Cream (For Electric Ice Cream Maker)
ingredients: ['1 quart milk', '1 tablespoon vanilla', '3/4 cup sugar', '1/8 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Mix the milk and sugar until well mixed.', 'Add vanilla & salt.', 'Pour into electric ice cream maker and follow instructions as stated.']

title: Ono Oven Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken thighs', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', '1/2 tsp. pepper', '1 1/2 c. mayonnaise', '2 c. cornflakes, crushed']
directions: ['Salt and pepper chicken.', 'Roll pieces in mayonnaise, then roll each piece in the crushed cornflakes.', 'Bake for one hour in 325° oven or until done.']

title: Cast Iron Grilled Chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 whole Lemon, Juiced', '6 cloves Garlic, Minced', '1- 1/2 teaspoon Sea Salt', '6 whole Chicken Thighs With Bones And Skin']
directions: ['1.', 'To make the marinade add lemon juice, garlic and salt into a large mixing bowl.', 'Stir and set aside.', '2.', 'Remove bones from chicken thighs with kitchen shears.', 'Place bones in a zip-lock bag, freeze and reserve for making chicken stock.', '3.', 'Place chicken thighs on a cutting board skin side up.', 'Cover with plastic wrap and pound with the flat side of a meat mallet until chicken is even, about 1/2 to 3/4 thick.', 'Place flattened chicken in the marinade and coat on all sides.', 'Repeat with remaining chicken.', '4.', 'Heat a cast iron griddle to medium heat.', '5.', 'When griddle is hot, add chicken skin side down and grill 8 minutes.', 'Using tongs, turn chicken and grill another 5 minutes.', '6.', 'Remove chicken from griddle and let it rest for 3-5 minutes.', 'Slice and serve with lemon wedges.']

title: Hot Chocolate Sauce
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter', '1/4 c. sugar', 'few grains salt', '1 sq. chocolate', '1/2 c. evaporated milk', '1/2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt butter.', 'Add sugar, salt and chocolate in saucepan.', 'Cook slowly until chocolate dissolves, stirring constantly.', 'Add milk; cook over low heat until thick, stirring constantly.', 'Add vanilla. Serves 4.', 'Chopped, salted nuts may be added.']

title: Margaret'S Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['5 Tbsp. rice, washed', '1 qt. milk', 'pinch of salt', '6 Tbsp. sugar', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients, except vanilla.', 'Bake at 325°.', 'Stir once in a while.', 'Add the vanilla when you take from oven.', 'Bake for 1 1/2 hours, or until thick.']

title: Egg In A Basket
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'olive oil Some, for the pan']
directions: ['1. With a mug (or something round) cut a hole in the middle of the slice of bread.', '2. Put some olive oil into a pan. Wait until the oil is heat.', '3. Place the bread on the pan.', '4. Turn the bread, break the egg and place it on the hole.', '5. When the egg is set, flip it over and cook it for a while.']

title: Vanilla Buttercream Cake Frosting
ingredients: ['1 lb confectioners' sugar', '1/2 cup butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 tablespoons milk']
directions: ['Allow butter to warm to room temperature.', 'In large bowl, beat together sugar, butter, vanilla and milk until smooth. If necessary add more milk until frosting is spreading consistency. If desired, add a few drops of food coloring. Mix everything well.']

title: Toa Vakalolo(Chicken In Coconut Cream)

directions: ['Broil, grill lightly or saute chicken until almost cooked.', 'Cut onions into rings and grill/saute until transparent.', 'Put chicken and onion into a saucepan or large frying pan with chopped and skinned tomatoes.', 'Pour coconut cream over chicken mixture.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Simmer for 15 minutes until chicken is tender.']

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: ['2 c. cooked, cubed chicken', '1 c. chopped celery', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'mayonnaise']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Add enough mayonnaise to mix up well.']

title: Shoe String Potato Salad
ingredients: ['1 c. finely diced celery', '1 c. grated carrots', '2 c. boned, diced chicken', '1 tsp. grated onion', '1 c. mayonnaise']
directions: ['The above ingredients may be fixed ahead of time and chilled in the refrigerator.', 'Just before serving, add 1 (4 ounce) bag or can of shoestring potatoes.', 'Serve on lettuce cups.']

title: Grill Baked Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato', 'butter']
directions: ['Prepare grill.', 'Wrap sweet potato in foil. Pierce potato several times through foil with a fork.', 'Place sweet potato on grill 4-6 inches from coals. Grill, turning, until potato is soft, about 45 minutes.']

title: Fat-Free Croutons
ingredients: ['1 sourdough bread', 'Butter Buds']
directions: ['Cut bread into 1-inch slices.', 'Sprinkle with Butter Buds, covering completely.', 'Let stand 2 minutes.', 'Turn and sprinkle other side.', 'Cut into crouton size pieces.', 'Put into brownie tin and cook at 350° for about 20 minutes or until golden in color. Absolutely the very best for salads, soups and just munching!']

title: Chris' Peanut Butter Cups(Kid Recipe)
ingredients: ['1 box peanut butter cookie mix', '2 bags miniature Reese's peanut butter cups']
directions: ['Mix peanut butter cookie mix as directed on box.', 'Divide dough into 36 balls which are the size of a walnut.', 'Place in greased small muffin tins.', 'Bake 10 minutes at 350°.', 'Remove from oven and place a peanut butter cup in center of each ball.', 'Return to oven for 3 minutes.', 'Remove from oven and place in refrigerator.', 'Store in airtight container.', 'Yields 36.']

title: Ladybirds Garlic Bread .
ingredients: ['1 long french bread stick .', '30 grams butter - roughly .', '2 tbsp minced garlic .']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 180C / 350F .', 'Take the long French bread stick , and using a sharp knife , slice , roughly , 2cm slits into the bread stick , making sure you don't cut all when way through to the bottom .', 'Now using the butter , slice the butter and add the slices into the slits of the bread stick , on each side .', 'Take the minced garlic and using a round flat tip butter knife , spread some of the garlic between the butter slices in the long bread stick , and push together to close it all up .', 'Take a piece of foil , longer than the bread stick , and place the bread stick onto the middle of the foil and wrap the foil up and around the prepared bread stick to seal it all up .', 'Now place prepared bread stick into Preheated oven and cook for 20 minutes , after the 20 minutes , open the top of the foil around the bread stick , and bake for a further 8-10 minutes , until lightly crisped .', 'Remove from heat .', 'Once cooked , place on serving platter and serve hot , enjoy .', ':-) .']

title: Toni's Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['5 pressed garlic cloves', '12 cup butter']
directions: ['Place ingredient in a pot heat until incorporated.', 'Place in a covered jar.', 'Keep in refrigerator if unused.', 'Awesome on homemade bread!']

title: Pork Steaks

directions: ['Slice zucchini.', 'Peel and grate carrots.', 'Peel and slice onion.', 'Put olive oil and sliced onions into skillet, cover and cook over medium heat until onions are tender.', 'Add grated carrots, sliced zucchini, salt and pepper.', 'Cover and continue to cook until all vegetables are soft.', '15-20 minutes.', 'Serve as a side dish.']

directions: ['Combine ingredients and put into a 9 x 13-inch cake pan.'],['crackers'

title: Buttered Potatoes
