directions: ['Boil potatoes.', 'Mash potatoes.', 'Mix in melted butter.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Garlic Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: ['1 head Cauliflower, Trimmed', '4 cloves Garlic, Thinly Sliced', '2 Tablespoons Olive Oil', '1/2 teaspoons Salt', '1 pinch Cracked Black Pepper']
directions: ['That's it. Five simple ingredients. Again, does it get any better? Yes, you will find out that it does.', 'Preheat your oven to 400°F.', 'Turn the cauliflower upside down, and with a knife, remove the core.', 'Next, begin trimming the cauliflower, making sure you have as close as the same size cuts in your florets. This will allow an even cooking process.', 'Add the cauliflower florets to a mixing bowl, along with the garlic. Drizzle the olive oil over the florets, tossing along the way to ensure the florets and garlic are lightly coated in oil. Shower the florets with salt and pepper, tossing along the way.', 'Add the florets to a baking sheet and place in the preheated oven. Roast in the oven for about 20 to 25 minutes or until the cauliflower is a nice and golden brown.', 'Simply place these in a serving dish and place on the table.', 'The end result is cauliflower that has this awesome nutty flavor alongside the roasted garlic. Did I mention how great the smells were? It's tender, lightly salted, and well, just plain old delicious. Delicious enough that it will be a side dish for this upcoming Thanksgiving dinner.']

title: Steamed Carrots
ingredients: ['1 lb. carrots', 'butter to taste']
directions: ['Wash, scrape and slice carrots in round disc shape.', 'Place a 2 to 3-quart size steamer basket in bottom of large cook pot.', 'Put enough water in pot so it does not rise above the steamer.', 'Add carrots to steamer.', 'Cover.', 'Cook on high heat for 5 minutes, then turn to low or simmer.', 'Carrots are done when tender to touch with fork.', 'Cooking time is about 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Check often.', 'When done, drain and place in serving dish.', 'Add butter to taste.', 'Stir and serve.']

title: Fish Patties

title: Simona'S Panna Cotta
ingredients: ['2 3/4 cups cream', '7/8 cup milk', '1 cup sugar', 'vanilla']
directions: ['Melt the gelatina (or the fish glue) with a bit of warm water.', 'Into a sauce pan, drop the milk, the cream, the sugar and vanilla; bring to moderate fire melting and being careful not to make it boil. Make it cook for 15 minutes, then melt the gelatin, mixing with a spoon.', 'Drop the cream into small cups and put into the fridge for 6 hours at least.', 'Before serving, decorate with fresh fruits, candied peel (see recipe here) or dark chocolate!']

title: Pecan Cookie Bars

directions: ['Melt butter slow and stir in sugar and vanilla.', 'Let boil for 2 minutes.', 'Stir in pecans.', 'Pour over graham crackers in lined pan.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 minutes.', 'Take off foil immediately or they will stick.']

title: Simply Carrots
ingredients: ['2 pound package of carrots', '1 stick of salted butter', '1 onion, chopped']
directions: ['Peel and slice carrots, diagonally in 1/4' slices (see pic).', 'In a dutch oven or even a cast iron pan with a lid, add butter, carrots and onions. When the butter has melted, stir to coat each carrot slice and break up the onions. On low heat, cook, covered for 15 minutes.', 'After 15 minutes, almost all of the water that comes out of the carrots and onions will have evaporated. This is when the caramelization starts to take place. Stir every 7-8 minutes. It should take 50 minutes from start to finish.\r\nWhen a good amount of the carrots and onions are caramelized, shut off the heat and cool. Store in the refrigerator overnight or up to 3 days. If you need to freeze them, they defrost perfectly. Can be nuked to reheat.']

title: Microwaved Turkey - No, I'm not kidding!
ingredients: ['1 whole turkey, thawed completely', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Whatever stuffing you want to use, or none.', 'This method of preparing your turkey IS different.', 'But, the turkey should turn out with a lovely brown color, fall off the bones tender and more than enough juice to make as much gravy as you could want.', 'Empty all cavities, wash, pat dry and rub outside with olive oil, feel free to use any seasonings that you want.', 'Stuff if you want and truss with string, or skewers.', 'MOST modern microwave ovens will tolerate a moderate amount of metal.', 'Refer to your owner's manual for details if you're not sure.', 'Place breast side down on microwave proof roasting pan or rack in baking dish.', 'Cover with waxed paper and cook on HIGH 2 MIN.', 'PER POUND.', 'Flip the bird breast side up and turn 1/2 rotation if you don't use a turntable.', 'Cover wings, ends of drumsticks and top of breast with foil, secure with toothpicks and replace wax paper.', 'Cook at 50% FOR 70- 90 MIN.', '(turn 1/2 rotation every 30 min.', 'if no turntable.)', 'or 185F in thickest part of breast.', 'Baste freequently with juices in pan.', 'Let your bird rest for at least 15 minutes before carving.', 'This is a good time to make your gravy.']

directions: ['Using a vegetable peeler make ribbons of the carrots.', 'Add carrots to a pot of boiling water and cook until tender crisp.', 'Drain.', 'Stir in butter.']

directions: ['Follow the Steam/Sauteed Tender Greens recipe, adding the garlic along with the greens and lemon juice and zest once the liquid has evaporated.']

title: Rice Pudding

directions: ['Combine and bring to a slight boil.', 'Place in oven at 300° or 325°.', 'When skim forms on top, stir it down.', 'Continue until desired thickness.']

title: Burnt Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter', '4 cups confectioners' sugar', '4 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place the butter in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until the butter is a nice tan color. If it gets dark brown or black you have allowed it to burn too long. When butter has been 'burned' remove the saucepan from the heat.', 'Slowly mix in confectioners' sugar and vanilla. Beat on high speed of an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Beat in the milk a tablespoon at a time until desired spreading consistency is achieved. Use frosting immediately, as this frosting will set up quickly.']

title: Chicken Cacciatore
ingredients: ['2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken', '1/2 c. olive oil', '1 finely sliced onion', '3 1/2 c. canned tomatoes', '2 cloves garlic', '1 tsp. salt', '1/4 tsp. pepper', '1/2 c. white wine']
directions: ['Brown chicken in oil.', 'Pour almost all of the oil off.', 'Add onion.', 'When soft, add tomatoes, garlic, salt and pepper.', 'Cover and simmer 45 minutes.', 'If not thickened, add a little cornstarch. Add wine the last 15 minutes.']

title: Avgolemono (Greek Egg And Lemon Soup) Recipe
ingredients: ['4 c. Chicken Stock', '1/4 c. Uncooked Rice', '1 Egg Yolk', '1/2 Lemon, Juice Only']
directions: ['Bring the chicken stock to a boil in a stockpot.', 'Add in the rice.', 'Reduce heat.', 'Simmer till the rice is tender (about 20 min).', 'Beat the egg yolk and lemon juice together in a separate bowl.', 'Stir in 1/2 c. of the stock.', 'Whisk the mix back into the stockpot.', 'Reheat but don't allow to boil.', 'Serve.']

title: Minute Fudge Or Frosting
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '2 1/2 sq. chocolate', '3/8 c. milk', '4 Tbsp. butter', 'dash of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. nuts']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in heavy saucepan and cook 1 minute after it begins to boil. Stir until sugar and chocolate are melted but do not stir while candy is boiling.', 'Remove from heat and let set until hand can be held on bottom of pan. This is important. Beat until ready to pour.', 'Add vanilla and nuts during the last minutes.']

title: Homemade Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['2 pounds tomatoes large, ripe', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 pinch pepper add to taste']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the tomatoes and let them cook for 2-3 minutes, until skin cracks. Place them into an ice bath (water) and peel off the skin.', 'Place the tomatoes in a blender. Blend them until it becomes liquified. Pour it into a large pot and top with the oil, salt and pepper. Mix and let it simmer on low for 2 hours, stir occasionally.', 'Remove from heat. Best when served warm, yet it can be cooled and then stored in the freezer for long term storage.']

title: Apple Sherbert Recipe
ingredients: ['1/2 x orange juice', '1/2 x apple juice', '1 ounce cream']
directions: ['Ice // rocks or possibly blended // frzn'],['cream'

title: Microwave Peanut Butter Fudge Recipe
ingredients: ['2 sticks butter', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Microwave on high 2-3 min (depends on microwave).', 'Take out, stir.', 'Will look like peanut butter soup.', 'Fold in:']

title: Roasted Rack Of Pork
ingredients: ['5 pounds pork rib rack chine bone removed', '2 cloves garlic crushed', 'black pepper coarsely ground']
directions: ['Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Trim excess fat from pork loin and trim extra meat from between rib bones. This is called 'Frenching' the bones; you can also ask your butcher to do this). Rub all surfaces with crushed garlic and sprinkle generously with black pepper.', 'Place pork roast, bones up, on rack in shallow roasting pan. Roast for 1 to 1 1/2 hours (20 minutes per pound), until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees F. Remove roast from oven; let rest 10 minutes. Cut between rib bones to serve.']

title: Simple Rosti
ingredients: ['1 kg floury potato', '75 g butter', '1 small onion, chopped']
directions: ['Scrub the potatoes but leave the skin on.', 'Cook the potatoes in boiling water for 7 minutes and allow to cool completely. When cool grate into a bowl.', 'Heat 15g of the butter and cook the onion until soft. Stir the onion mix into the potato.', 'Melt half of the remaining butter in a frying pan and add the potato mixture forming it into a cake shape.', 'Cook for 15 minutes or until the bottom of the cake is brown.', 'Melt the remaining butter and pour over the top of the cake. turn the rosti over and cook until golden.']

title: Francese Sauce
ingredients: ['6 oz. white wine', '1 lemon, squeezed', '1/2 lb. softened butter']
directions: ['Put white wine in saucepan.', 'Squeeze lemon and reduce volume to half its original size.', 'Swirl in 1/2 pound softened butter to make an emulsion.', 'If it separates, remove from heat and stir to re-emulsify, or add cold chicken stock.', 'If too loose, roll small pieces of butter in flour and stir until sauce is desired thickness.', 'Use as a sauce on chicken or fish.', 'Top with parsley and sliced blanched mushrooms.']

title: Baked Shredded Carrots
ingredients: ['4 c. shredded carrots', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1/4 tsp. salt', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Lightly toss together carrots and onion.', 'Put sugar and salt with mixture until combined.', 'Spread in 1-quart casserole.', 'Dot with butter.', 'Bake, covered, at 325° for 1 hour.']

title: Pb&b Shake
ingredients: ['1 banana, peeled sliced, and frozen', '1 12 cups milk', '12 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon peanut butter']
directions: ['The night before prep, peel and slice the banana, stick the pieces in a plastic baggie, and put that into the freezer.', 'This will add a nice burst of freshness and cold to go through you.', 'At the time of prep, put the bananas, milk, vanilla extract, and peanut butter into the blender.', 'It works out for the better if they go in in that order.', 'Blend the ingredients until the mixture is a nice beige color, or for about 30 seconds.', 'Serve, sip, and smile!']

title: Vanilla Buttercream Frosting
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter, softened', '4 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '5 -6 tablespoons 2% low-fat milk']
directions: ['In a large bowl, cream butter until light and fluffy. Beat in the confectioners' sugar, vanilla and enough milk to achieve desired consistency.', 'Almond Buttercream Frosting : Substitute 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon almond extract for the vanilla.', 'Chocolate Buttercream Frosting : Reduce confectioners' sugar to 4 cups and add 1/2 cup baking cocoa; increase milk to 6-7 tablespoons.', 'Lemon Buttercream Frosting : Substitute 5-6 tablespoons lemon juice for the milk; add 1 teaspoon grated lemon peel.', 'Orange Buttercream Frosting : Substitute 5-6 tablespoons orange juice for the milk; add 1 teaspoon grated orange peel.', 'Peanut Butter Frosting : Substitute peanut butter for the butter; increase milk to 6-8 tablespoons.', 'Peppermint Buttercream Frosting : Substitute 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon peppermint extract for the vanilla.']

title: Easy Vanilla Buttercream Frosting
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter, softened', '4 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '5 -6 tablespoons 2% low-fat milk']
directions: ['In a large bowl, cream butter until light and fluffy. Beat in the confectioners' sugar, vanilla and enough milk to achieve desired consistency. Yield: About 3 cups.', 'Easy Almond Buttercream Frosting: Prepare as directed above, use 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon almond extract instead of the vanilla. Yield: about 3 cups.', 'Easy Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: Prepare as directed above, except use 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 1/2 cup baking cocoa and 6-7 tablespoons milk. Yield: about 3 cups.', 'Easy Lemon Buttercream Frosting: Prepare as directed above, except use 5-6 tablespoons lemon juice instead of the milk and 1 teaspoon grated peel. Yield: about 3 cups.', 'Easy Orange Buttercream Frosting: Prepare as directed above, except use 5-6 tablespoons orange juice instead of the milk and add 1 teaspoon grated orange peel. Yield: about 3 cups.', 'Easy Peanut Butter Frosting: Prepare as directed above, except use 1/2 cup peanut butter instead of the butter and use 6-8 tablespoons milk. Yield: about 3 cups.', 'Easy Peppermint Buttercream Frosting: Prepare as directed above, except use 1/2 to 3/4 teaspoon peppermint extract instead of the vanilla. Yield: about 3 cups.']

title: Dinner Tonight: Roasted Tomato Sauce For Pasta Recipe
ingredients: ['4 pounds tomatoes, any variety, cut in half', '3 garlic cloves, peeled and finely chopped', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 pound shaped pasta, such as fusilli', '3 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F. Meanwhile, halve the tomatoes and pack them in an ovenproof dish. Chop the garlic if using a sieve or food mill, leave whole if blending. Mix the garlic with the olive oil and drizzle over the tomatoes. Season with a few good pinches of salt and pepper.', 'Roast for 35 minutes, until soft and just beginning to brown. Push the result through a sieve or food processor, or blend. In the meantime, bring a large pot of salty water to boil.', 'Cook the pasta until al dente. In the meantime, transfer the tomato mixture to a saucepan and add the butter. Simmer gently, aiming for a thick but not-too-pasty consistency. Add water if necessary. Season to taste.', 'Toss the drained pasta with the sauce and serve with Parmesan cheese.']

title: Topping

directions: ['Combine crackers and melted butter for topping; sprinkle on top of casserole.', 'Bake for 20 to 25 minutes.']

title: Lemon Garlic Chicken

directions: ['Season your chicken first with the garlic salt and pepper', 'Chop your onions and lemon up and add them to the pan with the chicken', 'Add little pinches of butter as needed add a little water and cover with foil', 'Put it in the oven at 350 for an hour and 15 minutes']

title: Salmon Cakes
ingredients: ['1 can salmon, bones picked out', '1 egg', '1 pinch salt', '5 crackers, crumbled']
directions: ['Mix all together.', 'Pat out in cakes.', 'Fry in butter or meat fryings.']

title: Mother's Yeast Rolls/Donuts/Bread Recipe
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1/3 c. evaporated lowfat milk', '1 tbsp. butter']
directions: ['These are very easy.', 'Anyone can make this bread.', 'Combine together: 1/4 c. very hot but not warm water 1/2 teaspoon sugar', 'Set aside.', 'Combine together: 1/4 c. shortening 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 c. scalded lowfat milk (bring to boil)', 'Cold, then add in: Yeast combination 3 1/2 c. flour', 'Let dough rise in a hot place for 1 hour or possibly till double in size.', 'Knead and cut out rolls or possibly donuts, or possibly shape into a loaf of bread.', 'Recipe makes 1 loaf.', 'Place rolls or possibly donuts on a greased cookie sheet or possibly place loaf into a greased loaf pan.', 'Let dough rise again for 30 min or possibly till double in size.', 'For rolls, bake in a 425 degree oven for 10 min.', 'For donuts, fry in vegetable oil till golden.', 'For bread, bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 40 min or possibly till loaf sounds hollow when thumped with finger tips.', 'Glaze recipe follows.']

title: Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 c peanut butter', '1 c sugar', '1 egg', '1 t vanilla']
directions: ['Mix ingredients', 'Roll into bals', 'Smash and press criss-cross with fork', 'Bake 350F 10-12 minutes on cookie sheet lined with parchment paper']

title: Garlic Jack Chicken
ingredients: ['1 pound Chicken', '1 loaf Garlic Bread', '12 slices Pepper Jack Cheese']
directions: ['Preheat oven per instructions of garlic bread.', 'Cook the chicken how you like (I have done this with grilled, pan-fried, and even store-bought chicken nuggets).', 'Place the chicken on top of garlic bread and cover with cheese.', 'Bake according to bread instructions.', 'My husband loves this served with salsa, but I eat it just as it is.']

title: Easy Honey Mustard Chicken

directions: ['Prepare salad dressing according to package directions.', 'Pour 1 cup prepared dressing over chicken in large bowl.', 'Refrigerate 3 hours to marinate. Remove chicken from marinade.', 'Bake at 350° for 60 minutes.']

title: Willie'S Homemade Boiled Chicken And Rice

directions: ['Boil chicken thighs for 1 hour and 45 minutes.', 'Stir in 2 cups rice.', 'Cook, covered, for 20 minutes longer.', 'Ready to serve.']

title: Grilled Shrimp Kabobs
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. peeled deveined shrimp', '1/2 c. melted butter', '1/2 c. honey']
directions: ['Thread shrimp onto wooden skewers, using 2 skewers per kabob to facilitate turning (1 skewer through the meaty part, 1 skewer through the tail part of each shrimp).', 'Brush grill with oil. Combine melted butter and honey (or substitute 1 cup Italian dressing for butter and honey).', 'Cook shrimp over hot coals, basting frequently with honey mixture or Italian dressing for 10 minutes per inch of thickness or until shrimp are tender and no longer translucent in the center.', 'Yield:', '4 servings.']

title: Zucchini Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['2 c. sliced zucchini', '1 small onion, chopped fine', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Wash and slice thin 2 cups zucchini.', 'Chop 1 small onion fine. Melt butter in skillet on medium heat.', 'Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender.']

title: Buckeyes
ingredients: ['1 cup powder sugar', '1/2 cup peanut butter', '3 tablespoon soft butter', '1 - 16 ounce dipping chocolate']
directions: ['Blend peanut butter, butter. Sift in sugar. Shape into balls, 1 inch. Melt chocolate. Dip with toothpick. Place on wax paper and chill.']

title: Hot Fudge Topping
ingredients: ['4 Tbsp. butter', '4 squares semi-sweet chocolate', '1 1/2 C. sugar', '1 lrg. can evaporated milk', 'dash of salt', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt chocolate and butter together in a saucepan.', 'Add sugar, milk and salt.', 'Cook slowly at low heat until thickened; about 15 minutes.', 'Add vanilla.']

title: Easy Salmon And Potato Foil Packets
ingredients: ['1 medium potato, sliced into very thin rounds about 1/16th-inch thick, divided', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', 'salt and pepper, divided', '2 salmon fillets, about 170 g each', '1 large orange, halved', '1 lemon, halved']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400F/200°C To a 12-inch long sheet of foil (I use Reynold's Heavy Duty Non-Stick), add half the potato slices in a pile in the center of foil. Slightly fan out the potatoes so air can circulate. Make sure potatoes are sliced very thin so they cook through in the same amount of time it takes the salmon to cook.', 'Evenly drizzle the potatoes with about 1 tablespoon of olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and repeat process with another sheet of foil and the remaining potato slices.', 'Top each pile of potatoes with 1 salmon filet.', 'Evenly drizzle each salmon filet with about 1 tablespoon olive oil.', 'Squeeze half the juice of the orange over one salmon filet and half the juice over the other filet.', 'Squeeze half the juice of the lemon over one salmon filet and half the juice over the other filet.', 'Season each salmon filet with salt and pepper.', 'Seal foil packets, making sure to tightly crimp the seams so the olive oil and citrus juices don't leak. Place packets on baking sheet and bake for about 25 to 30 minutes. Carefully open one packet to check for doneness of both salmon and potatoes and if necessary, return to the oven for an additional 5 minutes, or until done.']

title: Chocolate Blender Frosting
ingredients: ['1 c. evaporated milk', '1 1/2 tsp. vanilla', '1 1/2 c. sugar', '5 blocks chocolate, cut in small pieces', '6 Tbsp. margarine']
directions: ['Put in blender in order given.', 'Blend on medium speed until blended.', 'Blend on high until thick and creamy.', 'Stop and stir frequently.']

title: Buttercream Frosting

directions: ['Cream sugar with butter and blend vanilla and 2 tablespoons milk into mixture.', 'Gradually stir remaining milk into frosting until desired consistency is reached.']

title: Fried Chicken Of Arles

directions: ['Cut up the chicken and brown the pieces on all sides in hot oil.', 'Remove chicken and deglaze the pan by pouring the wine into it and, with a wooden spoon over medium heat, rubbing down all the good brown substances into the liquid in the skillet.', 'Then add the tomatoes and garlic.', 'Simmer until this sauce is somewhat reduced.', 'Season with salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Snow Ice Cream

directions: ['Blend the ingredients well and add clean fresh snow until absorbed.'],['egg'

directions: ['In a large saucepan bring 1 cup unsalted water to a boil, add the peas, and return the water to a boil, separating the peas with a fork.', 'Simmer the peas, covered, for 3 to 4 minutes, or until they are heated through, and drain them well.', 'Toss the peas with the butter and salt and pepper to']

title: Never Fail Creamy Caramel Icing
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cups granulated sugar', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1/2 cup butter', '3/4 cup milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['Melt 1/2 cup of sugar in iron skillet slowly, until brown and runny.', 'Mix egg, butter, remaining sugar, and milk in a saucepan and cook over low heat until butter melts.', 'Turn the heat up to medium and add the browned sugar.', 'Cook until it reaches the soft ball stage or until mixture leaves sides of pan. This takes about 10 minutes.', 'Remove from heat, let cool slightly, and add vanilla.', 'Beat until right consistency to spread.', 'If it gets too thick add a little cream.', 'This will ice a 2 layer cake.']

title: Plum Glaze & Giblet Gravy
ingredients: ['GLAZE: finely grated zest of 1 orange', '1 1/2 cups orange juice - 1/4 cup chinese plum sauce - 1/4 cup honey - 3 tbl soy sauce -2 tbl orange marmalade - 2 tbl finely minced ginger - 1 tbl finely minced garlic', 'GRAVY: 2 cups pan juices - 4 tble butter - 1/4 cup flour - 1/2 cup glaze - 1/2 tsp thyme - salt & pepper to taste - giblet mixture & broth if needed']
directions: ['GLAZE:combine all ingred in saucepan - simmer 10 mins - reserve 1/2 cup for gravy', 'GRAVY: simmer juices in roasting pan, scraping up brown bits - strain through gravy separator to remove fat - melt butter over lo heat - gradually whisk in flour until it browns slightly - whisking, slowly pour in juices & continue whisking until smooth - slowly bring gravy to boil to thicken - stir in glaze, thyme, salt, pepper & reserved giblet mix - simmer - stir x 10 mins - thin c extra broth if needed']

title: Mama'S Favorite Sauce
ingredients: ['1/2 c. evaporated milk', '3/4 c. sugar', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients in a saucepan.', 'Allow to boil for 2 1/2 minutes.', 'When sauce has cooled, pour over cool cake.', 'Sliced angel food cake tastes great.']

title: Vanilla Butter

directions: ['In a small bowl, stir ingredients until well blended.', 'Spread on your favorite toast, pancakes, waffles, scones, etc.']

title: Baked Salmon

Alternate layers of crackers and salmon.', 'Dot with butter, salt and pepper.', 'Add just enough milk until slightly soggy.', 'Cook 1 hour until brown on top.']

title: Funky Monkey

title: Roast Banana

directions: ['Peel back one thin strip of peel from the banana.', 'Brush the exposed banana with melted butter.', 'Fold the strip of peel back over the banana flesh, and/or wrap the whole banana in aluminum foil.', 'Roast in a 400F oven or over coals until the entire peel is black.', 'Eat directly from the peel with a spoon.']

title: Fried Banana

directions: ['Use enough butter to cover bottom of frying pan.', 'Slice banana.', 'Cook in butter until golden brown. Turn and brown other side.', 'Eat and enjoy.']

title: Cajun Shrimp Linguine
ingredients: ['1/2 cup of Butter', '1 Tbsp of Olive Oil']
directions: ['1. Peel and devein Shrimp, rinse with cold water and the juice of 1/2 a Lemon. Drain and set aside.', '', '2. Cook Linguine according to package directions.', '', '3.Cut open Leeks lengthwise and clean out. Dry Leeks on a paper towel and once dry, chop.', '', '4. In large Skillet, melt Butter and Olive Oil on medium- high heat.Throw in Shrimp then add Leeks and cook until almost soft. Peel garlic and use in Garlic Press. Add the pressed Garlic to the Leeks and Shrimp.', '', '5. Season with Spices and add the juice of the remaining Lemon.', '', '6.Cook until Shrimp is pink and sauce has thickened.', '', '7. Toss with cooked, drained Pasta.', '', '8. Place on large serving plate and enjoy.']

title: Dreamy, Creamy Peanut Butter Frosting
ingredients: ['1 cup jiff creamy peanut butter', '8 tablespoons margarine, room temp', '2 cups confectioners' sugar', '3 -4 tablespoons milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla']
directions: ['Place peanut butter and margarine in a large mixing bowl. Blend with an elextric mixer on low speed until fluffy, 30 seconds.', 'Add confectioners sugar, 3 tablespoons milk and the vanilla.', 'Blend on low speed until the sugar is well combined, 1 minute.Increase the speed to medium and beat until the frosting lightens and is fluffy, 1 more minute. Blend in only 1 tablespoon at a time,extra milk if frosting seems to stiff, up to 2 tablespoons.']

title: Easy Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: ['1 cup butter, chopped', '1/2 cup evaporated milk', '1 cup granulated sugar', '2 lb Toblerone chocolate']
directions: ['Line an 8 inch cake pan with parchment paper, extending paper 3/4 inch over edges.', 'In a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan, combine butter, evaporated milk and sugar. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil for 4-5 mins, stirring constantly, until golden. Remove from heat. Add chocolate, stirring until completely melted and smooth. Transfer to prepared pan and chill overnight.', 'Set aside at room temperature for 30 mins then cut into squares. Store in an airtight container in the fridge.']

title: Zucchini And Eggs
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 small zucchini, sliced', '1 egg, beaten', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat a small skillet over medium heat. Pour in oil and saute zucchini until tender. Spread out zucchini in an even layer, and pour beaten egg evenly over top. Cook until egg is firm. Season with salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Pick me up smoothie
ingredients: ['3 cup brewed coffee of your choice', '1 1/2 cup milk', '2 tbsp sugar', '1 tsp vanilla extract', '1 banana']
directions: ['Pour all ingredients into blender and blend!', 'Add more of whatever to your liking.', 'Just render you can add but you can't take away!']

title: How To Prepare Egg Mask For Shiny Hair
ingredients: ['1 piece egg', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon honey']
directions: ['Separate one egg white in a bowl and add one teaspoon each of olive oil and honey', 'Beat them to make a paste and put it all over from root to tips.', 'After 20 minutes, rinse with shampoo.']

title: Red Summer Fruit Pudding
ingredients: ['1 C. sugar', 'Butter']
directions: ['Prepare fruit by removing any bad berries, etc. Remove crusts from bread. Butter the inside of a 3-pt. pudding basin then line the basin with the bread slices - do not leave any gaps (overlap if necessary.) Press the edges together so the bread forms a complete mold inside the bowl. Reserve about 1/2 lb. raspberries for decoration at end. Place remaining berries with sugar and lemon zest into saucepan. Bring the mixture to a gentle simmer until the sugar is dissolved and the fruits are releasing their juices - takes about 5 minutes - don't overcook as you want the fruits to keep their shapes. Reserve about 3/4 C. of the juice, then cool and refrigerate. Pour the remainder of the fruit into the pudding basin - seal the top completely with slices of bread. Cover the bread with a flat plate/saucer that fits snugly inside the basin, then weigh down the plate with a 3-lb. weight (very heavy can or jar will do.)Leave in fridge overnight, the weight will cause the juice to bleed through the bread, staining it red. Gently slide a flexible spatula between the bread and the basin to loosen. Invert the bowl onto a serving dish - it should slide easily into place. Add a few drops of red coloring to the 3/4 C. set aside fruit juice, and use this to gently coat any areas that still have a white tinge - pour remainder of juice over entire pudding. Put the reserved raspberries all around the bottom of the pudding. Serve with real whipped cream and a sprig of mint or vanilla ice cream (optional.).']

title: Pumpkin Bars
ingredients: ['1 c butter', '1/2 c sugar']
directions: ['cream butter and sugar'],['sugar'

title: Mandarin Orange Dessert Recipe

directions: ['Crush crackers, heat butter and mix with crackers and sugar.', 'Reserve 1 c. for top.', 'Press in 9x13 cake pan.', 'Mix together:']

title: Amarula Coffee

directions: ['Pour hot coffee into a cup and top up with Amarula Cream.', 'Garnish with grated milk chocolate.']

title: Amarula Dark Continent

directions: ['Pour coffee into mug or cup. Add Amarula Cream.', 'Garnish with shaved chocolate.']

title: Honey Mustard Wings
ingredients: ['12 chicken wings, separated at joints, tips discarded', '3/4 cup GREY POUPON Savory Honey Mustard, divided', '1/4 tsp. each salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 450F.', 'Toss chicken with 1/2 cup of the mustard.', 'Place in single layer in foil-lined 15x10x1-inch baking pan.', 'Sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through, brushing with the remaining 1/4 cup mustard during the last 5 minutes of the baking time.']

title: Baked Garlic
ingredients: ['1 pod garlic', 'butter']
directions: ['Place pod of garlic into piece of foil.', 'Cut top so you can get some butter into center area.', 'Close foil around it and bake at 350° for about 30 minutes.', 'Garlic will slip out of peeling when done.', 'Spread on hot buttered bread or mix with butter for great garlic butter.']

title: Homemade Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['1/2 sticks Butter, Softened', '1 bulb Roasted Garlic']
directions: ['Note: I did not include the garlic roasting time for this because I use Ree's how-to for roasting garlic, and all the info is there.', '1. Squeeze all the cloves out of your freshly-roasted garlic into a small dish, making sure to get as much of the olive oil and papery husks stuck to your hands as possible because cooking is supposed to be messy, right?', '2. Wash hands.', '3. Notice you missed a few cloves and get those suckers out too.', '4. Wash hands (again).', 'You should have between 8-12 cloves. Use more or less depending on how garlicky you want the butter.', 'Now, there's a couple ways you can go about doing this.', 'The first way is a great stress reliever and involves a lot of mashing the garlic with the butter in a small dish with a fork, spoon, spatula, or other instrument of smashing, and will probably take a lot longer than the 3 minutes I've suggested. The result is still yummy and very edible so if you don't have a mini food processor, this is probably the way you should do it.', 'The second way involves a mini food processor and is a lot easier and faster, but much less emotionally satisfying.', '5. Drop the garlic cloves into the mini food processor.', '6. Cut the butter into chunks and add to the processor.', '7. Pulse it a few times until you realize that loaf of bread you just cut a slice off of is whimpering and then just hold the button down until the butter and garlic are melded into deliciousness, about 30 - 45 seconds.', '8. Get a big smear on a knife and spread it on a piece of bread and enjoy while trying to figure out how to get every last bit out of the processor.', '9. Scrape the garlic butter into a small airtight container and store for up to 3-4 days (see below).', 'Note: I only say this because I wouldn't trust it past that point. To be honest, the first time I made this recipe, I only used 1/4 stick of butter and the resulting stuff was gone in less than 24 hours, so I don't know that storage would really be an issue.', '10. Take a chunk of bread and run it around inside the processor container to get the rest of the garlic butter you missed.', 'Things I've done with this garlic butter:', 'Spread on fresh French bread and eaten it.', 'Spread on fresh French bread, topped with shredded mozzarella cheese and toasted it in the oven.', 'Spread it on corn-tortilla cheese quesadillas fresh off the frying pan.', 'Spread it on corn-tortilla cheese quesadillas BEFORE putting it on the frying pan (be careful with this, the stuff burns easily).', 'Spread it on roasted potatoes.', 'Tossed it with steamed broccoli.', 'And that was just in the past 12 hours. I've run out now, time to make some more!']

title: Sauteed Zucchini With Onion And Garlic
ingredients: ['2 large zucchini, cut in half', '1 large onion, sliced', '4 Tbsp. butter', 'garlic powder']
directions: ['In skillet melt butter; add zucchini and onion.', 'Saute until tender.', 'Add garlic powder to taste.']

Spread the tuna mixture over one slice of bread and cover with the second slice. Place the sandwich in the toaster, close the lid, and cook for 3 minutes until browned.']

directions: ['Slice zucchini in half lengthwise; remove seeds.', 'Place chopped bacon, onion and tomatoes in hollows.', 'Season to taste. Place in 9-inch cake pan.', 'Bake for 45 minutes in 350° oven.', 'Cut each half zucchini in half and serve.']

title: Peanut Butter Ice Cream For The Ice Cream Maker
ingredients: ['1 cup Peanut Butter Creamy Or Crunchy', '3/4 cups Sugar', '1 cup Milk Whole Or Two Percent', '1-1/3 cup Heavy Whipping Cream', '2 teaspoons Vanilla Extract']
directions: ['Combine the peanut butter and sugar until smooth. Add the milk. Blend on low speed until smooth and the sugar is dissolved. Stir in the heavy cream and the vanilla (don't stir too much, just a few strokes until it's well mixed).', 'Place in your ice cream maker and let it run as directed. If it is soft, make sure you freeze it before eating - if you can wait!']

title: Eggy Bread And Bacon

directions: ['Brush the sandwich toaster with a little sunflower oil and preheat to its highest setting.', 'Pour the beaten egg onto a large dinner plate and soak the bread in the egg, turning it over until all the egg has been absorbed.', 'When the toaster is ready, place one slice of eggy bread on the bottom plate. Top with the bacon and spread over the ketchup (if using). Finish the sandwich by placing the second slice of eggy bread on top. Slowly close the lid of the toaster and cook for 3-4 minutes until crisp and golden.']

title: Baked Cherry Tomatoes

directions: ['Preheat oven to 250 degrees', 'Cover baking sheet with tin foil. Grease tin foil with olive oil.', 'Wash cherry tomatoes.', 'Cut tomatoes in half.', 'Place on baking sheet.', 'Bake for 2-4 hours, rotating every 30 to 45 minutes. The tomatoes will shrink and become sweet. If you bake for four hours they will become crisp.', 'Sprinkle with salt if using right away.', 'Freeze leftovers and enjoy in the middle of winter.']

title: Caramel

title: Easiest Baked Chicken

directions: ['Preheat oven to 350', 'Place chicken tenders on a greased cookie sheet.', 'Sprinkle top side with seasoning salt & pepper.', 'Bake for 15 minutes, take out, flip, add seasoning salt & pepper to other side.', 'Bake for another 15 minutes.']

title: Chicken
ingredients: ['chicken', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['First you have to kill the chicken.', 'Then you have to take the feathers off the chicken.', 'Now, you put the chicken in the oven for hours.', 'Cook at 25 degrees.', 'After the chicken is done, put salt and pepper on it and eat.']

title: Bourbon Bbq Wings

directions: ['1. Rinse chicken.', '2. Split wing at joint into two parts.', '3. Cut off the tip.', '4. Season each side with salt and pepper.', '5. Fry chicken in olive oil until golden brown.', '6. Remove chicken wings from pan. Place on paper towel to soak up excess oil.', '7. Place fried wings into barbeque sauce mixture. Mix well.', '8. To serve, remove wings from mixture and place on a plate.', '9. Pour BBQ sauce on top liberally.']

title: Garlicky Lemon Asparagus
ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic', '1 lemon', '1 1/4 pounds asparagus', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400°F.', 'Line a large baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Crush and finely mince the garlic.', 'Grate 1 teaspoon of lemon rind.', 'Trim the rough ends from the asparagus and arrange the spears on the baking sheet.', 'Drizzle the asparagus with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, minced garlic, and black pepper, to taste.', 'Roast for 10-12 minutes on middle rack of oven.', 'Remove the asparagus from the oven when it is tender.', 'Sprinkle the lemon rind over the asparagus.', 'Slice the lemon in half. Squeeze the juice of half a lemon over the asparagus. Serve immediately.']

directions: ['Trim carrots.', 'Place carrots in large saute pan.', 'Cover with cold water.', 'Add butter and sugar.', 'Cover pan with lid and bring to a boil.', 'Remove cover and simmer until water evaporates and sugar starts to caramelize and carrots are fork tender.']

title: Easy Chocolate Ice Cream with Only 2 Ingredients

directions: ['Finely break the chocolate into a bowl.', 'Warm the bowl over hot water.', 'Separate egg whites from egg yolks.', 'Beat the egg white until it forms stiff peaks.', 'When the chocolate melts completely, mix the yolks.', 'The bowl should remain heated over warm water.', 'Remove the bowl from warm water.', 'Add the beaten egg whites (from step 2) in 2 batches.', 'Mix the first batch well, and cut in the second batch.', 'When mixed fully, freeze to finish.', 'There's no need to mix while it's freezing.', 'If you prefer it lighter, use 4 egg whites, or add 100 ml of milk.']

title: Simple Tomato Sauce

Mix well.', 'Add crushed crackers and toss lightly to blend. Allow mixture to stand for 15 minutes.', 'Drop mixture by small teaspoon onto waxed paper.', 'Allow candies to firm before serving.']

title: The Bread (Ree Drummond/ Pioneer Woman)
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread, sliced lengthwise', '1 cup salted butter, Softened']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.', 'Spread one stick of softened butter on each half of the loaf (Thats one stick per half loaf.', 'Yes, you read that right.', 'The idea here is that every speck of the surface of the bread needs to be coated.', ').', 'Place on a cookie sheet and bake for 10 minutes, or until butter is melted and starting to soak into the bread.', 'Crank on broiler and broil bread for 3 to 5 minutes, watching the whole time.', 'Remove when butter has started to brown and blacken.', 'Dont under-broil it!', 'The flavor really kicks in when the butters color changes (The goal here is to broil the bread to the point that the butter becomes very dark brown and, in just a few areas, begins to burn.', 'When that happens, the flavor shows up.', 'If you dont take it to the next level, it will just be buttered, warm bread.', 'Which is fine, and all...but its not The Bread).', 'Slice into strips and serve immediately (When I serve this, I slice it on a cutting board into relatively thin (because its so rich) strips).']

I do not know where the name of this bread dish comes from, but it makes this dish sounds very appealing to kids.']

title: Garlic Honey Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice of bread', 'slice butter', '1 garlic clove']
directions: ['Toast the slice of bread (Although in the picture i chose not to because it was a fluffy onion flatbread)', 'Peel the garlic clove and rub it onto the toasted bread until the you've rubbed it on the whole surface.', '(If you didnt toast your bread skip this part)', 'Cut slices of butter to lay ontop of the bread', 'Chop the garlic you used to rub on the bread.', '(If the garlic rubbed off into a very small piece then grab another garlic clove. )', 'Spinkle the garlic ontop of the bread', 'Drizzle honey ontop for a sweet flavor', 'Enjoy and snap a picture/review if you all decide to try it!', ':)']

title: Garlic Butter Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices french bread', 'garlic salt Lawry's', '1 tablespoon butter']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees', 'Spread butter on the bread and bake for 1 minute', 'Sprinkle as much garlic salt as desired', 'Bake for another 5 minutes or until golden brown']

title: Garlic Bread
ingredients: ['melted butter', '1 Tbsp. crushed fresh garlic', '1 loaf bread, uncut']
directions: ['Cut bread crossways, but not completely through.', 'Add fresh garlic to melted butter; put in bread slices with a spoon or pastry brush.', 'Pour remaining mixture across top.', 'Wrap in aluminum foil. Bake 10 minutes at 400°.']

title: Fried Pork And Beans
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, chopped', '1 can pork and beans', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Brown onion in 2 tablespoons Crisco oil.', 'Add beans.', 'Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Cook over low heat for 10 minutes.']

title: Coco Caramel Sauce
ingredients: ['200 Coconut Milk', '100 Castor Sugar', '25 Salted butter']
directions:
['First and the most important step for this delicious sauce is to make a dry caramel. For this, put the sugar in a deep bowl and over the low flame on your gas range. Let the sugar melt slowly without touching it with any spoon or spatula ( Or this would crystallize and make your sugar all grainy). A perfect caramel would be golden and shiny in colour.', 'While the sugar is slowly transforming into caramel, take a small pan and heat up the coconut milk until warm ( Not boiling )', 'Once this is done, 'Whisk in' the warm milk to the caramel and let it cook slowly. Don't do this over high flame since this would turn your caramel bitter towards the end. ( This is the sauce reduction stage )', 'In approximately 10 mins after the sauce has been reducing, add in the butter and whisk it again. 
Keep whisking it time and again so that the sauce doesn't stick on the bottom of the pan while thickening.
Lastly, when you see that 1/2 of the sauce has been reduced, take it off the flame and let it cool. Don't reduce it any longer or else it would not remain in the desired sauce consistency. 
Enjoy it fresh or store it in glass containers for later use!']

title: Holiday Bread Dressing
ingredients: ['4 c. cubed bread', '1/4 c. chopped celery', '1 small onion, chopped', '1/4 tsp. salt', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Mix with 1/2 to 3/4 cup water ingredients listed.', 'Can be cooked alone in side dish or used to stuff poultry.', 'Cook until celery is tender and dish is browned, if cooked alone.']

title: Uncooked Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1 Tbsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. butter', '2 sq. chocolate', '3 c. oatmeal', '1 c. coconut']
directions: ['Drop by teaspoon on wax paper and put into refrigerator.'],['sugar'

title: Baked Brie And Sourdough Bread
ingredients: ['1 round loaf sourdough bread', '1 1/2 lb. Brie cheese', '2 cloves pressed garlic', '1/3 c. melted margarine']
directions: ['With a bread knife, cut a circle through the top of round loaf about 1-inch from edge.', 'Gently remove center portion of bread loaf, leaving a bowl-shaped bottom.', 'Cut removed center portion into 1/2-inch strips.']

title: Simple Ghee
ingredients: ['2 pounds unsalted butter', '1 pinch salt']
directions: ['Melt butter in a large skillet over low heat until butter starts to foam and boil, about 10 minutes. Push the foam to the side, without stirring, to see if butter is clear, bright, and golden.', 'Remove skillet from heat and add salt; cool for about 2 minutes.', 'Pour butter through a fine-mesh strainer or cheesecloth to remove foam and particles into a glass container. Ghee will thicken and turn slightly translucent. Store in refrigerator.']

title: Microwave-Steamed Zucchini
ingredients: ['1 large zucchini', 'butter-flavored cooking spray', 'salt & pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Slice zucchini lenth-wise, not cutting all the way to the bottom.', 'Open slightly and spray interior with butter.', 'Sprinkle interior with salt and pepper.', 'Wrap in plastic wrap and place in microwave. Microwave for 5 minutes on high power.', 'Let stand for two minutes, remove, and cut in wedges.', 'Voila.']

title: Grilled Zucchini I
ingredients: ['1 large zucchini', '4 tablespoons butter', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat grill to medium high heat.', 'Clean outer skin of zucchini, and slice lengthwise into quarters.', 'Place a pat of butter or margarine on each zucchini quarter, and season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Wrap all four quarters in one piece of aluminum foil.', 'Place foil wrapped zucchini on heated grill, and cook for 10 to 15 minutes on each side.']

title: Garlic Butter Sauce
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '1 garlic clove, minced', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Microwave all ingredients in a microwave-safe measuring cup on high for 30 seconds; stir.', 'Continue to microwave on high, stirring at 15 second intervals, until butter is melted.']

title: Multgrain Earthbalnce Salt Toast
ingredients: ['1.5 - 2 tsp Earth Balnce 'butter'', 'Dash of salt', '1 piece gluten free multigrain bread']
directions: ['Toast gluten free multigrain bread. Spread Earth Balnce 'butter'. And dash on salt.']

title: Caramel King
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 c. evaporated milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Brown 1/4 cup of the 3 cups of sugar.', 'Mix milk and remaining sugar.', 'Bring to a slow boil.', 'Add brown syrup slowly.', 'Bring to a boil and cook until it forms a hard ball in water.', 'Beat; add butter and flavoring.']

title: Tomato Pudding To Eat With Beans
ingredients: ['1 pt. canned tomatoes', '3 slices bread, crumbled', '1/2 c. sugar', '5 small slices butter']
directions: ['Cook', 'in', 'small pan in microwave on High for 8 minutes, stirring in between, until bubbly through.']

title: Onion Bread
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread, sliced', '1 stick butter', '1 large onion, diced']
directions: ['Melt butter.', 'Add onion to butter and cook in microwave until tender, 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Spoon on French bread between slices. Wrap in foil.', 'Warm in oven 10 to 15 minutes.']

title: Cream Of Broccoli Soup
ingredients: ['1 pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, partially thawed', '1 envelope Lipton chicken noodle soup', '3 1/2 c. milk']
directions: ['Combine and cook gently until done.', 'Add 8 ounces shredded cheese with 1 tablespoon flour.', 'Simmer and serve.']

title: B~B~Q Tomato
ingredients: ['1 whole tomato', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Cut 1/2 way in the tomato in several spots. Wrap in aluminum foil. Cut butter and place in foil also. Wrap good and cook until tender.'],['tomato'

title: Creamy Avocado Tuna Salad
ingredients: ['2 avocado', '1 can tuna flakes in water', '3 tomatoes', '1 large onion', '1 black pepper to taste', '1 juice from 1 small lemon']
directions: ['Chop onions and tomatoes.', 'Drain water from tuna and mix with onion and tomatoes', 'Sprinkle with black pepper', 'Chop avocado and add to tuna mixture.', 'Don't worry about stirring too much', 'Lightly drizzle lemon juice over the salad and top with more black pepper', 'Enjoy with warm wholewheat bread or alone!']

title: Sausage Casserole
ingredients: ['1 to 2 lb. browned pork sausage, drained', '1 1/2 to 2 c. boiled white instant rice', '1 bag boiled broccoli']
directions: ['Cook all ingredients at the same time individually.', 'In a casserole dish, layer sausage, rice and broccoli.', 'Top off with Velveeta cheese.', 'Microwave until cheese melts.']

title: Smoked Whole Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat your smoker to 250. Feel free to experiment with wood chips. I like apple, hickory, or maple.', 'Remove the organs from the chicken if they are present. Rub the outside with the salt and pepper (no oil needed, the skin provides that).', 'Place breast side down in your smoker and smoke 3-5 hours or until internal temperature reaches 165.', 'Allow to rest at least 15 minutes before carving to improve moistness.']

title: Crispy Fried Chicken Thighs
ingredients: ['2 Chicken thighs', '1 tsp Salt', '1 Black pepper']
directions: ['Salt and pepper both sides of the chicken thighs.', 'For an even slab of meat, cut off the excess.', 'Heat a little vegetable oil in a frying pan (if using a Teflon pan, you don't need any).', 'On low-medium heat, cook the chicken from Step 1 with the skin side down.', 'It's OK if the pan isn't hot yet.', 'Place a plate over the chicken and put a 2 liter kettle (or something similar) on top and cook for 6-7 minutes.', 'Check to see if the chicken has browned, then turn the pieces over.', 'Pat excess oil with paper towels.', 'Saute the chicken on the other side for 2-3 minutes until the meat becomes plump.', 'Once the chicken has finished cooking, cut into bite-sized pieces and serve on a plate.', 'This shows the chicken as a sandwich filling.']

title: Herb Tomato Grilled Chicken Recipe
ingredients: ['1 chicken, 3 to 3 1/2 lbs., cut up', 'Dash of salt', 'Dash of black pepper']
directions: ['1.', 'Cut off excess fat from chicken pcs.', 'Loosen the skin way from the meat (this helps the basting sauce to reach the meat underneath).', '2.', 'Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper.', '3.', 'Mix together and blend well the oil, tomato ketchup or possibly chili sauce, wine or possibly lemon juice, the garlic and the herbs used.', '4.', 'Place chicken pcs on rack.', 'Brush on both sides with basting sauce.', '5.', 'Grill chicken for 12 to 15 min on one side, brushing with basting sauce from time to time.', '6.', 'Turn chicken over.', 'Brush again with sauce.', '7.', 'Grill chicken for another 12 to 15 min or possibly till chicken is done and juices run clear when pierced with fork.', 'Preparation time: 15 min.', 'Cooking time: 30 min.', 'TIPS: Fresh minced parsley can be substituted for fresh basil.', 'You may marinate the chicken pcs in the sauce before grilling.']

title: Sharon'S Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['3 lb. tomatoes', '1 stick real butter', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 tsp. salt', 'pinch of sugar']
directions: ['Cook tomatoes and butter for 15 minutes.', 'Run through foley mill.', 'Add onion, salt and sugar.', 'Cook 45 to 60 minutes.', 'Put in pint containers and freeze.', 'Makes 1 quart.']

title: Cauliflower Puree
ingredients: ['salt to taste', '1 head cauliflower, cut into florets', '1 tablespoon butter']
directions: ['Bring a 4-quart pot of salted water to a boil; add cauliflower and simmer until tender, 7 to 10 minutes. Drain cauliflower, reserving 1 cup cooking liquid.', 'Blend cauliflower and 1/4 cup cooking liquid in a blender until smooth, adding more water until desired consistency is reached. Add butter and pulse until incorporated; season with salt.']

title: Navy Carrots
ingredients: ['1 lb. carrots', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1 small onion', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut carrots into long strips, julienne style.', 'Add sugar to water and boil carrots for 15 minutes.', 'Saute onion in butter and place in baking dish.', 'Add carrots and salt and pepper to taste. Bake at 400° until tender.']

title: Boiled Spinach
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs spinach, trimmed,rinsed and patted dry', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Place spinach in a large pot of boiling water.', 'Cook 3-5 minutes .', 'Then drain.', 'Place in serving dish and sprinkle with salt and dot with butter.']

title: Orange Dessert
ingredients: ['1 to 2 stacks Ritz crackers, crushed', '3/4 stick butter', '1/4 c. sugar']
directions: ['Mix and save 1/2 cup mixture for topping. Place remaining mixture in bottom of 9 x 13 glass dish for crust.'],['crackers'

title: My Favorite Snack:  Pumpkin Seeds
ingredients: ['a pumpkin', 'butter', 'salt']
directions: ['Clean off the seeds.', 'Get an oiled pan and put butter on it. Put the seeds on and put them in the oven for about 20 minutes. Take them out, let them cool, put salt on it and eat.']

title: Peppered Shrimp
ingredients: ['1/4 cup butter', '1 lb shrimp', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon garlic', '1 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.', 'In a glass baking dish, melt the butter in the oven.', 'Remove the dish from the oven and add the salt, garlic and black pepper.', 'Meanwhile, wash the shrimp, leaving the shells on.', 'Add the shrimp to the butter mixture and stir well to coat.', 'Bake for 15-18 minutes.']

title: Skirlie (Scottish Oatmeal Stuffing)
ingredients: ['50 g butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', '175 g oatmeal', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Melt the butter and gently fry the onion until soft.', 'Stir in the oatmeal, season and cook gently for 10 minutes.']

title: Chocolate Icing
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '4 to 4 1/2 Tbsp. chocolate', '1 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients together in saucepan and bring to a boil.', 'Boil for exactly 2 minutes.', 'Cool thoroughly.', 'Beat for 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Spread on cake.']

title: Quick Coffee Ice Cream
ingredients: ['4 cups milk', '2 cups sugar', '3 cups cold strong brewed coffee', '1 pint heavy whipping cream', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a Dutch oven, heat milk to 175°. Stir in sugar until dissolved; cool. Transfer to a 3-qt. freezer container. Stir in the coffee, cream and vanilla. Cover and freeze for 4-5 hours or until mixture is slushy. Beat with an electric mixer until smooth. Freeze until firm. Remove from the freezer 30 minutes before serving.']

title: Baked Sweet PotatoSimple but Simply Nutritious.
ingredients: ['1 small sweet potato, scrubbed', '1 tablespoon butter, at room temperature', 'Light sprinkle of salt']
directions: ['Jab the sweet potato a few times with the tines of a fork.', 'Wrap in a paper towel and cook in a microwave oven at full power until soft, 4 to 5 minutes.', 'Remove to a plate, cut open lengthwise, add the butter and salt, and enjoy while still hot.']

title: Potato-Onion Patties
ingredients: ['1 medium boiled potato', '2 tbsp very finely diced onion', '1 tsp garlic powder', 'Salt & pepper to taste', '1/4 cube melted butter']
directions: ['Put all ingredients into bowl of Kitchen Aid and then beat at #4 until a smooth paste is formed.', 'Add more butter if too thick.', '', 'Put into a piping bag (or a heavy plastic bag with the corner cut off) and pip ont a baking tray, round and flat. They should be about one or two bites big.', '', 'Bake at 350 degrees until the tops are golden brown.', '', 'Serve with sour cream and chives dip, or any dip that you may prefer.']

title: Massively Kid Friendly Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['1 28 oz can organic crushed tomatoes', '1 Onion, peeled and halved', '5 tablespoons Salted butter', '1 Medium carrot, roughly chopped']
directions: ['Add everything to a medium sauce pan and heat over medium to a boil then reduce and simmer for about 45 minutes until texture is thick.', 'Remove onion and pulse sauce in a blender until smooth.']

title: Baby Zucchini Boats
ingredients: ['8 small zucchini, cut in half lengthwise', '1 medium onion, cut into rings', '3 tablespoons melted butter', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped']
directions: ['Have a pot of lightly salted water boiling.', 'Meanwhile saute onion rings in a tbsp of butter until limp.', 'Remove and keep warm.', 'Drop the zucchinis in the boiling water for only about 2-3 minutes.', 'You want the zucchini to be warmed through but still crisp.', 'Lightly brown the garlic in the remaining butter.', 'Place zucchini on a platter, top with sauteed onion and drizzle with the garlic butter.']

title: Easy White Coffee Icing
ingredients: ['2 cups sifted confectioners' sugar', '1/4 cup soft butter', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '3 tablespoons cool brewed coffee']
directions: ['Cream the confectioners' sugar and butter for about a minute.', 'Add and beat until smooth: the salt, vanilla, and coffee.']

title: Chocolate Mounds
ingredients: ['2 sticks Margarine', '2 1/2 c. Nuts', '2 1/2 boxes Powdered Sugar', '2 14 oz. packages Coconut', '1 can Sweetened Condensed Milk', '1 Tbsp. Vanilla']
directions: ['Mix above ingredients. Shape into balls. Chill in refrigerator for 30 minutes.'],['sugar'

title: Sunday Chicken
ingredients: ['3 lb. frying chicken, cut in pieces', 'margarine']
directions: ['Brown chicken in margarine and place in a covered casserole, skin side up.']

title: Graham Cracker Treats
ingredients: ['1/3 box honey graham crackers', '1 stick margarine', '1 stick real butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 c. finely chopped nuts']
directions: ['Separate crackers and arrange on bottom of a long cookie sheet.', 'Melt margarine and real butter; add sugar and cook 2 minutes.', 'Pour over crackers and sprinkle with nuts.', 'Bake for 10 minutes at 325°.']

title: Waverlies
ingredients: ['1 stick margarine', '1 stick real butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Bring to boil the margarine, butter and sugar for 3 minutes. Remove from heat and add vanilla and nuts.', 'Have cookie sheet lined with Waverly crackers and quickly drizzle mixture over crackers.', 'Work quickly.', 'Bake 7 to 8 minutes at 300°.', 'Watch closely and do not burn.']

title: Toffee Bars
ingredients: ['48 to 52 graham crackers', '1 stick margarine', '1 stick butter', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Line jelly roll pan with crackers.', 'Melt margarine and butter. Add sugar; bring to a rolling boil for 2 minutes.', 'Pour mixture over crackers in pan.', 'Spread to cover all crackers.', 'Sprinkle with nuts, if desired.', 'Bake 8 to 10 minutes.', 'Remove from oven.', 'Allow to cool slightly (10 to 15 seconds).', 'Remove bars from pan and place on foil.', 'Allow to cool completely.']

title: Zucchini Provencale
ingredients: ['zucchini', '1 onion, chopped', '1 can tomatoes', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Wash zucchini.', 'Do not remove skin.', 'Cut into small slices and cook in small amount of water until tender, about 5 minutes.']

title: Dairy-Free Hot Chocolate Pudding
ingredients: ['1 Egg, Separated', '35 grams Dairy Free Chocolate', '12 grams Caster Sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 200°C (390°F). Brush a ramekin with a little olive oil.', 'Whisk egg white until soft peaks form.', 'Melt chocolate in the microwave or in small bowl over a saucepan of water. Stir in caster sugar and egg yolk. Carefully fold in the egg white.', 'Spoon into the ramekin and bake in the centre of the oven for 12-15 minutes.']

title: Bananas On Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1/2 tablespoon butter', '1 banana']
directions: ['Slice banana.', 'Toast and butter bread.', 'Place banana over each slice of toast.']

title: BAKER'S Chocolate Glaze
ingredients: ['8 oz. Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate, chopped', '4 Tbsp. each: softened butter and water']
directions: ['MELT chocolate in microwave on MEDIUM heat for 2 1/2 minutes.', 'Stir until smooth.', 'ADD softened butter and water and mix until fully incorporated and smooth.', 'COOL 5 minutes and pour over 9 inch round cake; spread over top and sides.']

title: Havasu Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['3 heaping c. sugar', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1/8 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 stick butter', '5 heaping Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Bring all ingredients, except peanut butter, to a boil until soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat.', 'Add the peanut butter; use wooden spoon.', 'Place pan in cold water and beat 1 minute.']

title: Sinful Hot Chocolate
ingredients: ['1 ounce dark chocolate, at least 70% cocoa, broken into small pieces', '1 tablespoon sugar', '6 ounces milk']
directions: ['No need to crush the chocolate; I just break it up over the mug I am going to use.', 'Add the sugar and milk.', 'Microwave for about 3 minutes', 'Stir or whisk, add a topping, and enjoy!', 'You can also make this is larger batches on the stove.']

title: Sue'S Graham Crackers
ingredients: ['1 stick butter', '1 stick margarine', '1 c. sugar', '1 c. fine nuts']
directions: ['Line cookie sheet with graham crackers.', 'Bring margarine, butter and sugar to a boil.', 'Remove from heat and add chopped nuts. Spread over graham crackers and cook at 300° for 12 minutes. Remove from oven and put on wax paper.', 'Cool and eat.']

title: Old Fashion Sauce(Cake Topping)
ingredients: ['1 c. sugar', '1/2 stick butter', '1/2 c. evaporated milk', 'pinch of salt']
directions: ['Mix together. Boil to soft-ball stage.'],['sugar'

title: Calorie On A Ritz
ingredients: ['1 stick 'real' butter', '1 stick margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '40 Ritz crackers', 'chopped nuts']
directions: ['Mix first three ingredients.', 'Let come to a boil.', 'Boil hard for three minutes.', 'Have Ritz crackers placed on a cookie sheet. Pour mixture over crackers.', 'Take a spoon and make sure mixture is spread well on crackers.', 'Put chopped nuts on top of crackers. (Nuts are to be chopped fine.) Put in a 300° oven and bake 10 minutes (preheat oven).', 'Remove from oven and place on aluminum foil until cool.']

title: Fluffy French Toast
ingredients: ['2 slice Sliced bread', '170 ml Milk', '1 Egg', '20 grams Sugar', '1 tbsp Margarine', '1 Vanilla extract']
directions: ['Gather the ingredients: 2 slices of bread, egg, milk, sugar, margarine, and some vanilla extract if you have it.', 'Combine the egg, sugar, and milk in a bowl with a whisk.', 'Mix in the vanilla last to add a nice aroma if you have it.', 'Strain the egg mixture into a tray.', 'If you don't have a strainer, then you can just use the egg mixture as is.', 'Cut each bread slice into four and soak the pieces in the egg mixture.', 'When about half of the mixture has been soaked up, flip the slices over.', 'Please wait until all of the visible egg mixture has been soaked up.', 'Melt the butter in a frying pan at medium heat.', 'Spread the butter over the entire surface of the pan.', 'Gently arrange the bread slices in the pan.', 'Adjusting the heat as necessary, cook until both sides of the bread are browned.', 'Top with powdered sugar and maple syrup and enjoy.']

title: Green Rice
ingredients: ['1 pkg. frozen chopped spinach', '1 pkg. frozen chopped broccoli', '1 c. rice, cooked', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Cook spinach and broccoli.', 'Cook rice separately; then mix all together with the butter.', 'Pack mixture into well greased mold in pan of boiling water.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. Turn mold upside down onto plate to serve rice ring.']

title: Rusk Made from Sliced Bread in 5 Minutes
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '10 grams Butter', '1 tbsp Sugar']
directions: ['Cut the bread in half.', 'Then cut into 1 cm bite-sized pieces.', 'Melt the butter in a warm frying pan, then add the bread and fry.', 'The butter is easily absorbed by the bread, so stir together quickly.', 'Fry 1-2 minutes until both sides are crispy, then sprinkle on the sugar and mix.', 'It's done when the sugar turns a nice golden brown.']

title: Made in 5 Minutes! Seriously Delicious Rusks
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '10 grams Butter', '1 tbsp Sugar']
directions: ['Cut the slice of bread into cubes.', 'I cut it into 36 cubes.', 'Place in a dish and microwave at 800W for 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Give it a stir and microwave for another 30 seconds.', 'Meanwhile, heat the butter in a frying pan.', 'Once the butter begins to melt, add the bread and absorb the butter.', 'Add the sugar and brown the surfaces.', 'Once slightly browned, move to a dish and enjoy.']

title: Butter And Sugar Breakfast Toast
ingredients: ['4 slice bread', '2 tbsp soft butter', '2 tbsp sugar']
directions: ['spread generously any bread of your preferences with soft butter then toast it', 'springkle sugar top covering bread generously and enjoy', 'BELOW,ARE FEW OF MY BREAD RECIPES, I AM GLAD TO SHARE WITH YOU']

title: Leslie's Microwave Broccoli
ingredients: ['4 cups broccoli', '1 dash salt', '3 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Place broccoli in Nordicware microwave steam dish with water.', 'Microwave for 5 minutes.', 'Melt 3 tbsp butter and pour over with dash of salt.', 'stir.']

title: Peanut Butter Preacher Cookies
ingredients: ['1 stick butter', '2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '3 c. quick cooking oatmeal', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Place butter, sugar and milk in 2-quart pan. Bring to a full rolling boil. Remove from heat. Let set 1 minute. Add peanut butter, oatmeal and vanilla. Beat until it begins to stiffen. Drop on waxed paper.']

title: Pineapple Whip Ice Cream
ingredients: ['2 qt. half and half milk', '2 c. sugar', '2 c. crushed pineapple, drain', '2 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix well in order given.', 'Can use other fruit if desired instead of the pineapple.', 'Freeze in the ice cream freezer. Makes about a gallon.']

title: Goat'S Cheese, Avocado And Smoked Salmon Sandwiches
ingredients: ['100 g smoked salmon', '1 avocado, sliced', '80 -100 g goat cheese', '6 slices bread']
directions: ['Spread the slices of bread with the cheese.', 'Put the salmon on the goat's cheese.', 'Cover with slices of avocado.']

title: Sauteed Broccoli
ingredients: ['1 head broccoli', '3 tablespoons butter', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.', 'Remove the broccoli florets.', 'Trim the stalk and cut it into pieces.', 'Blanch the broccoli for 3 to 7 minutes.', 'Test to see if it is done after 3 minutes.', 'Shock broccoli in ice water when it is done.', 'Heat a skillet and add the butter.', 'Add broccoli.', 'Toss to coat and heat, then season with salt and pepper to taste.']

title: Steamed Broccoli With Butter
ingredients: ['4 bunches broccoli', '1/4 pound butter', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Trim bottom inch off broccoli stalks and discard.', 'Cut each stalk crosswise into 3 pieces.', 'Cut topmost piece of each stalk into small flowerets.', 'Cut remaining pieces into fine julienne.', 'Put all into cold water for at least 1/2 hour to refresh them.', 'Bring suitably large steamer of water to boil, add all broccoli and steam, covered, for 5 minutes, tossing from top to bottom a few times.', 'When just barely tender, remove to collander, spray liberally with cold water and drain.', 'When ready to serve, melt butter in skillet and toss broccoli with salt and pepper to taste, until heated through.']

title: Homemade Croutons
ingredients: ['1 loaf French bread, sliced 1/4-inch thick', 'butter', 'garlic powder']
directions: ['Spread butter evenly on bread slices, taking to edges of bread. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cut into cubes. Bake at 350° until crispy. Store in airtight bags. Will keep for several days.']

title: Elephant Garlic Bread
ingredients: ['16 elephant garlic cloves', '1 loaf French bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Seperate the cloves and brush off any dirt. Leaving the skins on, place the garlic on a small baking sheet and bake for 1/2 hour. Remove the garlic fromthe oven and cool slightly. The garlic will be crisp on the outside and creamy soft inside.', 'Cut through a fresh, French loaf and butter the slices. Crack open the garlic skins and squeeze out the creamy insides, spreading liberally on the bread slices.', 'Serve as an accompaniment to almost any pasta or seafood dish, or by itself!']

title: French Bread With Garlic
ingredients: ['1 loaf of French bread', 'Butter, to taste', '2 garlic cloves', 'Salt, to taste']
directions: ['Heat oven to 400° F or a grill to medium-high. Slice French loaf in half lengthwise. Spread the halves with butter. Mince garlic cloves; sprinkle over the buttered bread. Add salt to taste. Put the halves together, wrap in foil, and place in oven or on a grill. Heat until the bread is golden, 15 to 20 minutes.']

title: Zucchini Coins Recipe
ingredients: ['2 small zucchini', 'Butter', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cut each zucchini into 1/8-inch-thick coins. Steam over boiling water until just tender, about 2 minutes. Toss with butter and salt and pepper.']

title: Zucchini With Sun-Dried Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 medium zucchini', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 garlic clove, minced', '2 tablespoons sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, coarsly chopped', '1/4 teaspoon salt, to taste']
directions: ['Cut zucchini into 1/2 inch rounds, then cut each round into quarters (you should have about 2 cups).', 'Melt butter in nonstick pan and add zucchini.', 'Saute zucchini, stirring often, about 3 minutes.', 'Add garlic and saute for 1 minute.', 'Add tomatoes and continue to saute, stirring often, for about 2 more minutes.', 'Toss with salt and serve.']

title: Crispy Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['chicken pieces', 'melted margarine', 'finely crushed equal parts crackers and cornflakes', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Dip raw pieces of chicken', 'into', 'melted margarine, then roll in crumbs.', 'Place in well oiled, 9 x 13-inch baking dish, laying pieces side by side, not', 'crowding.', 'Sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Bake at 350° for an hour', 'or', 'until meat is brown and tender.']

title: Garden Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 tomatoes', '1 cucumber', '1 onion', '2 slices bread', '1 teaspoon mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon peanut butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Simply one slice bread with peanut butter, then layer of onions(sliced thin) then the cucumber (sliced thin, then the tomato (sliced thin) season with salt and pepper then cover with slice of bread with mayo on it.', 'Slice in toast corners for ease of eating.', 'Trust me it is yummi.']

title: Steamed Broccoli
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lbs broccoli', 'salt and pepper', '3 tablespoons butter', '1/2 lemon, juice of']
directions: ['Trim the broccoli into large florets.', 'Place the broccoli in a steaming basket over boiling water; cover and steam for 3 minutes.', 'Remove the lid for a moment, then cook, partially covered, until the stems are tender-firm, another 8-10 minutes.', 'Remove to a platter; season with salt and pepper, the butter, and the lemon juice.']

title: Honey Peanut Butter Spread
ingredients: ['5 Tablespoons Natural Peanut Butter', '5 Tablespoons Good Quality Honey']
directions: ['Measure peanut butter into small Mason jar and microwave for 30 seconds (or heat it on the stove top just until it softens). Measure honey into the same container. Stir well.'],['honey'

title: Honey Butter
ingredients: ['honey', 'butter, softened']
directions: ['Place butter in a bowl; add honey a little at a time, stirring until syrupy looking.', 'Great on fresh hot rolls.']

title: Honey Butter With Toast
ingredients: ['1 stick of semisoft butter', '3 tablespoons clover honey']
directions: ['mash butter into a small bowl with honey. spread on toast for a sweet treat for breakfast.'],['honey'

title: start your day sweet
ingredients: ['1 loaf whole grain bread', '3 tbsp honey', '1 tbsp unsalted butter']
directions: ['Slice the bread', 'Spread the butter first then honey', 'Add bananas if you desire', ''Close' and toast!', 'Goes well with a cup of fresh cold juice Enjoy :)']

title: Chocolate-Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 stick butter', '1/2 c. milk', '3 tsp. chocolate', '1/2 c. peanut butter', '3 c. oatmeal']
directions: ['Mix sugar, butter, milk and chocolate in saucepan.', 'Cook on medium heat until comes to a vigorous boil.', 'Let boil 1 minute. Remove from stove.', 'Add peanut butter and oatmeal.', 'Mix well.', 'Drop on wax paper until cool.']

title: Boiled Oatmeal Cookies With Peanut Butter
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 c. milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 c. quick oatmeal', '1/2 c. nuts', '1/2 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Bring the first 4 ingredients to a boil and boil for a few minutes.', 'Stir to avoid burning. Add the oatmeal, nuts and peanut butter. Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper.']

title: White House Cheese Rings
ingredients: ['1 lb. grated sharp cheese', '1 c. finely chopped nuts', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 small onion, finely grated', 'dash of black pepper']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients and season with pepper, mix well and place in lightly greased mold.', 'Chill until firm.', 'Serve with crackers.']

title: One Minute Caramel Icing
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1/2 stick butter', '1/2 c. milk', '1/2 tsp. vanilla', 'pinch of salt']
directions: ['Put 1/2 cup sugar in black skillet and heat until it melts. Heat 1 1/2 cups sugar, butter and milk.', 'When hot, add the sugar you have melted and cook for 1 minute after it begins to boil. Remove from heat.', 'Add vanilla and salt.', 'Beat until smooth enough to go on cool cake.']

title: Fillet Steak With Onion And Red Wine Sauce And Mashed Potatoes Recipe
ingredients: ['sea salt', '1 pinch sugar', '1 tablespoon butter']
directions:
['Put out your steak from the fridge go allow time to get close to room temperature.', 'Sauce:
Slice your onions thin and in a large pre heated pan add your oil and start to fry your onions with rosemary, salt and peppers until golden. Now it is time to add your wine and stir. When the when your red wine is reduced dissolve your cornstarch in cold water and add to your sauce and stir well. Add your butter and sugar. When it is reduced your sauce is ready.', 'Mashed potatoes: 
Now it is time to boil your potatoes. Peel and cut your potatoes in medium sized cubes and set them to boil in a pan with salt, black and white pepper and butter. 
After about 25-30 minutes your potatoes are ready to be mashed. Test them if they are soft (stick a knife in a potato and if it glides off it is ready). Now add your warm milk, butter, grated nutmeg (optional) and mash with your masker. Taste and seasoning if needed.', 'Steak:
For your steak, season with black pepper, sea salt, white pepper and coat with oil. Heat your pan on high temperature and seal your steak form all the sides. Then make your steak as you like it (blue, rare, medium, done) If you want your steak done or medium you can put it in a oven for some time for it to cook properly on your pan on low heat for about 15 minutes. I like my steak medium-rare so that is about 4 minutes on each side.', 'Plate your food and enjoy.']

title: Tomatoes
ingredients: ['tomatoes', 'salt', 'sugar']
directions: ['Peel', 'and', 'cut', 'tomatoes in quarters.', 'Stuff in jars in their own', 'juice', 'and', 'add', '1', 'teaspoon', 'salt per quart and 1 teaspoon sugar per quart.', 'Seal and bake on a cookie sheet for 1 hour and 10 minutes at 250°.', 'Let cool in oven.']

title: 3-2-1 Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['3 pounds confectioners' sugar', '2 pounds peanut butter', '1 pound butter, melted']
directions: ['Line a baking sheet with waxed paper.', 'Mix confectioners' sugar and peanut butter together in a large bowl until evenly mixed and crumbly. Pour butter into peanut butter mixture and stir to combine.', 'Press peanut butter mixture onto the prepared baking sheet and cool to room temperature.']

title: Sweet Cinnamon Rice
ingredients: ['1 c. rice', '1 1/2 c. milk', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 stick butter', '1/2 tsp. salt']
directions: ['Cover rice with water good.', 'Put on low flame with lid (watch it so it doesn't boil over).', 'After the water cooks down a lot, turn fire out.', 'Leave lid a little ajar.', 'When ready to fix, add milk, butter, salt, vanilla and sugar.', 'Mix in bowl.', 'Sprinkle with sugar/cinnamon.']

title: Delicious Hot Chocolate Sauce Recipe
ingredients: ['1/2 c. butter', '3 c. sugar', '1 2/3 c. evaporated lowfat milk', '4 squares unsweetened chocolate', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Heat butter and chocolate in double boiler.', 'Stir in sugar gradually making sure which sugar is moistened before adding more.', 'Mix becomes thick and quite dry.', 'Add in salt.', 'Slowly stir in lowfat milk, a little at a time.', 'Serve hot.', 'Store in small jars and reheat in the jars before serving.']

title: Butter Flavored Olive Oil Crock Pot Baked Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 Butter Flavored Olive Oil', '1 Pepper']
directions: ['Scrub up potatoes, poke each potato with sharp knife a few times.', 'Place potatoes on foil and add a splash of Butter Flavored Olive Oil with a dash of pepper to your liking.', 'If you really want the inside buttery, cut a line down the middle of the potato & pour some oil into the center before wrapping it up.', 'If you don't have Butter flavored oil available in your area you can substitute with regular olive oil or any flavored olive oil you choose.', 'Wrap those babies up nice & tight so they can simmer in the buttery goodness.', 'Cook Low 6-8 hours or High 4-5 hours.', 'These hot potatoes will be scrumptious right out of the foil & won't need any extra butter added when served.', 'But I won't judge if you do add some ;)']

title: Crunchy Apple Rings
ingredients: ['1 apple, cored, cut crosswise into 6 rings Safeway 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09', '2 Tbsp. Kraft Smooth Peanut Butter', '1/4 cup honey-flavoured multi-grain cereal flakes with oat clusters and peaches']
directions: ['Spread one side of each apple ring evenly with peanut butter.', 'Sprinkle with cereal.']

title: 3-Ingredient Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['28 ounces, weight Crushed Tomatoes', '5 Tablespoons Butter', '1 Onion, Halved And Ends Cut Off, Outer Skin Removed']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a large sauce pan and place over medium heat. Bring the sauce to a simmer, stirring occasionally, and then lower the heat so the sauce is barely simmering. Simmer for an additional 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove the sauce from heat and then discard the onion.', '(Adapted from Smitten Kitchen.)']

title: Easy Glazed Carrots Recipe
ingredients: ['1 pound carrots, sliced', '2 tbsp. butter', '2 tbsp. honey']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Place in a microwave dish.', 'Microwave on high till vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.', 'About 10 to 12 min.']

title: Double Pork Sausage
ingredients: ['8 pork breakfast sausages', '4 slices bacon, cut crosswise in half']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 450F with a rack in the upper third position.', 'Put a small baking sheet in the oven to preheat for 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, wrap 1 piece of bacon around the middle of each sausage.', 'Arrange the wrapped sausages seam side down on the heated baking sheet and cook for 20 minutes, or until the sausages are cooked through and the bacon is gold and crisp on the edges.', 'Drain on paper towels and serve.']

title: Homemade Whipped Cream Topping
