ingredients: ['16 ounces, fluid Whipping Cream', '1 Tablespoon Vanilla', '1/2 cups Granulated Sugar']
directions: ['Place all ingredients in a mixing bowl and whip at low speed for 30 seconds, then at high speed until soft peaks form. Serve over your favorite dessert item. Enjoy!']

title: Milkshakes
ingredients: ['1 cup milk', '1 pint ice cream', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Put all ingredients in a blender.', 'Mix for a minute or until well blended.', 'Pour and serve.']

title: Cracker Barrel Baby Carrots
ingredients: ['2 lbs fresh baby carrots', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Rinse carrots and put in a sauce pan, pouring enough water in pan to just cover the top of the carrots.', 'Cover carrots and bring to a boil over medium heat.', 'Turn heat to low and simmer about 30 minutes til tender when pierced with a fork.', 'When carrots are tender pour off half to three fourths of the water.', 'Stir in the rest of the ingredients.']

title: Shiny and Sweet Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['1/2 Carrot', '1 tbsp Butter', '2 tsp Granulated sugar', '1 Salt']
directions: ['Slice the carrot.', 'Shave the sharp edges off the carrot slices.', 'Put the slices in a pan with just enough water to cover.', 'Add the ingredients, and simmer until there's no liquid left in the pan.', 'Keep an eye on it so that it doesn't burn.', 'The surfaces of the carrots should become slightly candied.']

title: Auline'S Icing
ingredients: ['2 c. sugar', '1 1/2 sticks butter', '1 1/2 c. evaporated milk', '1 c. chopped nuts', '1 c. coconut']
directions: ['Boil sugar, butter and milk until thick.', 'It will get bubbly and change colors when thick.', 'Add nuts and coconut; stir well.']

title: Beer Onions
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 large onion, sliced thin', '1 cup beer', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Melt butter in saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onions and saute, stirring frequently, until tender, about 5-6 minutes. Add 3/4 cup beer, sugar, and salt. Cook until all the beer has been absorbed by the onions and they begin to brown slightly, about 18 minutes. Add the remaining 1/4 cup beer and bring to a simmer. Keep onions warm.']

title: Peanut Roll
ingredients: ['1 box 10X sugar', '1/2 stick of butter, melted', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/4 c. milk', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Put 10X sugar in plastic bowl.', 'Make a hole and add butter, vanilla and milk.', 'Stir well with a fork until dough is together, then knead.', 'If it is too wet, add more sugar.', 'Sprinkle sugar on board.', 'Roll dough out with rolling pin, turning dough over so the rolling pin won't stick.', 'Spread peanut butter to desired thickness over dough.', 'Roll up and put in refrigerator for 15 minutes.', 'Take out and cut in pieces.']

title: Grandma Rother'S Sweet Rice For Two
ingredients: ['1/2 c. rice', '1 1/2 c. milk', 'sugar and cinnamon to taste', 'butter']
directions: ['To the rice stir in milk and cook in the top of a double boiler until milk is absorbed, approximately 1 hour, stirring occasionally.', 'Add sugar to taste and after putting in bowl, top with butter.', 'Sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar.']

title: Soy Milk Eggnog
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '125 ml Soy Milk', '1 Tbsp sugar', 'to taste Vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a milk pan, beat the egg.', 'Add the milk and sugar, then blend with a hand blender or with a whisk.', 'Cook over low heat.', 'Add the spices and vanilla, stirring constantly until thick.', '(Do not burn it!)', 'Remove the clove.', 'Add the liquor and blend well with a hand blender.', 'All set to enjoy your healthy Christmas drink!', '*note* I added 1 Tbsp Cointreau.', 'and it was yum!']

title: Butter Scented Fluffy Omelettes
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 tsp Mayonnaise', '8 grams Butter']
directions: ['Mix the mayonnaise into the beaten egg well.', 'Heat up a frying pan and add the butter.', 'If the butter soon starts to sizzle, the temperature of the pan is just right.', 'Once the butter has melted, turn the heat to low.', 'Pour the egg mixture into the pan and stir the mixture in large circles to incorporate some air.', 'When the omelette is mostly cooked, like in the photo, turn off the heat.', 'Fold the omelette into 3 and it's done.', 'The centre is so creamy when cut in half.', 'Fold the omelette twice when you're serving it over seasoned rice (garlic rice, ketchup rice, etc.).', 'Then cut in half again to serve.', 'Omurice.']

title: Garlic-Lemon Butter For Grilled Salmon
ingredients: ['1/2 - 1 cup butter', '2 -3 cloves garlic', '1 lemon, juice of', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Soften one stick of butter and mix with garlic.', 'Either process in blender or food processor; or if doing by hand use garlic press and whisk really well with fork.', 'Gradually add as much lemon juice as butter will hold.', 'Quit adding when butter won't absorb any more.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Slather this on grilled salmon during cooking and serve remainder at table.']

title: Bootlegger Beans
ingredients: ['3 slices bacon', '1 small chopped onion', '1 can pork and beans']
directions: ['Saute bacon.', 'To bacon drippings, add chopped onion and saute. Crumble bacon.', 'Add bacon and onion to pork and beans.']

title: Pineapple Compote
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter', '1 pineapple, core removed and finely diced', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 tablespoons ginger, minced', 'salt']
directions: ['Melt butter in a saute pan over medium heat.', 'Add pineapple, season with sugar and salt.', 'Saute over medium heat for 5 minutes.', 'Add ginger, stir and remove from heat.']

title: Peanut Butter Wimsy
ingredients: ['3/4 to 1 c. milk', '3 c. sugar', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 c. oatmeal', '1 c. peanut butter']
directions: ['Stir milk, sugar, melted butter and vanilla together.', 'Boil for 1 minute.', 'Turn fire off.', 'Add oatmeal and peanut butter. Stir until thick.', 'Put in pan and refrigerate.']

title: Pretzels
ingredients: ['frozen bread dough', 'butter', 'salt']
directions: ['Thaw dough.', 'Roll small amount into snake shape.', 'Twist.', 'Melt butter; brush on dough.', 'Salt lightly.', 'Bake in a 350° oven until lightly browned on top.']

title: Toad In The Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice of bread', '1 teaspoon butter', '1 large egg', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Cut a 3-in. hole in the middle of the bread and discard. In a small skillet, melt the butter; place the bread in the skillet.', 'Place egg in the hole. Cook for about 2 minutes over medium heat until the bread is lightly browned. Turn and cook the other side until egg yolk is almost set. Season with salt and pepper.']

title: Golden Honey-Glazed Chicken
ingredients: ['3 1/2 to 4 lb. chicken, cut up', '1/2 c. Lea & Perrins white wine Worcestershire sauce', '3 Tbsp. honey']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°.', 'Rinse chicken well and pat dry.', 'Place on a rack in a shallow baking pan.', 'In a mixing bowl, combine white wine Worcestershire and honey.', 'Coat chicken with mixture and bake 35 to 40 minutes at 350°, basting occasionally, until chicken is golden.', 'Serves 4.']

title: Simply Made Salted Yogurt Toast
ingredients: ['1 White sliced bread', '1 Salted yogurt', '1 Olive oil', '1 Black pepper']
directions: ['Toast the bread (I think thinly sliced is best!)', 'until browned.', 'Spread salted yogurt on top.', 'Top with olive oil and black pepper to taste.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Bailey's Hot Fudge Sauce Recipe
ingredients: ['1/2 c. butter', '2 sqr unsweetened chocolate', '2 c. confectioners' sugar, sifted', '3/4 c. evaporated lowfat milk']
directions: ['In a saucepan over low heat, heat the butter and chocolate.', 'Remove from the heat; add in about 1/3 of the sugar and 1/3 of the evaporated lowfat milk.', 'Stir in and add in half the remaining sugar and evaporated lowfat milk; stir again and add in the rest of the', 'sugar and evaporated lowfat milk.', 'Stir till smooth.', 'Return to the stove and simmer for 8-10 min.', 'Makes 2 c..']

title: Baked Tomatoes
ingredients: ['1 large can tomatoes', '3/4 c. sugar', '1/3 stick butter', 'salt and pepper', '3 slices bread']
directions: ['Combine ingredients and cook at 350° until thick (about an hour).'],['bread'

title: Smooth Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['4 cups sugar', '1 cup milk', '2 cups peanut butter', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine sugar and milk in pan and boil until softball stage.', 'Remove from heat and set pan in a basin of cool water, stirring in remaining ingredients.', 'Spread in a buttered 9x11 pan.', 'cut into 60 pieces.']

title: Peanut Butter And Beetroot
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', 'butter', '1 1/2 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 beetroot']
directions: ['Brush the sandwich toaster with a little sunflower oil and preheat to its highest setting.', 'Butter the bread on one side only. Cover the butter on one slice with the peanut butter and top with the sliced beetroot. Place the second slice of bread on top (buttered side down) and transfer the sandwich to the toaster. Close the lid and cook for 3 minutes until crisp and golden.']

title: Country Style Smothered Chicken
ingredients: ['1 cut-up chicken', '4 to 5 slices bacon', '1/2 medium onion, sliced', 'celery leaves']
directions: ['Salt chicken; roll each piece in flour and place in roasting pan.', 'Lay 4 to 5 pieces bacon, onion slices and celery leaves on top of chicken.', 'Cover with water and bake 3 hours.']

title: Creamy Hot Fudge Sauce
ingredients: ['1/4 lb. butter', '4 sq. chocolate', '3 c. sugar', '1 can evaporated milk']
directions: ['Melt butter over low heat.', 'Add chocolate and melt it, stirring so it won\'t 'catch'.', 'Add sugar and milk.', 'Stir until sugar is completely dissolved. Add 2 tablespoons vanilla.', 'Place in 1-quart container.', 'When ready to use, place what you need in pan.', 'Bring to rolling boil for a minute and serve over ice cream or dessert.']

title: Honey Joys.
ingredients: ['8 cup Cornflakes', '3 tbsp Honey', '1/2 cup Butter', '1/3 cup Sugar']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 180?C.', 'In a small saucepan melt the butter, sugar and honey until it starts to froth.', 'In a large mixing bowl, tip in the 8 cups of cornflakes.', 'Pour the melted mixture into the cornflakes and quickly mix evenly through the cornflakes before it begins to set.', 'Place 20 cupcake cases, evenly spaced onto a flat oven tray.', 'Using a spoon, fill the cases to the top.', 'Place completed oven tray into the oven for 10-15 minutes or until lightly browned.', 'Remove tray from the oven and place onto a wire cooling rack.', 'Place the filled rack into the refrigerator for approximately 10 minutes allowing them to set.', 'Time to enjoy and make sure to save some for the kids!']

title: 1 - 2 - 3 Chocolate Sauce
ingredients: ['3 sq. Chocolate', '2 c. Sugar', '1 can Evaporated Milk', 'Pinch Salt']
directions: ['Mix and bring to a boil, stirring constantly.', 'Let it boil 1 minute, then add 1 teaspoon vanilla.', 'Mix well for 1 minute. Serve warm.']

title: Heavenly Topping
ingredients: ['1/2 cup butter', '4 ounces unsweetened chocolate', '3 cups sugar', '1 can milk']
directions: ['Melt butter and chocolate in top of double boiler. Stir in sugar gradually about 4 tbsp. at a time. Add milk slowly. Cook until smooth and satiny. Heat as need to pour over ice cream, pound cake, etc.', 'Stores well in refrigerator for a long period of time.']

title: Heavenly Hot Chocolate Sauce
ingredients: ['1/2 c. butter', '4 sq. chocolate', '3 c. sugar', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 can evaporated milk']
directions: ['Melt butter in a double boiler.', 'Drop in chocolate and melt. Add sugar gradually and stir.', '(It's going to be super hard to stir!)', 'Add salt.', 'Slowly add milk, a little at a time.', 'Serve hot or cold over ice cream.']

title: S'More Cookies
ingredients: ['8 sq. chocolate', '4 sq. vanilla candy quick']
directions: ['Melt chocolate and candy quick in microwave and mix together. You could use Marshmallow Creme instead of peanut butter or in addition to the peanut butter.'],['vanilla'

title: Vanilla Cream (Basic Recipe)
ingredients: ['2 c. milk', '1 c. sugar', '1/4 tsp. salt', '4 c. light/table cream', '2 Tbls. vanilla']
directions: ['1. Scald milk.', '', '2. Add the sugar and salt to the milk and stir until both are well dissolved.', '', '3. Add the cream + stir in the vanilla.', '', '4. Cool/Chill.', '', '5. Churn in freezer per instructions.']

title: Mock Chicken Divan
ingredients: ['1 cooked and deboned chicken', '2 cans broccoli and cheese soup', '1 1/2 c. milk', 'rice']
directions: ['Place deboned chicken in casserole dish.', 'Mix soup with milk. Pour over chicken.', 'Cook for about an hour at 350°.', 'Serve over rice.']

title: Salmon
ingredients: ['salmon', 'butter Lemon Dill']
directions: ['Grind some salt & pepper on top, then fire up the grill!']

title: Stewed Tomatoes With Rustic Italian Bread
ingredients: ['1 quart canned tomatoes', '8 slices wheat whole, Italian rustic bread', '2 teaspoons sugar', 'butter']
directions: ['Toast the bread until golden brown on both sides. Spread both sides of the toast with butter.', 'Pour the canned tomatoes into a glass baking dish. Break apart the toasted bread and mix it into the bowl of tomatoes using a fork to evenly incorporate the bread. Sprinkle the sugar on top.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees; bake the dish until it is heated through and slightly bubbly on top, about 25-30 minutes. Enjoy!']

title: Cheese Appetizers
ingredients: ['4 oz. sharp Cheddar, grated', '1/4 tsp. minced onion', '1/8 tsp. sugar', '1 1/2 tsp. butter', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 1/2 strips bacon']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together to make a paste. Trim the crust off 3 pieces of bread. Butter lightly and make 3 slices of each piece. Slice bacon strips in half. Spread cheese mixture on bread and roll with bacon on outside. Hold together with 2 toothpicks. Cut each in half between the toothpicks. Broil until browned on one side, turn and brown other side. Makes 18 yummy appetizers!']

title: Plank Baked Rainbow Trout
ingredients: ['2 lbs rainbow trout, cleaned with head on', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['Place the planks into cool water and allow to soak for at least 2 hours and up to overnight.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 to degrees F.', 'Brush the trout, inside and out with olive oil.', 'Season inside and out with salt and pepper.', 'Place the trout onto the planks belly down and open. Wrap foil around both fish and plank.', 'Place the planks in oven for approximately 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Remove from the oven and allow to sit for 5 to 10 minutes before serving as is or deboning and serving.']

title: Beer Braised Onions
ingredients: ['1/2 ounce unsalted butter', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '8 fluid ounces beer', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Melt the butter in a pan. Add the onions and cook until tender.', 'Add 6 fl oz beer, sugar and salt. Cook approx 16/18 minutes until the beer is absorbed and the onions are starting to brown.', 'Add the remaining beer and simmer gently.', 'Serve warm to accompany burgers.']

title: Grilled Shrimp A La Waco
ingredients: ['1 lb. large shrimp, peeled', 'thin sliced bacon', 'jalapeno pepper slices']
directions: ['Cut bacon strips in half and wrapped peeled raw shrimp. Secure bacon with toothpicks.', 'Place on grill for 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Wrap jalapeno peppers with the shrimp to add some 'spice.'']

title: Quick Pasta For One
ingredients: ['pasta, for one', '1/2 head garlic', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper, freshly ground', '1 pinch salt']
directions: ['Cook your pasta in the usual way.', 'The amount depends on how hungry you are.', 'In a small heavy pan (or very carefully in a light one) heat the oil with the garlic the black pepper and the salt.', ''fry'the garlic until it has gone very slightly golden.', 'Turn off the heat and let it stand until the pasta is cooked.', 'Mix the pasta with the oil and garlic and enjoy.']

title: Steam To Skillet Vegetables
ingredients: ['1 Medium Sized Broccoli Head', '8 ounces, weight Baby Carrots', '2 Tablespoons Unsalted Butter', '4 cloves Garlic, Sliced', '1 dash Sea Salt']
directions: ['Place 1 cup of water in a medium-sized pot and bring to a boil. Use a mesh wire basket and place inside the pot, making sure it does not touch the water. Add broccoli and carrots to basket, close lid and let steam for 10 minutes.', 'Melt butter in skillet on low/medium heat. Once butter is melted, add garlic. Take broccoli and carrots from wire basket and add to skillet. Saute for 5 minutes, adding sea salt. Stir and serve hot.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Graham Cracker Delight
ingredients: ['42 to 48 graham crackers', '1 stick butter', '1 stick margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '1/2 to 1 c. chopped nuts']
directions: ['Place graham crackers in a jelly roll pan (spray pan with Pam).', 'Combine butter, margarine and sugar.', 'Boil 3 minutes.', 'Add chopped nuts.', 'Pour over graham crackers.']

title: Slow-roasted Tomatoes in Garlic Olive Oil
ingredients: ['4 Vine-ripened Tomatoes', 'Olive Oil, Enough To Cover The Roasted Tomatoes', '1 teaspoon Sea Salt', '2 heads Garlic, Peeled And Thinly Sliced']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 275 F. Slice the tomatoes in half vertically (you can slice a little piece off the bottom to help the tomatoes sit upright).', 'If using bigger tomatoes slice them in thirds but make sure all slices are about the same width.', 'Rub olive oil on both sides of the tomatoes and line them in a single layer along a rimmed baking sheet.', 'Sprinkle sea salt over them.', 'Bake for 4-6 hours or until they look sun-dried.', 'After they are finished cooking place them in an airtight jar, drop in the garlic slices, mix it all up and cover with olive oil.', 'Let them sit in the fridge overnight to marry the flavors.']

title: Slow Roasted Roma Tomatoes
ingredients: ['7 whole Roma Tomatoes, Sliced In Half', '2 Tablespoons Olive Oil', '1/2 teaspoons Good Sea Salt', '1 bulb Garlic, Broken Into Cloves, Unpeeled']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 225°F. Slice tomatoes in half lengthwise. Lay cut side up on parchment-lined baking sheets. Brush with olive oil and sprinkle with sea salt. Place garlic cloves in between tomato halves. Roast for 4 hours. Eat immediately or store in the refrigerator with extra olive oil drizzled on top. You can use these in pasta, to top chicken or beef, or just for snacking!']

title: Roasted Tomatoes And Garlic
ingredients: ['1 pound Tomatoes', '1 head Garlic', '1 pinch Sea Salt', '1 Tablespoon Olive Oil']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F.', 'Slice tomatoes in half and set on a cookie sheet. Slice the top off garlic cloves and set on a pan. Sprinkle with salt and drizzle with olive oil. Roast for 25 minutes.', 'The tomatoes will be ready to go. To use the garlic, squeeze it out of the cloves.', 'Blend into soup or sauces, or spread garlic and tomatoes onto a piece of crusty baguette or freshly baked bread. Perhaps with some fresh basil or pesto. The possibilities and flavor combinations are endless!']

title: Crisp Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['3 lb. chicken, cut up', '1/2 tsp. salt', 'instant garlic powder to taste', 'pepper and paprika to taste']
directions: ['Place chicken pieces, skin side up, in shallow baking dish. Sprinkle with salt, garlic powder, pepper and paprika.', 'Bake at 375° for 1 hour or until golden brown.', 'Yields 6 servings. Contains 175 calories per serving.']

title: Chocolate Ice Cream Sauce
ingredients: ['1 lg. can evaporated milk', '2 c. sugar', '3 squares chocolate', '2 t. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix milk, sugar and chocolate together and cook in a double boiler 20-25 minutes. Beat 2-3 minutes and add vanilla. This is good either warm or cold.']

title: Microwaved Eggs Several Ways
ingredients: ['1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['Microwave Eggs cooked in their shells will explode!', 'Even out of the shell, eggs can and may explode in the microwave because rapid heating causes a buildup of steam.', 'Always use a wooden pick or tip of a knife to break the yolk membrane of an unbeaten egg before micro-cooking to allow the steam to escape.', 'Covering cooking containers with a lid, plastic wrap, or wax paper encourages more even cooking and (if you forgot to prick the yolks) helps to confine the explosion!', 'Microwave Fried Eggs:.', 'Break and slip one (1) egg into each of two lightly-greased 10-ounce custard cups or a pie plate.', 'Gently prick yolks with tip of knife or wooden pick.', 'Cover with plastic wrap.', 'Cook on 50% power just until eggs are almost desired doneness, about 2 to 3 minutes.', 'Let stand, covered until whites are completely set and yolks begin to thicken but are not hard.', 'Microwave Hard-Cooked (Boiled) Eggs:.', 'Separate yolks and whites of eggs into two (2) lightly-greased liquid measures or small bowls.', 'Stir yolks with fork.', 'Cover each container with plastic wrap.', 'Cook separately on 50% or 30% power, stirring once or twice, allowing about 20 to 30 seconds per yolk, about 30 seconds to 1 minute per white.', 'Remove when slightly underdone.', 'Let stand, covered, about 2 minutes.', 'Cool long enough to handle comfortably, then chop or chill until ready to chop.', 'Microwave Poached Eggs:.', 'Pour 1/3 cup water into 10-ounce custard cup or small deep bowl.', 'Break and slip in two eggs.', 'Gently prick yolks with tip of knife or wooden pick.', 'Cover with plastic wrap.', 'Cook on full power about 1 1/2 to 2 minutes.', 'If necessary, let stand, covered, until whites are completely set and yolks begin to thicken but are not hard, about 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Pour off water to serve in custard cup or lift out with slotted spoon.', 'NOTE: For 4 eggs, use 2/3 cup water in 1-quart bowl or baking dish.', 'Cook 1 1/2 to 3 minutes and let stand as above.', 'Microwave Scrambled Eggs:.', 'In a 10-ounce custard cup, beat together 2 eggs, and 2 tablespoons milk with salt and pepper to taste, if desired, until blended.', 'Cook on full power, stirring once or twice, until almost set, about 1 to 1 1/2 minutes.', 'Stir.', 'If necessary, cover with plastic wrap and let stand until eggs are thickened and no visible liquid egg remains, about 1 minute.', 'NOTE: All microwave cooking times are based on a full power output of 600 to 700 watts.', 'For a lower wattage oven, allow more time.', '1 egg: 30 to 45 seconds.', '2 eggs: 1 to 1-1/2 minutes.', '4 eggs: 2-1/2 to 3 minutes.', '6 eggs: 3-1/2 to 4-1/2 minutes.', '8 eggs: 4-1/2 to 5-1/2 minutes.']

title: Coffee Delight
ingredients: ['2 1/2 stacks Ritz crackers', '1 1/2 blocks butter, melted']
directions: ['Crush crackers into crumbs.', 'Mix crumbs and butter.', 'Press into ungreased 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Bake 10 minutes at 350°; cool.']

title: Oeufs En Cocotte or Shirred Eggs
ingredients: ['1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['In France, this basic methods of baked eggs is called oeufs en cocotte which means 'eggs baked in ramekins.', ''.', 'You can bake eggs nestled in other foods such as rice, vegetables or sauces.', 'These foods should be heated before the eggs are added for faster and more even cooking.', 'Make indentations in the heated food with the back of a spoon, about 2-inch diameter.', 'For individual servings of baked eggs, use baking dishes (ramekins, custard cups, individual souffle dishes, or small oval bakers) that just fit the eggs plus the flavoring, food, or liquid.', 'If baking the eggs in other solid foods or in liquids, preheat them before adding the eggs for faster and more even cooking.', 'Preheat oven to 325F.', 'For each serving, lightly butter an individual oven-proof baking dish or ramekin.', 'Break one or two eggs into each dish.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Spoon 1 tablespoon milk or cream over eggs (skim milk, low-fat milk, half and half, or light cream may be substituted).', 'Spooning a liquid over the eggs can help prevent drying out.', 'Bake in preheated oven approximately 12 to 14 minutes, depending on number of servings being baked.', 'Check the eggs after about 10 minutes baking time.', 'When done, the whites should be completely set and the yolks beginning to thicken but not hard.', 'Serve Immediately.', 'Baked Egg Options.', 'Top eggs with desired amount of one or more of the following toppings before baking:.', 'Light cream.', 'Salsa.', 'Shredded cheese.', 'Chopped ham.', 'Minced fresh chives or minced fresh herbs.']

title: 2-Ingredient Wheat-Free Banana Pancakes (Paleo)
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon butter', '1 large banana, broken into chunks', '1 large egg']
directions: ['Heat a large skillet over medium heat; add butter.', 'Mash banana chunks in a bowl using a fork until it becomes a wet consistency. Add egg and whisk mixture until batter is smooth.', 'Drop batter into the hot butter to make 2 pancakes. Cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry, about 3 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on the other side, about 2 minutes.']

title: Easy Peasy Tuna Pasta
ingredients: ['1/2 bulbs Onion', '1 can Tuna', '1 dash Olive Oil', '1 pinch Salt', 'Pasta']
directions: ['1. Cook pasta according to packet instructions, and drain.', '2. Dice onion and tomato.', '3. Chuck into a bowl with a generous amount of salt, a splash of oil, parmesan, and the can of tuna.', '4. Throw on the hot pasta, stir, and eat.']

title: Banana And Honey Spread Recipe
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. Butter', '1 Tbsp. Honey', '2 x Banana', '4 slc Bread']
directions: ['Mix butter and honey together in a bowl Mash bananas on a plate using a fork Add in banana to butter and honey mix Mix well Spread on bread'],['honey'

title: Slow-Roasted Tomatoes in Olive Oil
ingredients: ['60 ounces, weight Canned Diced Tomatoes, Drained', '1 cup Olive Oil Plus More As Needed', '1 teaspoon Salt', '1 teaspoon Sugar', '6 cloves Minced Garlic']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 275 F. Arrange the tomatoes in a baking dish (I used a large oval baker but a 9x13 should be fine as well).', 'Then pour the olive oil over top.', 'Add more olive oil as needed so that just the tops of the tomatoes are exposed.', 'Sprinkle with the salt and sugar.', 'Bake for several hours (at least 6 hours, or all day), stirring every hour or so, until the tomatoes are very dark red.', 'Add more olive oil during the cooking process as needed so the tomatoes dont dry out.', 'When the tomatoes are cooked, sprinkle the raw garlic over top and cover dish with plastic wrap.', 'Let it sit for at least 20 minutes, then serve as desired.', 'Notes: 1.', 'These are great on crostini, but I love them in marinara, risotto, or just as a topping for fish or chicken.', 'Skys the limit!', '2.', 'May be made up to a week in advance and kept in the fridge.']

title: Substitute for Half and Half'
ingredients: ['4 teaspoons melted butter', 'milk, to make 1 cup']
directions: ['melt butter in measuring cup.', 'add enough milk to make 1 cup.']

title: Betty Crocker's No Bake Strawberry Cheese Cake
ingredients: ['90 grams butter', '400 ml milk']
directions: ['In a dish, put 90gms butter and heat it for 10 seconds.', 'Beat biscuit crumb with melted butter.use an 18-20 cm loose base round tin and then press the biscuit mixture with the back of the spoon.', 'Cool in fridge for 15 minutes.', 'In a large bowl,beat milk with the pudding mix on low speed until moistened.', 'Scrape the bowl and beat on medium speed for 2 minutes until thick and creamy.', 'Spread on top of biscuit base n chill for 2 hours.']

title: My Baba's Cold Remedy
ingredients: ['6 ounces milk', '1 garlic clove', '1 teaspoon butter']
directions: ['Heat the milk, til bubbles form on edge.', 'Add the butter and mix til melted.', 'Crush or mince finely the garlic clove and add to milk.', 'Mix well and drink while still hot.']

title: Mandarin Orange Salad
ingredients: ['2 sleeves Ritz crackers', '1/3 c. sugar', '2 sticks butter, melted']
directions: ['Crush crackers; add sugar and butter. Place in bottom of 9 x 13-inch dish. Reserve some mixture for topping.'],['crackers'

title: Vanilla-Almond Coffee
ingredients: ['1 pound ground coffee', '2 tablespoons almond extract', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place coffee in a large jar with tight-fitting lid. Add extracts. Cover and shake well. Store in an airtight container in a cool, dark and dry place or in the freezer. Prepare coffee as usual.']

title: Frozen Fudge Bar Cooler Pops
ingredients: ['1 13 ounce can ' lite ' coconut milk', '12 oz semisweet chocolate, chopped', '1/2 tsp vanilla extract']
directions: ['Place chocolate in food processor and pulse until course ground.', 'Heat coconut milk in a saucepan or microwave just to a simmer, don't boil just get hot.', 'Add to chocolate in food processor, add vanilla whirl until very well mixed.', 'Pour into your popsicle containers and freeze until frozen, overnight is best.', 'Note, The can of coconut milk I have used is actually labeled 13.66 ounce, just use the entire can.']

title: Simple Sweet Carrots
ingredients: ['3 large carrots, cut into thick circles', '1 tablespoon butter', '12 cup apple juice']
directions: ['Melt butter in medium pan on high heat.', 'Add carrots to pan and let sit for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'Add apple juice and let reduce for about 30 seconds.', 'Cover pan, reduce heat to medium and let sit for 5 minutes.', 'Uncover pan, and continue cooking until carrots are as tender as you like (about a minute for me).', 'Serve hot.']

title: Chicken And Rice
ingredients: ['chicken', 'rice', 'onion', 'minced garlic', 'salt']
directions: ['Boil chicken with skin on until done when it is done remove from broth and take off bone.', 'Cut up onion put into broth.', 'Add minced garlic; cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add rice and', 'cook until done. Add the chicken to the ingredients add salt to taste.', 'Serve with pears or bread.']

title: Coconut Chips
ingredients: ['1 coconut', 'butter', 'salt']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200^C/Gas 6).', 'Butter baking sheets.', 'Bore two holes in eyes of coconut using a clean skewer or ice pick.', 'Drain liquid from coconut.', 'Bake coconut until shell cracks, about 15 minutes.', 'Remove coconut meat from shell and peel off brown skin.', 'Using a vegetable peeler, shave coconut into thin slices.', 'Arrange slices on prepared baking sheets and bake until light brown, turning occasionally, about 10 minutes.', 'Sprinkle with salt.']

title: Quay'S Tea Cakes
ingredients: ['1 stick butter', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Make real stiff with flour.', 'Drop on lightly greased cookie sheet and mash with fork.', 'Bake at 350° for 5 to 8 minutes.']

title: Honey Caramels
ingredients: ['2 cups honey', '2 cups sugar', '12 teaspoon salt', '1 cup evaporated milk', '12 cup butter']
directions: ['Cook honey, sugar and salt rapidly to hard-ball state - 250 degrees F. Stir occasionally.', 'Add evaporated milk and butter.', 'Cook rapidly to hardball stage again, stirring constantly so mixture doesn't scorch.', 'This may take 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Pour into well buttered 9x13 inch pan and cool completely.', 'Once cooled, loosen caramel in pan and place on cutting board.', 'Cut into 1-inch or smaller strips with a very sharp butchers knife.', 'Cut strips into 1-inch squares and place in foil candy cups or wrap in squares of waxed paper.', 'Store in an airtight container.', 'Makes about 100 pieces of caramel.']

title: Old-Fashioned Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1/3 c. uncooked rice', '4 c. milk, scalded', '1/4 tsp. salt', '1/4 c. sugar', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a flat baking dish and place in a slow oven (300°) and bake for 1 1/2 hours or until rice is perfectly tender and pudding is thick and creamy, not dry.', 'Stir every 15 minutes with a fork, carefully turning the brown top and scraping the edges down.', 'Serve hot or cold.', 'Yields 5 servings.']

title: Orange Honey Glazed Carrots
ingredients: ['1 1 pound bag frozen baby carrots', '3 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons honey', '1/4 cup orange juice', '1/4 cup sugar', 'salt to taste']
directions: ['Cook carrots in salt water until tender and drain.', 'Melt butter in skillet.', 'Add honey, orange juice, sugar and carrots.', 'Cook on medium head until carrots are glazed.']

title: Easy Shrimp Dip
ingredients: ['1 carton French onion dip', '1 can tiny cocktail shrimp']
directions: ['Rinse shrimp and drain well. Mash 1/2 of the shrimp with a fork. Mix with French onion dip. Fold in the rest of whole shrimp. Chill.'],['shrimp'

title: Chicken salad
ingredients: ['1 chicken breast', '1/2 chopped onion', '1/2 chopped tomato', '1/2 cucumber chopped', '1 boiled egg']
directions: ['Season chicken with Season all & garlic & onion powder sear on both sides, let cool while cooling chop & add remaining ingredients and enjoy']

title: Hole In The Wall
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 large egg', '1/4 teaspoon butter', '1/2 teaspoon mayonnaise']
directions: ['Heat non stick skillet.', 'Tear a circle out of the center of bread.', 'Spread a very, very thin layer of mayo to both sides of bread.', 'Place the bread in the skillet; add a very small amount of butter in the hole.', 'Crack the egg into the hole in the bread.', 'Cook egg till set and bread is browned turn over and brown the other side and egg is done to your desire.', 'Salt and pepper to taste and enjoy!', 'J.R. liked to put a little maple syrup on his. You can also toast the holes you tear out of the bread in the pan while egg is cooking and serve on the side.']

title: Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['12 pint heavy whipping cream', '3 tablespoons sugar', '12 teaspoon vanilla', '1 teeny tiny pinch salt']
directions: ['Whip until stiff.', 'Continue mixing while adding sugar in a slow stream, then vanilla and a pinch of salt.', 'For pie or shortcake topping use regular sugar, but for cake topping use powdered sugar.']

title: Shrimp & Bacon Pasta
ingredients: ['salt and pepper', '5 slices bacon', '1 lb pasta', '1 onion, chopped', '1 lb frozen large peeled and deveined shrimp, thawed', '2 tomatoes, cored and cut into 1/2-inch chunks']
directions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a rolling boil and salt it generously.', 'While the water comes to a boil, cook the bacon in a large, deep skillet, turning occasionally, over medium heat until crisp, about 10 minutes. Transfer to paper towels to drain and crumble. Drain all but 2 tablespoons fat from the skillet.', 'Add the pasta to the boiling water and cook until al dente according to the label's directions, stirring occasionally.', 'To the fat in the skillet, add the onions and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until the onions brown, about 3 minutes. Add the shrimp, season with salt and pepper, and cook, stirring, until just opaque throughout, about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes, season with salt and pepper, and cook just until warmed through, about 1 minute.', 'Transfer the pasta directly from the pot to the skillet. Toss until very well coated and top with the bacon.']

title: Pease Pudding
ingredients: ['1 cup split peas', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon butter']
directions: ['Wash peas, soak in water overnight, then rinse.', 'Place peas in pudding bag (can use thin towel or cloth).', 'Tie bag - allowing room for expansion', 'Cook in salted water for approximately 2 hours.', 'Remove bag from pot and squeeze out excess water', 'Remove peas from bag and mash with butter, salt and pepper.', 'You can press the mixture into a curved cereal bowl, then turn over and tap the bottom to remove. This will give the pease pudding a nice domed shape.']

title: Rice Ring
ingredients: ['butter, for coating mold', '1 1/2 cups rice, cooked,steamed dry and buttered']
directions: ['Butter a 1 1/2 quart ring mold generously.', 'Pack firmly with hot rice and cover tightly with foil (rice may be prepared 1 hour ahead to this point and kept warm in a 250F oven).', 'Invert onto a heated platter.']

title: Dad'S Peanut Butter Candy
ingredients: ['1 jar peanut butter', '2 c. milk', '4 c. sugar', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Boil milk and sugar until it forms a ball in cold water.', 'Add peanut butter; do not stir.', 'Take butter and grease down a pan, about 13 x 9-inch.', 'Put rest of butter into pot.', 'Wait until it cools, then stir peanut butter until smooth.', 'Pour into greased pan.', 'Let set and cool for 1 to 2 hours.', 'Makes 2 dozen.']

title: Lemon Sauce(Especially Good On Gingerbread)
ingredients: ['juice of one lemon', '1 egg', '1 c. sugar', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Add all ingredients together and cook in double boiler until thick.'],['butter'

title: Whipped Ricotta
ingredients: ['15 ounces Reduced Fat Whipped Ricotta', '1 teaspoon garlic', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon honey']
directions: ['In a food processor or blender add ricotta and blend for 2 minutes. Add in garlic, salt and olive oil and blend for another 4 minutes or until smooth. After two minutes slowly add in honey.', 'Serve with crackers or whole grain toast', 'Option- Add toasted walnuts for a crunch!']

title: Egg Cheese
ingredients: ['1 dozen egg', '1 12 quarts milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 pinch salt']
directions: ['Beat all ingredients together well.', 'Cook slowly over LOW heat until it looks like yellow cottage cheese,and liquid starts to seperates.', 'Pour into a strainer lined with cheese cloth,form into a ball.', 'Hang over sink and let drip,about 2 hours.', 'Refrigerate over night.']

title: Baked Whole Salmon
ingredients: ['1 large salmon 10 - 15 lbs.', 'salt', 'pepper', 'lemon', 'butter']
directions: ['Rub fish with salt, pepper and lemon.', 'Wrap in foil.', 'Bake slowly at 250 - 300° for three hours or until done.', 'Remove foil. Remove skin.', 'Place salmon on large platter.', 'Serve with melted butter and lemon.', 'Perfect side dishes to accompany the baked salmon are parsleyed new potatoes and green peas with pearl onions.', 'Lemon meringue pie would make an excellent dessert.']

title: Baby Food - Carrot And Rice
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons rice', '2 carrots', '1 teaspoon butter']
directions: ['Simmer in water until rice is very soft.', 'Remove and add butter.', 'Blend or mash accordind to your baby's age.']

title: Avena-Oatmeal
ingredients: ['2 cups milk', '1/2 cup instant plain oatmeal', '3 tablespoons sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon butter']
directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a sauce pan at high temperature, stirring constantly until it boils.', 'Lower temperature to low and stir only if necessary until it thickens to taste.', 'Serve hot.']

title: Guess Again...Carrots!
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '6 to 8 oz. sharp Cheddar, grated']
directions: ['Pare, slice and cook carrots until tender.', 'Drain; mash well. Add butter, onion and cheese.', 'Put into a buttered 1-quart casserole.', 'Bake at 350° for 40 minutes, until browned a bit. Garnish with parsley or sprinkle top with buttered crumbs.', 'Serves 8.']

title: Gingered Broccoli
ingredients: ['1 bundle broccoli', '1 tbsp minced ginger', '1 clove minced garlic', '3 tbsp butter', '1 salt and pepper']
directions: ['Trim broccoli stalks.', 'Boil until nearly tender.', 'Drain and shock broccoli in ice water.', 'Brown butter with garlic and ginger.', 'Saute broccoli until tender.', 'Season.', 'Variations; lemon zest or juice, white wine, carrots, sesame oil, rice wine vinegar']

title: Banana Roll Ups
ingredients: ['1 -2 tablespoon butter', '1 -2 tablespoon honey', '2 slices bread', '1 banana']
directions: ['cut crusts of the bread.', 'roll lightly with a rolling pin.', 'spread with butter and set honey.', 'put a peeled banana at one end and roll the bread around it.', 'cut in half.']

title: Banana And Honey Toastie
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', 'butter', '1 banana', '1 teaspoon honey']
directions: ['Preheat the sandwich toaster to its highest setting.', 'Spread the butter over one side of the bread. Slice the banana. Place banana slices on the unbuttered side of one slice of bread. Drizzle the honey over the banana and top with the remaining slice of bread (buttered side up).', 'Place the sandwich in the toaster, close the lid and cook for 3 minutes until crisp and golden.']

title: Aunt Hellen'S White Fudge
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar', '1 can milk', '1 stick butter', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1 tsp. vanilla', '3 Tbsp. peanut butter']
directions: ['Put sugar, milk, butter and salt into pan.', 'Cool over medium heat until soft balls form in cold water.', 'Remove from heat and add vanilla and peanut butter.', 'Beat mixture over medium speed until fudge starts to harden.', 'Pour into buttered pan.', 'Cool.']

title: Olive Oil Butter Table Spread
ingredients: ['12 tablespoons butter', '1/2 cup olive oil', '1 tablespoon skim milk']
directions: ['Beat butter in mixer until soft.', 'Gradually add the olive oil and milk.', 'When it is completely blended, pour into containers, cover and store in fridge.', 'It will harden as it cools. (Use as you would normally use butter).']

title: Almond Joy Truffles
ingredients: ['Chocolate', '3 Cups of Shredded Coconut', '1/2 Cup of Condensed Milk', '1/2 Cup of Powdered Sugar']
directions: ['In a mixing bowl stir together the coconut, condensed milk, and powdered sugar. Roll into balls and lay to side. Next, take almonds and stick into the middle of the coconut ball and roll in hand to shape into a round ball and hide the almond. Melt chocolate and dip the truffle in the chocolate and place on wax paper to harden.']

title: Golden Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken, cut up and seasoned', '1 egg, beaten', '2 Tbsp. milk']
directions: ['Combine egg and milk.', 'Roll chicken in flour, then dip in egg batter.', 'Roll in flour again.', 'Fry in oil in skillet.']

title: Warm Coconut Icing
ingredients: ['1 1/2 c. sugar', '1 stick butter', '1 small can evaporated milk', '7 oz. coconut']
directions: ['In a large skillet, melt butter in sugar, then pour in milk, stirring slowly until mixed well. Bring to boil and maintain a rolling boil, stirring constantly for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in coconut, then cool to desired consistency. Then pour over cake.']

title: Hard Times Dessert
ingredients: ['saltine crackers', 'butter', 'sugar']
directions: ['Spread butter on saltine cracker and sprinkle sugar on butter. Place in mouth and enjoy!'],['crackers'

title: Super Easy Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ['1 Cup - Kraft Smooth Peanut Butter', '1/2 Cup - Sugar', '1 Egg']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.', 'Mix all the ingredients at one time until well blended.', 'Roll the mixture into 24 balls.', 'Place onto an ungreased baking sheet 2 inches apart. Flatten with a fork. Bake for 15 or until lightly browned.']

title: Honey Sesame Chicken
ingredients: ['Chicken', 'Honey', 'Sesame Seed', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
directions: ['Let the chicken sit in the honey, turn over to moisten both sides.', 'Then dip into the sesame seeds.', 'Season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Bake for 1 hour in a 325 degree oven.']

title: Tamatim Mashwiya
ingredients: ['6 8 tomatoes', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Wash, dry, then halve tomatoes.', 'Arrange in greased oven pan, sprinkle with salt and pepper, and dot with butter.', 'Place under grill for 5-7 minutes.']

title: Lemony Garlic Shrimp & Pineapple Kabobs
ingredients: ['1 packages Frozen Baby Shrimp', '1 pints Sliced Fresh Pineapple', '1 Flavor God/Lemon & Garlic Seasoning']
directions: ['Put together your kabobs', 'Add to grill until shrimp and pineapple get grill marks (im usuing previously cookes shrimp, you can most certainly start with uncooked)', 'Pair with a tasty side!', 'I chose mashed sweet potatos for mine!']

title: Moms Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['6 cups milk', '23 cup rice', '23 cup sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Combine Milk, Rice, and Sugar in large pot.', 'Cook at medium heat until milk is not yet all absorbed.', '(could take 45 minutes to 1 hour.', 'Half way through add the Vanilla.', 'Stir occasionally.', 'When almost done it may start scorching bottom of pot.', 'take off heat and pour into seperate bowls.', 'add cinnamon on top (optional).', 'refrigorate for few hours (best overnight).']

title: Microwave Zucchini
ingredients: ['1 zucchini', '1 teaspoon butter', 'salt, to taste', 'pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Trim ends and slice zucchini in half length-wise.', 'Place skin-side up on a microwave-safe plate and microwave for 2 minutes.', 'Remove from microwave and turn zucchini over. With a knife, make small cuts into the inside of zucchini.', 'Spread butter over zucchini, and then salt and pepper to taste. Microwave for 1 more minute. You could also add other toppings at this point!', 'Enjoy :).']

title: Rice Croquettes
ingredients: ['1 c. rice, cooked', '2 Tbsp. milk', '1 tsp. salt', '1 egg', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['You will need:', '3/4 bushel fresh red chile, string or twine and sisal rope.']

title: Fun Bricked Chicken (with Real Bricks!)
ingredients: ['6 pieces Chicken Breast Halves', '4 Tablespoons Olive Oil, Divided', 'Salt And Pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Note: Youll also need 3 or 4 bricks and a good amount of aluminum foil to wrap them with.', '1.', 'Preheat oven to 375 F. Wash three or four bricks well using soap and hot water.', 'Wrap them in two layers of tin foil.', 'Be sure to wipe your counter well to be sure to wipe up any brick flakes.', 'If you like, have your kids decorate them using sharpie pens.', '2.', 'Wash the chicken breasts.', 'Pat them dry, put them on a cutting board and use a mallet to lightly pound the thicker parts of the chicken breasts so they are flat.', 'Rub them with a small amount of olive oil and sprinkle them with salt and pepper.', '3.', 'Rub a large casserole pan with olive oil.', 'Place the chicken in it and cover them with the bricks.', '4.', 'Bake in the preheated 375 F oven for about 30 minutes.', 'Chef Lynns tips: This will be the most tender chicken you have ever made in your life!', 'In the picture, Ive served it with steamed broccoli and buttered noodles ... its a great meal to please the kids!', 'I often serve tortillas as a bread substitute (lower calorie and high fiber) and the kids enjoy cutting up their meal and putting it inside the tortillas.', 'Its an extra activity to make meal time fun!']

title: Backon wrapped chicken hips
ingredients: ['5 piece Chicken hips', '5 slice Bacon', '1 Honey']
directions: ['Clean the chicken hips', 'brush the chicken hips with honey', 'wrap the chicken hips with bacon', 'Put them in the oven for 60 min', 'Each 15 min, remove the pan from the oven and pour the sauce on the chicken hips']

title: Steamed Maine Salmon
ingredients: ['1 medium fresh salmon', 'salt and pepper', 'butter']
directions: ['Season the inside of a a whole salmon with salt and pepper.', 'Wrap the salmon in a double layer of cheesecloth.', 'Add two cups of water to a large roasting pan.', 'Place the salmon on a cooking rack.', 'Place the rack on top of the roasting pan and cover.', 'Steam the fish in a 350 degree oven for 45 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through.', 'The skin will adhere to the cheesecloth when you remove it.', 'You need only to gently flake the salmon from the bones.', 'Serve the boneless salmon on a hot platter.', 'I like to drizzle melted clarified butter or melted herb buter over the fish just before serving.', 'Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley.', 'Great served with fiddleheads (or asparagus) and fresh rolls.']

title: Cream Baked Trout
ingredients: ['5 trout', 'pinch of pepper', 'pinch of salt', 'cream']
directions: ['Clean the trout, put in pepper and salt and close them.', 'Place the fish in a pan with just enough cream to cover the fins and bake fifteen minutes.']

title: Cranberry Chicken
ingredients: ['3 lb. chicken, cut up and skinned', 'frozen cranberry juice concentrate', 'dash of garlic powder']
directions: ['Mix juice half strength!'],['garlic'

title: Tony'S Chicken Wings
ingredients: ['2 to 3 lb. chicken wings, cut in two', '40 cloves garlic', '2 Tbsp. olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 c. red wine']
directions: ['Clean garlic.', 'If large clove, cut in half and count as two cloves.', 'In a nonstick skillet pan, heat oil and garlic.', 'Put in chicken wings and cook until brown and done.', 'Add, while cooking, your salt and pepper.', 'Garlic will melt some and caramelize chicken.', 'Add wine last and simmer for 5 minutes.']

title: Egg In A Frame
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', 'butter', 'egg']
directions: ['Cut center of bread with cookie cutter to make a hole in bread.', 'Melt butter in frying pan.', 'Place bread in butter and break egg in the hole in the bread.', 'Fry until egg is done. Butter round piece and serve with frame.', 'Kids love this one!']

title: Framed Eggs
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter skillet.', 'Cut hole in center of bread with a glass. Cook separately in skillet.', 'When golden brown, turn over.', 'Take one egg and scramble in bowl.', 'Pour egg in hole of bread.', 'Cover hole of bread with center of bread.', 'Cook until egg is done. Makes 1 serving.']

title: Eggy Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 piece bread', 'butter a little']
directions: ['1. Press the cookie cutter into the bread. Make sure it goes all the way through or you'll end up with a rough edge when taking the centre out.', '2. Push the centre of the bread away.', '3. Heat up a little butter in a frying pan. You could probably skip the butter if you're using a non-stick pan.', '4. Place the bread in the pan and fry until slightly browned.', '5. Flip the bread over and carefully crack your egg into the middle.', '6. Turn the heat down to a low/medium flame. Place a lid to cover the entire pan. This helps to cook the top of the egg.', '7. Once the egg is done to your preferred state, carefully lift the eggy bread to a place.', '8. Squeeze over tomato ketchup and enjoy.']

title: The Egyptian Eye
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', '1 teaspoon butter']
directions: ['Cut a square hole out of the bread.', 'Butter and preheat pan.', 'Place bread in pan and break egg into the hole, taking care not to break the yolk.', 'Fry until egg white is opaque but yolk is still runny.', 'Toast extracted bread center.']

title: Lighthouse Egg
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter both sides of bread.', 'Cut out center of bread in the shape of a circle, about 1 1/2 inches in diameter (one way is to use the cover of a pill bottle).', 'Put bread in frying pan.', 'Break egg and place in hole in center of bread.', 'Fry bread on both sides until egg is thoroughly cooked (yolk no longer runs).', 'Use low flame.', 'Remove from pan and eat.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Egg in a Basket
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', '12 tablespoon butter']
directions: ['Cut a circle from the center of the slice of bread using an upside down glass or biscuit cutter.', 'Butter both sides of the bread.', 'Place in a hot skillet over low heat.', 'Break an egg into the center hole.', 'Cook until the egg is set, then turn and cook the other side.', 'Serve sprinkled with salt and pepper.', 'Note: While your basket's a-cookin' you can toast your circular bread piece in the skillet or toaster oven.']

title: Egg In A Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter both sides of bread after tearing out a hole (in the center', 'of the slice) about the size of the egg yolk.', 'Put bread in frying pan and then break egg into hole.', 'Cook slowly and flip to', 'finish', 'cooking', 'egg.', 'Salt and pepper to taste. Serve.']

title: One-Eye Bandits
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Cut a hole in the center of the slice of bread, using a small cup or with a knife.', 'Heat a frying pan over medium fire, melting butter in the pan.']

title: Daddy's Eggs In The Nest Recipe
ingredients: ['Egg', 'Bread', 'Butter']
directions: ['Make a hole in the center of the bread with a shotglass.', 'Save the piece of bread from the middle.', 'Heat butter in a skillet.', 'Place the bread with the hole in it in the skillet.', 'Crack open the egg into the hole.', 'Cook till brown, flip and cook the other side.', 'Dip the little circle bread into the egg and eat.']

title: Toad-In-A-Hole
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Melt a bit of butter in skillet.', 'Using the rim of a glass, press the center out of the slice of bread.', 'Reserve center circle. Put slice of bread in pan.', 'Crack egg into center hole of bread. Turn when egg is set.', 'Cook over low heat until egg is done. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Serve with bread hole covering egg center (Toad)!']

title: Egg In Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 piece of bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Butter one side of the bread.', 'Make a hole in bread.', 'Place in pan.', 'Crack egg inside of hole.', 'Fry till egg is cooked.', 'Salt and pepper to taste']

title: Egg And Soldiers
ingredients: ['1 slice bread, toasted', 'butter', '1 egg']
directions: ['toast bread.', 'butter.', 'cut in half then into 4 strips(rectangles).', 'boil the egg. 3 minutes for soft and 6 minutes is hard.', 'place in an egg cup.', 'tap the top of with a knife or spoon.', 'serve.', 'make sure you dip the soldiers in the runny egg.', 'kids will love it.']

title: Egg-In-Toast
ingredients: ['butter', 'bread', 'egg']
directions: ['Butter a slice of bread on both sides.', 'With the top of a large glass, press onto bread and cut out circle from center. Place in hot, buttered frying pan.', 'Pour 1 stirred-up egg into hole.', 'Fry on both sides.', 'Also, fry round bread piece.']

title: Gram' Cheese Pirogue Filling
ingredients: ['1 lb dry pot cheese', '1 egg', '1 tsp sugar', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
directions: ['Combine pot cheese, egg, sugar together, salt and pepper to taste', 'Fill pieroies using the epicurian pierogi dough recipe']

title: Mother'S Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['Minute rice', '3 c. milk', '1 rounding c. sugar', '3 egg, separated', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Make Minute rice according to package directions for 6 servings.', 'Add milk and sugar.', 'Stir well; heat until just before boiling.', 'To egg yolks add the vanilla.', 'Gradually add egg mixture to rice mixture as not to curdle egg.', 'Stir well.', 'Pour into a 3-quart bowl.']

title: Grilled Chicken Breasts With Tomatillo-Cilantro Salsa
ingredients: ['6 chicken breast halves, boned', 'lemon', 'salt and pepper', '2 Tbsp. finely chopped garlic', '3 Tbsp. olive oil']
directions: ['Grill chicken breasts for 4 minutes per side.'],['lemon'

title: Bite-Sized Stuffies
ingredients: ['1 loaf bread dough, thawed', '36 cubes ham, cheese, shrimp, etc.']
directions: ['Let dough rise slightly.', 'Divide into thirds, then divide each third into 12 pieces.', 'Shape each piece around the meat or cheese and seal well.', 'Place on greased cookie sheet.', 'Cover; let rise in warm place until doubled in size, 30 to 60 minutes.', 'Bake at 400° for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Herbal Lemon Butter Salmon (or Tilapia)
ingredients: ['2 salmon steaks', '1 dash salt and pepper each salmon steak', '2 tbsp herbal butter per salmon steak', '4 slice lemon', '1 dash garlic powder per salmon steak']
directions: ['make herbal butter from my profile (butter, lemon, garlic powder, parsley, thyme, etc)', 'lay 2 layers of aluminium foil about 18' long each', 'sprinkle both sides of fish with salt.', 'lay fish in middle of 2 layers of foil.. put 2 pats of butter on each price of fish (2Tbsp).', 'lay 2 slices of lemon on top of fish.', 'fold foil down and then fold in like a big pouch.. lay on either grill to cook or place on cookie sheet and place in oven..', 'cook for about 15-20 min at 350.... fish should be white and flaky...']

title: 5 Minute Snack
ingredients: ['10 slices bread', '1 lb gr beef', '1 med onion chopped fine', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Heat oven to 500°. Toast bread; spread with prepared mustard or catsup. Mix ground beef and onions; spread evenly on each toast slice making sure edges are covered.', 'Season with salt and pepper. Place meat side up on ungreased baking sheet. Bake 3-5 min. or until meat is done. Cut in half and serve.']

title: Cheater's Honey-Mustard Chicken
ingredients: ['3 lbs chicken parts, with skin', '14 cup honey mustard, commercially prepared', '2 teaspoons mayonnaise']
directions: ['Preheat broiler.', 'Place chicken parts, skin side down, on a broiler pan.', 'In a small bowl, combine the mustard and the mayonnaise and brush half of this on the chicken.', 'Broil 8-10 inches from the heat for 10-12 minutes and then turn the chicken and brush with the remaining mustard mixture.', 'Broil 10-12 minutes, until done.']

title: Stuffed Pumpernickel
ingredients: ['1 medium whole pumpernickel bread', '1 glove garlic', '1 small onion, chopped fine', '1 large Wis-Pride sharp Cheddar', '1/2 c. beer']
directions: ['Mix ingredients together until soft.', 'Refrigerate at least 1 hour.', 'Scoop out bread and fill with cheese mixture.', 'Put extra pieces of bread on the side for dipping.']

title: Smoked Tomatoes
ingredients: ['12 vine-ripened tomatoes, halved crossways', 'olive oil, for drizzling', 'salt & freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['Drizzle the tomatoes with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Prepare a stovetop smoker according to the manufacturer's instructions.', 'Smoke the tomatoes for 20 to 30 minutes.', 'They will keep, covered, in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.']

title: Easy French Iced Coffee
ingredients: ['3 cups strong brewed hot coffee', '1-1/2 cups sugar', '4 cups 2% milk', '2 cups half-and-half cream', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a large bowl, whisk coffee and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Cool. Stir in the milk, cream and vanilla. Freeze in a 3-qt. freezer container for 8 hours or overnight. Transfer to the refrigerator 4 hours before serving. Stir until slushy. Serve immediately.']

title: Peanut Butter And Honey Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons peanut butter', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 teaspoon butter, softened', '2 slices bread']
directions: ['Stir the peanut butter, honey, and butter together in a bowl until smooth; spread on 1 of the bread slices and sandwich with the other slice.']

title: Shrimp Shell Stock
ingredients: ['Shells from 2 pounds shrimp', 'Salt and black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Put the shells in a medium saucepan and add about 1 quart water or enough to cover.', 'Bring it to a boil, then take the pan off the heat and let the shells steep until the water cools.', '(Or, if youre in a hurry, use it right away.)', 'Strain the stock, discard the shells, and add salt and pepper.', 'Use immediately, refrigerate for up to 2 days, or freeze for up to a month.']

title: Fresh Mushroom Sauteed In Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['2 cups mushroom sliced', '3 cloves garlic minced', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch pepper']
directions: ['Heat butter, saute garlic until fragrant.', 'Add the mushroom.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Cook until thicken.']

title: Microwave Poached Egg On Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice bread, toasted', '1 large egg', 'butter, to taste', 'salt, to taste', 'pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Place the toast on a plate, butter it, flatten the middle down with the back of a fork.', 'Crack and carefully pour the egg into the flattened middle of the toast, not allowing it to spill over into the plate.', 'Prick the yolk quickly and carefully with the tines of the fork and bake in the microwave on a turntable for about 1 minute on 60-70% power, until the white is cooked through or desired doneness is achieved.']

title: Creamy Fudge Frosting
ingredients: ['4 ounces unsweetened chocolate, chopped', '1/4 cup butter, cubed', '2/3 cup 2% milk', '1 cup sugar', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['Melt chocolate and butter in a metal bowl over barely simmering water. Stir until smooth.', 'Place milk, sugar and vanilla in a blender; cover and process 1 minute to dissolve sugar. Add warm chocolate mixture; cover and process just until mixture thickens to desired consistency, about 30 seconds. Store in refrigerator.']

title: Rothy'S Butter Bacon
ingredients: ['1lb Bacon', '1/2lb Butter']
directions: ['Unwrap bacon. Melt butter in a large pan at medium-high heat. Lay Bacon across the pan, cook until slightly browned, then turn over. Flip a second time - and be sure the heat is not so high as to burn the butter. The bacon is ready when slightly browed on both sides. Place on a a paper towel on a plate to allow extraneous grease to drip off.', '', 'Serve immediately or place in Ziploc bag and reheat later.']

title: Bacon Biscuits
ingredients: ['3 shots bacon', '54 pounds butter']
directions: ['combine some bacon and butter'],['bacon'

title: Fresh Tomato Gravy
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 cup chopped mushroom', '1/2 cup finely chopped onion', '2 cups chopped peeled tomatoes', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper']
directions: ['Melt butter in a medium nonstick saucepan over medium heat.', 'Add mushrooms and onion, and cook 4 minutes or until tender, stirring frequently.', 'Add chopped red tomato.', 'Bring to a boil, and cook for 10 minutes or until liquid almost evaporates.', 'Stir in 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.']

title: Easy Baked Egg Casserole
ingredients: ['1 dozen egg, whisked', '1/4 cup milk', '2 tablespoons melted butter', '1 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Whisk all ingredients together and place in a buttered 13x9x2 glass baking dish. Bake at 350* for 40-45 minutes till knife inserted in the middle comes out clean.'],['egg'

title: Mom'S Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['5 Tbsp. rice', '4 c. scalded milk', 'little salt', 'little butter', '5 Tbsp. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes until it thickens.', 'Stir every 15 minutes while baking.']

title: Crispy Bacon Rosti
ingredients: ['1 lb potato, washed, unpeeled', '6 slices bacon, chopped', '2 teaspoons butter']
directions: ['Boil the potatoes for 10 mins then drain.', 'Scrape off the skins and grate coarsely.', 'Fry the chopped bacon for 5 minutes Add the butter.', 'Stir in the grated potato and season with salt and pepper.', 'Press the mix down and cook for 10 minutes', 'Finish under the broiler for the last 5 mins to crisp up the top of the rosti.', 'Serve in wedges as a side dish or whole as above for a quick meal for one.']

title: Low Carb Cauliflower Hash Browns
ingredients: ['1 small cauliflower', '1 egg', 'butter, enough to really fry the cauliflower', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Chop the cauliflower into tiny pieces. grating it is also a good idea but a bit messier.', 'Once the cauliflower is chopped, scramble the egg into a separate container and beat well.', 'Combine the egg, cauliflower, salt and pepper forming into several patties. Depending on the size of your cauliflower you will be able to make different numbers of patties (more eggs will be needed if more cauliflower is used).', 'Heat the griddle or pan to med high heat as to properly sear the 'hash browns'.', 'Cook for about 5 min or until dark brown. Serve with ketchup or plain and enjoy!']

title: Rich Hot Chocolate
ingredients: ['2 1/2 cup whole milk', '4 oz 99% unsweetened chocolate, coarsely chopped', '1/3 cup granulated sugar', '1 1/2 tsp pure vanilla extract']
directions: ['Heat milk in a saucepan over medium heat until steam rises from the surface.', 'Whisk in chocolate and sugar, and continue whisking for 1 to 2 minutes, until sugar has dissolved.', 'Whisk in vanilla.', 'Reduce heat to low; keep warm until ready to serve.', 'Serve in small cups.', 'For an airier consistency, remove from heat, and mix with a hand blender set on low just before serving']

title: The Best Roast Turkey You Could Ever Eat
ingredients: ['1 whole turkey, size depending on how many people you want it to serve', '1/4 lb butter, softened', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Rinse the turkey and dry it well. Sprinkle the cavity well with salt. Stuff as desired.', 'Rub the softened butter all over the outside of the bird, and sprinkled it lightly with salt.', 'Place the turkey on the rack of a large roaster, which has a heavy bottom, pouring about 2 inches of water in the bottom of the pan.', 'Lay the neck and giblets alongside, cover the pan tightly and put it on the large burner on top of the stove. Allow it to boil and then steam gently for 4 1/2 to 5 hours, approximately the same length of time that it would take to roast the same bird. Take care to see the pan does not cook dry.', 'When the drumsticks are loosened and the meat thermometer indicates the bird is about done, dribble a bot of soft butter over the skin, sprinkled it with a bit of white sugar and flour and bang it into a 350*F oven to brown while theaccompanying vegetables are cooking on top of the stove.', 'The drippings in the bottom of the roasting pan will be a rich dark brown. Skim off any fat and then use them to make a rich gravy.']

title: Gooey Pecan Bars
ingredients: ['1 box butter pecan cake mix', '1 stick margarine', '1 egg']
directions: ['Mix', 'together and spread in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.']

title: Chess Cake
ingredients: ['1 stick melted margarine', '1 box Duncan Hines butter recipe cake mix', '1 egg, beaten']
directions: ['Mix together and press out on bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan.'],['egg'

title: Banana Smoothie Boost
ingredients: ['1 frozen banana', '2/3 cup almond milk', '1 teaspoon honey', '2 teaspoons coffee', 'shaved chocolate']
directions: ['Mix everything but shaved chocolate up in a blender.', 'pour into glass and sprinkle chocolate on top.']

title: German Pancakes
ingredients: ['1/2 c. milk', '1 egg', 'dash of salt', '1 Tbsp. sugar', '1/4 stick butter']
directions: ['This is best if cooked in cast-iron skillet.', 'Heat oven and pan to 425°.']

title: Uncooked Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['12 oz. peanut butter', '1/2 c. butter', '1 lb. 10x sugar', '1 egg', '2 Tbsp. milk']
directions: ['Melt peanut butter and margarine on low; stir constantly. Remove from heat; add egg, sugar and milk.', 'Mix together with your hands until smooth.', 'Place in 8 x 8-inch buttered pan for thick fudge.', 'Place in 15 x 10-inch buttered pan for thinner fudge.', 'I prefer the thinner.', 'Refrigerate.']

title: Confit Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: ['12 cherry tomatoes', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1/8 teaspoon sugar']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 200°F. Bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil. Using a paring knife, mark a shallow X on the bottom of each tomato. Add to the boiling water for 3 to 4 seconds. Immediately transfer to an ice bath and, once cool, remove the skins with a paring knife, being careful not to cut into the flesh. Toss the peeled tomatoes in the olive oil, salt, and sugar. Place on a rimmed baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 1 1/2 hours, until the tomatoes are slightly shriveled and about one-quarter of their original size. Cool to room temperature and refrigerate in an airtight container for up to 3 days.']

title: Chocolate Fudge Frosting
ingredients: ['4 ounces unsweetened chocolate', '1/2 cup butter', '1 pound box confectioner's sugar', '1/2 cup milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla']
directions: ['Melt chocolate and butter together.', 'Set aside.', 'Combine sugar, milk and vanilla in medium bowl.', 'Stir until smooth. Add chocolate mixture.', 'Set bowl in a pan of ice and water.', 'Beat with mixer until thick enough to spread and hold its shape.', 'Take frosting out of ice water just when it gets thick enough to hold shape. It will continue to thicken a little after coming out of the ice water. If it gets too thick, add a little milk.']

title: Veal Rib Chop
ingredients: ['8 ounces veal rip chops', '3 teaspoons salt', '3 teaspoons pepper']
directions: ['Season both sides of the veal chops', 'Heat a grill on medium to medium high heat', 'Add the chops and cook for 5 minutes', 'Flip once and cook another 5 minutes', 'Remove from grill and let rest for 4 - 5 minutes', 'Serve and enjoy!']

title: Line'S Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['1 egg, beaten', 'milk', 'salt and pepper', 'chicken']
directions: ['Add beaten egg to milk.', 'Salt and pepper chicken.', 'Dip in milk and egg mixture.', 'Batter chicken in flour.', 'Deep-fry or cook in electric skillet.', 'Keep chicken covered with lid until done on one side.', 'Turn chicken over and put lid back on until chicken is done.']

title: Pinwheels
ingredients: ['10x sugar', 'milk', 'butter', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Mix together first three ingredients and roll out on waxed paper.', 'Spread on peanut butter.', 'Roll up and cut thin. Refrigerate.', 'Enjoy!!']

title: Easy Cheez-It Chicken Fingers
ingredients: ['8 10 chicken breast tenders', '1/2 cup Cheez-It crackers', '1/2 cup milk', '1 egg', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.', 'Take the milk, egg, a little salt and pepper and whisk together in a bowl, put aside.', 'Crush the cheeze its in a ziploc bag, okay to have small chunks here and there, pour onto a plate.', 'Take chicken and dip in milk mixture and then roll in cheeze its.', 'Place on another plate and continue until all chicken is coated.', 'I love to run each piece through x2 to get extra coating and use the whole mix.', 'Place on baking sheet and bake 20-30 minutes depending on size.', 'Cool and serve, very yummy with ranch dressing as a dip.']

title: Hot Fudge
ingredients: ['4 sq unsweetened chocolate', '3 c sugar', '1/2 lb butter', 'salt', '1 can whole evaporated milk']
directions: ['Melt butter, add and melt chocolate and salt. Add the sugar, and slowly add the evaporated milk. Dissolve sugar.']

title: Roasted Pickled Pork
ingredients: ['1 1/3 kg pickled pork', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Preheat your fan forced oven to 180 degrees celsius.', 'Cover the top of the pork with the olive oil and massage in well.', 'Place the pork into your oven and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. I baked it for the first hour at 180 degrees celsius and then the last 15 minutes at 200 degrees celsius to obtain a crust on the roast.']

title: Baked Creole Eggplant
ingredients: ['2 eggplant, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 c. raw peeled, deveined shrimp, chopped', '1 to 2 ribs celery, chopped', '1/2 c. butter']
directions: ['Boil eggplant until soft.', 'Saute onion, shrimp and celery in butter.', 'Combine with eggplant.', 'Pour into casserole and sprinkle with bread crumbs.', 'Bake for 30 minutes at 350°.']

title: Cake Topping
ingredients: ['1 small can evaporated milk', '2/3 c. sugar', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1 c. coconut, separate', '1/2 c. nuts, separate']
directions: ['Mix and boil 10 minutes, then add coconut and nuts.', 'Pour over cake.']

title: Dip Graham Crackers
ingredients: ['8 ounces BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate', '16 graham crackers']
directions: ['PLACE chocolate in a glass measuring cup.', 'Microwave on MEDIUM power for 3 minutes; remove from oven and continue stirring until completely melted.', 'DIP half of each cracker into the melted chocolate.', 'Place cracker on a waxed paper-lined tray; chill.', 'Makes 12 to 16 crackers.']

title: Fruit And Nut Dark Chocolate Bark
ingredients: ['7 ounces, weight Good Quality, Dark Chocolate', 'Assorted Fruit And Nuts']
directions: ['Break up the chocolate and melt in a bowl over a saucepan of bubbling hot water. When it is completely melted, pour onto a baking tray lined with grease-proof paper.', 'Sprinkle your choice of dried fruit and nuts over the chocolate and leave in the fridge to set. When completely hardened, break into shards of chocolate and store in the fridge until ready to eat. Enjoy!']

title: Zucchini with Tomatoes
ingredients: ['8 cup coarsely chopped zucchini', '14 1/2 oz diced tomatoes', '2 tbsp tomato paste', '1/2 tsp salt', '3 tbsp butter']
directions: ['Heat butter in a pot.', 'Add zucchini amd salt.', 'Simmer 5 minutes.', 'Add the tomatoes and tomato paste, simmer 20 minutes.', 'Then cover for 10 minutes serve hope you enjoy!']

title: Vanilla
ingredients: ['34 cup milk', '4 swirls whipped cream', '2 teaspoons sugar', '14 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['stir together and serve whith whipped cream on top.'],['cream'

title: Grilled Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: ['1 large sweet potato, halved lenghtwise', '1 tablespoon butter, softened', 'salt, to taste', 'pepper, to taste', '2 teaspoons honey']
directions: ['Cut two pieces of heavy duty foil, about 18 X 12 inches; place a potato half onto each piece of foil.', 'Spread cut side with butter.', 'Sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Fold foil over potatoes and seal tightly.', 'Grill covered, over medium hot heat for 50 minutes, or until tender, turning once.', 'To serve, fluff potatoes with a fork and drizzle with honey.']

title: Guess Again Carrots
ingredients: ['2 lb. carrots', '2 Tbsp. butter', '1 medium onion, grated', '6 to 8 oz. sharp Cheddar, grated', '1/2 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper']
directions: ['Pare, slice and boil carrots until tender.', 'Mash; add butter, cheese, salt, pepper and onion.', 'Place in buttered 1-quart casserole.', 'Sprinkle 1 cup buttered Ritz crackers, crushed.', 'Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.']

title: Johnna'S Breakfast Cheese
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter', '1/4 c. sugar', '3 slices cheese']
directions: ['In a heavy skillet, melt butter.', 'Stir in sugar and add cheese that has been cut in small pieces.', 'Let come to a slow boil and cook for 3 to 5 minutes on low.', 'Stir often so it won't scorch. Spread on toast or biscuits.', 'Also good for an after school snack.']

title: French Bread With Biloxi Butter
ingredients: ['1 lb. butter, softened', '1 1/2 lb. shrimp, boiled, peeled, deveined and processed in a blender', 'garlic powder to taste', 'fresh French bread']
directions: ['Cream butter and garlic until light and fluffy.', 'Fold shrimp into butter and mix well.', 'Serve on hot French bread.', 'May also be toasted under broiler.']

title: My Favorite Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ['3 cups sugar, divided', '3/4 cup milk', '1 egg, beaten', '1 pinch salt', '1/2 cup butter, cut up']
directions: ['Sprinkle 1/2 cup sugar in a heavy saucepan; place over medium heat. Cook, stirring constantly, until sugar melts and syrup is light golden brown.The sugar will start to clump, this is normal, just keep stirring.', 'Combine reamaining 2 1/2 cups sugar, milk, beaten egg, and salt, stirring well, stir in the butter. Stir mixture into carmelized sugar, the mixture will lump again, just keep stirring.', 'Cook over medium heat stirring frequently, until a candy thermometer registers at 230F, this takes about 15-20 minutes, but don't rely on the time! Check the thermometer!)Cool mixture 5 minutes.', 'Beat mixture with a WOODEN spoon to almost spreading consistency. The mixture will cool and thicken quickly at this point. Spread on a cooled cake.']

title: Favorite Caramel Frosting
ingredients: ['3 c. sugar, divided', '3/4 c. milk', '1 egg, beaten', 'pinch of salt', '1/2 c. butter, cut up']
directions: ['Sprinkle 1/2 cup sugar in a heavy saucepan; place over medium heat.', 'Cook, stirring constantly, until sugar melts and syrup is light golden brown.', 'Combine remaining 2 1/2 cups sugar, milk, beaten egg and salt, stirring well; stir in butter.', 'Stir butter mixture into hot caramelized sugar.', '(The mixture will tend to lump, becoming smooth with further cooking.)', 'Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until a candy thermometer registers 230° (about 15 to 20 minutes).', 'Cool 5 minutes.', 'Beat with a wooden spoon to almost spreading consistency (about 5 minutes) and spread on cooled cake.', 'Yield:', 'about 2 1/2 cups.']

title: Buffalo Eggs
ingredients: ['1 slice dense sandwich bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 egg', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Use a cookie cutter or glass to cut out a 2 inch circle in the center of the slice of bread.', 'Heat a small nonstick skillet over medium heat.', 'Add 2 teaspoons butter.', 'When butter has melted and is foamy, place the slice of bread in the pan.', 'Cook for 1 minute until golden.', 'Flip the piece of bread over, drop the remaining 1 teaspoon butter in the hole, and when the butter has completely melted, crack the egg into the hole.', 'The white will run under and the yolk will sit in the hole.', 'Cook over medium heat 1 to 3 minutes until as set as desired.', 'If you wish a drier egg, you can flip the toast back over to lightly cook the top of the yolk.', 'Serve hot.', 'You can make more than one portion at a time on the flat surface of a griddle.']

title: Egg-in-a-Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice of your favorite kind of bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 egg', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper']
directions: ['With a biscuit cutter or the rim of a glass, press a hole in the center of the slice of bread.', 'Heat a skillet over medium-low heat and melt in the butter.', 'When the butter is all spread out, place the piece of bread in the skillet and crack the egg straight into the center of the hole.', 'Cook until the egg sets a bit on the bottom, 30 to 45 seconds.', 'Sprinkle the egg with salt and pepper.', 'After about a minute, flip it over with a spatula and salt and pepper the other side.', 'Move the whole piece of toast around the skillet, soaking up all of the glorious butter.', 'Let it cook until the yolk feels soft.', 'Here's the key: golden brown toast, white (not brown/burned) whites, soft unbroken yolk.', 'Perfect.']

title: Egg-In-A-Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Tear an egg size hole in the middle of the bread.', 'Grease the top of the hot tin-can stove with margarine.', 'Lay bread on the stove and break the egg into the hole of the bread.', 'Cook until egg begins to harden on the bottom and bread turns brown underneath. Insert pancake turner under to peek; put more margarine on the stove top.', 'Turn over the bread and egg to cook the other side. Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Remove to a plate to eat.']

title: Egyptian Eyes
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Remove center of bread.', 'Butter both sides of bread.', 'Place bread in hot frying pan over medium heat.', 'Drop egg into hole in bread.', 'Fry until egg is set, then turn over and cook other side. Makes 1 serving.']

title: Egg In The Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice seeded rye bread', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon butter', 'salt']
directions: ['Place the egg in its shell on its long side in the center of the toast. Cut around it with a sharp knife, creating a whole. Save the piece of bread you cut out, hopefully in one piece!', 'Butter both pieces of bread lightly on both sides. Put the rest of the butter (at least a teaspoon or so) in a pan and get it sizzling but don't let it brown.', 'Put the two pieces of bread in the pan. Crack the egg over the toast so that the yolk stays in the hole. Spread the white out a little with a wooden spoon so that it coats more of the toast - this is easier (and obviously, the whole thing tastes better) with a good fresh egg.', 'After the white has set on the bottom (1-2 minutes) flip the toast, being careful not to break the egg. Also flip the little extra bit of toast. 1 more minute and it's done! Season with salt.']

title: Cookie Cutter Breakfast
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'butter']
