directions: ['Press the cookie cutter into the middle of the slice of bread and take out the center.', 'Butter what is left of the bread and the cutout piece.', 'Spread some butter in frying pan or griddle.', 'Place the unbuttered side down in the pan.', 'Break an egg into a small bowl and pour into the hole.', 'Fry until ready to turn over.', 'Also fry the cutout piece of bread.', 'Serves 1.']

title: Birds' Nests
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 slice bread', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Place bread on cutting board.', 'Cut a hole out of the center of the bread, using a small drinking glass.', 'Gently remove the bread from the opening of the glass so as not to tear the bread.', 'Melt butter in skillet and put the slice of bread in the butter.', 'Break the egg gently into the hole of the bread.', 'Toast the middle of the bread in the skillet beside the piece of bread.', 'Add salt and pepper to the egg.', 'Gently turn when the egg white is set and cook until desired doneness.', 'Serve the toasted middle of the bread on the side of the Bird's Nest.']

title: Egg In The Basket
ingredients: ['egg', 'bread', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Cut a circle in the middle of a piece of bread.', 'If you don't have a round cookie cutter, the top of a glass will work.', 'Heat a skillet or griddle sprayed with Pam or Mazola.', 'Place the bread in the pan.', 'Put about 1/2 t butter in the hole in the bread.', 'Heat the butter until very hot.', 'Crack an egg in the hole.', 'Use a spatula to move the white around so it gets done.', 'When the egg is fairly well set, turn the bread and egg over to cook the other side, being careful not to break the yolk.', 'In the meantime, toast the holes from the bread for dipping in the yolk.', 'Oh, and salt and pepper as desired.', 'I guess you could toast the bread before you put it in the pan, but I've never tried it that way.']

title: Toad in the Hole
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Butter both sides of a slice of bread.', 'Using a round cookie cutter, cut a hole in the middle of the slice of bread.', 'Heat a skillet.', 'Put slice of bread in the skillet.', 'Crack egg and pour into hole in the bread.', 'Cook til bread is done on one side.', 'Flip using a pancake turner.', 'Finish cooking til egg is desired doneness.']

title: Grilled Broccoli With Blue Cheese
ingredients: ['Broccoli', 'Blue Cheese']
directions: ['RECIPE', '', '5 oz. broccoli cut into florets (1/4 oz. pieces)', '', '1. Marinate broccoli in vinaigrette.', '', '2. Grill until tender.', '', '3. Mix with crispy onions.', '', '4. Plate with bleu cheese cream on the bottom of the plate, placing broccoli and crispy onions on top of the cream.', '', '5. Garnish with preserved lemon.', '', 'VINAIGRETTE', '1 cup rice wine vinegar', '2 tablespoon saracha', '4 tablespoon Dijon', '2 lemons worth of zest', '1 oz lemon juice', '6 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 cups olive oil', '1 cup minced shallot', '3 tablespoon harissa', '', 'Mix all ingredients together by hand.', '', 'CRISPY ONIONS', '1 pound maseca flour', '1 pound corn starch', '4 large onions, sliced thin', '', 'Mix flour and corn starch, dreg onions. Fry at 275 degrees.', '', 'BLEU CHEESE CREAM', '2 quarts heavy cream', '1 1/4 lb. smoky bleu cheese', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '2 teaspoon crushed black pepper', 'Secondary quart of bleu cheese', '1 quart of sour cream', '', 'Whisk all ingredients together until bleu cheese is melted. Strain to produce a thick cream, and let it cool. Salt to taste. Mix in secondary quart of bleu cheese and sour cream so the mixture is chunky.']

title: Baked Cheese And Onion Spread
ingredients: ['1 c. mayonnaise', '1/2 onion, finely chopped', '1 1/2 c. cheese, grated']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together.', 'Bake at 350° for 10 to 15 minutes until bubbly or spread on crackers and broil until bubbly. Variation:', 'Instead of onion, use bacon bits and horseradish.']

title: Cookie Or Brownie Icing
ingredients: ['1 box 4x powdered sugar', '1 stick butter, softened', '3 Tbsp. milk', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients together until there are no lumps left. Add food coloring, sprinkles, chocolate chips or whatever you desire and frost.', 'After use, refrigerate.']

title: Dinner Tonight: Stuffed Tomato Nests Recipe
ingredients: ['1 tomato', '1 egg', '1/2 tablespoon butter', 'Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 425°F. Cut a hole around the stem. Scoop out the insides with a spoon, leaving enough to keep the walls fairly strong. Sprinkle a little salt inside, and turn upside down to drain off any excess liquid.', 'Place on a baking sheet lined with aluminum and coated with a little oil and set in the oven for five minutes. When done, drain the juices from the inside, again.', 'Crack the egg inside the tomato cavity. Stick the butter on top of the egg. Set back in the oven and cook 5-8 minutes, or until the whites have set. Season with salt and pepper.']

title: Turkey On The Grill
ingredients: ['10 to 12 pound turkey', 'Salt', '3 tablespoons Land O Lakes Butter, melted']
directions: ['Thaw and prepare turkey for roasting as directed on package; remove giblets from neck and body cavities.', 'Do not stuff.', 'Season cavity with salt; brush skin with melted butter.', 'Kettle or Covered Charcoal Grill', 'Place coals to one side in grill; heat until coals are ash white.', 'Make aluminum foil drip pan; place opposite hot coals.', 'Place top grilling rack over coals and drip pan.', 'Place prepared turkey onto grill over drip pan.', 'Open bottom vents directly under coals.', 'Cover grill, positioning top vent directly over side of grill with turkey.', 'Adjust vent as necessary to keep a consistently hot fire.', 'Add coals to fire as necessary.', 'Grill turkey 11-20 minutes per pound, turning halfway through the time and basting with butter.', 'Turkey is done when meat thermometer inserted into thick part of breast or thigh reaches 165F.', 'Remove turkey from grill.', 'Let stand 15 minutes before carving.', 'Gas Grill', 'Make aluminum foil drip pan.', 'Place over coals on one side of grill, if using dual control gas grill; heat other side 10-15 minutes on high.', 'Place drip pan over one half of coals to block out direct heat, if single control gas grill is used; heat grill 10-15 minutes on high.', 'Reduce heat to medium.', 'Place turkey onto top rack directly above drip pan.', 'Grill turkey on medium heat 11-20 minutes per pound, turning halfway through the time and basting with butter.', 'Turkey is done when meat thermometer inserted into thick part of breast or thigh reaches 165F.', 'Remove turkey from grill.', 'Let stand 15 minutes before carving.']

title: Peanut Butter And Tomato Toast
ingredients: ['1/2 tomatoes, sliced', '2 slices bread, toasted', '2 teaspoons peanut butter', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['toast bread.', 'spread with peanut butter.', 'top with tomato.', 'sprinkle with salt (optional) and pepper.', 'eat and enjoy.']

title: My Sister'S Cucumber Dip
ingredients: ['large container of Hood's Small Curd Cottage Cheese', 'Garlic Salt', 'small chunks of Cucumber']
directions: ['Mix a large container of Hood's small curd Cottage Cheese with a sprinkling of Garlic Salt and several chunks of Cucumbers.', 'Bring out the potato chips and watch it disappear.']

title: Pasta Al Burro Di Giovanni
ingredients: ['2 cups of your favourite Barilla pasta', '2 tbsp unsalted butter', '1 cup freshly grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese', '1 Salt to taste']
directions: ['Cook pasta according to package instructions and reserve a bit of the pasta water. Add butter, cheese, and salt to taste, using pasta water as needed; stir.', 'Chef's tip: Want something richer? Use gorgonzola and pecorino cheese for a grown-up version. Add along with the butter so they melt and form a rich sauce.']

title: Baker's Chocolate-Dipped Macaroons
ingredients: ['2.67 c. Baker's Angel Flake Coconut', '0.67 c. Eagle Brand Sweetened Condensed Milk', '1 tsp. vanilla', '2 squares Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate']
directions: ['Combine coconut, milk, and vanilla.', 'Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart, onto baking sheets sprayed with cooking spray.', 'To prevent burning, press down any ends of coconut shreds with back of spoon.', 'Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are golden brown.', 'Immediately transfer cookies from baking sheets to wire racks.', 'Cool completely.', 'Melt chocolate as directed on package.', 'Dip cookies halfway into chocolate; return to racks.', 'Let stand until chocolate is firm.', 'Can be stored in tightly covered container at room temperature up to 1 week.']

title: Lobster Stew
ingredients: ['2 c. milk', '2 c. cream', '1 c. butter', '2 tsp. salt', '1/8 tsp. pepper', '1 lb. lobster meat']
directions: ['Simmer lobster meat in butter until it reaches a good pink color.', 'Slowly add milk and cream, stirring constantly until stew has developed a rich salmon color.', 'Remove from heat and let age 5 or 6 hours.', 'Reheat slowly.', 'Serves 8.']

title: Baked Trout
ingredients: ['4 lbs trout', '12 slices bacon', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['Clean trout.', 'Sprinkle inside with salt pepper.', 'Place 6 strips of bacon on bottom of pan.', 'Place fish on top of bacon.', 'Lay 6 strips of bacon over the fish.', 'Put a cover on the dish and bake at 250 degrees Fahrenheit for 6 hours.', 'At the end the bones will be soft like canned salmon. A 2 lb. fish requires only 3 hours baking.']

title: Bathtub Turkey
ingredients: ['20 pounds turkey', '1 apple', '1 stick butter', 'salt']
directions: ['Thaw the turkey in the bathtub', 'Drink beer and play games while thawing', 'The next morning. Have a friend remove the innards, as you will be hungover and probably gag.', 'Place in roaster with apple, butter, and salt and pepper for at least four hours while you imbibe and play more games.', 'Enjoy with friends for whom you are thankful!']

title: Roasted Sweet Potato Slices
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter, melted', '3/4 lb sweet potato, left unpeeled and cut into 1/8 inch thick slices', 'salt']
directions: ['In a small bowl whisk together the oil, butter and salt and pepper to taste.', 'Arrange the potato slices not touching in rows on an oiled baking sheet.', 'Brush slices with the oil mixture.', 'Roast them in the oven on the upper third or middle layer of a pre heated 450 degree oven turning once.', 'Bake for about 18-22 minutes or until golden crisp.', 'Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt to taste.']

title: World'S Best Baked Potato
ingredients: ['1 medium potato', '2 slices bacon', '1 tablespoon butter', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Take medium-sized potato.', 'Split while raw (do not cut all the way through the potato).', 'Season with butter, salt, pepper and place one slice of bacon in middle of potato.', 'Wrap tightly in foil and cook slowly in coals or a 350° oven for one hour or until tender when pierced with a fork.', 'When done, remove the bacon.', '(I usually melt some butter and sour cream to pour over potato.) This is a guaranteed recipe for artery clogging.']

title: Fancy Baked Potato
ingredients: ['1 large potato', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 onion, sliced', '1 pat butter', '2 slices bacon']
directions: ['Peel the potato and split in half.', 'Salt and pepper each half. Put a large slice of onion and a pat of butter between the halves.', 'Wrap in bacon and seal in aluminum foil.', 'Bake in a 400° oven until done, about 1 1/2 hours.']

title: Broiled Tomatoes
ingredients: ['tomatoes, halved', 'any shredded cheese']
directions: ['Place halved tomatoes on cookie sheet.', 'Sprinkle on cheese. Place under broiler for about two minutes.', 'Can be topped also with any of your favorite dried herbs.', 'Example:', 'Use Parmesan cheese and basil.']

title: Salmon Soup
ingredients: ['1 can salmon', '1 can milk', '1 small onion, chopped', '1/4 c. butter']
directions: ['Combine in pot.', 'Bring to boil.', 'Serve warm with crackers.']

title: Fried Eggplant I
ingredients: ['egg', 'salt', 'butter', 'eggplant']
directions: ['Pare an egg plant and cut in very thin slices.', 'Sprinkle slices with salt and pile on a plate.', 'Cover with a weight to express the juice, and let stand one and one-half hours.', 'Dredge with flour and sautee slowly in butter until crisp and brown.', 'Eggplant is in season from September to February.']

title: Littlemafia's Garlic Asparagus
ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus', '1 ounce butter', '1 garlic clove', 'salt']
directions: ['Slice asparagus into 2,5 cm lenghts on the diagonal.', 'Melt butter in a frying pan.', 'Add garlic, salt and asparagus.', 'Stir fry till asparagus is tender and serve immediately.']

title: chocolate truffles
ingredients: ['300 grams dark chocolate', '300 ml double cream', '50 grams butter']
directions: ['break the chocolate into small pieces', 'in a pan heat the cream and butter till the butter is melted.', 'Don't let the cream boil', 'pour the cream mixture over the chocolate and stir till melted', 'pour the chocolate mix into separate bowls and add extras.', 'I made Bailey's truffles, sambuca truffles, honeycomb truffles and pistachio truffles', 'put in the fridge to set.', 'overnight preferably', 'once set use a melon baller to create good truffle shapes and roll in cocoa powder for classic truffles although you can use any desired coating.', 'enjoy!']

title: Sweetbreads Wrapped In Bacon
ingredients: ['1 pound veal sweetbreads', '12 slices bacon, cut in half']
directions: ['Place sweetbreads in a medium mixing bowl; cover with cold water. Set aside to soak for 1 hour. Drain well; remove and discard white membrane.', 'Place sweetbreads and water to cover in a small Dutch oven. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer 20 minutes. Drain well, and rinse with cold water. Cool sweetbreads completely.', 'Cut sweetbreads into 24 bite-size pieces. Wrap a half slice of bacon around each piece of sweetbread, and secure with a wooden pick.', 'Saute sweetbreads in a large skillet over medium heat until bacon is crisp and brown. Remove sweetbreads from skillet, and drain well on paper towels. Serve immediately.']

title: Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 pieces bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Place cheese sandwich in microwave for 30 seconds.'],['bread'

title: Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['bread', 'cheese']
directions: ['put the cheese in between the bread and grill it.'],['bread'

title: Easy Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Put the bread in the toaster, when it pops up put the cheese on it, then put it in the microwave for about 30 seconds.']

title: grilled cheese sandwiches
ingredients: ['1 slice cheese', '2 slice bread']
directions: ['Cook on medium until cheese is melted and bread is golden brown'],['bread'

title: Quick Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Toast bread in toaster.', 'Place cheese on bread; top with second piece of bread.', 'Place on paper plate.', 'Microwave on High for 15 to 20 seconds, or until cheese melts.', 'Makes 1 serving.']

title: Cheese Sticks
ingredients: ['bread', 'cheese']
directions: ['First, toast your bread and then put cheese on your bread. Then put it in the microwave for 21 seconds.', 'Take it out and then cut it in long strips.']

title: Peachy Shrimp Crostini
ingredients: ['30 French bread slices, toasted', 'Goat cheese, softened']
directions: ['Spread toasted French bread slices with softened goat cheese. Top each with 1 tsp. Ginger-Peach Chutney and 1 peeled Perfect Poached Shrimp.'],['bread'

title: Microwave-Toasted Cheese Sandwiches
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Put 2 slices of bread into toaster.', 'Pull knob down.', 'When it pops up, put the bread on a plate.', 'Put 1 slice of cheese between the bread.', 'This makes the sandwich.', 'Then put it in the microwave for 15 seconds to melt the cheese.', 'It's delicious!']

title: Dad'S Microwave Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Toast bread in toaster. Then put toasted bread on plate and place cheese on one slice of the bread.', 'Cover with other slice of toasted bread.', 'Place in microwave for 15 to 20 seconds or until cheese is melted.', 'Yields 1 serving.']

title: Mikey'S Cheesy Tost
ingredients: ['a piece of bread', '1 slice of cheese']
directions: ['Tost bread, a peace of cheese on tost on for sauce.', 'Put tost in microwave.', 'Heat for 24 seconds or until cheese is melted.']

title: Cheese Toast
ingredients: ['bread', 'cheese']
directions: ['Get a piece of bread.', 'Put cheese on top.', 'Put it in the toaster oven until cheese is melted, then eat it.']

title: Toasted Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Toast the bread; put the cheese between toasted bread.'],['bread'

title: Cheesy Ghost On Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice white American cheese', '1 slice bread']
directions: ['Toast 1 slice of bread.', 'With butter knife, cut 1 slice of cheese into a ghostly shape.', 'Use straw to cut out eyes.', 'Place cheesy ghost on top of toast.', 'Then enjoy.']

title: Aunt Eve'S Cheese Cake
ingredients: ['32 graham crackers', '2 Tbsp. sugar', '1/2 c. butter']
directions: ['Crush graham crackers.', 'Add sugar and melted butter; mix well. Reserve 1 cup for top.', 'Chill crust in refrigerator while making filling.']

title: Favorite Cheesy Grill
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '2 slices processed cheese', '2 tsp. margarine']
directions: ['Top 1 bread slice with processed cheese and second slice of bread.', 'Spread sandwich with margarine.', 'Cook in skillet on medium heat until lightly browned on both sides.', 'Makes 1 sandwich.']

title: Vanilla Icing
ingredients: ['2 cups Sifted Powdered Sugar', '4 Tablespoons Butter, Melted', '1 teaspoon Vanilla', '3 Tablespoons Milk']
directions: ['Combine the ingredients with enough milk to the desired consistency.', 'To frost the Apple Pancake Cupcakes, place the frosting in a zip top bag, cut the tip off, and place a nice sized blob on top of the cupcake. It will spread out a bit over the next few minutes.']

title: Ritz Cracker Chicken
ingredients: ['8 to 10 pieces boneless, skinless chicken', '2 sticks margarine', 'Lawry's garlic salt with parsley flakes', '1 large box Ritz crackers']
directions: ['Take chicken and use meat hammer to tenderize lightly.', 'Melt butter and add garlic salt to completely cover top of butter.', 'Dip chicken in butter and garlic salt.', 'Place in baking pan that has been covered with Pam spray.', 'Bake at 350° for 45 minutes, covered, then take off foil and bake 10 more minutes to brown.']

title: Granny'S Chicken
ingredients: ['Chicken pieces', 'Bacon', 'Garlic Powder', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
directions: ['Place chicken pieces in a roasting pan. Sprinkly liberally with garlic power, salt and pepper. Layer bacon across pieces. Each piece should have some bacon touching. As my boys say 'you can never have too much bacon'.', 'Cover with aluminum foil.', 'Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. Remove foil. Bake for another 15 until bacon gets crispy.', 'That's it!!']

title: Grilled Bacon & Banana Sandwich
ingredients: ['3 slices Bacon', '1 whole Banana', '2 slices Bread Of Choice', '2 Tablespoons Butter']
directions: ['Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.', 'When done, put the bacon on a paper towel to drain the grease.', 'Mash the banana in a bowl and set aside.', 'Butter one side of each slice of the bread really well.', 'Turn the bread over so the buttered side is facing down.', 'Spread the mashed banana onto the unbuttered side of one of the pieces of bread.', 'Top with bacon.', 'Cap it with the second slice of bread, buttered side up.', 'Heat a pan over medium heat and drop the sandwich onto it.', 'Grill both sides of the sandwich until each side is nice and golden brown.', 'If you have a panini maker, all the better.', 'Flip so the sandwich is grilled on both sides.', 'Enjoy.']

title: Frog In The Pond
ingredients: ['1 Tablespoon Butter', '1 whole Egg', '1 slice Bread', 'Pepper To Taste']
directions: ['Preheat skillet over medium heat and melt half of the butter in the pan.', 'Cut a square (or a circle, or a triangle) out of the center of the piece of bread and butter both sides and the cut-out with remaining butter.', 'Place bread in the pan and crack an egg right in the center of the hole. Toast the small cut out in the pan next to your creation. Fry egg and toast pieces for one minute, covered, then flip and cook until desired doneness. Pepper egg to taste.', 'Makes a great breakfast with a bowl of fruit.']

title: Croutons A La Fattymcfatterson
ingredients: ['3 slices Day Or Two Old French Bread', '2 Tablespoons Butter', '1 Tablespoon Olive Oil']
directions: ['Slice up the bread into 1/4 inch chunks.', 'Grab a big nonstick skillet that can handle 500-degree heat and heat some butter in there on medium high heat.', 'When it starts getting that nutty smell, roll the pan around to make sure it evenly spreads and then dump the bread in.', 'Shake the pan.', 'Wait a minute.', 'Shake the pan again.', 'Fiddle with your apron strings.', 'Shake the pan.', 'Say hello to the doggy who has discovered that you have food and maybe she can have some by licking your toes.', 'Notice that the underside of the croutons are on their way to nice and golden (it's been maybe 3 minutes).', 'Drizzle a little bit of olive oil around on top of the half baked croutons.', 'Grab your spatula and flip the croutons.', 'Repeat shaking steps from above.', 'About halfway through your shaking, you remember that you wanted to turn the broiler on in your oven.', 'Do that.', 'Shake some more (total 3 minutes on this side) and then stick them in the oven for about a minute.', 'Take them out. Put them on caesar salad. Personally, I like them warm on the salad.']

title: Oven Baked Rice Pudding
ingredients: ['1 cup rice', '3/4 sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '3 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Fill bowl to within 1 inch of top with milk.', 'Sprinkle with cinnamon.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour - turn up to 400 degrees for another 1/2 hour or until rice is tender.']

title: Breaddy Egg
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 egg', 'milk', 'salt', 'pepper', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Crack the egg (or eggs, if you'd like more than one) into a bowl and add a little milk.', 'Don't put too much or it will separate and you'll end up with soggy eggs.', 'Add salt and pepper (optional).', 'Whisk with a whisk (or a fork).', 'Toast some bread (one slice will be enough).', 'When it's done, rip it up into little bits.', 'If you don't want to toast it first, it's fine.', 'It'll probably give the end product a different texture, though.', 'Heat up a pan on high heat.', 'When it's hot, put the olive oil in (how much you put in depends on how much you want to eat).', 'Tip the egg mixture into the pan and let it cook.', 'When it starts to look semi-solid, add your toast bits (or bread bits, if you didn't make toast).', 'Try and spread them out if you can.', 'When it looks cooked, you can either turn it into an omelet by flipping half of it over onto the other half, or you can mix it up until it looks like a mess (scrambled eggs).', 'Scrambling is much easier.', 'Turn it out onto a plate and eat it.']

title: Kristina'S Cheese Toast
ingredients: ['2 pieces bread', '2 slices cheese', '2 Tbsp. butter']
directions: ['Use 3 mixing bowls.'],['bread'

title: Easy Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: ['1 lb shrimp, peeled with just tail left on and deveined', '1 cup white wine', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '12 cup butter']
directions: ['Heat oven to 350.', 'Melt butter in pan in oven.', 'When melted add wine, garlic and shrimp.', 'Cook in oven for 6-7 minutes or until shrimp is pink.', 'Remove and serve.']

title: Easy Chocolate Frosting
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. butter', '2 sq. chocolate', '1/4 c. milk', '1 egg, slightly beaten', '1 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Melt together butter and chocolate.', 'Add milk, egg, sugar, vanilla.', 'Cook over slow heat to boiling, about 5 minutes.']

title: Mixed Vegetable Casserole
ingredients: ['1 large pkg. frozen mixed vegetables', '1 c. cheese, grated', '1 c. mayonnaise', '1 c. celery, chopped', '1 c. onion, chopped', '1 stick butter', '1 tube Ritz crackers, crumbled']
directions: ['Cook vegetables according to directions on package until just tender.', 'Put into a greased casserole.', 'Mix onion, celery, cheese and mayonnaise.', 'Spread over vegetables.', 'Melt butter; mix with cracker crumbs and sprinkle on top.', 'Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.']

title: Peanut Butter & Cooked Bacon Filling
ingredients: ['10 lbs peanut butter, softened', '1 lb butter, softened', '1 quart milk, evaporated', '3 lbs bacon, chopped and cooked']
directions: ['Mix together peanut butter, butter, bacon, and milk until smooth.']

title: Mayo And Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '3 slices medium cheddar, sliced thick', '2 slices bread, works best on white']
directions: ['Place cheese on bread.', 'Spread with mayonnaise, as much as you want, the more the better.', 'Put other piece of bread on top.', 'Cut into 4 triangles.', 'Voila!', 'A truly yummy, simple sammie.']

title: Perfect Roast Chicken
ingredients: ['4 to 5 lb. chicken', 'salt to taste', 'pepper to taste']
directions: ['Heat oven to 450°.', 'Thoroughly rinse chicken inside and out. Season with salt and pepper.', 'Place chicken on roasting pan with shallow sides, no higher than one inch, and place in oven.', 'Bake 30 minutes.', 'Reduce heat to 400° and bake 15 to 25 minutes more, or until the thigh meat registers 160° on a meat thermometer. Remove chicken from oven and let stand 10 to 20 minutes before carving.', 'Serves 4 to 6.']

title: Ohio Buckeye Candy
ingredients: ['3 cups creamy peanut butter', '1 1/2 sticks softened butter', '2 pounds confectioners' sugar', '16 ounces dipping chocolate melted']
directions: ['Mix together 3 cups creamy peanut butter, 1 1/2 sticks softened butter and 2 pounds confectioners sugar.', 'Form into small balls.', 'Using a toothpick, dip balls into 16 ounces of melted dipping chocolate until almost covered, leaving some of peanut butter mixture exposed on top.', 'Refrigerate.', 'Enjoy!']

title: Kettle Bacon
ingredients: ['2 lbs bacon, sliced', '1 tablespoon butter', 'as req black pepper, ground']
directions: ['Place your cooking vessel on the heat source.', 'Seperate bacon slices and drop slice by slice into the vessel.', 'Add butter ( please use butter not substitute stuff, it is needed for the flavor ).', 'Sprinkle ground black pepper over the bacon while stirrring.', 'Cook over low to medium heat stirring very often with a wooden spoon .', 'Remove bacon pieces with tongs as they become crisp and place on toweling to drain.', 'Serve while still warm.', 'Options:.', 'Lemon Pepper can be used in place of black pepper.', 'Add a dash of cayenne pepper while cooking to add some zing.']

title: Pizza
ingredients: ['2 lb. rice', '2 lb. cheese']
directions: ['Mash with hands and put on pizza pan.'],['rice'

title: Microwave Shrimp
ingredients: ['1 lb. small shrimp', '1 stick butter', 'garlic salt', '1 lemon']
directions: ['Peel shrimp and place in a glass pan (microwave bowl). Squeeze one whole lemon over shrimp.', 'Shake on garlic salt.', 'Set 1 stick of butter on top of shrimp.', 'Heat on High for 2 1/2 minutes. Turn pan or bowl around.', 'Stir shrimp.', 'Cook for 2 1/2 more minutes.']

title: Dieter'S Tuna Casserole(For 1)
ingredients: ['3/4 c. skim milk', '1 slice cheese', '1 1/2 oz. tuna', '1 slice bread']
directions: ['Melt cheese in milk in saucepan. Add 1 slice of bread, crumbled, and thicken. Add tuna.', 'Place in small uncovered casserole dish. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes or microwave for 7 minutes.', 'Serves 1.']

title: Fried Shrimp Balls
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, grated', '1 medium raw potato, grated', '1 1/2 lb. raw shrimp, chopped fine', '1 egg', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix all ingredients.', 'Form in small balls.', 'Fry in deep fryer at 375° until golden brown.']

title: Chocolate Torte - No Baking
ingredients: ['157 ml double cream', '1 tablespoon sugar', '225 g dark chocolate', '57 g butter']
directions: ['Prepare a 7x7 dish by lining it with greaseproof paper for easy removal of the torte once cold.', 'Measure out the butter and chocolate and chop up ready for adding later.', 'Put the cream, sugar and salt in a pan and bring slowly to near boiling stirring constantly. You should see small bubbles at the edges of the pan.', 'Add the butter and chocolate and stir well until melted. Then add any other flavourings if desired (eg ginger etc) (optional).', 'Pour into prepared dish and chill in fridge overnight or until set (at least 7 hours I'd guess).', 'When set torte can be turned carefully onto serving dish where it will sit firm and not ooze. You can then decorate with cream / fruit / drizzled white chocolate (optional).']

title: Perfect Every Time Turkey
ingredients: ['1 turkey', '1 teaspoon Lawry's Seasoned Salt', '1 teaspoon pepper', '1/2 lb real butter']
directions: ['preheat oven to 325.', '(mix all ingredients in melted butter baste turkey put all remaining ingredients in cavity).', 'put in doubled brown grocery bag fold the end and staple shut.', 'place in large roasting pan no lid bake at 325 (20 minutes per lb).', 'do nothing else I promise you will never cook your turkey any other way.', 'moist and perfectly brown.', '(do not open oven).']

title: Super Easy and Delicious Chicken
ingredients: ['1 chicken breast', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons garlic paste']
directions: ['melt the butter and the garlic for 15 seconds in the microwave or until the butter melts.', 'put everything in a bowl, including the breast.', 'and put them in the fridge for half an hour.', 'cook in a skillet with a little oil and butter.']

title: French Onion Baked Chicken
ingredients: ['1/2 cup onion dip', '1/4 cup milk', '4 pounds chicken, whole cut into 8 pieces', '1 cup crackers crushed', '1 tablespoon butter melted']
directions: ['Heat oven to 350F (180C).', 'In small bowl stir together onion dip and milk.', 'Place chicken in 13x9 inch baking dish.', 'Spoon dip mixture over chicken pieces.', 'Sprinkle crushed crackers over chicken; drizzle with butter.', 'Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until chicken is fork tender.']

title: Old-Fashioned Chicken And Dumplings
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '1/2 tsp. black pepper', '1 tsp. salt', '1 stick butter']
directions: ['Combine ingredients and cook until chicken is tender.', 'Remove bones and skin.', 'Set aside 2 cups of broth.', 'Put chicken back into broth and boil.', 'With one cup of water, make a stiff dough.', 'Roll thin and cut into strips, about 2-inches long.', 'Drop into chicken, a small part at a time.', 'Cook without lid about 5 minutes.', 'Cover and cook about 5 more minutes.']

title: Basic Baked Fish Recipe
ingredients: ['3-4 pound fish, dressed for baking', '1/4 c. melted butter', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
directions: ['Place fish in a well greased baking dish and brush with melted butter.', 'Sprinkle inside and outside of fish with salt and pepper.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 40-60 min, depending on thickness of fish.', 'Fish will be done when the thickest part flakes easily when tested with a fork.', 'Baste once or possibly twice with drippings of melted butter.', 'Garnish and serve with lemon wedges.', 'Makes 4-6 servings.']

title: Chocolate Milk Shake Recipe
ingredients: ['Lowfat milk', 'chocolate', 'Ice cream']
directions: ['Get a blinder put some lowfat milk ice cream in it.', 'Then put some chocolate in it.', 'Then push blind and let it blind for about minute.', 'Then dump into a c. then get a straw and slirp down.']

title: Cooked Zucchini

directions: ['Cook onion, tomato, garlic, salt and pepper. Add zucchini and cook u til tender. Top with cheese until melted.']

title: Slow-Cooked Tomatoes
ingredients: ['12 medium-size ripe tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon sugar', 'Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 250 degrees.', 'Without coring, cut the tomatoes in half horizontally.', 'Brush a sheet pan with the olive oil.', 'Set the tomatoes on the pan skin side down', 'Sprinkle the cut faces of the tomatoes with sugar, salt and pepper.', 'Place the tomatoes in the oven, and bake for 3 1/2 to 4 hours, or until their skins are shriveled and the pulp appears somewhat dry.', 'The tomatoes should have a jamlike consistency.', 'Serve warm as a condiment for grilled meats.']

title: Cracker Crumb Chicken

directions: ['Cut chicken in small 2 x 2-inch pieces.', 'Dip in butter; roll in cracker crumbs.', 'Place on cookie sheet lined with foil.', 'Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes, turning once.']

title: Roasted Garlic Butter
ingredients: ['1 head Garlic', '2 Tablespoons Olive Oil', '1 stick Unsalted Butter, Softened', '1/2 teaspoons Salt']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400F. Cut the top off of your head of garlic - enough to expose the cloves. Place it on a sheet of aluminum foil. Drizzle with the olive oil.', 'Fold the foil up tight around the garlic, place on a baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes or until soft.', 'Place the stick of butter in a food processor. Squeeze the head of roasted garlic into the food processors, pushing the softened cloves out of the head. Be careful not to get any papery skin into the butter mixture. Add the salt. Pulse until combined.', 'Garlic butter can be served softened, or chilled. To chill the butter, place on a sheet of plastic wrap and roll into a log.', 'Refrigerate until chilled and then cut slices and serve over warm meat, seafood and vegetables.']

title: Almond Joy Cookies Recipe
ingredients: ['2 x Unsweetened Chocolate', '1 can Sweetened, condensed lowfat milk', '3 c. Sweetened, flaked coconut', '1 tsp Vanilla extract A healthy pinch of salt Almonds for garnish']
directions: ['Heat in a double boiler, 1 can sweetened condensed lowfat milk and 2 squares ofunsweetened chocolate, till chocolate is melted.', 'Stir till mix is smooth.', 'Pour over a bowl containing 3 c. of sweetened, flaked coconut.', 'Add in 1tsp of vanilla extract and a healthy pinch of salt.', 'Mix well till coconut iscompleted coated.', 'Drop on a cookie sheet that is lined with parchment paper, by tspfuls.', 'Press a whole almond into the top.', 'Bake at 350 degrees F. for 10 to 12 min.', 'Check at 8 min, as bottoms of cookies brown quickly.', 'Remove from oven, cold, remove from pan.']

title: Beer Carmelized Onions
ingredients: ['1 large onion', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 -4 ounces beer', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Place butter and oil in a frying pan or on the grill (I start on the stove and finish cooking on the grill when I start cooking my burgers) and heat until butter has melted. Add the onion that has been cut into layers or long strands. Salt and pepper your onions. Grill or cook your onion stirring frequently until it becomes almost golden brown throughout. Add the beer and continue to heat until almost all of the liquid has been cooked off. Remove from heat and let the onion cool on the counter. Put onion on your favorite burger and finish your beer.'],['beer'

title: My Favourite Toasted Sandwich

title: Grilled Butter And Honey Chicken

title: Shrimp Gumbo

directions: ['Cook celery and onions with a can of tomatoes and the juice from the shrimp.', 'When celery is soft, add the shrimp.', 'Serve over rice.']

title: Sauteed Garlic Spinach

title: Garlic cheese bread sandwich

directions: ['Preheat oven to 450 degrees F for 5 minutes', 'put in the 2 slices of bread and let it toast for 3 minutes till one side, than flip it over', 'after both sides are evenly toasted, spread a light coat of butter on one side on both slices.', 'add a pinch or two of garlic salt on the buttered side of the bread.', 'Once done, put the slices back in the oven with the buttered/seasoned side on the bottom.', 'let that toast for a minute or two', 'Top the two slices of cheese on top of each other and place that right on to of the bread.', 'Once the cheese has melted, take it out.', 'and enjoy :)', 'NOTE: throughout this process the oven is still on and the timer should be ticking down from 20min.']

title: Chocolate Butter

directions: ['Melt chocolate, set aside to cool.', 'Cream butter.', 'beat in cooled chocolate.', 'Pour into 4 small ramekins and chill until firm.', 'You may use butter molds-refrigerate for 20 minutes, then pop out and store in plastic bag.', 'Serve with warm brioche or croissants.', 'Or even better, serve with Chocolate Bread.']

title: Toasty Egg

title: Popeyes
ingredients: ['Bread', '2 Tablespoons Butter Or Margarine', '1 whole Large Egg', '1 pinch Salt', '1 pinch Pepper']
directions: ['1. Butter one side of the bread. Using a large biscuit cutter or glass, cut a round out of the center of the bread. Leave the round in the bread crust frame.', '2. Put the bread, buttered side down, in a frying pan over medium heat. Butter the top side of the bread.', '3. Fry until the underside of the bread starts to turn golden-brown, then flip. Move the bread circle elsewhere in the pan.', '4. Melt a little butter in the well formed by the bread crust. Break an egg into the well, then sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.', '5. Cook 1-2 minutes, until the egg starts to set, then flip and cook another 1-2 minutes. The white should be cooked through and the yolk still a little runny (though you can cook it longer if you don't like runny eggs).', '6. Serve on a plate with the bread round, which is great for soaking up and eating the runny yolk with.']

title: Easy French Toast in the Microwave

title: The Humble Fried Egg

directions: ['Put the butter and olive oil in a non-stick frying pan and heat until the pan is good and hot.', 'Break the egg into the pan and immediately turn the heat down as low as it will go.', 'Cover and leave to cook very gently for 4-5 minutes, until the white is set and shiny.', 'The yolk will be cooked but still slightly runny.', 'Eat how you like it, in a bacon and egg sarnie, on top of Asian dishes like nasi goreng or on its own.', 'A perfect fried egg is a beautiful thing!']

title: Buttercream Frosting Comparison

directions: ['I added all the ingredients to the specified appliance at the same time and then set a timer for 3 minutes. Turn appliance on. I tried to keep all the machines as close to medium speed as possible for the duration of the time. At the halfway point, I was allowed to scrape down the appliance if needed.']

title: Easy Chicken And Dumplings

Simmer an additional 30 minutes.']

title: Crazy Good Grilled Cheese Sandwich

directions: ['In a saucepan, put in your three slices of butter', 'Next add in 1/3 of milk', 'Add in half of your package of cheese', 'Put the temperature at medium', 'To prevent sticking add in another slice of butter and the other 1/3 of milk', 'Put your heat on low', 'Stir and add in your garlic powder and pepper ,I add a bunch but you can add as much as you would like', 'The sauce will be a little thick but it fast good :)']

title: Zucchini Tomato Casserole

title: Grilled Chocolate Sandwich

directions: ['Melt the butter in a heavy skillet over low heat and swirl each half of the bread, one side only, in the butter.', 'Place the piece of bread, buttery side down in skillet.', 'Layer with chocolate pieces.', 'Top with the other piece of bread, buttery side up and raise heat.', 'Cook exactly as you would an ordinary grilled cheese sandwich, pressing down on the bread occasionally and flipping after the first side browns.', 'Remove when the second side is golden brown and the chocolate has melted.', 'Cool slightly and eat.']

title: English Breakfast Tomatoes

Cook for a further 2-3 minutes until tender but still holding their shape. Recipe from the BBC Food Web site, see: Stress-free full English breakfast']

Remove the muffin pan from the oven using hot pads.', '(Make sure there is an adult there to supervise.)']

title: Graham Cracker Pralines Recipe

title: Perfectly Juicy 4 Ingredient Roasted Chicken
ingredients: ['1 whole 3-4 Lb. Chicken', '1 bunch Celery', '1/2 sticks Butter', '5 dashes Onion Powder', 'Salt and Pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350.', 'After you rinse off (and out) your bird, sprinkle the inside and outside generously with onion powder, salt, and pepper.', 'During this process you should crave Funyuns ... its normal, I promise.', 'Now, slather that puppy with butter.', 'Butter is good.', 'Say it with me.', 'Butter is normal, natural, and good to me.', 'Tuck some inside the cavity, under skin, and on top of the bird.', 'This will help create a crisp skin and seal the juice into the meat.', 'Plus, butter tastes good.', 'Now, tuck that celery into the cavity of the bird.', 'Dont make it tight but dont let it wiggle and wobble.', 'Stick that baby into the tanning bed aka oven at 350 degrees uncovered for appr.', '30 minutes per pound.', 'Just make sure the juice is running clear (if you can even tell with all the butter, yay!)', 'and the center of the thickest portion of meat is at least 180 degrees.', 'I usually take this out of the oven when its at about 175 degrees in the thickest piece of meat and cover it with foil for about 30 minutes.', 'Then it comes perfectly to 180 degrees and its tender, juicy, and slap yo mama good.']

title: Fish Baked In Milk

Stir mixture over low heat until butter melts then increase heat and boil rapidly.', 'Take sugar that is in iron skillet melted and pour in other mixture.', 'Stir fast and constantly.', 'Cook until soft ball stage.', 'Remove from heat and add 1 tsp. vanilla.', 'Beat well and spread on cake.']

title: Shrimp Wrapped in Bacon - Good for Bentos

title: Fromage Fort

directions: ['Put about 1/2 pound of cheese pieces in the bowl of a food processor, add 1 garlic clove, about 1/4 cup of dry white wine and a big grinding of black pepper.', 'Salt is usually not needed, but taste the mixture and add some if it is.', 'Process for 30 seconds or so, until the mixture is creamy but not too soft, and then pack it into small containers.', 'The fromage fort is ready to use now, either served cold or spread on bread and broiled for a few minutes.', 'Broiling will brown the cheese and make it wonderfully fragrant.']

When the pasta is almost al dente, throw shrimp into pan with oil, and turn heat up.', 'Stir often. When cooked, add salt and pepper. Toss drained pasta with the sauce in the pan and serve.']

Drop by teaspoonful on a cookie sheet covered with parchment paper.', 'Top each cookie with a whole almond.', 'Bake at 350 F for 10-12 minutes.', 'Check after 8 minutes.', 'Do not overcook.', 'Cookies should be soft but firm.', 'Cool completely.']
