title: Marc Veyrats Pumpkin Soup With Bacon-Flavoured Whipped Cream
ingredients: ['750 g pumpkin, flesh in big chunks', '125 g smoked bacon, strips cut into large pieces', '1 tablespoon butter', '250 g cream', '12 liter milk', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Heat 150g of cream with the bacon, bring to a boil and reduce to a thick liquid, strain, leave to cool and preserve in the fridge.', 'Throw away the bacon strips.', 'Melt the butter, add pumpkin pieces and cook for 3-4 minutes.', 'Add the milk, salt and leave to cook (covered) for 30 minutes.', 'Whip the remaining cream (very cold) rapidly until consistency of whipped cream.', 'Incorporate the equally cold bacon cream.', 'Keep the mixture in the fridge.', 'After 30 minutes blend the pumpkin milk mixture.', 'Adjust the seasoning by adding salt and maybe pepper.', 'Serve this soup hot and top gently with a tablespoon of bacon cream.', 'Enjoy.']

title: CrispRoasted Rack Of Lamb
ingredients: ['2 racks of lamb, each about 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 pounds', 'Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
directions: ['Preheat the oven to 500 degrees.', 'Strip most of the surface fat from the lamb.', '(Your butcher may already have done this.)', 'Cut between the ribs, almost down to the meaty eye.', 'Divide each rack in half down the middle, sprinkle with salt and pepper and place in a roasting pan.', 'Roast for 15 minutes, then insert a meat thermometer straight in from one end into the meatiest part.', 'If it reads 125 degrees or more, remove the lamb immediately.', 'If it reads 120 degrees or less, put the lamb back for about 5 minutes, no more.', 'Remove and let sit for 5 minutes; this will give you medium- to medium-rare lamb on the outer ribs, medium rare-to-rare in the center.', 'Cook a little longer for more doneness.', 'Serve, separating the ribs, if desired, by cutting down straight through them.']

title: Solo Baked Chicken Breast
ingredients: ['1 boneless skinless chicken breast, thawed', '1 lemon, juice of', '1 tablespoon melted butter', 'pepper']
directions: ['Place a Cast Iron Frying Pan into an oven and preheat at 350 degrees for 10 minutes.', 'During this time, IF the chicken breast is frozen, it can thawed in a microwave at power 3 for 7 minutes.', 'Place the thawed chicken breast into a shallow dish and add the juice of 1 lemon, coating both sides.', 'Let sit for at least 5 minutes.', 'Cover both sides with pepper, and then coat the chicken breast with the butter, using a brush.', 'Place the chicken into the Cast Iron Pan and bake for 35 minutes.', 'To get an even browning, turn the chicken over half way through the baking time.', 'Note:If a baking potato is punctured, microwaved on high for 3 minutes, and then coated with olive oil, it will be done in the same 35 minutes in the oven.']

title: Heath Cake
ingredients: ['2 Tbsp. sugar', '1 stick butter, melted', '2 c. crushed Ritz crackers']
directions: ['Mix and press in bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan.', 'Refrigerate.']

title: Buttered Honey Nuts Recipe
ingredients: ['6 ounce Shelled, unsalted nuts', '1 Tbsp. Butter', '1 Tbsp. Honey']
directions: ['DIRECTIONS: Spread nuts on a cookie sheet.', 'Bake at 300-F for 15 min.', 'Mix butter and honey; pour over nuts.', 'Stir till nuts are completely coated with the mix.', 'Store in airtight container.']

title: Grilled Jumbo Shrimp
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon plus 2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pound jumbo shrimp', '2 tablespoons salt']
directions: ['Brush 1 teaspoon of oil over a barbecue rack or a ridged grill pan.', 'Prepare a charcoal or gas grill for high heat or preheat the grill pan over a high flame.', 'Using scissors, cut the shell down the center of the back of the shrimp.', 'Brush the shrimp with the remaining 2 tablespoons of oil and sprinkle with salt.', 'Grill the shrimp until just cooked through, about 3 minutes per side.', 'Transfer the shrimp to a plate and serve.']

title: Shrimp Di Santo
ingredients: ['1 1/2 pounds unpeeled, medium-size fresh shrimp', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried granulated garlic', '1 teaspoon seasoned salt', '1/4 cup olive oil']
directions: ['Peel shrimp, and devein, if desired; place in a large bowl. Sprinkle with garlic and seasoned salt, tossing to coat. Add olive oil, tossing well. Sprinkle with breadcrumb mix, and toss to coat. Arrange shrimp in an even layer in an olive oil-greased 15- x 9-inch jellyroll pan.', 'Bake at 400° for 20 minutes, stirring twice. Serve warm.']

title: Popcorn
ingredients: ['8 cups butter-flavored microwave popcorn', '24 fl oz no salt added tomato juice']
directions: ['Pop a bag of microwave popcorn and measure 2 cups per person for this snack.', 'Store any remaining popcorn in a tightly sealed container for another snack.', 'Serve a 6 fl oz (3/4 cup) glass of tomato juice, chilled or over ice, per person with the snack.']

title: Pesto And Mozzarella Chicken
ingredients: ['4 fillets chicken', '1 jar pesto', '2 mozzarella balls']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 350 °F.', 'Arrange chicken fillets on a baking dish.', 'Spread generously with the pesto and cover with slices of mozzarella.', 'Bake for 30 minutes.']

title: St. John'S Honey Fudge From The Isle Of Man
ingredients: ['2 cups sugar', '2 ounces chocolate', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 cup evaporated milk', '1/4 cup honey', '2 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['Boil the sugar, chocolate, salt and milk for five minutes, stirring constantly.', 'Add the honey, keep stirring, and cook to a soft-ball stage (230 - 240 deg. F).', 'Remove from heat and stir in the butter.', 'Let stand about 5 minutes, then beat until smooth & creamy and pour into an 8' square buttered pan.', 'Cut when firm.']

title: Easy Creamy Vanilla Fudge
ingredients: ['3 3/4 cups confectioners' sugar', '6 tablespoons butter', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt']
directions: ['Grease a 9x5 inch pan. Set aside.', 'In a 3 quart saucepan, over very low heat, mix together confectioners sugar, butter, milk, vanilla, and salt until mixture is creamy.', 'Pour quickly into greased 9x5 inch pan. Refrigerate until firm, then cut into squares. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.']

title: Honey Joys
ingredients: ['4 cups Cornflakes', '6 Tablespoons Butter', '1/3 cups Sugar', '4 Tablespoons Honey']
directions: ['Place the cornflakes in a large mixing bowl and set aside.', 'Melt butter, sugar, and honey together in a small saucepan over a low heat until frothy. Pour over cornflakes and mix well until all the cornflakes are covered in the honey mixture.', 'Spoon into paper patty cases (cupcake cases). Bake in a slow oven, 150°C (300F, Gas Mark 2) for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool on wire racks. Enjoy.']

title: Vanilla Honey Simple Syrup
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon honey', '2 teaspoons butter']
directions: ['Combine the milk and vanilla extract in a bowl.', 'Heat the honey and butter together in a microwave-safe bowl in the microwave for 30 seconds; stir into the milk mixture. Allow to cool completely before use. Chill in refrigerator if too hot.']

title: Cauliflower Casserole
ingredients: ['1 head cauliflower', '3 slices bread', '1/2 c. chopped onion', '1/2 c. chopped celery', '3 c. milk', '8 slices cheese', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Wash cauliflower.', 'Separate head; cook in salted water until done, but not mushy.', 'Put cauliflower in buttered 9 x 12-inch baking dish.', 'While cauliflower is cooking, soak white bread (that the brown edges have been trimmed) in 3 cups of milk.', 'Break up bread after soaking; add onion and celery.', 'Cook in heavy skillet milk, bread, celery and onion until thick and creamy.', 'Salt and pepper to taste.', 'Pour over cauliflower.', 'Cover with cheese.', 'Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.']

title: Somebody's Mother's Buttercream Icing
ingredients: ['12 cup butter', '14 teaspoon salt', '2 12 cups confectioners' sugar, sifted', '3 -4 tablespoons milk', '1 teaspoon mexican vanilla']
directions: ['Cream butter, add salt and sugar, a small amount at a time, beating all the while.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Add milk if needed to slightly moisten the mixture.', 'Depending on what you're serving, add one mini jar of Somebody's Mother's Chocolate, Caramel, or White Chocolate Sauce with Pear William.']

title: Vanilla Glaze
ingredients: ['1 1/2 cups confectioners' sugar', '2 1/2 teaspoons milk', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon butter']
directions: ['Melt the butter and add to rest of ingredients. Mix until creamy.'],['sugar'

title: Smoked Shrimp
ingredients: ['3 lb. uncooked shrimp, shelled and deveined', 'garlic powder', 'margarine']
directions: ['Melt margarine and pour into pan.', 'Place shrimp in margarine. Sprinkle with garlic powder.', 'Place on smoker for 1 hour.', 'Serves 5 or 6.']

title: Chocolate And Banana Pudding
ingredients: ['1 cup Bread', '0.5 cups Milk', '1 piece Egg', '0.5 cups Dark Chocolate Chunks/Chips', '1 tablespoon Sugar', '1 piece Banana', '1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract']
directions: ['Mash the banana,Add the milk and banana and mix with a spatula.', 'Add the Sugar and Vanilla and mix well.Add the chocolate Chips.', 'Pour the mixture in 2 ramekins', 'Bake for 10 minute in a preheated oven at 180 degrees']

title: Mirowave Bacon Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese', '2 slices of cooked crisp bacon']
directions: ['Place the Cheese and Bacon between the Bread.', 'Cover with a paper towel and microwave for about 30 seconds.']

title: Shrimp Pilaff
ingredients: ['1 1/2 lb. shrimp', '4 bacon slices, cut into squares and fried until crisp', '1 small minced onion', '2 1/2 c. canned tomatoes', '1 c. uncooked rice', 'salt']
directions: ['Partly cook and clean shrimps.', 'Remove bacon from pan and drain.', 'Add other ingredients to bacon fat.', 'Place in double boiler and steam over hot water for 45 minutes.', 'Stir in peeled, cooked shrimp and a pinch of chervil.', 'Turn into a casserole. Bake in a moderate oven for 15 minutes.', 'Serve with Mornay Sauce. Serves 6.']

title: Fish and Cheese Chowder
ingredients: ['1 pound fish fillets', '1 x cheese']
directions: ['Flake fish so you can get a crumbled texture.', 'Cook it in a saucepan until flly crumbled.', 'Stir in cheese and let simmer for an hour.', 'Stir regularly.']

title: Tomato Butter
ingredients: ['Cherry tomatoes', 'Salt', 'Softened butter']
directions: ['Broil cherry tomatoes until the skins blister and juices are released; let cool. Blitz with salt in a food processor until coarsely pureed, then stir into softened butter. Dollop onto grilled fish, cooked rice, or crostini.']

title: Kokoshka Sou Oris (Macedonian Chicken And Rice)
ingredients: ['1 chicken, in pieces', '3 cups rice', 'salt and pepper', '1/4 cup butter', '1 medium onion']
directions: ['Place chicken in pot, cover with water and bring to boil removing any scum from the top.', 'Season to taste with salt and pepper and cook till tender-remove when cooked through, and reserve liquid to cook rice in.', 'When chicken is cooked, melt butter in a metal baking pan, and fry the finely chopped onion till transparent.', 'Add the rice and fry it for a minute, being careful not to burn it.', 'Add 6- 7 cups of chicken broth or stock and bring to the boil--you may want to use the liquid that you boiled the chicken in.', 'Place chicken pieces on top of rice.', 'You can also place a couple of tomatoes cut in half with the cut side up in the baking dish.', 'Bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 20 minutes, or until the stock is absorbed and rice is tender.']

title: Easy!! Bacon and Sunny-Side Up Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '1 Egg', '2 slice Bacon', '1 slice Melting-type sliced cheese', '1 tbsp Ketchup']
directions: ['Press a slice of bread into the center of a round bowl.', 'Coat the surface with ketchup.', 'Crack an egg and slowly pour it into the center of the bread.', 'Arrange the cheese and bacon around the edge of the bread and toast in the toaster for 3 minutes.']

title: Broiled Whole Lobster On Grill
ingredients: ['1 1/4 lb. lobster for each serving', 'melted butter']
directions: ['Broil over medium hot coals, turning from time to time, about 12 to 14 minutes.', 'Remove stomach and fill with melted butter. Serve on heated plates with melted butter and lemon juice.']

title: Peanut Butter And Banana French Toast
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 dash vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter', '2 slices bread', '1 small banana, sliced', '2 tablespoons butter']
directions: ['In a small bowl, lightly beat the egg and vanilla together.', 'Spread 1 tablespoon of peanut butter on top of each slice of bread. Place the banana slices on top of one of the slices of bread. Place the other slice of bread on top of the first, to make a peanut butter and banana sandwich.', 'In a skillet or frying pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Dip the sandwich into the egg mixture and place in the heated skillet. Cook until brown on both sides. Serve hot.']

title: De-E-Licious Cookies
ingredients: ['40 graham crackers', '1 stick butter', '1 stick margarine', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Put graham crackers on cookie sheet lined with foil over the sides.', 'Melt butters; add sugar and bring to a boil.', 'It will be foamy.', 'Pour over graham crackers.', 'Sprinkle with chocolate chips and nuts.', 'Bake at 350° for 12 minutes.', 'Easy and quick.']

title: Ma Ma'S Peanut Butter Fudge
ingredients: ['milk', 'sugar', 'vanilla', 'butter', 'pinch of salt', 'peanut butter']
directions: ['Use half as much milk as sugar (or twice as much sugar as milk).', 'Cook to soft ball stage.', 'Put in hunk of butter, some vanilla, pinch of salt and a gob of peanut butter.', 'Stir well and put into buttered dish.', 'Cool and cut into squares.']

title: Toasted Cheese With Bacon Please
ingredients: ['12 slices bacon', '6 pineapple rings', '12 slices white American cheese', '6 slices bread']
directions: ['Spread both sides of bread with margarine or butter.', 'Place on ungreased cookie sheet.', 'Put two slices of cheese on each piece of bread; top with one pineapple ring and 2 slices of bacon.', 'Bake at 325° for 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Yummy and quick!']

title: Butter Icing For Cookies
ingredients: [2 cups confectioners' sugar', '2 1/2 tablespoons cream', '4 tablespoons butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a saucepan, over medium heat, heat cream and butter until butter is melted. Stir in the vanilla and confectioners' sugar. Remove from heat, and beat with an electric mixer until thick and smooth.']

title: Pork And Beans Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 slice bread, toasted', '1/3 c. drained pork and beans', '1 slice cheese', '2 slices bacon', '1 tsp. diced onion']
directions: ['Spread pork and beans over top of bread slice.', 'Top with slice of cheese.', 'Sprinkle with diced onion.', 'Place 2 slices of bacon on top and place under broiler until bacon is done. Great with glass of milk.', 'This could be done in a microwave if the bacon was precooked.']

title: Potato Balls
ingredients: ['2 boiled potato', '1 egg', '2 ounces cheese', '1 teaspoon milk']
directions: ['Rub cooked potatos through a sieve, and season with salt and pepper.', 'Stir in milk and grated cheese, then half the well beaten egg.', 'Form into balls and dust with flour.', 'Let them rest for an hour or more.', 'Dip in beaten egg, then in breadcrumbs and fry a golden brown in boiling fat.', 'Drain and serve.']

title: Dave'S Bread
ingredients: ['bread', 'garlic powder', 'butter', 'tomatoes, diced and drained']
directions: ['Spread slices of bread on cookie sheet.', 'Spread with butter. Sprinkle with garlic powder.', 'Top with tomatoes.', 'Broil until brown.']

title: French Fried Egg Sandwich
ingredients: ['egg, fried as usual', 'bread', 'cheese', 'mayonnaise']
directions: ['Fry egg; toast bread slices.', 'Add mayonnaise.', 'Put egg and cheese on bread.', 'Put in microwave 10 seconds.', 'Great sandwich.']

title: Apple And Pineapple Salad
ingredients: ['8 ounces pineapple chunks', '1 chicken breast', '1 garlic clove', '1 ginger', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '1 large apple', '1 -2 cup mayonnaise', '8 ounces cream']
directions: ['Boil 3 cups of water.', 'Slightly puch the ginger and garlic cloves with the flat side of the knife so that they appear squashed.', 'Add the chicken, garlic and ginger cloves, salt and pepper.', 'Let this boil for 20-25 minutes.', 'After the chicken is properly boiled, strain out the water (throw away the galic and ginger cloves). Keep chicken aside and let it cool.', 'Cut the apple into bite size and dry out the pineapple bits.', 'Get back to the chicken: cut the breast into small, bite sized pieces.', 'In a mixing bowl, add the apples,chicken and pineapple.', 'Add the mayonnaise and cream an mix well.', 'If it turns out a little stiff add just 1 tbsp of the pineapple water from the tin.', 'Decorate with pineapple or apple chunks and serve for a light and healthy lunch!']

title: Garlic Shrimp
ingredients: ['3/4 cup olive oil, divided', '1/2 cup chopped onion', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '16 large shrimp, in shells', 'cooked rice']
directions: ['puree 1/2 c olive oil, onions, garlic, salt& pepper in blender.', 'pour over shrimp and marinate for 1 hour.', 'heat remaining oil in skillet, add shrimp and marinade, saute about 5 minutes until shrimp are opaque serve over rice.']

title: Mock Peanut Butter Cups
ingredients: ['Ritz crackers', 'peanut butter', 'chocolate candy coating *']
directions: ['*Or use sweet chocolate chips and 2 tablespoons shortening.'],['crackers'

title: Fast Food Tuna Melt
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '3 ounces tuna', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Toast bread.', 'Smear mayo on bread.', 'Put on tuna and slice cheese; put under broiler till melted or put in microwave about 30 seconds.', 'Add other slice bread or leave off--up to you.']

title: Sam'S Blackened Shrimp
ingredients: ['3 lb. medium shrimp', '2 sticks margarine', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Rinse and drain shrimp. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch Corning Ware dish, sprayed with vegetable oil. Place margarine slices on top of shrimp. Pepper shrimp heavily. Bake at 400° for approximately 10 minutes. Turn shrimp with a spatula. Cook an additional 10 minutes.']

title: Broiled Lunch Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 slice cheese', '1 sliced tomato', 'bits of cooked bacon']
directions: ['Toast bread; place slice of cheese on toast and broil until cheese begins to melt.', 'Add tomato and bits of cooked bacon. Broil until tomato is hot.', 'Serve immediately.', 'Makes 1 sandwich.']

title: Chicken Cordon Bleu
ingredients: ['12 lb chicken, slices', '12 cup cheese']
directions: ['my instructions are as follow, roll up chicken into the cheese.']

title: Willie's Lobster Wraps
ingredients: ['2 lbs lobster meat, pre-cooked', '12 lb bacon']
directions: ['Cut lobster into 2' pieces.', 'Wrap each lobster chunk with a 3' strip of bacon.', 'Broil on broiling pan until lightly browned, then turn and broil other side.']

title: Eggs Cocotte
ingredients: ['1 egg', '1 teaspoon butter', '2 tablespoons cream', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Melt butter and pour into a ramekin cup.', 'Add egg.', 'Add cream (do not stir) and then add salt and pepper to taste.', 'Bake egg at 350 degrees untill desired doneness. (5-10 min).']

title: Roasted Tomato Sauce
ingredients: ['4 pounds Fresh Plum Tomatoes', '1 whole Medium Sized Onion', '3 cloves Garlic', '1 Tablespoon Olive Oil', '1 Tablespoon Butter', 'Salt And Pepper, to taste']
directions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees.', 'Wash tomatoes and place them on a foil-lined baking sheet.', 'Roast tomatoes about 10 to 15 minutes, until their skin begins to crack, flipping them halfway through.', 'While the tomatoes cool, chop and dice your onion and garlic.', 'Place a medium-large pot over medium heat.', 'Add oil and butter.', 'Toss in the onion and let cook, stirring occasionally, for 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Add the garlic and let cook until the onion is translucent.', 'In the meantime, peel your tomatoes and rip them into smallish pieces.', 'I removed some of the seeds, though not all.', 'Add the tomatoes to the onion mixture.', 'Bring to a boil, lower heat, cover, and let simmer for 1 to 3 hours.', '(I realize this is highly unspecific and not very helpful.', 'Cook it as long as you feel you should, until it tastes good and is nice and thick.)']

title: Baked Shrimp
ingredients: ['shrimp, peel', '3/4 stick butter']
directions: ['Peel shrimp and season with Season-All and garlic.', 'Place in casserole dish and cover with pats of butter.', 'Bake at 400° for 15 minutes.', 'Turn shrimp over and bake 10 minutes longer.']

title: Steamed Salmon In Papillote
ingredients: ['2 slices salmon', '1/2 carrot', '1/2 leek', '1 slice bacon', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Season the salmon with lemon, salt, and pink pepper.', 'Cut 2 sheets of foil and brush each with olive oil.', 'Peel the carrots and use a carrot peeler to cut thin slices lengthwise.', 'Cut leek lengthwise into 4 pieces, then in half again, like sticks.', 'Spread the vegetables on aluminum foil and put the salmon on top.', 'Slice the bacon and the cheese in thin strips and arrange them on top of the fish.', 'Close the foil, and steam it.', 'If you don't have a steam cooking pot, place the salmon on a baking sheet and bake at 360°F for 50 minutes.']

title: Petite Microwaved Cheese Omelette For Your Bento
ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 tbsp Milk', '1 pinch of each Salt and sugar', '1/2 a slice Melting sliced cheese', '1 Ketchup']
directions: ['Mix the egg, milk, salt and sugar together in a deep dish.', 'Microwave for 1 minute at 600 W.', 'Take the plate out when the surface is cooked.', 'Make a slit in the middle with a knife and place the cheese on one side.', 'Fold over one side of the egg.', 'The cheese will melt and help the two sides stick together nicely.', 'Pour your desired amount of ketchup on and it's done.', 'If you are putting it in a small lunch box, cut it in half again before dressing with ketchup.', 'P.S.', ': You can use any type of plate as long as the egg doesn't spill, but it will look more like an omelette if you use a plate that's slightly on the deeper side.']

title: '"any Type' Nut Butter"
ingredients: ['12 lb butter', '4 tablespoons nuts, finely chopped', '18 teaspoon salt', '18 teaspoon pepper']
directions: ['Cream butter in a small bowl with an electric mixer.', 'Transfer to blender or food processor.', 'Add remaining ingredients and blend well.', 'Place butter in plastic wrap and form into a log shape or place in a ramekin and cover tightly.']

title: Breakfest Help Sandwich
ingredients: ['French Bread', 'Baby Spinach', 'cheese', 'tomatoes', 'turkey']
directions: ['Cut the French bread in half', 'put turkey, cheese, sliced, tomatoes,and baby spinach', 'warm up in the microwave for 30 seconds then take out and enjoy']

title: Easy and Yummy White Bread
ingredients: ['4 cups bread, four', '1 34 cups milk', '2 teaspoons instant yeast', '1 12 teaspoons salt', '1 12 tablespoons sugar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 teaspoons melted butter']
directions: ['Warm the milk but make sure not to make it too hot .', 'Sieve the flour and the salt into a bowl then add the sugar .', 'Mix it well .', 'Mix the yeast with with a little bit of sugar in the warm milk .', 'Add the olive oil into the mixture.', 'Then pour the yeast mixture into the bowl .', 'Using a fork continue to mix the flour with the liquid .', 'Form a ball then transfer the dough on a lightly floured surface .', 'Knead for about 10 minutes .', 'At this stage the dough should still be sticky but don't worry , just wet your palm with some olive oil and continue the kneading process until you form a soft a smooth dough .', 'Put the dough into a lightly oiled bowl .', 'Cover with a damp cloth leave to rise in a draft free place forabout 1 1/5 - 2 hours or until the dough is double in size .', 'Punch down the down .', 'On a lightly floured surface gently roll up the dough and a rectangular shape with 3/4 cm thickness.', 'Roll down , shape into loaf and transfer it into a well greased 1 pound tin loaf .', 'Cover with cloth and let it rise for 45 minutes or until the dough has risen about an inch above the tin.', 'Bake in preheated oven at 175 C fan force for 30 minutes.', 'Take it out from the oven , brush the top with the melted butter .', 'Bake for further 10 minutes.', 'Transfer the loaf on the cooling rack .', 'Wait until it's completely cool before slicing it .']

title: Old Fashion Fudge
ingredients: ['2 sq. Baker's semi-sweet dark chocolate, chopped fine', '2 c. sugar', '1 c. milk', '1 stick butter', '1 tsp. vanilla']
directions: ['Chop chocolate fine; add sugar and milk.', 'Boil to a rolling boil approximately 20 minutes over medium-high heat to soft ball stage, stirring constantly.', 'Add butter and vanilla.', 'Stir with pan in cold water until stiff.', 'Add nuts if desired and stir quickly into 8 x 8-inch pan (coated with Pam).', 'Put in refrigerator to set hard.']

title: Pork and Cheese Piccata
ingredients: ['4 slice Thinly sliced pork', '2 slice Processed sliced cheese', '1 egg Beaten egg', '1 Salt and pepper']
directions: ['Put the cheese on a slice of pork and roll up.', 'Add another slice of pork, and roll up to hide the cheese.', 'Form as in the photo and season with salt and pepper.', 'Dip in beaten egg and pan fry.', 'Dip once again in the beaten egg, coat well and pan fry again.']

title: Baked Onion with Tuna and Cheese
ingredients: ['1 Onion', '1 can Canned tuna', '1 tsp Mayonnaise', '1 Black pepper', '1 slice Melting type sliced cheese']
directions: ['Drain the liquid from the canned tuna.', 'Combine with mayonnaise and black pepper.', 'Slice the onion crosswise into 4 circles and sprinkle with katakuriko.', 'Fry the onion starting from the larger sides (that are facing up in this picture).', 'Heat some oil in a frying pan.', 'Fry the onions over low to medium heat until they're well done.', 'Turn them over.', 'Place the tuna from Step 1 and the cheese on top of the onion.', 'Cover the pan and continue to cook until the cheese melts.', 'Done!']

title: Zucchini Scallop
ingredients: ['2 c. zucchini, cooked', '2 c. saltine crackers, crumbled', '2 Tbsp. onion, minced', '1 c. cheese, cubed', '1 c. milk', '1 egg, beaten', '2 Tbsp. margarine, melted', 'pepper']
directions: ['Layer zucchini, crackers, onion and cheese in a 2 quart casserole.', 'Combine milk and egg.', 'Pour over zucchini mixture. Pour melted margarine over all.', 'Sprinkle with pepper.', 'Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.']

title: Soddy Daisy Sandwich Special
ingredients: ['2 slices of bread', 'butter', '1 slice each Cheddar, American and hot pepper cheese']
directions: ['Place 2 helpings of butter on 1 side of each bread slice. Place cheese on top of butter.', 'Place in toaster oven, cheese side up, until cheese is melted.', 'Remove from oven, put both slices together and enjoy.']

title: Amanda'S Egg Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 strips cooked bacon', '1 egg', '1 slice cheese', 'bread']
directions: ['In a mixing bowl, slightly beat egg, then fry in greased pan until done.', 'Place cheese on top of egg to melt.', 'Place bacon on top of cheese and put on toasted bread.']

title: Shrimp & Avocado Salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion medium, chopped', '1 jalapeno pepper seeded and chopped', '1 1/2 pounds uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined', '2 avocado', '1/2 cup Best Food's Mayonnaise with Lime Juice']
directions: ['Heat olive oil in 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat and cook onion and jalapeno pepper, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until tender. Add shrimp and cook, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Chill 30 minutes.', 'Stir in avocados and Hellmann's(R) or Best Foods(R) Mayonnaise with Lime Juice. Season, if desired, with salt and serve with hot pepper sauce.']

title: Olmstead Manor'S Peanut Butter Spread
ingredients: ['5 lb. peanut butter', '2 lb. butter', '1 c. honey']
directions: ['Blend all together very well.', 'Needs to be refrigerated, but tastes better at room temperature.', 'Can be used on bread, crackers or carrot sticks.']

title: Surprise Rice And Gravy
ingredients: ['10 c. rice', '2 c. roast beef', '1 chicken leg', 'bread']
directions: ['Cut the chicken and roast beef.', 'Stir it; put in rice.', 'Add some bread and cook for a while.', 'Yum!']

title: Graham Cracker Toffee Bars
ingredients: ['12 double graham crackers', '2 c. nuts', '2 sticks butter', '1/2 c. sugar']
directions: ['Cover cookie sheet with foil.', 'Lay graham crackers on cookie sheet; sprinkle nuts on top. Boil sugar and butter for 2 1/2 minutes. Pour over graham crackers and nuts. Bake in 325° oven for 10 to 12 minutes.']

title: Broccoli Bake
ingredients: ['1 pkg chopped broccoli', '1/2 stick margarine', '4 slices cheese', '1/2 pkg town house crackers']
directions: ['Cook broccoli and drain; place in baking dish with margarine, cheese and crackers crumbled.', 'Mix well.', 'Top with more crackers and cheese. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.']

title: Broccoli With Asiago
ingredients: ['1 bunch broccoli, cut into spears', '4 teaspoons minced garlic', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'Dash pepper', '1 cup shaved Asiago cheese']
directions: ['Place broccoli in a large skillet; cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 5-7 minutes or until broccoli is tender. Drain well. Remove and keep warm.', 'In the same skillet, saute garlic in oil for 1 minute. Stir in the broccoli, salt and pepper. Top with cheese.']

title: John'S Favorite Pepper Shrimp
ingredients: ['2 lb. shrimp', '2 sticks butter', '2 cloves garlic', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and simmer for 5 minutes. Spread raw shrimp evenly in 13 x 9 Pyrex dish. Pour melted garlic butter over shrimp. Toss gently with your hands. Sprinkle pepper over all the shrimp. Just when you think you've put enough pepper, add more. You can't add too much. Toss again with your hands. Put in 350° preheated oven and bake for 15 to 20 minutes. Shrimp should be pink. Toss with spoon and bake only 5 minutes more. Save the juice off of this; it's very good for dipping toasted bread.']

title: Breakfast toast
ingredients: ['2 slice loaf bread', '3 slice sliced cheese', 'dash of olive oil', '2 tbsp margarine', '1 tbsp mayonnaise']
directions: ['Put 1tbsp of margarine in 2slice of bread', 'Add a dash of olive oil and then put the margarined bread', 'Then just flip it until golden brown on the side', 'Then put the 2tbsp of mayonnaise on place and the 3slice of sliced cheese', 'Then put just enough of margarine on the toasted side until it is toasted enough', 'Then serve it hot with a side of orange juice.. don't forget to put your picture']

title: French Toast With Chocolate
ingredients: ['2 slice Sliced bread', '1/2 bar Chocolate bar', '1 Egg', '120 ml Milk', '1 tbsp Sugar', '1 tbsp Butter']
directions: ['Cut each slice of bread into 4 pieces, and cut a slit into each piece.', 'Put a piece of chocolate into each slit.', 'Push it in deep.', 'Mix the egg, milk, and sugar together, and soak the bread in it.', 'Use a shallow container, and make sure to soak both sides of the bread well so that it absorbs all that liquid.', 'Heat up the butter in a frying pan, and pan fry the bread.', 'Put on a lid and cook over low-medium heat.', 'When the bread is browned, turn it over and brown the other side too.']

title: Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['4 slices bread', '2 slices Kraft cheese', 'squeeze butter']
directions: ['You will need a sandwich machine.'],['bread'

title: Grilled Toast With Cheese
ingredients: ['10 slices bread', '10 slices cheese', 'butter']
directions: ['In a large frying pan, melt 1 tablespoon of butter.', 'Place 2 slices of bread in pan.', 'Let brown; turn over.', 'On side facing up place one slice of cheese.', 'When other side is brown, put both slices together to form a sandwich.', 'Repeat for each sandwich.']

title: Waffle Iron Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['2 slice bread', '2 slice cheese', '2 tbsp unsalted butter']
directions: ['Melt 2 tablespoons of butter.', '30 seconds in my microwave did the trick.', 'If your butter is soft, and not straight out of the fridge like mine, you can spread directly on bread.', 'Butter one side of each slice of bread.', 'Place two slices of cheese on the non buttered side.', 'You want the butter on the outside!', 'Sandwichify and place on HOT waffle iron.', 'Buttered side is on the outside of the sandwich!', 'Lightly press the waffle iron down for about 60 seconds until the grilled cheese is golden and crispy.']

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 slice cheese', '2 slices bread', 'butter']
directions: ['Take 2 slices bread and butter one side of each.', 'Put one piece of the bread buttered side down onto a hot griddle.', 'Put a slice of cheese on top of bread and put the other piece of bread, buttered side up, on top of cheese.', 'Let bottom get light or golden brown.', 'Turn and do the same to other side.']

title: Jenna'S Grilled Cheese(Kindergarten Recipe)
ingredients: ['2 pieces of bread', 'butter', '2 slices of cheese']
directions: ['Put the butter on the top of the bread.', 'Put the cheese inside and grill it on the stove.', 'Flip it over.', 'If the side is brown, then you are ready to eat it.']

title: Grill Cheese
ingredients: ['1 slice cheese', '2 slices bread', '1/2 stick butter']
directions: ['Melt butter; place cheese between bread.', 'Place in pan.', 'Brown on both sides.', 'Cool, then serve.']

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
ingredients: ['1/4 stick butter', '2 slices bread', '1 slice cheese']
directions: ['Heat butter in skillet.', 'Put cheese in between bread.', 'Put in pan.', 'Cook until nice and brown.', 'Then eat it.']

title: Busy Day Grilled Cheese
ingredients: ['bread', 'cheese', 'butter']
directions: ['You will need foil and an iron.'],['bread'

title: K & B'S Famous Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '2 pieces Kraft cheese', 'butter']
directions: ['Set oven at broil.', 'Take one slice of bread and put butter on one side of it.', 'Lay, butter side down, on a cookie sheet, then take both slices of cheese (unwrapped) and put them on the bread. Take the other piece of bread and put butter on one side of it. Lay that piece of bread on top of the cheese.', 'Butter side up and place in the oven until golden brown.']

title: Quick Low Fat Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '2 slices cheese', 'butter-flavored cooking spray']
directions: ['Spray both sides of each bread with cooking spray. Then place in toaster, toasted to your desire. Then place cheese slices between the toast and microwave for 15 seconds. Serve and eat!']

title: Sweet 'N Sour Hot Dogs
ingredients: ['all beef hot dogs', 'apricot jam']
directions: ['Slice hot dogs and mix with jam in crock-pot.', 'Simmer for 15 minutes.', 'Ready to serve.']

title: Scamorza Octopus Au Gratin
ingredients: ['1 octopus', 'cheese', 'sea salt']
directions: ['Tenderize the octopus using a meat mallet.', 'Add the octopus to salted boiling water and cook for 25 minutes.', 'Drain the octopus and slice. Place the octopus on a foil lined baking sheet. Top with cheese and season with salt.', 'Place in the oven and broil until the cheese is melted. Serve hot.']

title: Pear And Cheese Toast
ingredients: ['1 pear', '1 ounce cheese', '1 slice bread', '1 little butter']
directions: ['Peel and core the pear, and cut into thin slices. Slice the cheese thinly. Toast the bread lightly on both sides under the grill and spread with butter. Arrange the pear slices on the toast, and top with the slices of the cheese. Put back under the hot grill for a few minutes, until the cheese is golden and melted. Serve at once.']

title: Zucchini And Cheese Broil
ingredients: ['sliced raw zucchini', 'melted butter', 'garlic powder', 'Feta cheese']
directions: ['Place zucchini in casserole.', 'Put melted butter on top. Sprinkle garlic powder on and top with Feta cheese.', 'Put under broiler until cheese melts and browns slightly.']

title: Holiday Fudge Sauce Recipe
ingredients: ['1 pound box confectioners' sugar', '1 stick butter', '1 can evaporated lowfat milk', '6 sq. Baker's chocolate', '1 teaspoon vanilla']
directions: ['In double boiler, heat butter and chocolate till smooth.', 'Gradually add in sugar and lowfat milk.', 'Keep stirring till smooth and creamy.', 'Add in 1 tsp.', 'vanilla.', 'Pour into jars when cold and keep refrigerated.', 'Portions may be heated in microwave for warm fudge sundaes or possibly brownie a-la-mode.', 'Add in minced walnuts and heavy cream for topping.']

title: Fudge a la Louise
ingredients: ['4 cups sugar', '3 squares chocolate unsweetened dark', '113 cups milk', '2 tablespoons butter plus extra for, greasing platters', '1 cup nuts chopped', '113 teaspoons vanilla extract']
directions: ['In a heavy saucepan mix together the sugar, chocolate, and milk.', 'Place the pan over high heat and stir constantly until the choclate is melted and the sugar is dissolved.', 'Bring to a full boil, and lower the heat so the candy continues to boil gently, not vigorously.', 'Stir no more.', 'Put a candy thermometer into the center of the mixture and cook until the temperature reaches exactly 232 F.', 'Meanwhile, butter a large platter (turkey size) and a flat pan about 11 by 13 inches.', 'When the fudge reaches 232 F, pour it into the readied platter - do not scrape the pan, but let it drip out.', 'Dot with 2 tablespoons butter and let the mixture cool until the platter feels cool underneath.', 'Add vanilla.', 'Take a large slotted spoon and start to stir the liquidy mixture - it will take about 15 or 20 minutes.', 'You will see a steady change from dark to light color, from glossy to dull, from liquid to solid.', 'When the fudge begins to get dull, add the nuts and mix in thoroughly.', 'Put fudge into the large buttered pan and press into shape with the flat of your palms.', 'Cut into squares; store in airtight container if there's any left.']

title: Mom'S Slick Dumplings
ingredients: ['Equal amounts of beef drippings and flour', 'salt and pepper to taste']
directions: ['Mix above ingredients together.', 'Add more flour just until you create a soft, moist dough.', 'Flour a counter top and put dough in center.', 'Using a floured rolling pin, roll dough to approximately 1/8 inch to 1/4 inch thick.', 'Taking a sharp knife, cut the dough into rectangles approximately 2 inches x 3 inches. Take roast drippings and add enough water to make about 3 inches of broth in bottom of large saucepan.', 'Add salt and pepper to taste.', 'If you are short on drippings and the water dilutes it too much, add beef bouillon cubes to make extra fluid or canned beef broth.', 'Gently peel dumplings from counter.', 'Add them to boiling broth one at a time and immerse them totally before adding the next dumpling.', 'Cover and cook about 10 minutes.']

title: Boiled Tongue
ingredients: ['1 beef tongue', '1 teaspoon salt']
directions: ['Place the tongue in a soup pot with the salt, and add enough water to cover. Bring to a boil, and cook until the outer skin begins to peel off, about 2 1/2 to 3 hours. Peel off the thick outer skin, and serve.']

title: Truffles
ingredients: ['5 tablespoons butter', '2/3 cup sifted confectioners' sugar', '3 ounces semisweet chocolate, melted and cooled', '1 teaspoon vanilla', 'finely chopped nuts']
directions: ['Cream butter and gradually add sugar, blending well.', 'Stir in chocolate and vanilla.', 'Chill until firm enough to handle.', 'Shape into 1' balls and roll in nuts.', 'Chill until set and store in refrigerator.']

title: Best Ever Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 whole Sliced Onion', '1 whole Sliced Tomato', '2 pieces Bread, Buttered', '1 piece Butter Or Margarine', '1 piece Cheese']
directions: ['1.', 'Melt the butter in a hot skillet and saute the onion until translucent and well-cooked.', '2.', 'Put the bread, butter side down, on a hot skillet.', 'Put the slice of cheese, tomato, and onion on top.', 'Place the other piece of bread, butter side up, on top.', 'Cook until the bread is browned on both sides.', '3.', 'Enjoy!', 'This recipe is very easy to make and the onion and tomato slices can easily make up to four sandwiches, so you may want to cut the onion and tomato in half and save the other halves for later.']

title: Simple Chocolate Fudge
ingredients: ['4 ounces unsweetened chocolate', '1 12 cups milk', '18 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons vanilla', '4 cups sugar', '14 cup butter']
directions: ['Place chocolate and milk in pan, cook and stir over very low heat until mixture is smooth and well blended & slightly thickened.', 'Add sugar and salt stir over med heat until sugar is dissolved and mixture boils.', 'Continue boiling over medium heat without stirring until mixture reaches 234 degrees on candy thermometer.', 'Remove from heat and add butter and vanilla.', 'Do NOT stir.', 'Cool to 110 degrees then beat until mixture begins to lose its gloss and holds its shape.', 'Pour into pan.', 'Cool until set then cut into squares.', 'Let stand in pan until firm.']

title: Marrow Bone Butter
ingredients: ['3 beef marrow bones', 'pepper and salt']
directions: ['Crack bones and roast in 350° oven for 1 hour or when marrow feels soft.', 'Scoop out marrow and season with salt and pepper. Serve on Indian bread or tortillas.']

title: Pao De Queijo
ingredients: ['1 egg', '80 ml olive oil', '60 ml milk', '65 g cheese', '1 teaspoon salt, to taste']
directions: ['1.Pre-heat the oven to 200c and grease a cupcake tray.', 'Put all the ingredients in a blender and pulse until smooth to create your batter.', 'This recipe is quite simple so feel free to experiment by adding herbs and spices to the mix.', '2.Pour the batter evenly into the cupcake tray and then bake in the oven for 15-20 mins until the batter has puffed up and they are slightly brown on top.', 'Leave them to cool.', 'Devour.', 'from http://www.therealbrazil.com/guide/brazilrecipes.aspx.']

title: mac meets tuna
ingredients: ['2 mac &cheese', '1/4 butter', '2 tuna']
directions: ['set up water for noodles', 'let noodles boil then drain a bur a lil water', 'add 2 cans of tuna to butter and water mix with noodles stir till tuna blends almost with noodles', 'finally add cheese mix and stir till mixed the place in bowl and salt and pepper if u want :)', 'now enjoy']

title: Avocado Honey Cheese Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '1/2 Avocado', '1 Cheese', '1 Honey', '1 Olive oil', '1 pinch Salt', '1 pinch Black pepper']
directions: ['Spread olive oil on sliced bread.', 'Sprinkle lightly with salt.', 'Top with diced avocado and cheese.', 'Top with honey and toast.', 'Serve with black pepper if you like!', 'Also check out my Gratin-Style Avocado and Camembert with Honey Mustard.', 'I based it on this recipe!']

title: Beef And Rice
ingredients: ['1 pkg. beef', '1 box Minute rice', '1 large onion', '1 large pepper']
directions: ['Cook beef until done.', 'Cook onion and pepper with beef.', 'Put rice in pot.', 'Cook on low heat until done.', 'Salt and pepper to your taste.']

title: Hash Casserole
ingredients: ['roast beef Cooked, chopped, amount depends on people', '1 onion', 'salt', 'pepper omit salt if using dry Green pepper, opt., chopped, browned']
directions: ['Brown raw onions and peppers in butter, until tender. Add shredded or chopped potatoes, meat and gravy. If not enough gravy add 1 can of creamy onion soup.', 'Put in casserole and put in the oven for 30 to 40 minutes at 325 degrees. Depends on amount you make. (Microwave for 10 to 12 minutes.)', 'Not enough potatoes, add a slice or two of cubed old bread. Small amounts of cooked vegetables are good. Use your imagination.']

title: Melted cheese omelette
ingredients: ['2 Egg', '1 Salt and white pepper', '1 table spoon Milk', '1/2 slice Sliced cheese', '5 grams Butter']
directions: ['Cut the sliced cheese in half.', 'Beat the egg and mix in the milk, salt and pepper.', 'Melt the butter in the pan.', 'Once hot enough that a bit of the egg mixture sizzles, pour the rest of it in.', 'Stir briskly.', 'Once half-done, place the cheese in the middle and fold over to one side.', 'Lift up the pan a bit and tap on the quite hard a few times to move the egg to the side of the pan further away from you.', 'Here's what it should look like from the side.', 'The cooked omelette will hop about when you're tapping on the handle of the pan.', 'Fold it over to let it take the shape of an omelette.', 'Flip it over.', 'Move the omelette to the furthest side of the pan and flip it over again.', 'This will help seal the seams of your omelette together.', 'Plate and you're done!', 'It looks like this when cut.']

title: Shape Snack
ingredients: ['cheese', 'crackers']
directions: ['Cut cheese slices into triangles.', 'Eat on round, square or rectangular crackers.', 'Practice saying the names of the shapes as you eat them.']

title: Steamed Lobster
ingredients: ['1 1/4-pound live lobster', '2 tablespoons butter', '1/2 lemon']
directions: ['Set up a collapsible steamer in a very large pot.', 'Pour in a good inch of water and bring to a boil.', 'Lower the lobster into the pot, on top of the steamer; slap on the lid and hold it there for the first minute or so of cooking, to keep the lobster firmly in place.', 'Meanwhile, melt the butter slowly in a small pot, and squeeze in as much lemon juice as you like.', 'Keep warm.', 'After 10 minutes of cooking, remove the lobster with tongs, and let the water drip back into the pot.', 'Place on a big plate, with the melted butter in a small cup alongside.', 'If you dont have lobster-eating equipment, look in your toolbox for something to crack the tough shells, or use a nutcracker.', 'I use poultry shears to cut through the middle from head to tail, so I can break the body open and get at the meat.', 'Dip each bite into the melted butter, and relish the delectable sweet, sea-scented flavor.', 'And be sure to spoon out the tomalley, now greenish in color and creamy in texture, and glorious to eat.', 'Return the shells to the broth, and cook together for about 15 minutes, adding a little more water.', 'Youll now have a fine broth to use in any fish soup, or for the base of a New England Bouillabaisse (page 91).']

title: Easy in the Microwave Cheesy French Toast
ingredients: ['1 slice Sliced bread', '1 Egg', '2 to 3 tablespoons Milk', '1 tbsp Sugar', '1/2 tbsp Butter', '1 slice Easy-melting cheese']
directions: ['Prepare a large sheet of parchment paper and twist the ends to make a dish.', 'Pack it with pieces of bread, and add the combined ingredients marked .', 'See the Helpful Hints section.', 'When the liquid has mixed in, top with the cheese slice.', 'Microwave at 500 W for 1 and 1/2 minutes to finish!']

title: Grilled bacon cheese sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slice bread', '4 bacon', '2 slice cheese', '1 tbsp butter']
directions: ['preheat 2 pans', 'cook 4 slices of bacon in one pan', 'grill your 2 bread slices on side than when light brown flip to other side..', 'add the cheese', 'when bacon is cooked add on top of cheese', 'put both slices of bread together, when both sides are lightly browned they are done', 'enjoy!', ':)']

title: Bacon, Cheese, Tomato Sandwiches
ingredients: ['bacon', 'bread', 'cheese', 'tomato', 'butter']
directions: ['Cook bacon.', 'On 1', 'slice', 'of', 'bread,', 'put', 'a', 'slice', 'of cheese.', 'On another, put tomato slices.', 'Put bacon between and put the 2 slices of bread together.', 'Butter the sides of bread and cook same as a grilled cheese sandwich.']

title: Breakfast Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 slice bread', '1 slice cheese, cut in half', '1 slice avocado', '1 slice tomatoes']
directions: ['Toast bread and cut in half.', 'Place cheese, avocado and tomato on half slice of toast.', 'Top with remaining toast.', 'Tasty!']

title: Lobster Tails
ingredients: ['4 lobster tails', '1 1/2 tsp. salt', 'melted butter', 'lemon', 'black pepper']
directions: ['Thaw frozen tails.', 'In a 3-quart saucepan, bring 6 cups of water and 1 1/2 teaspoons salt to a boil.', 'Add tails.', 'Simmer, uncovered, for 4 to 8 minutes for 3 ounce tails (6 to 10 minutes for 6 ounce tails; 8 to 12 minutes for 8 ounce tails) or until shell turns bright red and meat is tender.', 'Drain.', 'Serve with melted butter and lemon.', '(Optional:', 'black pepper.)']

title: Sweet And Sour Beef Ribs
ingredients: ['2 slabs of beef ribs.', 'Can be done with pork ribs as well.']
directions: ['Dip beef ribs in your favorite', 'BBQ sauce. Place on grill for about 15 minutes. BBQ ribs are ready for the eating.']

title: Shrimp Avocado Boats
ingredients: ['avocado', 'shrimp', 'cheese', 'crispy bacon Chopped']
directions: ['Cut Avocados in half.', 'Score inside of each avocado, making sure not to cut thru skin.', 'Drizzle avocado and shrimp with olive oil. Sprinkle w/ salt and pepper.', 'Grill shrimp for 2 mins per side. Remove from heat and chop. Grill avocados, flat side down for 5 mins.', 'Flip avocados once charred and fill with grilled shrimp and cheese. Cover', 'After cheese is melted, add crispy bacon bits on top.. Serve HOT.']

title: Beef Liver With Onions And Bacon
ingredients: ['1 pound beef liver thinly sliced, preferably grass-fed and finished', '1 yellow onion large, thinly sliced', '1/2 pound bacon preferably pastured, cut into 1- inch pieces', 'salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Place the liver in a large bowl and add enough milk to cover; set aside and allow to soak for 30 minutes.', 'Heat a large, heavy - preferably cast iron - skillet over medium-low heat and cook the bacon until just crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon and reserve on a plate; keep warm.', 'Remove all but about 2 tablespoons of the bacon fat from the skillet and reserve. Over medium-low heat, cook the onion until soft, translucent and fragrant, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and add to the plate with the bacon; keep warm.', 'Drain the milk from the liver, pat dry and sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Return the reserved bacon fat to the skillet. Gently cook the liver slices in the bacon fat over medium-low heat until barely pink inside, about 3 or 4 minutes per side. Serve immediately, smothered in the onions and bacon.']

title: Sauteed Spinach with Bacon and Eggs
ingredients: ['3 bunches Boiled spinach', '2 slice Bacon', '1 Egg', '1 Butter', '1 Salt and pepper', '1/2 tbsp plus Grated cheese']
directions: ['Beat the eggs (add milk for a fluffy result).', 'Chop the spinach and bacon into bite-sizes.', 'Melt butter in a frying pan and saute the bacon.', 'When it's cooked thoroughly, add spinach and saute briskly.', 'Add salt, pepper, and grated cheese.', 'Gather the cooked ingredients to the side of the pan.', 'Pour the beaten eggs into the open space.', 'When the eggs are soft-set, mix and cook together with the spinach and bacon to finish.']

title: H L'S Pure Maine Lobster Stew
ingredients: ['1 maine lobster, cooked and shelled', '4 tablespoons butter', '1 quart half-and-half cream', 'salt, if needed']
directions: ['Cut lobster tail, knuckle and claw meat into pieces. Do not mince or chop finely.', 'Melt butter in a deep skillet or heavy sauce pan and add lobster, saute 2 minutes on low heat. This will give a bit of pink color.', 'Add half&half and bring up to slight hot bubble.', 'Simmer on low heat 15 minutes stirring occasionally and serve hot.', 'I like a bit of crusty french bread toasted with this. Personally I avoid a salad or have salad after as I don't want dressing and things getting in the way of the flavor.', 'I used to use light cream for this and changed years ago to half and half. This is going to be high calorie either way though you will not eat it daily so don't worry! :).', 'Cooking time does not include boiling the lobster and you want to boil it until just done with no flavorings in the water at all.', 'You will get 4 meal portions or 6 first course servings. It will, however, be calculated based on 4 servings.']

title: Gluten Free Meatballs
ingredients: ['minced beef 2 pounds ground', '1 egg', '1 onion finely chopped', 'salt', 'pepper', 'olive oil']
directions: ['Mix all of the ingredients in a bowl', 'Make meatball sized balls out of the mix (it should hold together well. Add g-free breadcrumbs if too sticky)', 'Fry in olive oil', 'Serve with or without tomato sauce. (we ate one batch with baked rosemary potatoes and another on polenta with tomato sauce)']

title: Good All the Way to the Crusts! Simple Sandwich
ingredients: ['2 slice Sliced bread', '2 slice Bacon', '2 slice Sliced cheese', '2 tsp Butter', '1 Egg', '50 ml Milk', '1 pinch Krazy Salt']
directions: ['Mix all the ingredients in a bowl and set aside.', 'On a slice of bread, lay one slice of bacon cut in half (using both halves as in the picture).', 'Top with two slices of cheese.', 'Add another layer of bacon.', 'Finally, cover with a second slice of bread.', 'Soak all sides of the sandwich in the mixture.', 'In a frying pan, melt the butter on low heat, then fry both sides of the sandwich.', 'Pour the remaining mixture over the sandwich and continue frying, flipping the sandwich and sopping up the remaining mixture as it fries.', 'Finally, turn the heat to medium and continue frying until both sides are golden brown.', 'Cut thirds as shown, and enjoy!']

title: Classic Turkey Club Sandwich
ingredients: ['3 slices bread, any', '1/4 lb turkey sliced lunch meat', '2 slices cheese any', '4 slices tomatoes', '2 slices lettuce', '2 slices bacon cooked', 'to taste mayonnaise', 'to taste salt & black pepper']
directions: ['Spread mayonnaise on two slices of bread.', 'Add one slice of bacon to the bread (cut in half).', 'Add half of the lunch meat to each slice of bread then top with one slice of cheese.', 'Add two slices of tomato to each half and sprinkle with salt and pepper.', 'Then place the lettuce on top.', 'Add mayonnaise to the third piece of bread.', 'Place on one half of the sandwich and add mayonnaise to the other side.', 'Place the two sandwich half's together and secure with 4 long toothpicks.', 'Make your first cut corner to corner of a sandwich.', 'Then make a cross cuts.', 'Pick up 1/4 of the sandwich and this place a long toothpick from the bottom thougth the top.', 'Do each 1/4 in turn with a long toothpick from the bottom.', 'Can be served with pickles & potato chips, french fries, coleslaw or potato salad.']

title: Tender, Juicy, Roast Beef Ever
ingredients: ['3 1/2 lbs beef eye round', 'coarse salt', 'pepper']
directions: ['Salt and pepper roast all over.', 'Place roast in roasting pan in a pre-heated oven at 450 for 15 minute.', 'Add a little water in pan to loosen up juices.', 'Turn down oven to 325 and cook for 1 hour and 10 minute.', 'Take out and cover with aluminun foil for 30 minute.', 'You can choose to make gravy with the drippings or do what I do and use two packets McCormick Brown gravy and pour in the juice from the roast.', '***If your meat is a different weight then I mentioned, just cook 20 minute per pound. If it is too rare for you liking, just pop it right back in the oven and cook a little longer.***.']

title: The Standing Rib
ingredients: ['4 lb. beef rib roast', 'salt and pepper']
directions: ['Place meat, fat side up, in a 15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 2-inch roasting pan.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Insert a meat thermometer. Roast in a 325° oven until:', 'rare, 2 1/2 hours or 140°; medium, 3 hours or 160°; or well done, 3 1/4 hours or 170°.', 'Cover with foil to keep warm.']

title: Corny Cheese Toasties
ingredients: ['2 slices bread', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon mayonnaise', '1 slice canned corned beef', '1 slice American processed cheese']
directions: ['Preheat skillet over medium heat. Butter each slice of bread on 1 side only. Spread mayonnaise on the un-buttered sides. Place 1 slice of bread, buttered side down, in the skillet. Layer corned beef and cheese slices on bread. Cover with remaining slice of bread, buttered side up. Cook for 5 minutes on each side, or until toast is golden brown, and cheese is melted.']

title: Perfect Prime Rib(Atk)
ingredients: ['6 7 lbs first-cut beef rib roast, 3 ribs, set at room temperature for 3 hours, tied twice between the rib bones', 'salt & fresh ground pepper']
directions: ['Adjust oven rack to low position and heat oven to 200 degrees.', 'Heat large roasting pan over two burners set at medium-high heat.', 'Place roast in hot pan and cook on all sides until nicely browned and about 1/2 cup fat has rendered, 6 to 8 minutes.', 'Remove roast from pan. Set wire rack in pan, then set roast on rack. Generously season with salt and pepper.', 'Place roast in oven and roast until meat registers 130 degrees (for medium-rare), about 3 1/2 hours (or about 30 minutes per pound).', 'Let stand 20 minutes (a bit longer is fine) before serving.', 'Transfer to cutting board and carve in accordance with the instructions below.', 'Tying and Carving the Prime Rib: To carve, remove the twine and set the roast on a cutting board, rib bones perpendicular to the board. Using a carving fork to hold the roast in place, cut along the rib bones to sever the meat from the bones.', 'Set the roast cut side down; carve the meat across the grain into thick slices.', 'We didn't tie the first few prime ribs that we roasted. We found out pretty quickly, though, that unless the roast was tied, the outer layer of meat pulled away from the rib-eye muscle, causing the roast to look a little unattractive. Separated from the main roast, this outer flap of meat also tended to overcook. To solve this problem easily, tie the roast at both ends running parallel to the bone.']
